Retention 名词，意思是保留。电信公司沃达非宣布新政策，给产妇16周带薪产假，恢复工作后每周只需上30个小时的班。Vodafone says talent retention is one of the goals for designing the new policy. 沃达非公司说，制定这项新政策的目的之一是为了留住人才。哈佛大学的一项研究报告说，Increasing customer retention rate by 5 percent increases profits by 25 to 95 percent. 如果把顾客保留率提高百分之五，就能让盈利提高百分之25到百分之95。好的，今天我们学习的词是 retention, retention, retention…

title: buck the trend
article: 今天我们要学的词是 buck the trend. To buck the trend 意思是逆潮流而进。The Mac has bucked the trend of declining PC sales for quite a while. 就在个人电脑销量下降的时候，苹果电脑的销量很长一段时间来却能逆潮流而上。英国食品市场价格去年下跌1.9%，食品消费支出也下跌1.1%, 然而，UK organic food sales bucked the trend and rose 4 percent. 英国有机食品的销量却逆流而上，上涨了百分之四。好的，今天我们学习的词是 buck the trend, buck the trend, buck the trend…

title: reappear
article: 今天我们要学的词是 reappear. To reappear 意思是重新出现。Russian President Vladimir Putin reappeared in public after a 10-day absence, showing no signs of visible ill-health. 俄罗斯总统普京十天没有露面后，第一次重新在公众场合出现，看不出身体有任何异样。A rare bird, which was long thought to be extinct, reappeared in Myanmar last year. 长时间来一直被学界认为已经灭绝的一种罕见鸟类，去年再次在缅甸出现。好的，今天我们学习的词是 reappear, reappear, reappear…

title: real estate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 real estate. Real estate 房地产。Real estate heir Robert Durst was arrested last Saturday in New Orleans. 房地产富豪之子罗伯特.杜斯特上星期六在新奥尔良被抓捕。17 nonprofit organizations urged the U.S. Treasury to scrutinize foreign real estate buyers for money-laundering risks. 十七家非盈利组织联合呼吁美国财政部对购买房地产的外国人严加核查，防范洗钱的风险。好的，今天我们学习的词是 real estate, real estate, real estate…

title: minimize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 minimize. To minimize 意思是最小化。Saudi Arabia is trying to minimize the impact of plunging oil prices on its economy. 沙特阿拉伯正在设法将油价暴跌对经济的影响降到最低程度。美国阿肯色州发现禽流感。U.S. authorities may impose tougher restrictions in an effort to contain the virus and minimize international trade disruptions. 美国有关当局可能会严格规定，设法控制疫情，尽量减小对国际贸易的影响。好的，今天我们学习的词是 minimize, minimize, minimize…

title: seasonal
article: 今天我们要学的词是 seasonal. Seasonal 形容词，意思是季节性的。A federal visa program in Alaska to hire foreign workers is on temporary hold because of a court ruling. 根据一项法院裁决，阿拉斯加从外国雇佣季节性工人的一个签证项目目前暂时处于停顿状态。Boston broke its seasonal snowfall record with 108.6 inches this year, beating the previous record set in 1995-1996. 波士顿今年冬季降雪量108.6英寸，打破了先前1995年到1996年冬季的最高记录。好的，今天我们学习的词是 seasonal, seasonal, seasonal…

title: consume
article: 今天我们要学的词是 consume. To consume 有消耗的意思。有研究显示，The average person will consume 7,000 animals during their lives, including 2,400 chickens and 4,500 fish. 人一生平均要吃掉7千个动物，其中包括两千四百只鸡和四千五百条鱼。最近一项针对美国年轻人对新闻关心程度的调查发现，Two-thirds of them consume online news frequently, especially through social media, although many of them may never read a newspaper. 虽然很多年轻人都不再读报，但是三分之二的人经常从网上了解新闻，特别是通过社交媒体。好的，今天我们学习的词是 consume, consume, consume…

title: footage
article: 今天我们要学的词是 footage. Footage 名词，有镜头的意思。印度大约600个高中生因为作弊被学校开除。TV footage showed parents and friends scaling the outer walls of school buildings to pass cheat sheets to students taking exams inside. 从电视镜头上可以看到，学生家长和朋友爬墙给里面的考生递小抄。The Tunisian government has released footage showing gunmen walking through the Bardo museum during the attack that killed 25 people. 突尼斯政府公布了巴尔多博物馆袭击事件中枪手在博物馆里的镜头，这起袭击事件造成25人丧生。好的，今天我们学习的词是 footage, footage, footage…

title: punitive
article: 今天我们要学的词是 punitive. Punitive 形容词，意思是惩罚性的。A California judge ruled that Ellen Pao may seek punitive damages in her gender bias case against her employer. 美国加州一个法官裁决，鲍康如在控告雇主性别歧视一案中，可以寻求惩罚性赔偿。Nigerian President Goodluck Jonathan recently said the solution to the anti-graft campaign should be more preventative than punitive. 尼日利亚总统乔纳森最近说，反腐行动的最佳途径是预防，而不是惩戒。好的，今天我们学习的词是 punitive, punitive, punitive…

title: detail
article: 今天我们要学的词是 detail. Detail 做为名词，是细节的意思，做为动词，则是具体列举。美国癌症协会和世界肺健基金会公布了最新版的全球吸烟调查。The report detailed the effects of tobacco use on health worldwide. 报告具体阐述了全球范围内烟草使用对人类健康带来的影响。埃博拉病毒爆发一周年之际，无国界医生发表报告。The report slammed the international community’s slow response and detailed the “indescribable horror” faced by its staff. 报告对国际社会反应迟缓提出批评，并列举了无国界医生的工作人员所面临的“无法形容的恐怖”。好的，今天我们学习的词是 detail, detail, detail…

title: graduate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 graduate. Graduate 做为动词，是毕业的意思。An 84-year-old Turkish woman will graduate from Mimar Sinan University this summer, 64 years after her first enrollment. 土耳其一位84岁的老太太今年夏天将从希南大学毕业，她64年前第一次在那里注册入学。美国教育部的最新调查报告显示，More high school students of minority backgrounds and from poor families are graduating. 少数族裔和穷人家孩子的高中生毕业率有所提升。好的，今天我们学习的词是 graduate, graduate, graduate…

title: processed food
article: 今天我们要学的词是 processed food. Processed food 加工食品。Processed food companies are taking a hit as consumers are moving towards healthier foods. 消费者逐渐向健康食品转移，这种趋势让加工食品公司受到打击。美国密西根大学的研究结果显示，Highly processed foods, like French fries and pizza, may be addictive. 薯条和披萨饼这类经过高度加工的食品很可能会让人上瘾。好的，今天我们学习的词是 processed food, processed food, processed food…

title: deliberate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 deliberate. Deliberate 形容词，意思是故意的。法国调查人员说，The co-pilot of the Germanwings passenger jet that crashed in the French Alps made a deliberate attempt to destroy the aircraft. 在法国阿尔卑斯山区坠毁的德国之翼客机的副驾驶是故意坠机。A Federal Reserve investigation found no evidence of deliberate leaks of confidential information from its interest-rate policy meeting in September 2012. 美联储调查没有发现证据证明，有人故意泄露了2012年9月美联储利率政策会议上的保密信息。好的，今天我们学习的词是 deliberate, deliberate, deliberate…

title: flare up
article: 今天我们要学的词是 flare-up. Flare-up 做为名词，有突发的意思，常用来指暴力事件或是疫情。Indiana’s Governor declared a public health emergency after one of its counties saw a large HIV flare-up from intravenous drug use. 印第安纳州一个郡因静脉毒品注射引起艾滋病毒感染人数猛增，印第安纳州州长宣布进入公共卫生紧急状态。研究人员发现，The places hit by the latest measles flare-up in the U.S. had inoculation rates as low as 50 percent. 美国最近受麻疹突发所影响地区的麻疹疫苗接种率最低的只有50%。好的，今天我们学习的词是 flare-up, flare-up, flare-up…

title: secrecy
article: 今天我们要学的词是 secrecy. Secrecy 做为名词，是秘密的意思。密西西比州高等教育委员会决定不跟密西西比大学校长续约。Thousands of protesters demonstrated last weekend, criticizing the decision for being wrapped in secrecy. 数以千计的示威者上周末抗议游行，批评这一决定暗箱作业，缺少透明度。黎巴嫩银行协会主席最近说，Lebanon will not abandon its banking secrecy law but will continue to cooperate with the United States and other nations to fight against money laundering. 黎巴嫩不会取消银行保密法，但是会继续跟美国等国家配合，打击洗钱。好的，今天我们学习的词是 secrecy, secrecy, secrecy…

title: close to heart
article: 今天我们要学的词是 close to heart. Close to one’s heart 意思是特别关心的。苹果公司首席执行官库克保证把自己的财产全部捐献给慈善机构。AIDS, human rights, and immigration reform are all issues close to his heart. 艾滋病，人权和移民法改革都是他最关心的问题。Kate Middleton, the Duchess of Cambridge, recently urged the public to focus on a cause close to her hear, mental health. 剑桥公爵夫人凯特.米德尔顿最近敦促公众更多地重视精神健康，这是一个她格外关注的问题。好的，今天我们学习的词是 close to heart, close to heart, close to heart…

title: one stop shop
article: 今天我们要学的词是 one-stop shop. One-stop shop 一站式商店。Amazon recently launched “Home Services,” a one-stop shop that lets you order professional services ranging from home maintenance to technical support. 亚马逊推出一站式家居服务，用户可以寻找从房屋维修到技术帮助等各种专业人员。Facebook wants to become a one-stop shop for news, and is in talks with a number of news organizations. 脸书网希望为用户提供一站式新闻服务，为此正在跟很多新闻机构接洽。好的，今天我们学习的词是 one-stop shop, one-stop shop, one-stop shop…

title: bloodshed
article: 今天我们要学的词是 bloodshed. Bloodshed 流血。In his Easter address, Pope Francis called for ending “absurd” violence, bloodshed, and persecution in hotspots around the world . 罗马天主教宗方济各在复活节讲话中，呼吁结束世界各大冲突热点的“荒谬的”暴力，流血和迫害。Somalia’s Islamic extremist group al-Shabab warned of more bloodshed in Kenya. 索马里伊斯兰极端组织青年党警告说，要在肯尼亚制造更多的流血事件。好的，今天我们学习的词是 bloodshed, bloodshed, bloodshed…

title: officiate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 officiate. Officiate 动词，有主持活动，或是担任裁判的意思。For the first time in its history, the NFL will have a woman officiating games. 美国职业橄榄球协会有史以来将第一次让女性担任比赛裁判。Utah’s governor signed a bill allowing county clerks to refuse to officiate marriages for religious reasons，but also mandated that a substitute be found. 美国犹他州州长签署法案，允许郡书记官因为宗教信仰的原因，拒绝给某些人主持婚礼，但必须找人代为主持。好的，今天我们学习的词是 officiate, officiate, officiate…

title: allocate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 allocate. Allocate 动词，意思是分配，指定。IBM is allocating $3 billion to establish a new business unit to provide IoT systems and services to enterprises. IBM 拨款三十亿美元，成立一个新部门，专门负责为公司企业提供物联网的系统和服务。最近一项审计报告发现，One third of the funds allocated by Sierra Leone’s government to fight Ebola is unaccounted for. 塞拉利昂政府用于打击埃博拉病毒的拨款里，三分之一的钱下落不明。好的，今天我们学习的词是 allocate, allocate, allocate…

title: ownership
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ownership. Ownership 所有权。统计数字显示，Home ownership peaked at 69.2 percent in 2004 in the United States, but had slipped to 64 percent by the end of 2014. 美国买房的家庭比例2004年最高，达到69.2%, 到2014年年底时滑落到64%。皮尤研究中心的调查显示，54 percent of blacks now see gun ownership as a good thing, up from 29 percent two years ago. 如今，美国54%的黑人认同购买和拥有枪支，这一比例两年前还只有29%。好的，今天我们学习的词是 ownership, ownership, ownership…

title: once in a lifetime
article: 今天我们要学的词是 once-in-a-lifetime. Once-in-a-lifetime 是千载难逢的意思。A once-in-a-lifetime experience 千载难逢的经历。President Barack Obama said the nuclear framework agreement reached last week with Iran represents a “once-in-a-lifetime” opportunity to bring some stability to the Middle East. 美国总统奥巴马说，上星期跟伊朗达成的核框架协议是一个可以给中东带来稳定的千载难逢的机会。好的，今天我们学习的词是 once-in-a-lifetime, once-in-a-lifetime, once-in-a-lifetime…

title: make history
article: 今天我们要学的词是 make history. To make history 意思是创造历史，过去时是 made history. A new smart phone app called Women on the Map will alert users when they are near a spot where a woman made history. 一个名叫“地图上的女性”的手机应用可以提醒用户，他们所在地点附近曾有女性创造过历史。President Obama made history over the weekend by meeting with Cuban President Raul Castro. 美国总统奥巴马上周末会见古巴总统劳尔.卡斯特罗，书写了历史。好的，今天我们学习的词是 make history, make history, make history…

title: restrict
article: 今天我们要学的词是 restrict.Restrict 动词，意思是限制。China is restricting visits by Shenzhen residents to Hong Kong to one trip per week. 中国政府限制深圳居民，每周只能去香港一次。California has started restricting water usage because of the ongoing draught. 由于持续不断的旱情，加州政府开始限制用水。The Vietnam government issued a resolution , restricting takeover of farmlands for other purposes. 越南政府颁布决议，限制征用耕地另做他用。好的，今天我们学习的词是 restrict, restrict, restrict…

title: everyday
article: 今天我们要学的词是 everyday. Everyday 分开做为两个字的时候，大家都知道是每天的意思；连在一起，做为一个词，则可以做形容词，意思是普通的，平常的。比如：everyday problems 意思是日常生活中经常遇到的问题，everyday worries 日常烦恼。希拉里.克林顿宣布参加2016年总统大选。希拉里说，”Everyday Americans need a champion, and I want to be that champion.” 普通美国人需要有人去捍卫他们的利益，我希望能成为这个人。好的，今天我们学习的词是 everyday, everyday, everyday…

title: meteoric rise
article: 今天我们要学的词是 meteoric rise. Meteoric rise 意思是急速上升。最近有报道说，There has been a meteoric rise in Russian cyber attacks against the United States since the U.S. started to impose sanctions. 自从美国对俄罗斯施加制裁以来，俄罗斯对美国发动的网络空间袭击数量迅速增长。Marco Rubio, the Florida Senator who has had a meteoric rise in politics, says he is running for President. 美国政界迅速升起的一颗新星，来自佛罗里达州的联邦参议员马克.卢比奥宣布参选总统。好的，今天我们学习的词是 meteoric rise, meteoric rise, meteoric rise…

title: home services
article: 今天我们要学的词是 home services. Home services 意思是家居服务业。The home services industry in the United States, valued at over $400 billion, remains highly fragmented and localized. 美国家居服务业有超过四千亿美元的市场，但目前还处于高度分裂和局部化状态。Some of the biggest names in e-commerce like Google and Amazon are vying for a chunk of the huge home services market. 谷歌和亚马逊等电子商业巨头都准备在巨大的家居服务市场争夺一块地盘。好的，今天我们学习的词是 home services, home services, home services…

title: emergency
article: 今天我们要学的词是 emergency. Emergency 可以做形容词，意思是紧急的。European Union officials had an emergency meeting after a migrant boat disaster. 一艘搭载非法移民的船只发生沉船事故后，欧盟官员召开紧急会议。The Federal Railroad Administration issued an emergency order that trains carrying large quantities of crude oil or ethanol travel no faster than 40 mph through highly populated areas. 美国联邦铁路局发布紧急命令，运载大量原油或乙醇的货车途经人口密集地区，时速不得超过40英里。好的，今天我们学习的词是 emergency, emergency, emergency…

title: broadcast
article: 今天我们要学的词是 broadcast. Broadcast 做为动词，意思是广播，播放。CNN International is scheduled to broadcast a special interactive debate ahead of the UK election. 英国大选即将来临，CNN国际频道将播放一次大选前互动辩论的特别节目。Norway will be the first nation to stop broadcasting on the FM band and completely transition to digital radio in 2017. 挪威2017年将成为停止调频波段，彻底转向数字广播的第一个国家。好的，今天我们学习的词是 broadcast, broadcast, broadcast…

title: edge out
article: 今天我们要学的词是 edge out. To edge out 意思是挤掉，替代。统计数字显示，Revenue from digital music downloads and subscriptions edged out those from CDs for the first time in 2014. 音乐的下载和订购收入2014年首次超过了销售CD所得的收入。最近一项关于乘客对航空公司满意程度的调查显示，JetBlue Airways delivered the best customer service, narrowly edging out Southwest Airlines. 美国捷蓝航空公司以小幅优势，挤掉西南航空公司，成为客服最好的航空公司。好的，今天我们学习的词是 edge out, edge out, edge out…

title: disqualify
article: 今天我们要学的词是 disqualify. To disqualify 是取消资格的意思。The winner of this year’s St. Louis Marathon was disqualified after marathon officials found her cheating. 今年圣路易斯马拉松比赛冠军事后被比赛官员发现作弊，因此被取消资格。Lincoln Chafee, a potential challenger for Hillary Clinton’s democratic nomination, said Clinton’s 2002 vote for the Iraq War should disqualify her from becoming commander in chief. 可能会对希拉里.克林顿民主党总统提名构成威胁的林肯.卡菲表示，希拉里2002年投票支持出兵伊拉克，就凭这点，她就没资格当总统。好的，今天我们学习的词是 disqualify, disqualify, disqualify…

title: shipment
article: 今天我们要学的词是 shipment. Shipment 名词，意思是运货。U.S. navy officials said that a U.S. aircraft carrier was on its way to Yemeni waters to help intercept Iranian weapons shipments. 美国海军官员说，美国已经派遣了一艘航空母舰前往也门海域，协助阻截伊朗运送武器的船只。Lebanon has received the first shipment of $3 billion worth of French weapons paid for by Saudi Arabia. 黎巴嫩已经收到了第一批法国武器，这些武器是由沙特阿拉伯出资购买的，总价值30亿美元。好的，今天我们学习的词是 shipment, shipment, shipment…

title: aftershock
article: 今天我们要学的词是 aftershock. Aftershock 名词，意思是余震。A major aftershock hit the Kathmandu area of Nepal last Sunday, sending terrified people into the streets. 尼泊尔加德满都地区上周日发生强烈余震，惊慌失措的人们纷纷跑到街上。Aftershocks and road damage have made it difficult for rescuers to reach communities outside Kathmandu. 余震和道路受到的破坏让救援人员很难进入加德满都的城郊地区。好的，今天我们学习的词是 aftershock, aftershock, aftershock…

title: justified
article: 今天我们要学的词是 justified. Justified 形容词，意思是有正当理由的。Russian President Vladimir Putin said in a new documentary that the annexation of Crimea was justified. 俄罗斯总统普京在一部新纪录片中表示，兼并克里米亚的行动是正当的。According to a new poll conducted in Russia, 45 percent of respondents consider the “sacrifices” made by Russians under Stalin’s rule were justified in order to achieve enormous economic progress. 俄罗斯一项最新民调显示，45%的受访者认为，斯大林统治时期为经济大发展做出的牺牲是合乎情理的。好的，今天我们学习的词是 justified, justified, justified…

title: apprehension
article: 今天我们要学的词是 apprehension. Apprehension 有逮捕的意思。According to the Department of Homeland Security, there has been a sharp drop in the apprehension of illegal immigrants at the U.S.’ southern border. 美国国土安全部说，美国南部边境被抓到的非法移民人数明显下降。A picture on Instagram showing high-end watches for sale led to the smuggler’s apprehension. 有人走私高级手表，把照片放在图片分享应用 Instagram上，结果引火烧身被抓捕。好的，今天我们学习的词是 apprehension, apprehension, apprehension…

title: to date
article: 今天我们要学的词是 to date. To date 意思是到目前为止。In a closed door meeting last weekend, former President George W. Bush delivered his harshest criticisms to date against his successor, President Obama, on foreign policy. 在上周末的一次不对外会议上，前总统小布什对继任者奥巴马总统的外交政策做出了迄今为止最严厉的批评。战争游戏黑色行动3定于11月6号发行。The popular video game series Black Ops has nearly 100 million players to date. 黑色行动系列游戏迄今已有近亿用户。好的，今天我们学习的词是 to date, to date, to date…

title: fluoride
article: 今天我们要学的词是 fluoride. Fluoride 氟化物。The U.S. government is lowering the recommended amount of fluoride added to drinking water for the first time in more than 50 years. 美国政府50多年来首次降低饮用水建议添加的氟化物的含量。有关官员解释说，People may get too much fluoride these days because it is also added to toothpaste, mouthwash and other products. 现在牙膏，漱口液等产品内也添加了氟化物，这种情况可能会使人们摄取过多的氟化物。好的，今天我们学习的词是 fluoride, fluoride, fluoride…

title: join the fray
article: 今天我们要学的词是 join the fray. To join the fray 意思是参与竞争或冲突。Carly Fiorina, the former chief executive of HP, joined the fray in seeking the Republican nomination for President. 前惠普公司总裁卡莉.菲奥里纳加入了共和党总统提名的角逐。Louisiana Governor Bobby Jindal joined the fray with other Republicans, battling with President Obama over Medicaid spending. 路易斯安那州州长博比.金达尔加入其它共和党人阵营，反对奥巴马总统有关联邦医疗补助计划开支的政策。好的，今天我们学习的词是 join the fray, join the fray, join the fray…

title: in connection with
article: 今天我们要学的词是 in connection with. In connection with 意思是与某事相关的。Six police officers in connection with the death of Baltimore resident Freddie Gray are facing criminal charges. 跟巴尔的摩居民格雷之死有关的六名警察面临刑事指控。UFC fighter Jon Jones turned himself over to authorities in connection with a hit-and-run crash. 终极格斗锦标赛选手乔恩.琼斯向警方自首，他涉嫌一起肇事逃逸案。好的，今天我们学习的词是 in connection with, in connection with, in connection with…

title: immersion
article: 今天我们要学的词是 immersion. Immersion 意思是浸透。Montana has become the second state to fund Native American indigenous language immersion programs in public schools. 蒙大拿州成为美国第二个出资，让公立学校提供印第安土著语言浸透式教育的州。The Los Angeles Unified school board approved a plan to build a Mandarin-English Dual-Language Immersion Elementary school. 洛杉矶联合学区董事会批准兴建一所新小学，让学生接受中英文双语浸透式教育。好的，今天我们学习的词是 immersion, immersion, immersion…

title: critique
article: 今天我们要学的词是 critique. Critique 有批评的意思。U.S. Senator Kirsten Gillibrand released a harsh critique, saying the Pentagon has refused to give her information about sexual assaults that happened at some major bases. 美国联邦参议员吉利伯兰德严辞批评五角大楼，说他们拒绝向她提供某些主要军事基地上发生的性骚扰的信息。Jim Webb, a former Senator from Virginia, delivered an implicit critique of the Clinton era’s foreign policy. 前维吉尼亚州联邦参议员韦伯对克林顿时代的外交政策提出不点名批评。好的，今天我们学习的词是 critique, critique, critique…

title: therapy
article: 今天我们要学的词是 therapy. Therapy 治疗。Gene therapy can help restore vision in patients with a rare form of childhood blindness, but its benefits will start to diminish after one to three years. 基因疗法可以帮助小时候因为一种罕见疾病失明的患者恢复视力，但疗效会在一到三年后开始减弱。美国乔治亚州官员最近宣布，Transgender inmates in Georgia will be eligible to receive hormone therapy treatment while behind bars. 乔治亚州服刑期间的跨性别者可以接受荷尔蒙治疗。好的，今天我们学习的词是 therapy, therapy, therapy…

title: chemicals
article: 今天我们要学的词是 chemicals. Chemicals 化学物质。A group of scientists voiced new health concerns about a common class of chemicals used in thousands of products, including electronics, footwear, and sleeping bags. 科学家对一类常见化学物质对人体健康的影响表示关注，电器，鞋子和睡袋等数以千计的产品中都带有这类化学物质。The State of New York will institute new rules to protect manicurists from the potentially dangerous chemicals in nail products. 纽约州将实行新规定，保护美甲师不受美甲产品里有害化学物质的伤害。好的，今天我们学习的词是 chemicals, chemicals, chemicals…

title: landfall
article: 今天我们要学的词是 landfall. Landfall 登陆。Tropical storm Ana weakened before making landfall in South Caroline on Sunday. 热带风暴安娜星期天在南卡罗来纳州登陆前风力有所减弱。The Unites States has passed the nine and a half year mark without the landfall of a major hurricane, which needs to reach at least Category 3 status. 美国已经有九年半的时间没有强烈飓风登陆，飓风起码要达到三级，才被认为是强烈飓风。好的，今天我们学习的词是 landfall, landfall, landfall…

title: put a damper on
article: 今天我们要学的词是 put a damper on. DTo put a damper on 有降低热烈程度，或令人扫兴的意思。Rain showers put a damper on Mother’s Day, causing most of the outdoor activities to be canceled. 母亲节下雨，大部分户外活动都被取消了，令人扫兴。包括沙特阿拉伯在内的好几位国家首脑都不准备出席在美国戴维营召开的波斯湾国家首脑峰会。Their absences will put a damper on talks that are intended to reassure key Arab allies. 这次峰会目的是消除核心阿拉伯盟国的疑虑，这几位首脑的缺席让会谈黯然失色。好的，今天我们学习的词是 put a damper on, put a damper on, put a damper on…

title: cut short
article: 今天我们要学的词是 cut short. To cut short 有缩短的意思。An eight-day cruise was cut short when a number of passengers on board came down with a stomach bug. 一艘游轮上的乘客感染肠胃病毒，游轮因此被迫缩短原定八天的行程。Former President Jimmy Carter cut short his election observation visit to Guyana due to health reasons. 美国前总统卡特因为健康原因，被迫缩短在圭亚那进行选举观察的行程。好的，今天我们学习的词是 cut short, cut short, cut short…

title: tamper
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tamper. Tamper 动词，有篡改，破坏的意思。After months of investigation, an NFL report concluded that the New England Patriots indeed tampered with game balls for the AFC championship game. 经过几个月的调查，全国职业足球联盟的报告得出结论，新英格兰爱国者队确实在美国足球联盟冠军赛中对比赛用球做了手脚。美国亚特兰大市2005年到2009年间发生作弊丑闻。Almost 180 teachers and principals illegally tampered with scores on state tests. 将近180名教师和校长对州立考试成绩动了手脚。好的，今天我们学习的词是 tamper, tamper, tamper…

title: a spate of
article: 今天我们要学的词是 a spate of. A spate of 有一连串的意思。The neighborhood has seen a spate of car thefts over the past two months. 过去两个月里，小区发生了一连串的偷车事件。The University of Canberra issued warning to students and staff after a spate of robberies on campus. 堪培拉大学校园发生一连串抢劫事件，校方提醒师生注意安全。Guinea has seen a spate of new Ebola cases contracted at funeral ceremonies. 几内亚出现一连串埃博拉感染新病例，这些患者都是在参加葬礼时被传染的。好的，今天我们学习的词是 a spate of, a spate of, a spate of…

title: organized crime
article: 今天我们要学的词是 organized crime. organized crime 有组织的犯罪。美国得克萨斯州城市韦科发生摩托车帮会火拼，192人被抓。The individuals arrested are likely to face charges of engaging in organized crime. 被抓的这些人可能将面临参与有组织犯罪的指控。A recent study suggests that organized crime is widespread in Venezuela. 最新的一项研究显示，委内瑞拉的有组织犯罪十分普遍。好的，今天我们学习的词是 organized crime, organized crime, organized crime…

title: disregard
article: 今天我们要学的词是 disregard. Disregard 可以做名词，意思是无视。美国国务卿克里最近在访问首尔时表示，Pyongyang government has shown “a flagrant disregard for international law while denying its people fundamental freedom and rights.” 朝鲜政府完全无视国际法，剥夺了朝鲜人民最基本的自由和权利。Two UN human rights experts condemned the sharp increase of executions in Iran, calling it “a callous disregard for both human dignity and international human rights law.” 联合国两位人权专家对伊朗处决激增提出谴责，称其为“对人类尊严和国际人权法的冷酷漠视”。好的，今天我们学习的词是 disregard, disregard, disregard…

title: contingency
article: 今天我们要学的词是 contingency. Contingency 名词，有意外，应急的意思。WHO will establish a $100 million contingency fund to better respond to major crises. 世界卫生组织将设立价值一亿美元的应急基金，以便在发生重大危机时能更好地应对。The International Monetary Fund is working with countries in Southeast Europe on contingency plans for a Greek default. 国际货币基金组织跟东南欧国家商讨应急计划，以备希腊出现债务违约。好的，今天我们学习的词是 contingency, contingency, contingency…

title: misuse
article: 今天我们要学的词是 misuse. Misuse 可以做名词，意思是滥用，误用。German Chancellor Angela Merkel called on all countries to help combat the misuse of antibiotics, which is fueling drug resistance. 德国总理默克尔敦促世界各国协助打击误用抗生素的现象，抗生素的误用推动了抗药性的产生。Former Sri Lankan economic development minister Basil Rajapaksa was charged with misuse of public funds. 斯里兰卡前经济发展部部长拉贾帕克萨被控滥用公共基金。 好的，今天我们学习的词是 misuse, misuse, misuse…

title: first ever
article: 今天我们要学的词是 first-ever. First-ever 中间用横杠相连，意思是首次的。Ireland has become the first-ever country to approve same-sex marriage by referendum. 爱尔兰成为第一个通过全民公投，使同性婚姻合法化的国家。Apple’s senior Vice President of Design, Jony Ive, has become Apple’s first-ever Chief Design Officer. 苹果公司掌管设计业务的高级副总裁乔纳森.艾维被提拔为苹果公司第一任首席设计官。 好的，今天我们学习的词是 first-ever, first-ever, first-ever…

title: berate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 berate. Berate 动词，有责骂，痛斥的意思。A Saudi religious policeman berated a veiled woman and barred her from entering a shop for not wearing gloves. 沙特阿拉伯的一个宗教警察对一名头戴面纱的女性大喊大叫，因为这名女性没戴手套而不让她进商店大门。A Starbucks employee was fired after a video showed her berating a customer. 星巴克一名雇员因为大声斥责一名顾客，被星巴克开除。好的，今天我们学习的词是 berate, berate, berate…

title: shootout
article: 今天我们要学的词是 shootout. Shootout 名词，有枪战的意思。Forty-two suspected gang members and one Federal police officer were killed in a shootout in Western Mexico. 墨西哥西部发生枪战，42名疑似团伙成员和一名联邦警察在枪战中被打死。In the wake of the deadly biker-gang shootout in Waco, authorities found more than 300 weapons scattered around the crime scene. 韦科发生摩托车团伙间的激烈枪战后，有关部门在事发地点附件找到了三百多件武器。好的，今天我们学习的词是 shootout, shootout, shootout…

title: portray
article: 今天我们要学的词是 portray. Portray 做为动词，有刻画，饰演的意思。John Nash, a mathematician who was portrayed in the movie “A Beautiful Mind” died in a taxi crash at the age of 86. 数学家约翰.纳什在一起出租车车祸中不幸身亡，享年86岁。电影“美丽心灵”讲述的就是他的故事。Elizabeth Wilson, who portrayed Dustin Hoffman’s mother in “The Graduate,” died at 94. 在电影“毕业生”里扮演达斯汀.霍夫曼母亲的演员伊丽莎白.威尔逊去世，享年94岁。好的，今天我们学习的词是 portray, portray, portray…

title: emerging
article: 今天我们要学的词是 emerging. Emerging 形容词，意思是新兴的，新浮现出来的。FTSE Group will include China’s stocks in two new emerging-market indices. 富时集团将把中国股市纳入两个新的新兴市场股票指数当中。美国和古巴关系出现改善之际，A team of lawyers from Florida will visit Cuba to explore emerging business opportunities. 佛罗里达州的一些律师将前往古巴访问，探索可能出现的商机。好的，今天我们学习的词是 emerging, emerging, emerging…

title: white paper
article: 今天我们要学的词是 white paper. White paper 白皮书。South Korea sounded the alarm in a defense white paper that North Korea might soon have a long-range missile that could reach the continental U.S. 韩国在国防白皮书里警告说，朝鲜可能很快就要拥有射程能达到美国大陆的远程导弹。China issued a white paper last week, stressing active defense and pledging closer international security cooperation. 中国上周发表白皮书，强调积极防御，保证加强国际安全合作。好的，今天我们学习的词是 white paper, white paper, white paper…

title: estate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 estate. Estate 名词，有全部财产的意思。The family members of the late actor Robin Williams’ are fighting over how to split his estate. 已故演员罗宾.威廉姆斯的家人为如何分配他的家产发生争执 。Estate 也可以单指某一栋房产，比如：Los Angeles Lakers guard Kobe Bryant sold one of his California estates for 6 million dollars. 洛杉矶湖人队后卫科比.布赖恩以六百万美元的价格出售了自己在加州的一套房产。好的，今天我们学习的词是 estate, estate, estate…

title: hawkish
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hawkish. Hawkish 形容词，意思是鹰派的，强硬派的。Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu appointed a hawkish confidant to run the Foreign Ministry. 以色列总理内塔尼亚胡任命自己的鹰派亲信出现国防部长。South Carolina Senator Lindsey Graham announced his bid for the Republican presidential nomination, bringing a hawkish foreign policy voice to the race. 南卡罗来纳州联邦参议员林赛.格雷厄姆宣布参选共和党总统提名，给选战注入了鹰派国防政策的声音。好的，今天我们学习的词是 hawkish, hawkish, hawkish…

title: incarcerate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 incarcerate. Incarcerate 动词，意思是监禁。The U.S. federal government spends $7 billion a year to incarcerate about 200,000 inmates. 美国联邦政府每年支出70亿美元，用于监禁大约20万名囚犯。美国人口只占全球人口总数的百分之五，囚犯人数却占全球囚犯总数的百分之25。The President of the American Bar Association, William Hubbard, recently claimed that we over-incarcerate in this country. 美国律师协会会长哈巴德最近说，美国存在过份监禁的问题。好的，今天我们学习的词是 incarcerate, incarcerate, incarcerate…

title: official
article: 今天我们要学的词是 official. Official, 大家都知道，official 做为名词，是官员的意思，做为形容词，则有正式的意思。It’s official: Windows 10 will be released on July 29th. 正式消息称，视窗十7月29日发行。It’s official: former Maryland Governor Martin O’Malley is running for President. 美国马里兰州前州长奥马利正式宣布参选总统。It’s official: smoking will be banned in Seattle city parks. 西雅图正式宣布，城市公园里禁止吸烟。好的，今天我们学习的词是 official, official, official…

title: parole
article: 今天我们要学的词是 parole. Parole 做为名词，有假释的意思。Olympic track star Oscar Pistorius will be released from prison on parole after serving 10 months of a five-year sentence. 奥林匹克田径明星奥斯卡.皮斯托瑞斯五年刑期服了十个月后，将获得假释出狱。The New York Senate passed a legislation extending time between parole hearings for violent felons. 纽约州参议院通过立法，延长暴力囚犯从一次假释听证会到下一次假释听证会之间间隔的时间。好的，今天我们学习的词是 parole, parole, parole…

title: keynote speech
article: 今天我们要学的词是 keynote speech. Keynote speech 主题演讲。Apple’s CEO Tim Cook delivered the keynote speech at Apple’s Worldwide Developers Conference. 苹果公司首席执行官库克在苹果公司全球开发者大会上发表主题演讲。Cisco’s outgoing CEO John Chambers predicted in his keynote speech at its customer conference that more than one-third of businesses today will not survive the next 10 years. 思科即将离任的首席执行官钱伯斯在思科用户大会上发表主题演讲，预计现在的公司三分之一以上十年内都会消失。好的，今天我们学习的词是 keynote speech, keynote speech, keynote speech…

title: manhunt
article: 今天我们要学的词是 manhunt. Manhunt 名词，意思是搜捕。A massive manhunt is underway after two convicted killers fled a maximum security prison in New York state. 两名杀人犯从纽约州一座警戒级别最高的监狱里越狱逃跑，大规模的搜捕行动目前正在进行当中。Police have launched a manhunt for three suspects in connection with the shooting of a police officer. 警方展开行动，搜捕三名向警察开枪的嫌疑人。好的，今天我们学习的词是 manhunt, manhunt, manhunt…

title: birthplace
article: 今天我们要学的词是 birthplace. Birthplace 出生地。The U.S. Supreme Court struck down a law that would have allowed American citizens born in Jerusalem to list Israel as their birthplace on their U.S. passports. 美国最高法院否决了一项法令，该法令原本允许在耶路撒冷出生的美国公民在美国护照出生地一栏填写以色列。The site of Theodore Roosevelt’s Birthplace is getting a major renovation. 西奥多.罗斯福出生地遗址将接受大规模整修。好的，今天我们学习的词是 birthplace, birthplace, birthplace…

title: under performing
article: 今天我们要学的词是 under-performing. Under-performing 形容词，表现不佳的。HSBC plans to cut about 50,000 jobs globally as it sells several under-performing businesses. 汇丰银行准备出售一些业绩不佳的部门，全球裁员约五万人。The State of Massachusetts awarded more than $4 million to four under-performing schools to help them turn around. 麻萨诸塞州向四所表现欠佳的学校拨款四百多万美元，帮助它们改进现状。好的，今天我们学习的词是 under-performing, under-performing, under-performing…

title: tout
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tout. Tout 动词，有过份夸奖，兜售的意思。Florida Governor Rick Scott went to Paris for the International Air Show to tout his state and develop more business opportunities. 美国佛罗里达州州长斯科特前往巴黎参加国际航空航天展览会，为佛罗里达州做宣传，寻找商机。Jeb Bush released a video touting his record as Florida’s governor right before he launched his presidential campaign. 杰布.布什正式拉开总统选战前，发布了一段视频，宣传自己担任佛罗里达州长时的业绩。好的，今天我们学习的词是 tout, tout, tout…

title: pharmacy
article: 今天我们要学的词是 pharmacy. Pharmacy 名词，是药店，药房的意思。CVS Health Corp. has agreed to buy Target Corp.’s pharmacies and clinics for $1.9 billion. CVS 保健公司同意出价19亿美元，收购塔吉特公司的药房和诊所业务。The National Institutes of Health suspended operations at a specialized pharmacy in Maryland. 美国国立卫生研究所让马里兰州一家专业药房暂时停止工作。好的，今天我们学习的词是 pharmacy, pharmacy, pharmacy…

title: matchmaking
article: 今天我们要学的词是 matchmaking. Matchmaking 做媒，牵线搭桥。Iran launched its first matchmaking web site to encourage millions of singles to get married. 为鼓励数百万单身的人组建家庭，伊朗推出第一个官方婚介网站。A Chicago-based high-end matchmaking service offers clients 35 and younger, memberships starting at $15,000. 芝加哥一个高端婚介公司以一万五千美元的会费，吸引35岁以下的会员加入。好的，今天我们学习的词是 matchmaking, matchmaking, matchmaking…

title: normality
article: 今天我们要学的词是 normality. Normality 名词，意思是常态。Thousands of South Korean schools reopened as the country sought normality amid the MERS outbreak. 南韩的中东呼吸综合症疫情还在继续，数千所小学复课，努力回归常态。As Iraq tries to reclaim territory from ISIS, people in Baghdad have managed to keep some sort of normality to their lives. 伊拉克努力从激进组织伊斯兰国手中收复失地的同时，巴格达居民尽量让自己的生活在某种程度上保持常态。好的，今天我们学习的词是 normality, normality, normality…

title: creditor
article: 今天我们要学的词是 creditor. Creditor 债权人。Greece and its creditors hardened their stances after the collapse of talks aimed at preventing a default. 为防止希腊债务违约的谈判失败后，希腊和其债权人各自强化了立场。 Japanese Skymark Airlines intends to enter discussions with its main creditors and convince them to accept its restructuring plan. 日本天马航空公司准备跟主要债权人进行讨论，努力说服它们接受航空公司的重组计划。好的，今天我们学习的词是 creditor, creditor, creditor…

title: racism
article: 今天我们要学的词是 racism. Racism 种族歧视。President Barack Obama said in a recent interview that the United States has not overcome its history of racism. 美国总统奥巴马最近在一次访谈中表示，美国尚未克服种族歧视的历史。New Jersey Governor Chris Christie said the shootings in Charleston, South Carolina were the results of hatred rooted in racism. 新泽西州州长克里斯汀表示，南卡罗来纳州查尔斯顿发生的枪击案是由根深蒂固的种族主义仇恨造成的。好的，今天我们学习的词是 racism, racism, racism…

title: sighting
article: 今天我们要学的词是 sighting. Sighting 做为名词，有目击的意思。There have been more than 90,000 reported UFO sightings since 1905 in America. 1905年以来，美国有人自称目击不明飞行物的情况共有九万多例。美国纽约州两名逃犯的追捕行动还在继续。The search for two escaped killers is focused on an area 22 miles west of the prison they escaped from after a reported sighting. 有人提供线索，说在距离监狱22英里以西的地方看到这两名逃犯，警方因此将追捕行动集中在周围地区。好的，今天我们学习的词是 sighting, sighting, sighting…

title: supremacist
article: 今天我们要学的词是 supremacist. Supremacist 至上主义者。一名白人男子在美国南卡罗来纳州黑人教堂打死九人后，White supremacists quickly distanced themselves from the suspect. 白人至上主义者迅速跟枪击案嫌疑人划清界限。与此同时，Records show the leader of a white supremacist group whose website may have inspired the shooting suspect, has donated tens of thousands of dollars to Republican campaigns. 有记录显示，一个白人至上主义者团体的领袖曾向共和党候选人捐赠过数万美元，南卡罗来纳州枪击案嫌疑人据称就是受了该组织网站的影响。好的，今天我们学习的词是 supremacist, supremacist, supremacist…

title: make the cut
article: 今天我们要学的词是 make the cut. To make the cut 有晋级，过关的意思。MIT Technology Review published the 50 Smartest Companies list for 2014, and Apple didn’t make the cut. 麻省理工科技评论杂志公布了2014年最有智慧的五十家公司大排名，苹果公司竟然没有入围。在刚刚过去的高尔夫球美国公开赛上，Six amateurs made the cut while Tiger Woods missed it. 六个业余选手入围，而老虎伍兹却没能顺利晋级。好的，今天我们学习的词是 make the cut, make the cut, make the cut…

title: mistreat
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mistreat. Mistreat 动词，有虐待的意思。The owners of a Florida zoo are accused of mistreating animals. 美国佛罗里达州一个动物园的业主被指控虐待园里的动物。The owner of an adult family home in the state of Washington pleaded guilty in connection to allegations that he mistreated a 69-year-old man in his care. 美国华盛顿州一个成人护理中心的老板对虐待一位69岁男性护理对象的指控供认不讳。好的，今天我们学习的词是 mistreat, mistreat, mistreat…

title: line up
article: 今天我们要学的词是 line up. To line up 动词，意思是排队。As soon as the U.S. Supreme Court’s decision legalizing gay marriage was announced, same-sex couples lined up to get marriage licenses. 美国联邦最高法院一宣布同性婚姻合法化，同性伴侣立即开始排队领证。Although banks were closed on Monday, Greek retirees lined up just after dawn at bank branches hoping to receive their pensions. 尽管希腊银行星期一停业，但是希腊的退休人员还是一大早就在银行外面排队，希望能领到自己的退休金。好的，今天我们学习的词是 line up, line up, line up…

title: overstep
article: 今天我们要学的词是 overstep. To overstep 有逾越的意思。Texas Senator Ted Cruz criticized the Supreme Court for overstepping its bounds in both legalizing same-sex marriage and upholding Obamacare. 美国德克萨斯州参议员特德.克鲁兹批评说，联邦最高法院在让同性婚姻合法化和支持奥巴马医保改革法案的两项裁决上都越权了。不久前，South African President Jacob Zuma warned African leaders not to overstep a presidential two-term limit. 南非总统雅各布.祖玛警告非洲领导人不要超过总统的两届任期。好的，今天我们学习的词是 overstep, overstep, overstep…

title: hostage
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hostage. Hostage 人质。美国政府关于人质问题的政策最近发生了变化。Families who try to pay ransom to win the release of American hostages will no longer face the threat of prosecution. 人质家属通过支付赎金让人质获得自由，今后不会再因此而受到面临政府起诉的威胁。据报道，30 Americans are being held hostage overseas currently. 美国公民目前在海外被扣为人质的总共有三十人。好的，今天我们学习的词是 hostage, hostage, hostage…

title: resort
article: 今天我们要学的词是 resort. Resort 有度假胜地的意思。The terrorist group Islamic State claimed responsibility for an attack which killed 38 people at a beach resort in Tunisia. 恐怖组织伊斯兰国宣称，突尼斯一个海边度假村发生的恐怖袭击事件是他们一手制造的，这次袭击事件共造成38人死亡。The Philippines has started building the “world’s first resort airport” in Cebu. 菲律宾已经开始在宿雾兴建世界上第一个机场度假村。好的，今天我们学习的词是 resort, resort, resort…

title: ingredient
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ingredient. Ingredient 做为名词，意思是成分，原料。Papa John’s International Inc. is spending $100 million a year to remove artificial ingredients and other additives from its menu. 棒约翰国际公司准备一年投入一亿美元，去除食物中的人工配料等添加剂。Mexican fast food chain Chipotle is in the process of cutting tortilla ingredients from 11 to 4. 墨西哥快餐店Chipotle 正着手将制作玉米薄饼的原料从11种减少到4种。好的，今天我们学习的词是 ingredient, ingredient, ingredient…

title: austerity
article: 今天我们要学的词是 austerity. Austerity 有紧缩的意思。Greek voters rejected a bail out deal proposed by its international creditors, which required austerity measures in return for emergency funds. 希腊选民拒绝接受国际债权人提出的用紧缩经济换取应急资金的协议。U.S. stocks declined slightly on Monday after Greek voters rejected the austerity plan. 希腊选民拒绝接受紧缩计划，美国股市星期一略微走低。好的，今天我们学习的词是 austerity, austerity, austerity…

title: rematch
article: 今天我们要学的词是 rematch. Rematch 做为名词，意思是重新比赛，对手之间再次碰面。The U.S. women’s soccer team beat Japan for the World Cup last Sunday in a rematch of the 2011 final. 美国女子足球队上周日在世界杯中击败日本，这是两支队伍在2011年世界杯上一决雌雄后的再次较量。The World Boxing Organization ruled against a rematch between Jessie Vargas and Tim Bradley even though their match ended prematurely by 4 seconds. 世界拳击组织裁定，尽管瓦加斯和布拉德利之间的比赛提前结束了四秒钟，但是两人不必重赛。好的，今天我们学习的词是 rematch, rematch, rematch…

title: outstanding
article: 今天我们要学的词是 outstanding. Outstanding 做为形容词，有尚未解决的意思。French Foreign Minister Laurent Fabius said that Iran needs to decide whether it will do what’s necessary to resolve outstanding issues. 法国外长法比尤斯说，伊朗需要决定，是否准备采取必要措施，解决尚存的问题。与此同时，Iran lead negotiator Abbas Araqchi said there were still “four or five” outstanding questions regarding sanctions. 伊朗首席谈判代表阿拉奇说，还有四五个关于制裁的问题没有解决。好的，今天我们学习的词是 outstanding, outstanding, outstanding…

title: brief
article: 今天我们要学的词是 brief. Brief 做为动词，有简报，摘要汇报的意思。President Obama made a rare visit to the Pentagon to be briefed on operations against the terrorist group Islamic State. 美国总统奥巴马罕见地前往五角大楼，听取美国打击恐怖组织伊斯兰国行动的简报。美国联邦人事管理局网络系统受到黑客袭击。Rep. Barbara Comstock, whose personal information was also compromised during the attack, wanted to be briefed by OPM on how and why the hack was carried out. 美国联邦众议员康斯托克的个人信息在这次袭击中也被窃，她要求联邦人事管理局向她提供简报，说明这次袭击为什么会发生，是怎么发生的。好的，今天我们学习的词是 brief, brief, brief…

title: transmission
article: 今天我们要学的词是 transmission. Transmission 做为名词，有传染的意思。Cuba became the first country to receive WHO’s seal of approval for essentially eliminating transmission of HIV from a mother to her baby. 古巴成为第一个得到世界卫生组织肯定的，基本杜绝艾滋病病毒母婴传染的国家。An international research team received $1.35 million to study the transmission of avian flu from birds to humans. 一个国际科研小组得到135万美元的研究资金，考查禽流感在禽类和人体间的传播。好的，今天我们学习的词是 transmission, transmission, transmission…

title: testify
article: 今天我们要学的词是 testify. Testify 动词，意思是作证。最新公布的法庭文件显示，Bill Cosby testified back in 2005 that he got a sort of sedative with the purpose of giving it to women for sex. 比尔.考斯比在2005年的法庭证词中，承认曾获取一种镇定剂，为的是给女性吃，跟她们发生性关系。Olympic champion Mo Farah promised to testify to US Anti-Doping Agency officials if called upon. 奥运冠军法拉赫保证，如果美国反兴奋剂机构提出要求，他愿意提供证词。好的，今天我们学习的词是 testify, testify, testify…

title: for life
article: 今天我们要学的词是 for life. For life 意思是终身。Pope Francis recently said that the Roman Catholic Church should not have “leaders for life” in its ranks. 教皇方济各最近表态说，罗马天主教会的各级领袖不应该是终身制的。Former FIFA executive committee member Chuck Blazer has been banned from soccer-related activities for life. 前国际足协执行委员会成员查克.布莱泽被终身禁止参与任何跟足球相关的活动。好的，今天我们学习的词是 for life, for life, for life…

title: notorious
article: 今天我们要学的词是 notorious. Notorious 臭名昭著的。A notorious Mexican drug lord escaped from prison, for the second time. 墨西哥一个臭名昭著的贩毒集团头领越狱逃跑，这已经是他第二次越狱成功了。Pope Francis visited a notorious prison in Bolivia last Friday before boarding a plane for Paraguay. 教皇方济各上周五前往玻利维亚一个最臭名昭著的监狱参观，然后离开玻利维亚，坐飞机前往巴拉圭。好的，今天我们学习的词是 notorious, notorious, notorious…

title: extradition
article: 今天我们要学的词是 extradition. Extradition 引渡。Former vice president of FIFA Jeffrey Web, who was arrested as part of a massive corruption investigation, has agreed to extradition to the U.S. 因涉嫌腐败被拘押的前国际足联副主席韦伯同意被引渡回美国。U.S. officials say the prison escape of a Mexican drug lord illustrated the need for extradition of captured cartel kingpins to the U.S. 美国官员表示，墨西哥一个大毒枭越狱逃跑一事凸显了将落网毒枭引渡回美国的重要性。好的，今天我们学习的词是 extradition, extradition, extradition…

title: component
article: 今天我们要学的词是 component. Component 组成部分。President Barack Obama said that a secure retirement is a major component of being middle class in America. 美国总统奥巴马说，有保障的退休生活是美国中产阶级应有的一个重要组成部分。In fiscal year 2014-2015, The Indian auto component industry registered a growth of 11 percent over the previous year. 印度汽车零部件行业2014到2015财政年度比前一年增长了百分之11。好的，今天我们学习的词是 component, component, component…

title: tribute
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tribute. Tribute 做为名词，有悼念的意思。日本任天堂首席执行官岩田聪英年早逝。Nintendo fans, gamers, and industry executives have been posting tributes across social media. 任天堂的粉丝，游戏玩家和业内高管们纷纷在社交媒体上对岩田聪的去世表示悼念。The final design was approved to build a memorial for former President Dwight D. Eisenhower as a lasting tribute. 美国前总统艾森豪威尔纪念碑的最终设计已经获得批准，做为对他永久的怀念。好的，今天我们学习的词是 tribute, tribute, tribute…

title: in house
article: 今天我们要学的词是 in-house. In-house 意思是内部的。Apple has started to produce in-house music videos with some popular music artists. 苹果公司开始跟一些时下流行的歌手合作，自行制作音乐视频。The Securities and Exchange Commission has been facing a flurry of legal challenges to its in-house court system. 美国证券交易委员会面临一系列法律挑战，这些法律挑战针对的都是该委员会自己内部的法庭系统。好的，今天我们学习的词是 in-house, in-house, in-house…

title: commute
article: 今天我们要学的词是 commute. Commute 做为动词，有减轻刑罚或是债务的意思。President Barack Obama commuted the prison sentences of 46 inmates, bringing the commutations he has granted to a total of 89. 美国总统奥巴马给46名囚犯减刑，当目前为止，他减刑的犯人总数为89人。The death sentence of a Filipina convicted of drug trafficking in Malaysia has been commuted to a life sentence. 一名被马来西亚判定毒品走私的菲律宾女性的刑期从死刑减为终身监禁。好的，今天我们学习的词是 commute, commute, commute…

title: transgender
article: 今天我们要学的词是 transgender. Transgender 跨性别者。Leaders at the Pentagon are finalizing plans aimed at lifting the ban on transgenders serving in the military. 美国五角大楼官员正在最终敲定计划，旨在取消禁止跨性别者服役的规定。Immigration authorities unveiled new guidelines to allow transgender detainees to be housed according to their gender identification. 移民当局公布新政策，允许在押的跨性别者按照自己的性别认定予以关押。好的，今天我们学习的词是 transgender, transgender, transgender…

title: eradicate
article: 今天我们要学的词是eradicate. Eradicate 彻底铲除。联合国最新报告说，$160 per year for each person living in extreme poverty would eradicate world hunger by 2030. 生活在极度贫困中的人口，如果每人每年平均得到160美元，2030年就能在全球范围内彻底铲除饥饿。The U.S. government is moving forward on plans to eradicate trans fat from the food supply within three years. 美国政府开始落实计划，努力在三年内彻底铲除食品供应中的反式脂肪。好的，今天我们学习的词是 eradicate, eradicate, eradicate…

title: forensic
article: 今天我们要学的词是forensic. Forensic 形容词，意思是法庭的，法医的。A Syrian forensic photographer took thousands of photos of people who died in Syrian prisons. 叙利亚的一名法医摄影师，拍摄了数千张照片，记录死在叙利亚监狱里的人们。A U.S. forensic pathologist believes the late Argentina special prosecutor Alberto Nisman likely was murdered. 美国一位法医病理学家认为，阿根廷特别检察官尼斯曼很可能是死于谋杀。好的，今天我们学习的词是 forensic, forensic, forensic…

title: sweeping
article: 今天我们要学的词是sweeping. Sweeping 形容词，有彻底的意思。President Barack Obama called for sweeping reforms in the criminal justice system in a recent speech. 美国总统奥巴马在最近的一次讲话中，呼吁展开彻底的刑事司法改革。Pope Francis called for sweeping changes in politics, economics, and lifestyles to confront the issue of climate change. 教皇方济各呼吁，在政治，经济和生活方式上实现彻底改变，以应对气候变化的问题。好的，今天我们学习的词是 sweeping, sweeping, sweeping…

title: reopen
article: 今天我们要学的词是reopen. Reopen 动词，意思是恢复，重新开放。British Foreign Minister Philip Hammond said that Britain hopes to reopen its embassy in Iran by the end of the year. 英国外交大臣哈蒙德表示，英国希望在年底前重新开放英国驻伊朗大使馆。Nairobi’s Westgate Mall reopened recently, nearly two years after it was attacked by Somalia’ Islamic extremists. 内罗毕西门购物中心最近重新开放，近两年前，那里曾受到索马里伊斯兰极端份子的袭击。好的，今天我们学习的词是 reopen, reopen, reopen…

title: notify
article: 今天我们要学的词是 notify. Notify 动词，意思是通知。U.S. Authorities have not notified the 21.5 million data breach victims, two months after the hack was discovered. 美国发现黑客袭击事件两个月后，信息被盗的2150万受害者至今尚未收到有关当局的通知。福特汽车公司为降低开支，增加利润，准备把一些小型车辆的生产转移到墨西哥去。The United Auto Workers Union was said to have notified its members. 全美汽车工人联合会据说已经把这一消息通知给了工会成员。好的，今天我们学习的词是 notify, notify, notify…

title: hit back
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hit back. To hit back 意思是反击。Bahrain hit back at the U.S.’ expressed concern over freedom of expression, saying its treatment of opposition figures followed legal due process. 美国对巴林的言论自由度表示关注，巴林对此予以回击，说自己对待反对派人物的做法遵循了法律程序。单向组合乐队的哈罗.斯泰尔斯呼吁粉丝抵制海洋世界公园，因为它们涉嫌虐待动物。Sea World hit back at Harry Styles, insisting that animal welfare is of the utmost importance to them. 海洋世界公园对斯泰尔斯予以反击，称动物福祉是他们最关心的问题。好的，今天我们学习的词是 hit back, hit back, hit back…

title: prompt
article: 今天我们要学的词是 prompt. prompt 做为动词，有促使的意思。A reported shooting prompted a lockdown at several schools in the vicinity. 有关枪击事件的报道，让附近的学校都进入了封锁警戒状态。There were dozens of whales seen off of the Northern California coast, prompting federal officials to issue a boating warning. 美国加州北部海域发现几十条鲸鱼，促使有关联邦当局对驾船出海的人发出安全警告。好的，今天我们学习的词是 prompt, prompt, prompt…

title: backer
article: 今天我们要学的词是 backer. Backer 名词，意思是支持者。统计数字显示，Backers pumped $230 million into the presidential campaigns of Jeb Bush, Hillary Clinton and Ted Cruz by the end of June. 截止到六月底，杰布.布什，希拉里.克林顿和泰德.克鲁兹三人的竞选团队从支持者那里得到的捐赠共计2.3亿美元。美国进出口银行的特许经营权六月底失效。Backers of the Export-Import Bank warned of economic damage if Congress doesn’t reauthorize the federal agency. 进出口银行的支持者警告说，如果国会不重新授权，将会使美国经济收到伤害。好的，今天我们学习的词是 backer, backer, backer…

title: blood bank
article: 今天我们要学的词是 blood bank. Blood bank 血库。Federal authorities suspended the operations of a Miami-area blood bank for multiple violations. 美国联邦当局下令迈阿密一家血库暂停营业，因为他们违反了多项相关规定。The blood bank in Sweden is using social media and text messaging to battle blood shortages. 瑞典的血库利用社交媒体和发短信的方式，设法解决血源短缺的问题。好的，今天我们学习的词是 blood bank, blood bank, blood bank…

title: unfreeze
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unfreeze. To unfreeze 意思是解冻。根据伊朗与六大国达成的协议，About $100 billion of Iran’s assets will be unfrozen by the lifting of sanctions. 解除制裁意味着伊朗大约一千亿美元的资产将得到解冻。iPhone and iPad users in both the U.S. and the U.K. have reported a new scam, soliciting money from users to unfreeze their web browsers. 美国和英国都有苹果手机和平板电脑用户举报说，现在有一种新的诈骗手段，要求用户付钱，然后帮他们解冻浏览器。好的，今天我们学习的词是 unfreeze, unfreeze, unfreeze…

title: bring about
article: 今天我们要学的词是 bring about. To bring about 意思是引起，导致。Scientists believe soot that hangs over the mountains of the Sichuan Basin brought about the floods in 2013. 科学家认为，2013年的洪灾是由四川盆地山区上空的煤烟引起的。世界六大国与伊朗就其核问题达成协议后，美国总统奥巴马发表声明说，This deal demonstrates that American diplomacy can bring about real and meaningful change. 这项协议显示，美国外交能够带来真正的，有意义的变化。好的，今天我们学习的词是 bring about, bring about, bring about…

title: ditch
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ditch. To ditch 意思是放弃。Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe ordered plans for Tokyo’s 2020 Olympic stadium to be ditched because of public anger over its $2 billion price tag. 日本首相安倍晋三下令放弃东京2020年奥运场馆的兴建计划，因为民众对为此投入20亿美元感到不满。The UK’s Scientific Advisory Committee on Nutrition ditched a 10% upper limit on sugar intake and recommended less than 5% instead. 英国营养科学咨询委员会放弃了10%糖的最大限量，改为建议摄入量低于5%。好的，今天我们学习的词是 ditch, ditch, ditch…

title: class action
article: 今天我们要学的词是 class action. Class action 集体诉讼。Apple will face a class action lawsuit by its retail employees in California who were subjected to bag checks after their shift was over. 苹果公司加州零售店雇员将对公司提出集体诉讼，因为他们下班要接受搜包检查。In a class action lawsuit filed recently, the top four U.S. airlines are accused of conspiring to restrict capacity and raising fares. 根据最近提出的一项集体诉讼案，美国四大航空公司被控串通一气，限制承载人数，提高票价。好的，今天我们学习的词是 class action, class action, class action…

title: behind bars
article: 今天我们要学的词是 behind bars. Behind bars 意思是坐牢。New Jersey Governor Chris Christie said that it was right to keep drug dealers behind bars, but not drug users. 美国新泽西州州长克里斯蒂说，应该被投入大牢的是毒贩，而不是买毒品的人。有报道说，The United States has more people behind bars than the 35 biggest European countries combined. 美国监狱囚犯总人数比欧洲最大的35个国家加起来还要多。好的，今天我们学习的词是 behind bars, behind bars, behind bars…

title: bug bounty
article: 今天我们要学的词是 bug bounty. Bug bounty 意思是找到系统漏洞而得到的奖赏。Bug bounties are awards that are paid to hackers for finding bugs in a company’s system. 漏洞奖励是公司发给协助他们发现系统漏洞的黑客的奖赏。Companies like Microsoft, Google, Yahoo and others are offering bug bounties to encourage hackers to report system vulnerabilities to them. 微软，谷歌，雅虎等公司都有漏洞奖励项目，鼓励黑客把发现的系统薄弱点汇报给他们。好的，今天我们学习的词是 bug bounty, bug bounty, bug bounty…

title: social skills
article: 今天我们要学的词是 social skills. Social skills 社交技能。最新研究指出，Kindergartners with good social skills are more likely to succeed as adults. 社交技能强的学前班孩子长大成人后更容易成功。美国中学生喜欢用手机短信和社交应用跟朋友交流，但是研究人员认为，Technology addiction could hinder teenagers’ social skills, making them less excited about actually hanging out with their friends. 过份依赖科技设备可能会阻碍青少年社交技能的培养，让他们对真正跟朋友在一起提不起兴趣来。好的，今天我们学习的词是 social skills, social skills, social skills…

title: inch closer
article: 今天我们要学的词是 inch closer. To inch closer 是逐渐接近的意思。美国几家轮胎公司正在加紧研发无气轮胎。Airless tires that don’t puncture are inching closer to a production reality. 不会被扎的无气轮胎距离投入生产越来越近了。Researchers are inching closer towards the development of a treatment and cure for Dengue fever, which affects an estimated 400 million people each year. 研究人员寻找登革热治疗方法的努力取得了进展，全球每年有大约四亿人口感染登革热。好的，今天我们学习的词是 inch closer, inch closer, inch closer…

title: mental health
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mental health. Mental health 心理健康。英国最新调查显示，Principals are more concerned about pupils’ mental health than any other issue related to well-being. 校长对学生健康状况最担心的问题是他们的心理健康。A World Health Organization report warns of the shortage of mental health resources across the globe. 世界卫生组织的一项报告警告说，全球普遍存在心理健康资源短缺的现象。好的，今天我们学习的词是 mental health, mental health, mental health…

title: chapter
article: 今天我们要学的词是chapter. Chapter 做为名词，有篇章的意思。American e-commerce company eBay separated from Paypal, and started a new chapter as an independent company. 美国商务公司易趣脱离贝宝，做为一家独立公司，拉开了新的篇章。The United States and Cuba opened a new chapter in post-Cold War relations, formally restoring diplomatic ties and re-establishing embassies. 美国和古巴正式恢复外交关系，重开使馆，拉开了冷战后两国关系的新篇章。好的，今天我们学习的词是 chapter, chapter, chapter…

title: interstate
article: 今天我们要学的词是interstate. Interstate 做为名词，有州际高速公路的意思。A bridge collapsed in Southern California, and forced the indefinite closure of Interstate 10. 美国加州南部的一座桥梁倒塌，迫使十号州际高速公路无限期关闭。 According to the Reason Foundation’s Annual Highway Report, California ranks second to last for the condition of its urban interstates. 根据理性基金会的年度高速公路报告，加州的城市州际高速公路状况在全美排名倒数第二。好的，今天我们学习的词是 interstate, interstate, interstate…

title: digital footprint
article: 今天我们要学的词是digital footprint. Digital footprint 数码足迹。Everyone who uses a computer, tablet or smart phone will generate vast amounts of information, called a “digital footprint.” 任何使用电脑，平板电脑或是手机的人都会产生大量信息，这些信息构成了他们的“数据足迹”。More than a quarter million people have asked Google to remove their digital footprints from the search engine. 已经有超过25万人要求谷歌把自己的数字足迹抹掉。好的，今天我们学习的词是 digital footprint, digital footprint, digital footprint…

title: counterpart
article: 今天我们要学的词是counterpart. Counterpart 指对应的人或物。一项研究发现，African Americans are more likely to suffer sudden cardiac arrest than their white counterparts. 非洲裔美国人比对应的美国白种人更容易出现心脏骤停的情况。The speaker of South Korea’s legislature proposed holding talks with his North Korea counterpart later this year. 韩国国会议长提议，愿意今年晚些时候跟朝鲜对等官员举行会谈。好的，今天我们学习的词是 digital counterpart, counterpart, counterpart…

title: proportion
article: 今天我们要学的词是 proportion. Proportion 有部分的意思。A report from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention found that only a small proportion of American adults, less than 15%, eat enough fruits and vegetables. 美国疾病控制中心的报告发现，美国成年人里只有一小部分，不到15%的人，每天摄取足够的蔬菜和水果。英国据信至少有700人前往中东，参加恐怖组织伊斯兰国的行动。A large proportion of them have returned to the UK, where they are considered a threat. 其中很大一部分人已经返回英国，被认为是安全隐患。好的，今天我们学习的词是 proportion, proportion, proportion…

title: lobbyist
article: 今天我们要学的词是lobbyist. Lobbyist 说客。Former Florida Governor Jeb Bush said that lawmakers should wait for six years before they become lobbyists. 美国前佛罗里达州州长杰布.布什说，国会议员离职后应该等六年，才能成为说客。最新公布的统计数字显示，Lobbyists spent nearly $70 million in Minnesota last year to try to influence state legislators. 在美国明尼苏达州，说客为了说服州议员，去年用于游说的开支将近七千万美元。好的，今天我们学习的词是 lobbyist, lobbyist, lobbyist…

title: custom
article: 今天我们要学的词是custom. Custom 做为形容词，有特定的，特制的意思。Google is testing a $2-a-month service that allows its users to ditch their old gmail addresses for custom addresses. 谷歌开始测试一种一个月两美元的服务，让用户可以放弃原有旧的gmail 电邮地址，改用定制的邮箱地址。 An online dessert maker offers custom treats that are made from pictures provided by the customers. 一家网上甜点公司提供定制甜点服务，可以根据客人提供的相片，定制甜点。好的，今天我们学习的词是 custom, custom, custom…

title: cognitive
article: 今天我们要学的词是cognitive. Cognitive 形容词，意思是认知的。最新研究显示， Women with mild cognitive impairment deteriorate twice as fast as men with the same condition. 患有轻微认知能力缺失的女性病情恶化速度比男性快一倍。One of the earliest symptoms of dementia is cognitive decline. 老年痴呆症初期症状之一就是认知能力的下降。Feeling lonely increases the rate of cognitive decline in older adults. 对老年人来说，感觉孤独会加快认知能力衰退的速度。好的，今天我们学习的词是 cognitive, cognitive, cognitive…

title: rename
article: 今天我们要学的词是rename. Rename 动词，意思是重新命名。The Obama administration will rename Alaska’s Mount Mckinley, North America’s highest peak, to Denali. 美国政府将把北美最高峰麦金利山改名为德纳里峰。The University of North Carolina renamed a building on campus that has long honored a former trustee who was a Ku Klux Klan leader. 北卡罗来纳大学为校园里的一栋大楼重新命名，这栋大楼原来很长一段时间都是以一位前校董的名字命名的，此人曾是三K党领袖。好的，今天我们学习的词是 rename, rename, rename…

title: volatility
article: 今天我们要学的词是 volatility. Volatility 名词，意思是波动性。Analysts are warning of further market volatility following a roller-coaster ride last week. 经过上周一周的起伏跌荡，分析人士警告说，市场波动还会继续下去。Federal Reserve Vice Chairman Stanley Fischer said market volatility is a key factor in deciding whether to raise interest rates. 美联储副主席斯坦利.费希尔说，市场波动性是决定是否加息的一个关键因素。好的，今天我们学习的词是 volatility, volatility, volatility…

title: hunger strike
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hunger strike. Hunger strike 绝食抗议。Five Palestinian prisoners launched a hunger strike last Saturday, demanding Israel to end its policy of imposing detention without trial. 五个巴勒斯坦在押者上星期六开始绝食抗议，要求以色列终止只拘不审的政策。A group of parents and grandparents entered a hunger strike to protest the closing of a high school in Chicago. 一些父母和祖父母对芝加哥关闭一所高中的决定进行绝食抗议。好的，今天我们学习的词是 hunger strike, hunger strike, hunger strike…

title: private sector
article: 今天我们要学的词是 private sector. Private sector 私有部门。India has named private sector managers to oversee reforms of some state-controlled banks. 印度政府任命一些私有部门高管，负责监管某些国家控股银行的改革。The Pentagon is teaming up with private sector companies to create high-tech sensory gear for a variety of defense purposes. 美国五角大楼跟私人公司合作开发用于各种国防用途的高科技感应装备。好的，今天我们学习的词是 private sector, private sector, private sector…

title: overtake
article: 今天我们要学的词是 overtake. Overtake 做为动词，有超过的意思。美国人口普查局公布的最新数字显示，Immigrants from China and India have overtaken Mexicans as the largest groups coming into the U.S. 来自中国和印度的移民，已经超过墨西哥，成为美国新移民人数最多的两大族群。The department store John Lewis is aiming to overtake Ikea as Britain’s biggest home and furniture retailer. 百货商店约翰.路易斯正在努力超越宜家，成为英国最大的家用商品和家具零售店。好的，今天我们学习的词是 overtake, overtake, overtake…

title: cadet
article: 今天我们要学的词是 cadet. Cadet 名词，有军校学员的意思。A pillow fight at the U.S. West Point Military Academy turned bloody, leading to 30 people being injured, including 24 with concussions. 美国西点军校学员的枕头大战演变为流血事件，造成30人受伤，其中有24人脑振荡。维吉尼亚军事学院1997年开始招收女生，女生人数逐年增长。This year, 10 percent of the 500 new cadets at Virginia Military Institute are female. 维吉尼亚军事学院今年入学的五百名新学员里，有10%是女生。好的，今天我们学习的词是 cadet, cadet, cadet…

title: submerge
article: 今天我们要学的词是 submerge. Submerge 动词，有淹没的意思。The floods in Assam, India, have worsened, with over 2,100 villages submerged and more than 37 people dead. 印度阿萨姆邦的洪灾灾情进一步恶化，目前已经造成2100个村庄被淹没，丧生者人数超过37人。Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said last Sunday that he wouldn’t allow Israel to be submerged by Syrian refugees. 以色列总理内塔尼亚胡上星期天说，他不会允许以色列被叙利亚难民淹没。好的，今天我们学习的词是 submerge, submerge, submerge…

title: shelter
article: 今天我们要学的词是 shelter. Shelter 名词，有庇护所，安身之处的意思。Pope Francis called on Catholic parishes across Europe to give shelter to refugees fleeing conflict and poverty. 教皇方济各呼吁欧洲各地教区，为逃避战乱和贫困的难民提供住所。An Egyptian billionaire has offered to buy an island in the Mediterranean to provide shelter for refugees fleeing Syria and other conflict-torn regions. 埃及的一个亿万富翁提出，愿意在地中海买下一个岛屿，为逃避叙利亚等地战乱的难民们提供安身之处。好的，今天我们学习的词是 shelter, shelter, shelter…

title: executive order
article: 今天我们要学的词是 executive order. Executive order 名词，行政命令。President Barack Obama signed an executive order on Labor Day, requiring federal contractors to provide their employees with paid sick leave. 美国总统奥巴马劳工节当天签署行政命令，要求政府合同公司为员工提供带薪病假。Republican Presidential hopeful Donald Trump vowed to reverse President Obama’s executive orders on immigration if elected President. 美国共和党总统参选人川普表示，如果当选，他将撤销奥巴马总统在移民问题上下达的行政命令。好的，今天我们学习的词是 executive order, executive order, executive order…

title: annul
article: 今天我们要学的词是 annul. Annul 动词，意思是废除，宣告无效。Pope Francis released new streamlined procedures for annulling Catholics marriages. 教皇方济各公布了经过简化的新程序，让天主教徒可以解除婚姻。WNBA player Brittney Griner filed to annul her marriage with Glory Johnson just 28 days after the same-sex couple wed. 美国职业女子篮球球员布兰妮.格里纳跟同性伴侣格罗瑞.约翰逊结婚28天，就向法院申请，要求宣告婚姻无效。.好的，今天我们学习的词是 annul, annul, annul…

title: mistakenly
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mistakenly. Mistakenly 副词，意思是错误地。Security forces in Egypt mistakenly killed 12 people, including Mexican tourists, during an anti-terror operation. 在一次反恐行动中，埃及安全部队误杀了12个人，其中包括来自墨西哥的游客。American Airlines mistakenly flew a Hawaii flight with an aircraft that was not certified for long over-water flights. 美国航空公司的一趟夏威夷航班错误地使用了一架未经获得水上远程飞行认可的飞机。好的，今天我们学习的词是 mistakenly, mistakenly, mistakenly…

title: erupt
article: 今天我们要学的词是 erupt. Erupt 动词，意思是爆发。Japan’s volcano Mount Aso erupted, blasting a plume of black smoke 2 kilometers high. There were no reports of damage or injuries. 日本的阿苏山火山爆发，喷出的黑色浓烟高达两千米，但是没有造成人员伤亡或是财产损失的报道。Clashes erupted in Indian-held Kashmir when Kashmiri students chanted pro-Pakistan and pro-freedom slogans. 克什米尔学生在印属克什米尔地区高喊支持巴基斯坦，要自由的口号，结果引发冲突。好的，今天我们学习的词是 erupt, erupt, erupt…

title: condemn
article: 今天我们要学的词是 condemn. Condemn 动词，意思是谴责。纽约市通过抽奖的方式，免费发放了八万张观看教皇车队的票。New York officials condemned ticket scalping, on web sites like eBay, to see Pope Francis’ motorcade . 纽约市官员对有人在电子湾等网站上出售教皇车队黄牛票的做法表示谴责。The prime ministers of Slovakia and Ukraine condemned a recent deal to expand a pipeline that delivers natural gas directly from Russia to Germany. 斯洛伐克和乌克兰总理对最近达成的一项拓展运输管道，将天然气从俄罗斯直接输送到德国的协议提出谴责。好的，今天我们学习的词是 condemn, condemn, condemn…

title: disapprove
article: 今天我们要学的词是 disapprove. Disapprove 动词，意思是不赞成。最新民调显示，Some 55% of Americans disapprove of the way Hillary Clinton has handled questions about her use of private email. 希拉里.克林顿对其私人电子邮件所引起争议的处理方式，让大约55%的美国人不赞同。另一项民调显示，58% of voters disapprove of President Barack Obama’s performance on the Iranian issue and 54% disapprove of Obama’s handling of relations with Israel. 58%的选民对奥巴马总统在伊朗问题上的表现不满意，54%的选民不赞成奥巴马对以色列双边关系的处理方式。好的，今天我们学习的词是 disapprove, disapprove, disapprove…

title: on track
article: 今天我们要学的词是 on track. On track 意思是保持在正确的轨道上，按计划进行中。According to Apple, pre-orders for its latest iPhones are on track to beat last year’s 10 million unit first-weekend record. 苹果公司表示，从新苹果手机的预购量看，上市后第一个周末的销量可能会打破去年创下的一千万部的记录。IMF’s Managing Director Christine Lagarde says French reforms are on track, but need to go further. 国际货币基金组织主席拉加德说，法国改革轨道正确，但是需要做出更大的努力。好的，今天我们学习的词是 on track, on track, on track…

title: emission
article: 今天我们要学的词是 emission. Emission 做为名词，有排放的意思。German automaker Volkswagen installed software on many of its diesel cars to intentionally falsify emissions data. 德国大众汽车公司在很多柴油车上安装软件，操纵尾气排放数据。The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency discovered that these cars had devices that turn emissions controls on during tests and off during normal driving. 美国环境保护局发现，这些车上装有特定装置，让废气排放控制在检测时自动启动，平时开车时则处于关闭状态。好的，今天我们学习的词是 emission, emission, emission…

title: notable
article: 今天我们要学的词是 notable. Notable 做为形容词，有明显的意思。U.S. officials say there is a notable increase in the number of undocumented immigrants crossing the U.S.-Mexico border. 美国官员指出，从美墨边境进入美国的非法移民人数最近有明显增加。This year’s Emmy Awards made some notable rule changes, including allowing all members of the Television Academy to vote for winners via an online voting system. 今年的艾美奖在规则上做出了一些明显改变，包括允许电视艺术学会的全体成员通过网上投票系统参加评选。好的，今天我们学习的词是 notable, notable, notable…

title: unfit
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unfit. Unfit 形容词，意思是不适合的，不胜任的。A migrants center in Italy has been closed after an investigation found it unfit for housing refugees. 意大利的一个移民中心经调查被判定不适合难民居住，因此被关闭。美国共和党总统候选人之一本.卡森周末表示，不支持穆斯林当总统，引起强烈反响。A prominent Islamic group called for Ben Carson to withdraw from the 2016 presidential race because he is “unfit to lead”. 一个很有影响力的穆斯林团体要求卡森退出2016年总统选举，因为该团体认为，卡森不适合做领袖。好的，今天我们学习的词是 unfit, unfit, unfit…

title: conviction
article: 今天我们要学的词是 conviction. Conviction 名词，有定罪的意思。A U.K. man was found guilty of flying drones illegally over buildings and congested areas, the first conviction of its type in the country. 一名英国男子因为在建筑物和人口密集地区上空操纵无人驾驶机被定罪，这是英国因为这一罪名被定罪的首例案件。美国俄勒冈州10月1号开始合法出售娱乐用大麻，Residents with minor marijuana-related convictions who have stayed out of trouble for at least 10 years can apply to have convictions removed from their records. 曾因大麻被定罪的居民，如果过去至少十年里没有触犯法律的话，就可以申请把该罪状从自己的记录中拿掉。好的，今天我们学习的词是 conviction, conviction, conviction…

title: humanitarian
article: 今天我们要学的词是 humanitarian. Humanitarian 形容词，人道主义的。The United States will donate an additional $419 million in humanitarian aid toward helping Syrian refugees. 美国将追加4.19亿美元，用于叙利亚难民的人道救援。The European Commission announced 15 million euros in new humanitarian aid to people affected by the crisis in South Sudan. 欧洲委员会宣布，向南苏丹危机的受害者提供1500万欧元的人道援助。好的，今天我们学习的词是 humanitarian, humanitarian, humanitarian…

title: exploration
article: 今天我们要学的词是 exploration. Exploration 做为名词，有勘探的意思。Royal Dutch Shell will stop exploration in Arctic waters off Alaska’s coast after failing to find enough oil or natural gas. 壳牌石油公司在阿拉斯加近海的北极水域没有找到足够的石油或天然气，因此决定停止勘探。A British oil exploration firm was accused of corrupt payments to the Somali government in return for exploration rights. 一家英国天然气勘探公司被控贿赂索马里政府，换取开采权。好的，今天我们学习的词是 exploration, exploration, exploration…

title: equality
article: 今天我们要学的词是 equality. Equality 平等。World leaders pledged money and political power to achieve equality for women by 2030 at a U.N. meeting. 世界各国领导人在一次联合国会议上保证，要政府投资，并施加政治影响力，争取在2030年之前，让女性享受性别平等。President Obama predicted that marriage equality probably won’t be an issue in the 2016 presidential race. 美国总统奥巴马预计，婚姻平等估计不会成为2016年总统大选的议题。好的，今天我们学习的词是 equality, equality, equality…

title: defection
article: 今天我们要学的词是 defection. Defection 有叛变，反水的意思。The U.S. military denied reports of the defection of Syrian forces trained by the U.S. 美国军方否认有关美国协助培训的叙利亚部队倒戈的报道。Top GOP donors warned Jeb Bush that he must show growth in the polls over the next month or face defections. 共和党重要捐款人警告杰布.布什说，如果在接下来一个月时间里民调结果还是上不去的话，就可能会被捐款人抛弃。好的，今天我们学习的词是 defection, defection, defection…

title: makeup
article: 今天我们要学的词是 makeup. Makeup 做为名词，可以有组成的意思。皮尤研究中心的最新报告预计，Asians are projected to become the United States’ largest immigrant group by 2065, significantly altering the makeup of the country. 亚裔2065年将成为美国人数最多的移民族群，显著改变美国的人口构成。最近有研究发现，The health benefits of weight-loss diets vary from person to person depending on the makeup of their stomach organisms. 各种减肥食谱对使用者的效益因人而异，取决于个人胃里微生物的构成。好的，今天我们学习的词是 makeup, makeup, makeup…

title: finalist
article: 今天我们要学的词是finalist. Finalist 意思是入围决赛的选手。American Girl dolls, Twister and Jenga are among 12 finalists vying for a place in the National Toy Hall of Fame. 美国女孩娃娃，扭扭乐和叠叠乐等12种玩具入围决赛，参加美国国家玩具名人堂的角逐。The IOC announced the five finalists to host the 2024 Olympics, including four cities in Europe and a two-time host from the United States, Los Angeles. 国际奥委会宣布了2024年主办城市的最后入选名单，包括四个欧洲城市，和曾经两次主办奥运会的美国城市洛杉矶。好的，今天我们学习的词是 finalist, finalist, finalist…

title: accord
article: 今天我们要学的词是accord. Accord 做为名词，有协议的意思。The United States, Japan and 10 other Pacific Rim nations reached agreement on the largest free-trade accord since the North American Free Trade Agreement. 美国，日本和另外十个环太平洋地区国家就北美自由贸易协定以来规模最大的一项自由贸易协议达成共识。Opponents of the Trans-Pacific Partnership deal have vowed to mount a final campaign to block the accord on Capitol Hill. 跨太平洋伙伴协议的反对者表示，要在国会做最后努力，阻止协议的通过。好的，今天我们学习的词是 accord, accord, accord…

title: sanctuary
article: 今天我们要学的词是sanctuary. Sanctuary 做为名词，有禁猎区，保护区的意思。The Obama administration announced plans to create two marine sanctuaries in Maryland and Wisconsin. 美国政府宣布，计划在马里兰州和威斯康辛州新建两个海洋动物保护区。Wolf Haven International, a Washington-based wolf sanctuary, received international accreditation from the Global Federation of Animal Sanctuaries. 位于华盛顿州的野狼保护区得到了动物保护区全球联合会的认证。好的，今天我们学习的词是 sanctuary, sanctuary, sanctuary…

title: fragmented
article: 今天我们要学的词是fragmented. Fragmented 形容词，意思是分裂的，各自为政的。More than 40 Syrian insurgent groups vowed to attack Russian forces in a show of unity among usually fragmented rebels. 四十多个一贯各自为政的叙利亚反叛团体一致表示，要对俄罗斯部队发动打击。The already fragmented battlefield in Syria became even more complicated as Russia and Iran expanded their military efforts. 俄罗斯和伊朗军事行动的扩大话，让叙利亚本来已经分裂混乱的战场进一步复杂化了。好的，今天我们学习的词是 fragmented, fragmented, fragmented…

title: formation
article: 今天我们要学的词是formation. Formation 名词，有形成的意思。Leaders of Nepal’s three main political parties discussed formation of a new government following the adoption of a new constitution last month. 尼泊尔上个月通过新宪法后，三大主要政党领袖围绕成立新政府的问题进行了讨论。A stunning video captured 70 million years of formation of the Himalayas in two minutes. 一段惊人的视频用两分钟的时间，展现了喜马拉雅山七千万年的形成过程。好的，今天我们学习的词是 formation, formation, formation…

title: session
article: 今天我们要学的词是session. Session 名词，有会期的意思。The United States Supreme Court returned to its new session last Monday, ready to tackle some of the most contentious issues facing the country. 美国联邦最高法院上星期一进入新会期，将对一些美国最有争议的问题进行裁决。The Human Rights Council of the United Nations adopted 30 resolutions during its 30th session which was held in Geneva, Switzerland. 联合国人权委员会在瑞士日内瓦召开的第30次会期上，通过了30项决议。好的，今天我们学习的词是 session, session, session…

title: espionage
article: 今天我们要学的词是espionage.Espionage 名词，意思是间谍活动。Washington Post reporter Jason Rezaian, who has been detained in Iran for more than a year on charges including espionage, has been convicted. 因为间谍等罪名已被伊朗扣押一年多的华盛顿邮报记者杰森.芮塞恩被判定有罪。好的，今天我们学习的词是 espionage, espionage, espionage…

title: antibiotics
article: 今天我们要学的词是antibiotics. Antibiotics 名词，抗生素。California has adopted a bill that sets the strictest limits in the United States on the use of antibiotics in healthy livestock. 加州通过新立法，对健康牲畜服用抗生素确立了美国最严格的限制。In signing the legislation, California Governor Jerry Brown called the overuse of antibiotics “an urgent public health problem.” 加州州长布朗在法案上签字并表示，抗生素的过度使用是“一个紧迫的公共健康问题”。好的，今天我们学习的词是 antibiotics, antibiotics, antibiotics…

title: come up with
article: 今天我们要学的词是come up with. To come up with 意思是拿出，提出。California has given Volkswagen until November 20th to come up with a plan to fix its manipulated cars. 美国加州政府要求大众汽车公司在11月20号之前拿出一项如何清理造假汽车的计划。印度首都新德里是世界上空气污染最严重的城市之一。India’s Supreme Court asked New Delhi to come up with a plan to clean up the air. 印度最高法院要求新德里提出一项清洁空气的计划。好的，今天我们学习的词是 come up with, come up with, come up with…

title: on average
article: 今天我们要学的词是on average. On average 意思是平均说来。路透社的一项分析发现，U.S. prices for the world’s 20 top-selling medicines are, on average, three times higher than in Britain. 世界上销量最多的20种药物，美国售价平均比英国售价贵三倍。美国人事管理局最近宣布，Federal employees on average will pay 6.4 percent more for health care in 2016, the biggest rate change in recent memory. 美国联邦工作人员2016年健康保险保费平均上涨6.4%，是近年来涨幅最大的一次。好的，今天我们学习的词是 on average, on average, on average…

title: mega
article: 今天我们要学的词是mega. Mega 形容词，意思是宏大的，非常成功的。Dell has reached a mega-deal to acquire cloud computing giant EMC for $67 billion. 戴尔公司谈成了一项规模宏大的收购案，出价670亿美元，收购云端运算巨头公司EMC。研究人员最近提出，A mega-tsunami taller than a 50-story skyscraper once engulfed an island off the west coast of Africa in prehistoric times. 非洲西海岸附近的一个岛屿在史前时代曾被一次巨大的海啸所吞没，海啸掀起的巨浪比一栋50层的摩天大厦还要高。好的，今天我们学习的词是 mega, mega, mega…

title: unearth
article: 今天我们要学的词是unearth. Unearth 动词，有发掘，发现的意思。A hidden chemistry lab dating back to the 1820s was unearthed during renovations at the University of Virginia. 维吉尼亚大学在整修过程中发现了一个十九世纪二十年代的隐秘的化学实验室。A Michigan farmer unexpectedly unearthed mammoth bones on his property, buried in the soil beneath his wheat field. 美国密西根州的一个农民在自家麦田地底下意外地发现了猛犸象的骨头。好的，今天我们学习的词是 unearth, unearth, unearth…

title: demonize
article: 今天我们要学的词是demonize. Demonize 动词，妖魔化。British Prime Minister David Cameron unveiled a new strategy to combat extremism, but his proposals were condemned by Muslims as demonizing their communities. 英国首相卡梅伦公布了打击极端主义的新策略，穆斯林对此提出批评，称该策略是对穆斯林社区的妖魔化。Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton criticized her Republican opponents for “demonizing” and “insulting” immigrants in the United States. 美国民主党总统参选人希拉里.克林顿批评共和党对手，说他们妖魔化并侮辱美国移民。好的，今天我们学习的词是 demonize, demonize, demonize…

title: state sponsored
article: 今天我们要学的词是state-sponsored. state-sponsored 国家支持的。Facebook will begin alerting users if it suspects that they’re being targeted by state-sponsored attacks. 脸书网如果怀疑用户受到由国家支持的黑客袭击时，将向用户发出警告。美国一家网络安全公司的最新报告显示，State-sponsored Chinese hackers continue to target U.S. companies even after the two countries agreed recently not to spy on each other for commercial reasons. 尽管美中两国最近同意不对彼此进行商业间谍活动，但是中国国家支持的黑客继续对美国公司发动攻击。好的，今天我们学习的词是 state-sponsored, state-sponsored, state-sponsored…

title: provision
article: 今天我们要学的词是provision. Provision名词，有规定的意思。A federal appeals court has upheld key provisions of laws in New York and Connecticut banning possession of semi-automatic assault weapons and large capacity magazines. 美国一家联邦上诉法院维持了纽约州和康涅狄克州禁止持有半自动攻击性武器和大容量弹夹的相关法律的核心规定。Hillary Clinton said she doesn’t support the Trans-Pacific Partnership because it doesn’t include enforceable provisions to address currency manipulation. 希拉里.克林顿说，她不支持跨太平洋伙伴关系协议，因为该协议里没有解决汇率操纵的可以执行的相关规定。好的，今天我们学习的词是 provision, provision, provision…

title: register
article: 今天我们要学的词是register. Register 做为动词，有登记的意思。The U.S. federal regulators plan to require recreational drone users to register their aircraft with the government. 美国联邦管理部门计划要求娱乐性无人机的用户向政府登记注册。California Governor Jerry Brown approved legislation that automatically registers citizens to vote when they obtain or renew their driver’s licenses. 美国加州州长布朗批准了一项新法规，根据该法规，居民获取或是延长驾照时，将自动完成选民注册。好的，今天我们学习的词是 register, register, register…

title: forgo
article: 今天我们要学的词是forgo. Forgo 动词，有放弃的意思。Roger Hull, a Republican candidate for mayor in Schenectady, New York, pledged to forgo his salary if he’s elected. 美国纽约州斯克内克塔迪市的共和党市长候选人罗杰.赫尔保证说，如果当选市长的话，他可以不要工资。After much consideration, Vice President Joe Biden decided to forgo a third try for the presidency. 经过慎重考虑后，美国副总统拜登决定，不再第三次参加总统竞选。好的，今天我们学习的词是 forgo, forgo, forgo…

title: processed
article: 今天我们要学的词是processed. Processed 形容词，意思是经过加工的。A new World Health Organization study concluded that processed meats, such as bacon, sausages and hot dogs, cause cancer. 世界卫生组织的一项最新研究得出结论认为，培根，香肠和热狗这类经过加工的肉类会致癌。日本海关的数据显示，Japan’s import of processed shrimp products decreased 18 percent from the previous year. 日本进口的加工虾类产品比前一年减少了18%。好的，今天我们学习的词是 processed, processed, processed…

title: monumental
article: 今天我们要学的词是 monumental. Monumental 形容词，有巨大的意思。Congressman Paul Ryan is expected to face monumental obstacles when he assumes the role of house speaker. 美国国会联邦众议员保罗.瑞安出任众议院议长后，估计将面临巨大挑战。California Governor Jerry Brown released monumental climate change goals, including relying on renewable energy for 50% of electricity use by 2030. 美国加州州长布朗推出宏伟的气候变化目标，包括在2030年以前，让加州百分之50的电力依靠可再生能源。好的，今天我们学习的词是 monumental, monumental, monumental…

title: validate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 validate. Validate 动词，有证明，确认的意思。New York’s attorney general asked three Internet providers to validate their speed claims. 纽约州首席检察官要求三家互联网网络服务商证明他们的宽带网速符合承诺。European Union observers validated Guinea’s presidential election despite vote rigging claims made by opposition candidates. 几内亚反对派参选人认为大选存在投票舞弊现象，但是欧盟观察员还是确认了这次总统大选的合法性。好的，今天我们学习的词是 validate, validate, validate…

title: undue
article: 今天我们要学的词是 undue. Undue 形容词，有过度的意思。U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen said that federal regulations should not put undue burdens on community banks. 美联储主席耶伦表示，联邦政府的规定不应该给社区银行增添过度负担。President Barack Obama called on states to cut back on unnecessary testing that consumed too much instructional time and put undue stress on educators and students. 美国总统奥巴马呼吁各州减少不必要的考试，因为不必要的考试耽误了授课时间，也给老师和学生带来过度压力。好的，今天我们学习的词是undue, undue, undue…

title: wreckage
article: 今天我们要学的词是 wreckage. Wreckage 名词，意思是残骸。A U.S. Navy search team located the wreckage of a cargo ship that is believed to be the missing El Faro. 美国海军搜救队发现了一艘货轮的残骸，怀疑是失踪的埃尔法罗号。俄罗斯客机在埃及西奈半岛发生空难事故，机上人员无一幸免。The wreckage was found in a wide area, suggesting the aircraft broke up at high altitude. 飞机残骸散落于一大片地区，说明飞机是在高空解体的。好的，今天我们学习的词是wreckage, wreckage, wreckage…

title: overcrowded
article: 今天我们要学的词是 overcrowded. Overcrowded 形容词，过份拥挤的，人满为患的。6,000 inmates on drug offences were granted early release in an effort to relieve overcrowded prisons across the U.S. 为了缓解美国全国各地监狱人满为患的问题，六千名因毒品入狱的囚犯提前获释。统计数字显示，The number of overcrowded apartments in New York City rose more than 15% between 2005 and 2013. 2005年到2013年间，纽约市居住人口过份拥挤的公寓数量增长幅度超过15%。好的，今天我们学习的词是overcrowded, overcrowded, overcrowded…

title: infighting
article: 今天我们要学的词是 infighting. Infighting 名词，内斗。New House speaker Paul Ryan attributed the GOP’s infighting to lack of vision. 新上任的美国国会众议院议长瑞安认为，共和党内斗，都是因为党内缺乏远见卓识。German Vice Chancellor Sigmar Gabriel called for an end to the political infighting over the migrant crisis within Chancellor Merkel’s conservative bloc. 德国副总理加布里尔呼吁默克尔总理的保守派阵营停止在移民危机上的政治内斗。好的，今天我们学习的词是infighting, infighting, infighting…

title: headquarters
article: 今天我们要学的词是 headquarters. Headquarters 名词，意思是总部。HSBC may delay its decision on whether to move its headquarters from London to Asia until next year. 汇丰银行可能拖延到明年再决定是否把银行总部从伦敦迁往亚洲。Fannie Mae, the mortgage finance giant, has put three buildings at its headquarters on the market. 美国房贷巨头房利美将公司总部的三座大楼拿到市场上出售。好的，今天我们学习的词是headquarters, headquarters, headquarters…

title: euthanize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 euthanize. Euthanize 动词，安乐死。So far, wildlife managers have euthanized 24 grizzly bears in the Greater Yellowstone Ecosystem this year. 野生动物管理人员今年在黄石公园生态区已经对24只灰熊实施安乐死。In the past five years, a total of 72 grizzly bears have been euthanized in the area because they either killed cattle, destroyed property, or posed a danger to people. 过去五年里，该地区共有72只灰熊因捕食牛，破坏财物，或是对人类构成威胁而被安乐死。好的，今天我们学习的词是 euthanize, euthanize, euthanize…

title: faculty
article: 今天我们要学的词是 faculty. Faculty 名词，有教职员工的意思。A group of University of Missouri faculty plan to walk out of their classes for two days to protest the school’s handling of racist incidents on campus. 密苏里大学一些教职员工准备罢课两天，对校方处理校园种族歧视事件的方式表示不满。Yale University pledged $50 million over a five-year period to increase the diversity of its faculty members. 耶鲁大学要在五年时间内投入五千万美元，用来提升教职员工的多元化。好的，今天我们学习的词是 faculty, faculty, faculty…

title: systematic
article: 今天我们要学的词是 systematic. Systematic 形容词，系统性的。世界反兴奋剂机构发表最新报告，The report found “consistent and systematic use of performance enhancing drugs by many Russian athletes.” 报告发现，很多俄罗斯运动员都一贯地，系统性地使用兴奋剂。A year-long investigation uncovered systematic corruption within Rome as politicians and businessmen conspired with mobsters to rig public tenders. 一项历时一年的调查发现，罗马政客和商人系统地跟犯罪集团合谋，操纵公开投标项目。好的，今天我们学习的词是 systematic, systematic, systematic…

title: fractured
article: 今天我们要学的词是 fractured. Fractured 形容词，有破裂的意思。President Barack Obama met with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu at the White House on Monday, trying to mend their fractured relationship. 美国总统奥巴马星期一在白宫会见以色列总理内塔尼亚胡，努力修补彼此间出现裂痕的关系。Paul Ryan took over as the new Speaker of the House and will try to unite his fractured GOP party. 保罗.瑞安接替美国国会众议院议长一职，努力改变共和党分裂的现状，加强党内团结。好的，今天我们学习的词是 fractured, fractured, fractured…

title: compensate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 compensate. Compensate 动词，有补偿，赔偿的意思。German car maker Volkswagen is reportedly preparing to compensate owners of its diesel cars. 据报道，德国大众汽车公司准备对拥有大众柴油车的人提供补偿。RushCard, a prepaid debit card company, set aside millions of dollars to compensate its customers who temporarily lost access to their money due to technical problems. 预付借记卡公司RushCard 拿出数百万美元，对因技术问题一度无法进入帐户的用户进行赔偿。好的，今天我们学习的词是 ompensate, compensate, compensate…

title: homeless
article: 今天我们要学的词是 homeless. Homeless 形容词，无家可归的。美国政府有关无家可归状况的最新报告显示，Hawaii has an estimated 7,620 homeless people in 2015, the highest rate of homelessness per capita of any of the 50 states. 夏威夷州2015年约有7620个无家可归者，按人均比例计算，是美国50个州里最高的。Hawaii governor David Ige recently declared a state of emergency to tackle the homeless crisis. 夏威夷州长伊格最近宣布夏威夷州进入紧急状态，着手解决该州无家可归者人口比例过高的危机。好的，今天我们学习的词是 homeless, homeless, homeless…

title: mastermind
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mastermind. Mastermind 名词，主谋。French officials identified the suspected mastermind of the Paris attacks as Belgian national Abdelhamid Abaaoud. 法国官员确认，巴黎恐怖袭击的幕后主使嫌疑人是比利时人阿巴乌。Federal prosecutors will seek a 15-year prison sentence for the mastermind behind Oregon’s largest investor-fraud. 联邦检察官要求将俄勒冈州最大一起投资诈骗案的主谋判处15年监禁。好的，今天我们学习的词是 mastermind, mastermind, mastermind…

title: responsibility
article: 今天我们要学的词是 responsibility. Responsibility 名词，责任。The Islamic State claimed responsibility for a series of attacks that happened in Paris last Friday. 恐怖组织伊斯兰国对上周五巴黎发生的一系列恐怖袭击事件承担责任。民主党总统候选人举行第二次辩论会，U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont said during the debate that the U.S. has a moral responsibility to accept Syrian refugees. 佛蒙特州联邦参议员桑德斯在辩论中表示，美国有接受叙利亚难民的道德义务。好的，今天我们学习的词是 responsibility, responsibility, responsibility…

title: resilience
article: 今天我们要学的词是 resilience. Resilience 名词，有韧性和迅速反弹能力的意思。Two days after the terror attacks in Paris, French stock markets showed resilience with only modest losses across the board after opening on Monday. 巴黎发生恐怖袭击两天后，法国股市展现韧性，星期一开盘后只出现小幅跌落。Messages of resilience and hope are on full display on social media after the terrorist attacks in Paris that killed 129 people. 巴黎恐怖袭击事件造成129人丧生后，社交媒体上到处可见各种展现韧性和希望的帖子。好的，今天我们学习的词是 resilience, resilience, resilience…

title: high speed
article: 今天我们要学的词是 high-speed. High-speed 高速的，快速的。At least 10 people died when a French high-speed train derailed during a test run. 法国一架高速火车在试行过程中脱离轨道，造成至少十人丧生。The U.S. is exploring the idea of building a high-speed rail line that travels from Washington D.C. to Baltimore, Maryland in about 15 minutes. 美国考虑在华盛顿特区和马里兰州巴尔的摩之间修建一条高铁，单程只需15分钟到达。好的，今天我们学习的词是 high-speed, high-speed, high-speed…

title: personnel
article: 今天我们要学的词是 personnel. Personnel 是人员，员工的意思。英国政府宣布，The U. K. is going to recruit an extra 1,900 security and intelligence personnel to combat the threat of ISIS. 英国将额外招募一千九百名保安和情报人员，应对来自恐怖组织伊斯兰国的威胁。The Department of Defense issued a travel ban in the aftermath of the Paris attacks that prohibit all military personnel from unofficial travel to Paris. 巴黎恐怖袭击事件发生后，美国国防部发布旅行禁令，任何军人非公务不得前往巴黎。好的，今天我们学习的词是 personnel, personnel, personnel…

title: imminent
article: 今天我们要学的词是 imminent. Imminent 形容词，意思是即将发生的，迫在眉睫的。比利时首相宣布，Brussels will stay on the highest level of terror alert because of the “serious and imminent” threat. 鉴于严重的，迫在眉睫的威胁，布鲁塞尔将持续保持最高级别的恐怖预警状态。巴黎恐怖袭击事件发生后，D.C. officials said additional law enforcement resources have been deployed but there is no imminent threat. 美国华盛顿特区官员表示，已经增派了警力，但是华盛顿并不面临迫在眉睫的威胁。好的，今天我们学习的词是 imminent, imminent, imminent…

title: resettlement
article: 今天我们要学的词是 resettlement. Resettlement 重新安置。The state of Texas announced that it will no longer take part in the resettlement of Syrian refugees. 美国德克萨斯州宣布，不再参加重新安置叙利亚难民的行动。Australia said it is still committed to the resettlement of 12,000 Syrian refugees, but security checks could take more than a year. 澳大利亚说，他们安置一万两千名叙利亚难民的承诺不变，但是对难民的背景调查可能需要一年以上的时间。好的，今天我们学习的词是 resettlement, resettlement, resettlement…

title: resistance
article: 今天我们要学的词是 resistance. Resistance 阻力，抵抗。英国首相卡梅伦寻求议会支持，对叙利亚境内的伊斯兰国恐怖分子发动空袭。然而，British Prime Minister David Cameron’s effort to expand airstrikes into Syria could face resistance from his political foes. 卡梅伦首相将空袭行动延伸至叙利亚的努力会受到来自政敌的阻力。A multi-country survey conducted by the World Health Organization revealed widespread public misunderstanding about antibiotic resistance. 世界卫生组织进行的一项多国调查显示，公众对抗生素抗药性的误解普遍存在。好的，今天我们学习的词是 resistance, resistance, resistance…

title: divert
article: 今天我们要学的词是 divert. Divert 动词，有改变方向的意思。Lebanon rejected a Russian request to divert its civilian flights so Moscow could conduct a naval exercise in the Mediterranean Sea. 俄罗斯要在地中海军演，要求黎巴嫩民用航班改向飞行，遭到黎巴嫩拒绝。巴黎恐怖袭击发生几天后，Two Air France flights bound for Paris had to be diverted because of anonymous threats received after they had taken off. 两架飞往巴黎的法国航空公司的航班起飞后受到匿名威胁，被迫改变航向。好的，今天我们学习的词是 divert, divert, divert…

title: documentary
article: 今天我们要学的词是 documentary. Documentary 纪录片。CNN aired The Hunting Ground, a documentary about campus sexual assaults despite the threat of a lawsuit. CNN不顾诉讼威胁，播放了关于校园性侵的纪录片《猎场》。The Hunting Ground is one of the most talked about documentaries of the year. 《猎场》是今年最热议的纪录片之一。19 Harvard Law School professors have challenged the veracity of the documentary. 哈佛大学法学院19名教授对纪录片的真实性提出置疑。好的，今天我们学习的词是 documentary, documentary, documentary…

title: diplomatic
article: 今天我们要学的词是 diplomatic. Diplomatic 形容词，外交的。Israel will open a diplomatic office in the United Arab Emirates, representing Israel at the International Renewable Energy Agency. 以色列将在阿拉伯联合酋长国开设一个外交办公处，做为以色列在国际可再生能源机构的代表处。将近150位各国领导人在巴黎参加联合国气候大会。The U.N.
