Climate Conference is the biggest diplomatic meeting in France since 1948. 这次联合国气候大会是1948年以来巴黎召开的规模最大的一次外交会议。好的，今天我们学习的词是 diplomatic, diplomatic, diplomatic…

title: fossil fuel
article: 今天我们要学的词是 fossil fuel. Fossil fuel 矿物燃料。Australia will not sign a communique at the Paris climate summit about phasing out fossil fuel subsidies. 澳大利亚不会在巴黎气候峰会上签署逐步取消对矿物燃料补贴的公报。U.S. President Barack Obama promised money to help the poorest countries to transition to economies that depend less on fossil fuels. 美国总统奥巴马承诺向最贫穷的国家提供经济支援，帮助它们向更少依赖矿物燃料的经济转型。好的，今天我们学习的词是 fossil fuel, fossil fuel, fossil fuel…

title: riot
article: 今天我们要学的词是 riot. Riot 骚乱，暴乱。French riot police clashed with demonstrators ahead of the Paris climate summit. 巴黎气候峰会召开前，法国防暴警察和示威人群发生冲突。At least six people died during a Guatemalan prison riot. 危地马拉一所监狱发生暴乱，至少造成六人丧生。A violent riot erupted after Macedonian authorities installed a fence along the border with Greece to stop the flow of asylum seekers. 马其顿政府为阻止寻求政治庇护者入境，在马其顿和希腊边境建起围栏，结果引发暴乱。好的，今天我们学习的词是 riot, riot, riot…

title: round up
article: 今天我们要学的词是 round up. To round up 有围捕的意思。Police in Milwaukee, Wisconsin rounded up 19 suspected gang members during a recent operation. 威斯康星州密尔沃基市警察在最近一次行动中围捕了19名黑帮团伙嫌疑人。A Tennessee lawmaker’s call to round up Syrian refugees and send them packing ignited fierce debate. 美国田纳西州一名重要的州议员表示，应该把叙利亚难民集中起来送回去，这种提议引起激烈辩论。好的，今天我们学习的词是 round up, round up, round up…

title: defiant
article: 今天我们要学的词是 defiant. Defiant 形容词，有不甘示弱的意思。Turkey remained defiant and refused to apologize for shooting down a Russia warplane. 土耳其不甘示弱，拒绝为击落俄罗斯战斗机一事道歉。German Chancellor Angela Merkel remained defiant and vowed to stick to her open-door refugee policy despite potential security risks in the wake of the Paris terror attacks. 巴黎恐怖袭击后，面对潜在的安全隐患，德国总理默克尔不甘示弱，坚持继续执行对难民开放门户的政策。好的，今天我们学习的词是 defiant, defiant, defiant…

title: affiliation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 affiliation, affiliation is spelled a-f-f-i-l-i-a-t-i-o-n, affiliation. Affiliation 名词，有从属，归属的意思。美国最近一项民调显示，Regardless of party affiliation, a majority of Americans consider the U.S. has not been aggressive enough in handling ISIS. 不论党派归属，大多数美国人都认为，美国对付伊斯兰国恐怖组织的行动不够积极有力。宾夕法尼亚州立大学最近的一项研究发现，Fewer than half of the people examined in the study followed their parents’ political affiliation. 研究对象里，只有不到一半的人沿袭了父辈的党派归属。好的，我们今天学习的词是affiliation, affiliation, affiliation…

title: tailspin
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tailspin, tailspin is spelled t-a-i-l-s-p-i-n, tailspin. Tailspin 名词，有急速下降的意思。Brazil’s economy went into a tailspin at the fastest speed on record in the third quarter. 巴西经济第三季度出现有史以来最快速的急速下滑。美国民主党总统参选人希拉里.克林顿最近发表文章提到，The U.S. economy has rebounded since the Great Recession of 2008 that “sent our economy into a tailspin.” 2008年经济衰退让美国经济急速下滑以来，今天的美国经济已经反弹回升。好的，我们今天学习的词是tailspin, tailspin, tailspin…

title: inform
article: 今天我们要学的词是 inform, inform is spelled i-n-f-o-r-m, inform. To inform 意思是通知。美国国土安全部准备推出新的恐怖袭击预警系统。国土安全部部长约翰逊表示，Security officials need to do a better job of informing the public about global terrorist threats and providing guidance. 安全负责官员需要更好的向民众通报全球恐怖威胁，并向公众提供行为指南。俄罗斯战斗机在土耳其被击落后，加拿大驻北约大使表示，Russia repeatedly failed to inform Turkey of its bombing runs over Syria. 俄罗斯对叙利亚展开的轰炸行动，经常不事先通知土耳其。好的，我们今天学习的词是inform, inform, inform…

title: distracted
article: 今天我们要学的词是 distracted, distracted is spelled d-i-s-t-r-a-c-t-e-d, distracted. Distracted 形容词，注意力分散的。现在边玩手机边走路的行人越来越多。Distracted walking is most common among young people between 18-34. 18岁到34岁的年轻人，是最容易走路一心二用的人群。美国的统计数字显示，Visits to emergency rooms for injuries involving distracted pedestrians on cell phones more than doubled between 2004 and 2010. 因为行人用手机注意力不集中而受伤送急诊的人在2004年到2010年间增加了一倍以上。好的，我们今天学习的词是distracted, distracted, distracted…

title: first ever
article: 今天我们要学的词是 first-ever, first-ever is spelled f-i-r-s-t dash e-v-e-r, first-ever. First-ever 意思是第一次的。Beijing issued its first-ever red alert for smog, urging schools to close and putting restrictions on factories and traffic.北京首次发布雾霾红色预警，敦促学校停课，并对工厂作业和道路交通加以限制。Surgeons at Johns Hopkins School of Medicine will perform the first-ever penis transplant in the United States. 美国约翰霍普金斯大学医学院的外科医生准备施行美国首例阴茎移植手术。好的，我们今天学习的词是 first-ever, first-ever, first-ever…

title: investigator
article: 今天我们要学的词是 investigator, investigator is spelled i-n-v-e-s-t-i-g-a-t-o-r, investigator. Investigator 调查人员。Egypt said that investigators found no “illegal or terrorist act” in the October crash of a Russian passenger plane.埃及政府表示，调查人员没有发现十月份俄罗斯客机的坠毁是“非法或恐怖行动”造成的。Thailand’s main investigator into human trafficking has sought political asylum in Australia because of death threats. 泰国人口走私的核心调查员因为收到死亡威胁在澳大利亚寻求政治避难。好的，我们今天学习的词是 Investigator, Investigator, Investigator…

title: quell
article: 今天我们要学的词是 quell, quell is spelled q-u-e-l-l, quell. Quell 动词，有缓和，平息的意思。German Chancellor Angela Merkel has pledged to reduce the number of refugees entering Germany in an attempt to quell criticism from within her own party. 德国总理默克尔保证要减少进入德国的难民人数，以便平息来自她自己所在党派的批评。U.S. President Barack Obama planned a series of events to quell concerns about his strategy for stopping the Islamic State group. 美国总统奥巴马计划举行一系列活动，打消民众对他为制止伊斯兰国恐怖组织而采取的策略的疑虑。好的，我们今天学习的词是quell, quell, quell…

title: application
article: 今天我们要学的词是 application, application is spelled a-p-p-l-i-c-a-t-i-o-n, application. Application 名词，申请。For the first time in four years, NASA is accepting applications for new astronauts.美国航空航天局四年来首次启动申请程序，招募新宇航员。The company Nexus Gas Transmission plans to build a $2 billion gas pipeline across Northern Ohio and has filed its formal application for federal approval. Nexus 天然气传输公司计划兴建一条价值20亿美元的天然气管道，贯穿俄亥俄州北部地区，并已为此向联邦当局正式提交申请。好的，我们今天学习的词是application, application, application…

title: testify
article: 今天我们要学的词是 testify, testify is spelled t-e-s-t-i-f-y, testify. Testify 动词，提供证词。Ex-New York Senate majority leader Dean Skelos won’t testify in his and his son’s corruption trial. 美国纽约州参议院前多数党领袖史科洛斯将不在针对自己和儿子的腐败案上出庭作证。A Thai investigator who sought political asylum in Australia can testify via video-link in next week’s trial of a human trafficking case. 已经在澳大利亚寻求政治庇护的一名泰国调查人员，可以通过视频在下周举行的人口走私案中提供证词。好的，我们今天学习的词是testify, testify, testify…

title: settle
article: 今天我们要学的词是settle, settle is spelled s-e-t-t-l-e, settle. Settle 做为动词，有庭外和解的意思。A Wisconsin gun shop will pay $1 million to settle a lawsuit in which it was found guilty of negligently selling a gun used to injure two policemen. 威斯康辛州一家枪店将赔偿一百万美元，庭外和解一起诉案，这家枪店在案件中被认定在出售枪支时玩忽职守，后来枪支被用来打伤两名警察。Four U.S. retailers agreed to pay $1.3 million in fines to settle civil charges that they deceived consumers through false labeling. 美国四家零售商同意支付130万美元的罚金，庭外解决指控他们标签造假，误导消费者的民事诉讼案。好的，我们今天学习的词是 settle, settle, settle…

title: interest rate
article: 今天我们要学的词是interest rate, Interest rate 利率。The Federal Reserve announced its first interest rate increase since 2008. 美联储宣布加息，这是2008年以来美联储的首次加息行动。The Federal Reserve also indicated that further interest rate hikes will be made slowly. 美联储同时暗示，进一步的加息行动会是缓慢的，渐进的。World markets rose after the announcement of the interest rate hike. 加息的消息宣布后，全球股市攀升。好的，我们今天学习的词是 interest rate, interest rate, interest rate…

title: public school
article: 今天我们要学的词是public school. Public school 公立学校。Los Angeles public schools reopened after an email threat which turned out to be a hoax. 洛杉矶公立学校复课，此前收到的电邮威胁经调查是一起恶作剧。The Education Department of New York City proposed to shut down three public schools because of poor performance. 纽约市教育局提议关闭三所表现不佳的公立学校。好的，我们今天学习的词是 public school, public school, public school…

title: death penalty
article: 今天我们要学的词是 death penalty. Death penalty 死刑。一项最新研究发现，There were 49 new death penalty sentences this year in the United States, marking a 33 percent drop from last year. 美国今年有49 起新的死刑案，比去年减少了33% 。在美国，18 states and the District of Columbia have outlawed the death penalty, while another 12 haven’t executed anyone in nine years or longer. 18个州和华盛顿特区都取缔了死刑，另外还有12个州过去九年或更长时间没有执行过死刑处罚。好的，我们今天学习的词是 death penalty, death penalty, death penalty…

title: accommodate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 accommodate. To accommodate 有满足需要的意思。The Obama administration extended the deadline for buying health insurance under Obamacare to accommodate last minute enrollees. 为照顾等到最后一刻才登记的人，奥巴马政府决定延长购买奥巴马医保计划的最后期限。The Canadian government planned to book a swath of hotel rooms to accommodate the influx of Syrian refugees. 加拿大政府计划预定一批酒店房间，为涌入加拿大的叙利亚难民提供住处。好的，我们今天学习的词是 accommodate, accommodate, accommodate…

title: worldwide
article: 今天我们要学的词是 worldwide. Worldwide 全世界的。The New York-based Committee to Protect Journalist identified 199 reporters behind bars for their work worldwide in 2015. 总部设在纽约的保护记者委员会确认，2015年全球共有199名记者因报道入狱。美俄举行高层会谈。U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry and his Russia counterpart agreed that the Islamic State group is a worldwide threat and must be eliminated. 美国国务卿克里和俄罗斯外长一致认为，伊斯兰国恐怖组织是一个世界性威胁，必须铲除。好的，我们今天学习的词是 worldwide, worldwide, worldwide…

title: decorated
article: 今天我们要学的词是 decorated. Decorated 作为形容词，有获得过奖牌，荣誉的意思。Michael Phelps, the most decorated Olympian in history, is considering coaching at Arizona State University after the 2016 Olympics. 有史以来获得奖牌最多的奥林匹克选手菲尔普斯考虑2016年奥运会结束后去亚利桑那州立大学当教练。Three sons of a decorated NYPD deputy inspector will graduate from the same Police Academy class and follow his footsteps. 纽约警察局一位副高级警监的三个儿子将从同一所警校同届毕业，子承父业。好的，我们今天学习的词是 decorated, decorated, decorated…

title: charter
article: 今天我们要学的词是charter。 Charter, 有包租的意思。 “The major multi-car pileup was caused by a charter bus,” 这起严重连环车祸是由一辆包租的大客车引起的。 “The airline significantly expanded its charter service clientele in the past year,” 过去一年里，这家航空公司包租服务的客户显著增加。鉴于埃及的动荡局势，美国从星期一开始用包机，协助美国公民离开埃及。美国国务院的一位负责人说， “We will keep running the charter flights until we get all the people out,” 我们的包机会一架接着一架地飞，直到所有人都撤离为止。好的，今天我们学习的词是charter…

title: unruly
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unruly. Unruly 形容词，意思是难以控制的，无法无天的。A suburban shopping mall in Kentucky was forced to close early when more than 1,000 unruly teens caused disturbances. 一千多名青少年在肯塔基州近郊的一家购物中心引发混乱，迫使该购物中心提前关门。新闻里常能看到飞机乘客无理取闹，延误班机的事件。From 2001 to 2014, the FAA opened a total of 2,697 cases against unruly passengers. 2001年到2014年间，美国联邦航空管理局针对无理取闹的乘客，共立案2697起。If prosecuted, unruly passengers can face up to $25,000 in fines and potential jail time. 如果被起诉的话，这些无法无天的乘客可能面临最多两万五千美元罚款，还可能坐牢。好的，我们今天学习的词是 unruly, unruly, unruly…

title: proceedings
article: 今天我们要学的词是 proceedings. Proceedings 名词，有法律程序，诉讼程序的意思。Authorities in Costa Rica have begun deportation proceedings for 56 Cuban migrants who entered the country after it stopped issuing special transit visas to the U.S. 哥斯达黎加有关当局启动遣返56名古巴移民的程序，这些人是在哥斯达黎加停止发放去美国的过境签证后进入哥斯达黎加的。Brazil’s Supreme Court ruled that impeachment proceedings against President Dilma Rousseff can move forward. 巴西最高法院裁定，针对巴西总统罗塞夫的弹劾诉讼程序可以继续展开。好的，我们今天学习的词是 proceedings, proceedings, proceedings…

title: undo
article: 今天我们要学的词是 undo. Undo 动词，有取消，恢复原状的意思。Louisiana Governor-elect John Bel Edwards might undo the higher education funding cuts made by his predecessor. 路易斯安那州当选州长爱德华兹可能会撤销他前任对高等教育拨款的裁减。A New Hampshire couple who sought to undo their divorce were turned down by the court. 新罕布什尔州一对男女寻求撤销他们的离婚裁决，遭到法庭拒绝。In some states, divorced couples can request to undo their divorce within a certain time frame or under certain circumstances. 某些州允许前夫妻在规定时间范围内或是在特殊情况下申请撤销离婚判决。好的，我们今天学习的词是 undo, undo, undo…

title: sever
article: 今天我们要学的词是 sever. Sever 动词，有切断，断绝的意思。Saudi Arabia severed ties with Iran on Sunday over the attack on its embassy in Tehran. 沙特阿拉伯驻德黑兰大使馆遭到袭击后，沙特星期天宣布跟伊朗断绝关系。随后不久，Bahrain and Sudan announced their decision to sever diplomatic relations with Iran on Monday and asked Iranian diplomats to leave. 巴林和苏丹星期一也宣布，决定跟伊朗断绝外交关系，并要求伊朗外交官离开。好的，我们今天学习的词是 sever, sever, sever…

title: caucus
article: 今天我们要学的词是 caucus Caucus 名词，党团会议。U.S. Presidential candidates have started a four-week sprint to the Iowa caucuses on February 1st. 美国总统大选的候选人们开始为四周后2月1号的爱奥华州党团会议冲刺。Some strategists think turnout for the Republican caucuses might be in the 140,000 range, much higher than in 2012. 一些选举策略家认为，今年参加共和党党团会议的人数可能会在14万人上下，远远高出2012年的水平。好的，我们今天学习的词是 caucus, caucus, caucus…

title: legacy
article: 今天我们要学的词是 legacy. Legacy 遗产。In a nationally televised news conference, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe tried to burnish his legacy and shore up support for the Upper House election in July. 日本首相安倍晋三在一次全国电视新闻发布会上，努力打造自己的政治遗产，为七月份日本国会上院选举寻求支持。U.S. President Barack Obama is mounting a final-year effort to make gun control part of his legacy. 美国总统奥巴马利用任期最后一年努力让枪支控制成为自己政治遗产的一部分。好的，我们今天学习的词是 legacy, legacy, legacy…

title: Scandinavian
article: 今天我们要学的词是 Scandinavian. Scandinavian 可以做形容词，指斯堪的纳维亚的，北欧的。In recent months, Scandinavian countries have expressed concerns over the number of migrants trying to enter their countries. 北欧国家过去几个月开始对大批移民的到来表示担忧。Denmark has imposed temporary border controls following its Scandinavian neighbor, Sweden’s move to stem the influx of migrants. 丹麦宣布临时性边界控制措施，此前，丹麦的北欧邻国瑞典也采取措施，希望制止移民的大批涌入。好的，我们今天学习的词是 Scandinavian, Scandinavian, Scandinavian…

title: engagement
article: 今天我们要学的词是 engagement. Engagement 作为名词，有接触的意思。沙特阿拉伯宣布跟伊朗断绝外交关系后，The United States called for leaders throughout the region to calm tensions through diplomatic engagement. 美国呼吁该地区国家领导人通过外交接触缓和紧张局势。美国国务院发言人表示，The Obama administration believes “diplomatic engagement and direct conversations remain essential in working through differences.” 奥巴马政府相信，外交接触和直接对话依旧是化解分歧的关键。好的，我们今天学习的词是 engagement, engagement, engagement…

title: assault
article: 今天我们要学的词是 assault. Assault 名词，有袭击的意思。Tensions are running high in Cologne after more than 500 complaints were filed for robbery and sexual assaults against women on New Year’s Eve. 科隆新年除夕很多女性遭到抢劫或性侵，目前诉案已有500多起，科隆局势因此十分紧张。German Chancellor Angela Merkel has condemned the assaults and called for the perpetrators to be punished. 德国总理默克尔对袭击事件提出谴责，并要求将肇事者绳之以法。好的，我们今天学习的词是 assault, assault, assault…

title: capture
article: 今天我们要学的词是 capture. Capture 作为动词，有捕获的意思。Nearly six months after his escape, the Mexican drug lord Joaquin El Chapo Guzman, was captured again. 墨西哥大毒枭古斯曼逃跑将近六个月后，再次落网。墨西哥官员表示，将把古斯曼引渡到美国。古斯曼上次被捕后，Shortly after Mr. Guzman was captured in 2014, the Mexican authorities refused to extradite him to the United States. 古斯曼2014年被捕后不久，墨西哥有关当局就宣布拒绝将他引渡到美国。好的，我们今天学习的词是 capture, capture, capture…

title: extremist
article: 今天我们要学的词是 extremist. Extremist 名词，极端分子。French officials held a special ceremony to honor all those killed in Islamic extremist violence around Paris in 2015. 法国官员举行特别仪式，悼念2015年在巴黎附近发生的伊斯兰极端暴力事件中的死者。统计数字显示，At least 52 people in the United States were killed by domestic extremists in 2015, the highest number in two decades. 美国2015年至少有52人死于国内极端分子之手，是二十年来受害者人数最多的一年。好的，我们今天学习的词是 extremist, extremist, extremist …

title: regional
article: 今天我们要学的词是 regional. Regional 形容词，地区性的。Saudi Foreign Minister Adel al-Jubeir said cutting diplomatic relations with Iran was a first step, and Saudi Arabia would discuss further actions against Iran with its regional and international allies. 沙特阿拉伯外长朱贝尔表示，跟伊朗断绝外交关系只是第一步，沙特还将跟地区和国际盟友商讨对伊朗采取进一步行动。与此同时，Foreign ministers from countries in the Arab League have condemned Iran for undermining regional stability. 阿拉伯联盟的各国外长谴责伊朗削弱地区稳定。好的，我们今天学习的词是 regional, regional, regional…

title: alleged
article: 今天我们要学的词是 alleged. Alleged 形容词，所谓的，被指称的。德国科隆新年除夕发生众多针对女性的袭击事件。About 40% of the over 500 alleged crimes were sexual assaults. 在据称发生的500多起犯罪行为中，大约百分之40是性侵害。Nearly 300 British veterans have received letters saying they are facing investigation over alleged war crimes in Iraq. 近三百名英国退伍军人接到信函，通知他们将接受被指的伊拉克战争罪行的相关调查。好的，我们今天学习的词是 alleged, alleged, alleged…

title: imprisoned
article: 今天我们要学的词是 imprisoned. Imprisoned 形容词，被监禁的。An imprisoned former NFL running back, who was awaiting trial on murder charges, died of suspected suicide. 美国职业橄榄球联盟的一名前跑锋，因谋杀罪名待审期间死亡，疑似自杀。Four imprisoned Americans were released by Iran under a prisoner-swap deal. 美国伊朗交换在押人员，四名被拘禁的美国人被伊朗释放。好的，我们今天学习的词是 imprisoned, imprisoned, imprisoned…

title: ballistic missile
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ballistic missile. Ballistic missile 弹道导弹。The U.S. enacted new sanctions against Iran’s ballistic missile program. 美国针对伊朗的弹道导弹项目实施新的制裁措施。Footage released by North Korea showing an allegedly successful firing of a submarine-launched ballistic missile seemed to be doctored, according to U.S. experts. 美国专家认为，朝鲜公布所谓潜水艇弹道导弹试射成功的视频似乎有造假嫌疑。好的，我们今天学习的词是 ballistic missile, ballistic missile, ballistic missile…

title: exacerbate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 exacerbate. To exacerbate 动词，有使加剧，使恶化的意思。联合国世界粮食计划署宣布，About 14 million people face hunger in Southern Africa because of a drought that has been exacerbated by an El Nino weather pattern. 厄尔尼诺现象加剧了南部非洲的干旱气候，使当地约1400万人面临饥饿。2016年初始，中国刚开始实行的熔断机制就被叫停。Experts say the circuit breaker might have exacerbated the Chinese stock market sell-off. 有专家认为，熔断机制可能加剧了中国股市的抛售。好的，我们今天学习的词是 exacerbate, exacerbate, exacerbate…

title: integrate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 integrate. To integrate 动词，有结合，融入，成为整体的意思。英国准备拨款让移民的穆斯林妇女学英语。Britain’s prime minister says Muslim women must improve their English to better integrate into British society. 英国首相说，穆斯林妇女必须提高英语水平，才能更好地融入英国社会。The German government has launched a new smartphone app to help asylum seekers integrate into their new country. 德国政府启动了一款新的智能手机应用，帮助寻求避难的人更好地融入他们的新国家。好的，我们今天学习的词是 integrate, integrate, integrate…

title: propaganda
article: 今天我们要学的词是 propaganda. Propaganda 宣传。韩国和朝鲜近来紧张局势升级。North Korea has dropped nearly 1 million propaganda leaflets into South Korea. 朝鲜已经向韩国散发了将近一百万份传单。今年年初，South Korea resumed its propaganda broadcast into North Korea in response to the North’s nuclear test. 韩国恢复了对朝鲜的宣传广播，做为对朝鲜核试验的回应。好的，我们今天学习的词是 propaganda, propaganda, propaganda…

title: explorer
article: 今天我们要学的词是 explorer. Explorer 探险家。British explorer Henry Worsley has died attempting to be the first person to cross Antarctica unaided. 英国探险家沃斯利希望成为在没有支持和帮助的情况下独自穿越南极洲的第一人，结果途中不幸身亡。A joint British and Omani expedition led by veteran explorer Mark Evans is days away from completing the 808-mile trek across the world’s largest dune desert. 一个由经验丰富的探险家马可.埃文斯率领的英国和阿曼联合探险队距离成功跨越世界上最大的808英里长的沙丘沙漠指日可待。好的，我们今天学习的词是 explorer, explorer, explorer…

title: public transit
article: 今天我们要学的词是 public transit. Public transit 公共交通。Most of the Washington region’s public transit services remain shut down as people try to dig out of the snowstorm。华盛顿地区努力清除积雪，大部分公共交通仍旧处于瘫痪状态。With the federal and DC governments closed on Monday, the demand for public transit will be lighter than normal. 星期一美国联邦政府和华盛顿市政府关门，因此减轻了对公共交通的需求。好的，我们今天学习的词是 public transit, public transit, public transit…

title: news conference
article: 今天我们要学的词是 news conference. News conference 新闻发布会。The first televised news conference was held on January 19th, 1955 by President Dwight D. Eisenhower. 美国第一次电视转播的新闻发布会是1955年1月19号由艾森豪威尔总统主持的。DC mayor Muriel Bowser asked residents to stay home in a news conference as the city continues the snow cleanup. 美国首都华盛顿继续雪后清理，华盛顿市长鲍尔斯在新闻发布会上要求市民尽量待在家中。好的，我们今天学习的词是 news conference，news conference, news conference…

title: retroactively
article: 今天我们要学的词是 retroactively. Retroactively 有追溯效力的。U.S. Defense Secretary Ash Carter is reportedly considering retroactively demoting retired General David Petraeus. 有报道称，美国国防部长卡特正在考虑给退休将军彼得雷乌斯补办降级事宜。The U.S. Supreme Court ruled its 2012 decision to bar mandatory life sentences without parole for juvenile killers can be applied retroactively. 美国联邦最高法院裁决，2012年通过的禁止判处未成年杀人犯终身监禁不得假释的规定，有追溯效力，适用于2012年前定罪的囚犯 。好的，我们今天学习的词是 retroactively, retroactively, retroactively…

title: brain damage
article: 今天我们要学的词是 brain damage. Brain damage 脑损伤。美国一项最新研究显示，The vast majority of cases of babies born with severe brain damage are not the result of mismanaged deliveries. 大多数患有严重脑损伤的新生儿都不是接生有误造成的。The WHO warned that the mosquito-born Zika-virus which has been linked to brain damage in babies is likely to spread to all countries in the Americas except Canada and Chile. 世界卫生组织警告说，蚊子传播的可能导致新生儿脑损伤的寨卡病毒可能会传遍除加拿大和智利以外的整个美洲大陆。好的，我们今天学习的词是 brain damage, brain damage, brain damage….

title: margin of error
article: 今天我们要学的词是 margin of error. Margin of error 误差幅度。最近民调显示，爱奥华州党团会议召开前夕，Hillary Clinton has a three percentage-point lead over Bernie Sanders, within the poll’s margin of error of 4 percent. 希拉里.克林顿以三个百分点领先于桑德斯，在这次民调的误差范围之内。Scientists at the University of Leuven developed a unique test of blood samples that can determine a person’s age with a margin of error of 3.75 years. 鲁汶大学的科学家们研制出了一种独特的血样测试法，可以判断出血样所属人的年龄，误差不超过三年零九个月。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 margin of error, margin of error, margin of error….

title: placate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 placate. To placate有安抚的意思。German Chancellor Angela Merkel tried to placate critics of her open-door policy for refugees by insisting that most refugees would go home once the conflicts are over. 德国总理默克尔坚持说，战乱结束后，大多数难民都会回家，以此来安抚那些反对向难民敞开大门的人。美国副总统拜登在参加世界经济论坛时发表讲话指出，Corporations should avoid making short-term decisions to placate shareholders and instead plan for long-term economic viability. 大公司应避免为安抚股东而做出短期决策，而是要为长期经济活力进行规划。好的，我们今天学习的词是 placate, placate, placate….

title: explosive
article: 今天我们要学的词是 explosive. Explosive形容词，爆炸性的。The World Health Organization warned of the explosive spread of the Zika virus through the Americas. 世界卫生组织警告说，寨卡病毒很可能在美洲大陆出现爆炸性传播。Renewable energy continued its explosive growth in 2015, with a record breaking investment of $328.9 billion around the world. 可再生能源2015年继续呈现爆炸性增长，全球总投资3289亿美元，再创新高。好的，我们今天学习的词是 explosive, explosive, explosive….

title: clemency
article: 今天我们要学的词是 clemency. Clemency 作为名词，有宽恕的意思。The Georgia Board of Pardons and Paroles plans to consider a clemency request from the state’s oldest death row inmate. 乔治亚州赦免和假释委员会将考虑该州年纪最大的死刑犯提出的宽恕请求。不久前，President Obama granted clemency to seven Iranian prisoners in exchange for the release of five Americans formerly held in Iran. 美国总统奥巴马特赦了七个伊朗囚犯，换取先前被伊朗关押的五个美国人的自由。好的，我们今天学习的词是 clemency, clemency, clemency….

title: outlay
article: 今天我们要学的词是 outlay. Outlay 作为名词，有费用，支出的意思。美国共和党总统参选人川普去年第四季度的竞选开销是680万美元。The outlay is less than half of what Ted Cruz, his nearest rival in the polls, spent during the same period. 他的竞选支出只占川普在民调中最接近的对手克鲁兹同期支出的不到一半。China Railway has set its fixed assets investment outlay target at 800 billion yuan for 2016. 中国铁路总公司计划，2016年固定资产投资的支出目标是八千亿人民币。好的，我们今天学习的词是 outlay, outlay, outlay….

title: provocative
article: 今天我们要学的词是 provocative. Provocative 形容词，挑衅性的。U.S. National Security Advisor Susan Rice called North Korea’s launch of a long-range rocket “a destabilizing and provocative move.” 美国国家安全顾问赖斯说，朝鲜发射远程火箭，是一种“破坏稳定和挑衅性的举动”。U.N. Secretary General Ban Ki-moon slammed the Israeli government’s decision to approve building more than 150 new homes in the West Bank as provocative. 联合国秘书长潘基文批评以色列政府批准在约旦河西岸兴建150多所新居的做法是带有挑衅性的。好的，我们今天学习的词是 provocative, provocative, provocative….

title: contemplate
article: 今天我们要学的词是contemplate. Contemplate 动词，有深思熟虑的意思。Peyton Manning said he is contemplating retirement from the NFL after winning his second Super Bowl title. 曼宁赢得了他职业橄榄球生涯的第二个超级杯冠军后表示，他正在慎重地考虑退役。Oklahoma Governor Mary Fallin is contemplating raising the state’s cigarette tax by $1.50 a pack. 俄克拉荷马州州长法琳考虑将对每盒香烟加收1.5 美元的税。好的，我们今天学习的词是 contemplate, contemplate, contemplate….

title: connection
article: 今天我们要学的词是connection. Connection 名词，有关系，关联的意思。Twitter has suspended more than 125,000 accounts since mid-2015 because of their connections to extremist groups. 2015年年中以来，推特已经关闭了12万5千多个跟极端团体有关联的帐户。A recent report indicated that the NFL has favored doctors with connections to the league when awarding its concussion research funding. 最近的一份报告显示，美国职业橄榄球联盟发放脑震荡研究资金时，更愿意选择那些跟联盟有关系的医生。好的，我们今天学习的词是 connection, connection, connection….

title: developer
article: 今天我们要学的词是developer.Developer 名词，有开发商的意思。Taiwanese authorities have arrested the developer of a building which collapsed during the earthquake last weekend. 中国台湾省当局拘捕了上周末在地震中倒塌的一栋大楼的开发商。A recent report suggests that smart home apps are a clear favorite for app developers in the next few years. 最近的一份报告显示，今后几年内，各种智能家庭应用是应用开发商们青睐的开发领域。好的，我们今天学习的词是 developer, developer, developer….

title: entry
article: 今天我们要学的词是entry。 Entry, 有进入的意思。 “He found an entry-level job immediately after graduating from college,” 他大学一毕业马上就找到了一个初级的职务。 “The college quarterback’s entry into NFL is almost guaranteed,” 这个大学四分位进入国家职业橄榄球联盟基本上是肯定的了。 “An American writer and translator was denied entry into Egypt,” 埃及拒绝让一个美国作家和翻译家入境。零售商家沃马特宣布关闭在俄罗斯的办公处，但同时表示， “It will continue to pursue market entry opportunities there,” 沃马特会继续寻找进入当地市场的机会。好的，今天我们学习的词是entry…

title: preside
article: 今天我们要学的词是 preside. To preside 动词，有主持的意思。Pope Francis presided over an outdoor Mass in the impoverished outskirts of Mexico City. 罗马天主教教宗方济各在墨西哥城贫困郊区主持了一场室外弥撒。英国媒体报道说，100 judges and magistrates have received written threats connected to the cases they presided over during the last five years. 过去五年间，100位法官和地方司法官员都曾因为负责的案件而收到书面威胁。好的，我们今天学习的词是 preside, preside, preside…

title: membership
article: 今天我们要学的词是 membership. Membership 名词，意思是成员资格和身份。Bosnia handed in its application for EU membership on Monday. 波斯尼亚星期一提交了加入欧盟的申请。The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced a major membership structure change last month. 美国电影艺术与科学学会上个月宣布，对会员构成做出重要调整。好的，我们今天学习的词是 membership, membership, membership…

title: natural causes
article: 今天我们要学的词是 natural causes. Natural causes 自然因素。Investigators determined the late U.S. Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia died of natural causes. 调查人员得出结论，美国联邦最高法院大法官斯卡利亚属于自然死亡。A former Bosnian Serb general died of natural causes at the detention center of the U.N court. 一名前波斯尼亚塞族将军死于联合国法院拘留中心，死因是自然死亡。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 natural causes, natural causes, natural causes…

title: incident
article: 今天我们要学的词是 incident. Incident 名词，事件。一架飞往纽约的国际班机因为驾驶员被激光照射被迫折返回伦敦。有关官员说，The incident underlined the safety risks posed to aircraft by lasers. 这一事件凸显了激光对飞机构成的安全威胁。The NYPD is investigating a hotel assault incident involving former New York Governor Eliot Spitzer. 纽约市警察局正在调查一起酒店打人事件，涉及纽约前州长斯皮策。好的，我们今天学习的词是 incident, incident, incident…

title: subpoena
article: 今天我们要学的词是 subpoena. Subpoena 作为动词，是传唤，发出传票的意思。U.S. Republican Senator John McCain said he would subpoena 10 U.S. sailors about their detention by Iran if the Obama administration doesn’t provide its findings of the incident. 美国共和党联邦参议员麦凯恩说，如果奥巴马政府不提供十名海军被伊朗扣押的调查报告，他就要传唤这十个人。The Clinton Foundation was subpoenaed last fall by the State Department inspector general. 克林顿基金会去年秋天接到了美国国务院监察长发出的传票。好的，我们今天学习的词是 subpoena, subpoena, subpoena…

title: resettle
article: 今天我们要学的词是 resettle. Resettle 动词，有安置的意思。Canada is on schedule to resettle 25,000 Syrian refugees by the end of this month. 加拿大正在按计划完成本月底前安置两万五千名叙利亚难民的工作。Australia is in talks with six nations to resettle asylum seekers detained in Papua New Guinea and the Pacific Island nation of Nauru. 澳大利亚正在跟六个国家进行协商，商讨安置在巴布亚新几内亚和太平洋岛国瑙鲁扣押的避难申请者的问题。好的，我们今天学习的词是 resettle, resettle, resettle…

title: unlock
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unlock. Unlock 动词，意思是解锁。The FBI and Apple are arguing about the agency’s request that Apple help it unlock the cell phone of a terrorist. 美国联邦调查局要求苹果公司协助将一个恐怖分子的手机解锁，双方就此展开论战。Law enforcement agents around the country have said that they have hundreds of iPhones for Apple to unlock if the FBI ends up winning the case. 美国各地执法人员已表示，如果联邦调查局最终赢得此案的话，他们也有数以百计的苹果手机需要让苹果公司解锁。好的，我们今天学习的词是 unlock, unlock, unlock…

title: radioactive
article: 今天我们要学的词是 radioactive. Radioactive 放射性的。The Iraqi authorities have found some potentially deadly radioactive material that had been missing for months. 伊拉克有关当局找到了数月前丢失的一些具有潜在致命杀伤力的放射性物质。国际原子能机构负责人警告说，放射性物质落入恐怖分子手中的威胁不容忽视。The International Atomic Energy Agency has received nearly 2,800 reports of radioactive material gone missing since 1995. 1995年以来，国际原子能机构已经收到了近2800份放射性物质丢失的报告。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 radioactive, radioactive, radioactive….

title: archive
article: 今天我们要学的词是 archive.Archive 作为名词，有档案馆的意思。A Polish archive released documents on Monday that allegedly showed that former President Lech Walesa collaborated with the communist secret police in the 1970s. 波兰一家档案馆星期一公布了一些文件，据称这些文件显示，前波兰总统瓦文萨70年代曾跟共产党秘密警察合作。The International Committee of the Red Cross digitized its entire archive of materials spanning more than 150 years and put it online for anyone to browse. 国际红十字会将自己150多年的档案全部数字化，放到网上供所有人浏览。好的，我们今天学习的词是 archive, archive, archive…

title: deposition
article: 今天我们要学的词是 deposition. Deposition 证词。Bill Cosby’s wife gave a deposition in a lawsuit against her husband for sexually assaulting women decades ago. 考斯比的妻子在考斯比被控几十年前性侵女性的案件中提供证词。A DC judge ordered Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump to come to DC a deposition about his company’s lawsuit against a New York top chef. 美国首都华盛顿的一名法官要求共和党总统参选人川普来华盛顿，为他们公司跟纽约一位名厨的纠纷案件提供证词。好的，我们今天学习的词是 deposition, deposition, deposition…

title: Super Tuesday
article: 今天我们要学的词是 Super Tuesday. Super Tuesday 超级星期二。Super Tuesday refers to a Tuesday during the presidential election when a large number of states hold their primaries or caucuses. 超级星期二指的是美国总统大选期间很多州同时举行党内初选或党团会议的那个星期二。A new poll shows that Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump are solidly in the lead a day ahead of Super Tuesday. 一项民调显示，超级星期二的前一天，希拉里·克林顿和川普稳稳地居于领先地位。好的，我们今天学习的词是 Super Tuesday, Super Tuesday, Super Tuesday…

title: touch off
article: 今天我们要学的词是 touch off. To touch off 意思是引发，触发。A new report written by civil servants in Britain’s government warned that leaving the European Union could touch off a decade of uncertainty. 英国政府公务员撰写的一份报告警告说，离开欧盟可能会给英国带来整整十年的不确定性。Students displaying anti-gay stickers at a California high school touched off a debate: is it hate speech or free speech? 美国加州一所高中的学生佩戴反同性恋的标志而引发争论：这种做法体现的到底是仇恨言论，还是展现了言论自由呢？好的，我们今天学习的词是 touch off, touch off, touch off…

title: confess
article: 今天我们要学的词是 confess.To confess 有认罪的意思。According to Chinese media, four Hong Kong booksellers in Chinese police custody confessed that they illegally sold books to customers in mainland China. 据中国媒体报道，四名被中国警方关押的香港书商承认，曾非法向中国大陆顾客售书。A University of Virginia student detained in North Korea confessed to the crime of trying to steal a propaganda sign in a hotel in Pyongyang. 美国弗吉尼亚大学一名被朝鲜扣押的学生承认，曾试图从平壤一家旅馆窃取一个宣传标语。好的，我们今天学习的词是 confess, confess, confess…

title: hydro electric
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hydro-electric. Hydro-electric 水电的。The United States urged its citizens to be ready to leave Iraq in case the country’s largest hydro-electric dam collapses. 美国警告在伊拉克的美国公民，让他们做好撤离的准备，谨防伊拉克最大的水电大坝的坍塌。ScottishPower plans to more than double the generating capacity of a hydro-electric power station built inside of a mountain. 苏格兰电力公司计划将一个建筑在大山里的水电站的发电量增加一倍。好的，我们今天学习的词是 hydro-electric, hydro-electric, hydro-electric…

title: push forward
article: 今天我们要学的词是 push forward. To push forward 意思是推进。Iran will push forward with plans to pump an additional one million barrels of oil per day into the global market. 伊朗将执行石油增产计划，每天向国际市场多供应一百万桶原油。The United Nations Secretary General Ban Ki Moon visited the capital of South Sudan in an attempt to push forward the peace implementation process. 联合国秘书长潘基文出访南苏丹首都，努力推进和平进程的落实。好的，我们今天学习的词是, push forward, push forward, push forward…

title: preemptive strike
article: 今天我们要学的词是 preemptive strike. Preemptive strike 先发制人，主动出击。North Korea threatened to launch a preemptive strike in response to the joint U.S-South Korea annual military exercises. 美国和韩国举行年度军事演习，朝鲜威胁说要采取行动，先发制人。New Jersey health officials have launched a preemptive strike against the Zika virus by distributing information through social media, radio and print advertisements. 新泽西州卫生官员通过社交媒体，电台和印刷宣传，散发关于寨卡病毒的信息，主动出击防范。好的，我们今天学习的词是 preemptive strike, preemptive strike, preemptive strike…

title: jaw-dropping
article: 今天我们要学的词是jaw-dropping。 Jaw-dropping, 令人惊讶的。 “The seventh Harry Potter movie opened to a jaw-dropping $330 million in global ticket sales over the weekend,” 《哈利-波特7》周末上映全球票房3.3亿美元，让人跌破眼镜。 “Rihanna gave a jaw-dropping performance on Sunday night’s American Music Awards,” 蕾哈娜在星期天晚上全美音乐奖颁奖典礼上的表演让观众大饱眼福。 “Everyone agrees that Apple has achieved jaw-dropping success in the last couple of years,” 所有人都承认，苹果公司过去两年取得了惊人的成绩。好的，今天我们学习的词是jaw-dropping…

title: indispensable
article: 今天我们要学的词是 indispensable. Indispensable 形容词，不可缺少的。欧盟和土耳其围绕难民危机召开紧急峰会。土耳其总理表示，The summit showed that Turkey was indispensable to Europe and Europe was indispensable to Turkey. 这次峰会显示，土耳其对欧洲来说是不可缺少的，土耳其同样的也离不开欧洲。美国前第一夫人南希·里根去世，享年94岁。Nancy Reagan is widely considered to have been indispensable to former President Ronald Reagan’s success. 外界普遍认为，南希·里根对前总统里根的成功起到了不可缺少的作用。好的，我们今天学习的词是 indispensable, indispensable, indispensable…

title: dialogue
article: 今天我们要学的词是dialogue。 Dialogue, 对话。 “Freed Burmese activist Aung San Suu Kyi called for dialogue with the Myanmar government,” 缅甸民主运动领袖昂山素季获释后，呼吁跟缅甸政府展开对话。 “Russia and Japan intend to start truth-based dialogue after a recent territorial dispute soured bilateral relations,” 俄罗斯和日本不久前因领土争议造成两国关系恶化后，如今打算开展以互信为基础的对话。教育专家说， “Honest dialogue between parents and kids helps promote trust and respect,” 家长跟孩子间坦诚的对话有助于增加彼此间的信任和尊重。好的，今天我们学习的词是dialogue…

title: bolster
article: 今天我们要学的词是 bolster. Bolster 动词，有支持，支撑的意思。Two new studies bolstered evidence that feeding peanuts to babies is more likely to protect them than to cause problems. 两份最新研究提供了更多证据，证明让婴儿吃花生更可能对他们起到保护作用，而不是带来问题。China plans to revamp its income-tax system to include deductions such as mortgage interest and education expenses as a way to bolster consumption. 中国计划全面修改所得税体系，增加房贷利息和教育开支等减免税款的项目，以支持民众消费。好的，我们今天学习的词是, bolster, bolster, bolster…

title: thumbs down
article: 今天我们要学的词是 thumbs-down. Thumbs-down 名词，有反对的意思。German Chancellor Angela Merkel’s conservatives lost in two out of three regional state elections as German voters gave a thumbs-down to her refugee policy. 德国总理默克尔的保守派在三个州地区选举中的两个州落败，显示德国选民对其难民政策的否定。印度政府2月底公布2016年到2017年财政预算后，The stock markets gave the budget a thumbs-down, with both indices ending with losses. 股市对预算展现负面反应，两大指数纷纷下滑。好的，我们今天学习的词是 thumbs-down, thumbs-down, thumbs-down…

title: shortlist
article: 今天我们要学的词是 shortlist. Shortlist 名词，最终候选人名单。President Obama has reportedly cut his shortlist for Supreme Court nominees down to three federal appeals judges. 据报道，美国总统奥巴马的联邦最高法院大法官的最终候选人名单已缩减至三位联邦上诉法院法官。Apple tops the shortlist of technology companies where women think they are treated fairly. 女性认为能受到平等对待的高科技公司的名单中，苹果公司名列榜首。好的，我们今天学习的词是 shortlist, shortlist, shortlist…

title: flood
article: 今天我们要学的词是 flood. Flood 作为名词，是洪水的意思，作为动词，则有似洪水般汹涌而至的意思。Hundreds of thousands of protesters flooded the streets of Brazil last Sunday, calling for President Dilma Rouseff’s removal. 数以万计的巴西人上周日似洪水般涌上街头，要求总统罗赛夫下台。A Donald Trump campaign event was cancelled last Friday due to security concerns after protesters flooded the area. 川普上星期五的一次竞选活动因为抗议者的汹涌而至，出于安全考虑，被迫取消。好的，我们今天学习的词是 flood，flood, flood…

title: prominent
article: 今天我们要学的词是 prominent. Prominent形容词，著名的。U.S. President Barack Obama promised one of Cuba’s prominent dissident groups that he would raise the issue of freedom of speech and assembly when he meets Cuban President Raul Castro. 美国总统奥巴马向古巴一个著名异议人士团体承诺，见到古巴总统卡斯特罗一定会提出言论和结社自由的问题。A prominent auction house executive in the U.S. pleaded guilty to smuggling wildlife products. 美国一个业界有名的拍卖行高管承认走私野生动物产品。好的，我们今天学习的词是 prominent, prominent, prominent…

title: Olympian
article: 今天我们要学的词是 Olympian. Olympian 作为名词，有奥林匹克选手的意思。Organizers of a Texas art festival apologized to U.S. Olympian Ibitihaj Muhammad after a volunteer at the event asked her to remove her hijab. 德克萨斯州一次艺术节的主办方对美国奥运选手伊布蒂哈德表示道歉，因为活动志愿者要求她摘去穆斯林头巾。Four-time U.S. Olympian skier Marco Sullivan retired after completing the 105th downhill race of his career. 美国四次参加奥运会比赛的滑雪选手萨利文完成了自己运动生涯第105次滑降赛后退役。好的，我们今天学习的词是 Olympian, Olympian, Olympian…

title: detention
article: 今天我们要学的词是 detention. Detention名词，扣押。The Australian government has contacted Malaysia over the detention of two Australian journalists. 澳大利亚政府已经跟马来西亚联系，询问两名澳大利亚记者被扣押的问题。Republican presidential candidates Marco Rubio and Ted Cruz joined other Republican Senators in supporting the detention of Islamic State fighters in Guantanamo Bay. 共和党总统参选人鲁比奥和克鲁兹跟其他联邦参议员一同，支持用关塔纳摩湾来羁押伊斯兰国武装人员。好的，我们今天学习的词是 detention, detention, detention…

title: suspend
article: 今天我们要学的词是 suspend. Suspend 动词，有暂停的意思。The U.S. Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement suspended drilling operations at a rig in the Gulf of Mexico after an offshore worker was seriously injured. 美国安全和环保执行署得悉墨西哥湾一家钻井平台一个离岸工人受重伤后，暂停了该钻井平台的作业。Belarusian authorities have suspended an investigation into a former presidential candidate who fled Belarus in 2011 and returned last year. 白俄罗斯有关当局暂停了针对一位前总统候选人的调查，此人2011年逃离白俄罗斯，去年返回。好的，我们今天学习的词是 suspend, suspend, suspend…

title: recruit
article: 今天我们要学的词是 recruit. RecrRecruit 作为名词，有新兵，被招募的新成员的意思。据英国媒体报道，Leaked Islamic State documents have reportedly revealed the identities of 22,000 recruits. 被泄漏的伊斯兰国激进组织的文件据称暴露了两万两千名被招募人员的身份。A Pentagon report shows that 80% of recent recruits have a close relative who also has served in the U.S. military. 美国五角大楼的一份报告显示，近年来的新兵当中，80%的人家里都有亲人也曾经在美国军队中服役。好的，我们今天学习的词是, recruit, recruit, recruit…

title: avert
article: 今天我们要学的词是 avert. Avert 动词，有避免的意思。The New Jersey transit authority reached a tentative deal with the rail unions, averting what would have been the first strike at the New Jersey rail system since 1983. 美国新泽西州铁路部门跟铁路工会达成初步协议，从而避免了1983年来首次铁路系统的大罢工。President Obama met with financial regulators to push for tougher oversight of Wall Street to avert future financial crises. 美国总统奥巴马会见金融监管官员，设法进一步加强对华尔街的监管，谨防金融危机再度发生。好的，我们今天学习的词是 avert, avert, avert…

title: unconventional
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unconventional. Unconventional 形容词，非常规的，非传统的。The IMF endorsed the unconventional monetary policies of central banks in Europe and Japan. 国际货币基金组织对欧洲和日本央行的非传统性货币政策表示首肯。A Canadian personal trainer started an unconventional yoga practice that combines yoga with swearing, shouting and beer. 加拿大一个私人健身教练新创了一种非传统型瑜伽，在瑜伽动作中加入说脏话，大声喊叫和啤酒。好的，我们今天学习的词是 unconventional, unconventional, unconventional…

title: scrutinize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 scrutinize. To scrutinize 意思是仔细审查。California state lawmakers will scrutinize the state’s $64 billion high speed rail plans. 加州州议会议员将对加州兴建价值640亿美元的高铁的计划进行审查。The U.S. Treasury Department has started a pilot program to scrutinize purchases of luxury real estate properties in Manhattan and Miami. 美国财政部开始试点项目，对曼哈顿和迈阿密的豪华房地产交易进行细查。好的，我们今天学习的词是, scrutinize, scrutinize, scrutinize…

title: e prescribing
article: 今天我们要学的词是 e-prescribing. E-prescribing 是通过电子途经开处方的意思。 这里的 e, 是 electronic 的缩写。Effective March 27, New York’s e-prescribing law went into effect. 纽约州的电子处方法从3月27号开始生效。The e-prescribing law aims to fight painkiller abuse and reduce errors that could result from hard-to-read handwriting. 电子处方法的出台是为了打击止疼药的滥用，同时也可以减少因为处方笔迹不清晰而在抓药时造成的错误。好的，我们今天学习的词是 e-prescribing, e-prescribing, e-prescribing…

title: ideology
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ideology. Ideology 名词，意思是意识形态。U.K. Prime Minister David Cameron called for Britons to defeat the ideology behind the Brussels terror attacks. 英国首相卡梅伦呼吁英国人挫败布鲁塞尔恐怖袭击背后的意识形态。European researchers and Indonesian religious scholars are working together to develop theoretical arguments to debunk the ideology of radical groups. 欧洲研究人员和印尼宗教学者联手打造理论论证，揭穿激进组织所推崇的意识形态的假面具。好的，我们今天学习的词是 ideology, ideology, ideology…

title: restore
article: 今天我们要学的词是 restore. Restore 动词，意思是恢复，复原。Japan lost all contacts with its latest satellite telescope and hasn’t been able to restore any communications. 日本跟最新发射的观测卫星失联，无法恢复任何联络。According to Syrian authorities, it would take five years to restore the historic ruins of Palmyra damaged by the Islamic State group. 叙利亚有关部门表示，要修复被伊斯兰国恐怖组织破坏的帕尔米拉的历史遗迹，需要五年的时间。好的，我们今天学习的词是 restore, restore, restore…

title: upgrade
article: 今天我们要学的词是 upgrade. Upgrade 作为名词，是更新的意思。The Nigerian Customs Service said it requires about N20 billion to do a system upgrade at the nation’s international airports. 尼日利亚海关说，他们需要200亿奈拉才能完成尼日利亚各大国际机场的系统更新。Leading Silicon Valley companies including Facebook and Google are investing in encryption upgrades. 包括脸书和谷歌在内的硅谷大科技公司都在投资更新自己的加密技术。好的，我们今天学习的词是 upgrade, upgrade, upgrade…

title: offshore
article: 今天我们要学的词是 offshore. Offshore 离岸的。The International Consortium of Investigative Journalism published an extensive investigation into the offshore dealings of the rich and famous. 国际记者调查联盟公布了对有钱人和名人的离岸交易的一份深入调查。Some 11.5 million leaked documents revealed the offshore accounts of 140 politicians and public officials. 约1150万份被泄漏的文件显示，140位政界人士和在职政府官员都有离岸账户。好的，我们今天学习的词是 offshore, offshore, offshore…

title: impeachment
article: 今天我们要学的词是 impeachment. Impeachment 弹劾。South Africa’s parliament will debate a motion for President Jacob Zuma’s impeachment. 南非议会将讨论一项弹劾总统祖马的提案。Brazilian President Dilma Rousseff’s lawyers will present final arguments before an impeachment committee at the start of a crucial two weeks that will determine her political fate. 巴西总统罗赛夫的律师将向弹劾委员会提出最后申辩，接下来关键的两周将决定她的政治命运。好的，我们今天学习的词是 impeachment，impeachment, impeachment…

title: insufficient
article: 今天我们要学的词是 insufficient. Insufficient 形容词，不充分的。Thousands of Chicago teachers went on a one-day strike, calling on the government to address insufficient public school funding. 芝加哥数千名教师罢工一天，呼吁政府解决公立学校经费不足的问题。A recent study by researchers from the University of Chicago showed that insufficient sleep might lead to cravings for unhealthy snacks. 芝加哥大学研究人员的最新研究结果显示，睡眠不足会让人贪吃不健康的零食。好的，我们今天学习的词是 insufficient, insufficient, insufficient…

title: interference
article: 今天我们要学的词是 interference. Interference 干扰，干涉。Russia said that Turkey should stop interference into the internal affairs of its neighboring countries. 俄罗斯表示，土耳其应该停止干涉邻国内政。South Korean officials accused North Korea of using radio waves to conduct GPS signal interference near the border. 韩国官员指责朝鲜利用无线电波在边界地区对韩国的全球定位系统的信号进行干扰。好的，我们今天学习的词是 interference, interference, interference…

title: acceptance rate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 acceptance rate. Acceptance rate录取率。Harvard University’s acceptance rate sank to 5.2% this year, a record low. 哈佛大学今年的录取率跌至5.2%, 再创历史新低。Among Ivy League schools, only Brown University and Dartmouth College’s acceptance rates were higher this year than last year. 在常春藤学校里，只有布朗大学和达特茅斯学院的录取率跟去年相比有所提升。好的，我们今天学习的词是 acceptance rate, acceptance rate, acceptance rate…

title: defect
article: 今天我们要学的词是defect. Defect动词，叛逃。South Korea confirmed that a high ranking North Korean military official defected to the South last year. 韩国证实，朝鲜一名高级军官去年脱北，投奔韩国。就在几天前，South Korea revealed that 13 North Koreans working at a state-owned restaurant in a foreign country defected as a group. 韩国透露，一家驻外的朝鲜国营餐厅的13名员工集体脱北，投奔韩国。好的，我们今天学习的词是 defect, defect, defect…

title: border crossing
article: 今天我们要学的词是border crossing. Border crossing 边境通道。Finland has started tightening controls at two Northern border crossings with Russia to stop illegal crossings. 芬兰加紧对北部两个边境通道的控制，防止有人从俄罗斯一边非法越境。Pakistan and Iran agreed to open two more border crossings to increase bilateral trade. 巴基斯坦和伊朗同意增设两个边境通道，以增加双边贸易。好的，我们今天学习的词是 border crossing, border crossing, border crossing…

title: ratchet up
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ratchet up. Ratchet up 提高，加剧。U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry said that Washington is ready to ratchet up pressure on increasingly aggressive North Korea. 美国国务卿克里说，美国随时准备对越来越肆无忌惮的朝鲜施加更大的压力。The Obama administration has requested a quadrupling of defense spending in Central and Eastern Europe for fiscal year 2017, a move critics say would ratchet up Cold-War era tensions with Russia. 奥巴马政府要求将2017年财政年度用于中欧东欧的国防开支翻两番，批评人士认为此举会让美俄冷战时期的紧张关系再度抬头。好的，我们今天学习的词是 ratchet up, ratchet up, ratchet up…

title: counterweight
article: 今天我们要学的词是 counterweight. Counterweight 用于平衡，制衡的力量。美国国防部长卡特前往印度访问。U.S. Defense Secretary Ash Carter tried to enhance a relatively new defense relationship with India which the U.S. sees as a counterweight to the growing power of China. 卡特试图培养美印间年轻的国防关系，美国认为印度可以对中国实力的上升起到制衡作用。Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said recently that Japan and South Korea should have nuclear weapons as a counterweight against China and North Korea. 美国共和党总统参选人川普最近说，日本和韩国应该拥有核武器，制衡中国和朝鲜。好的，我们今天学习的词是 counterweight, counterweight, counterweight…

title: road rage
article: 今天我们要学的词是 road rage. Road rage 路怒。Former NFL football star Will Smith was shot dead during an apparent road rage incident in New Orleans. 美国前橄榄球明星球员史密斯在新奥尔良的一次路怒事件中被射杀身亡。National Highway Traffic Safety Administration data show that road rage or aggressive driving were reported as a factor in 375 fatal crashes in 2014. 美国高速公路交通安全管理局的数据显示，路怒或野蛮驾驶是2014年375起致命车祸的起因。好的，我们今天学习的词是 road rage, road rage, road rage…

title: coordinate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 coordinate. Coordinate 动词，协调。Islamic nations pledged to establish a policy center in Istanbul to coordinate anti-terrorism efforts. 伊斯兰国家保证要在伊斯坦布尔建议一个政策中心，协同打击恐怖主义。Ecuador’s President cut short his trip to Italy, returning home to coordinate rescue efforts after Saturday’s 7.8-magnitude earthquake. 厄瓜多尔总统中断对意大利的访问，回国协调星期六7.8级强烈地震后的救灾工作。好的，我们今天学习的词是 coordinate, coordinate, coordinate…

title: unilateral
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unilateral. Unilateral 单边的 ， 单方面的。Azerbaijan announced a unilateral cease-fire in the disputed region of Nagorno-Karabakh. 阿塞拜疆宣布，在有争议的纳戈尔诺-卡拉巴赫地区实现单方面停火。以色列总理内塔尼亚胡星期天表示，以色列不会从格兰高地撤走。A German Foreign Ministry spokesman said that a unilateral decision by Israel to keep the Golan Heights would breach international law. 德国外交部发言人说，以色列单方面决定继续占据格兰高地的做法违反国际法。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 unilateral，unilateral, unilateral…

title: abide by
article: 今天我们要学的词是 abide by. To abide by 意思是遵守。南苏丹上星期五正式成为东非共同体的第六个成员国。South Sudan President Kiir pledged to abide by the East Africa Community rules. 南苏丹总统基尔保证遵守东非共同体的规则。Lebanon’s Central Bank Governor said that Beirut will abide by a U.S. law that imposes sanctions on banks knowingly doing business with Hezbollah. 黎巴嫩中央银行行长表示，黎巴嫩会遵守美国对明知故犯，跟真主党做生意的银行实施制裁的法律。好的，我们今天学习的词是 abide by, abide by, abide by…

title: displaced
article: 今天我们要学的词是 displaced. Displaced 颠沛流离的。U.N. Secretary General Ban Ki-moon called the current refugee crisis, with over 70 million displaced people, totally uncontrollable. 联合国秘书长潘基文说，目前7000多万人颠沛流离的移民危机已经变得无法控制。The death toll from the massive earthquakes in Japan has reached over 42, while over 100,000 people remain displaced. 日本大地震遇难者人数已经超过42人，还有10万余人流离失所。好的，我们今天学习的词是 displaced, displaced, displaced…

title: permanent
article: 今天我们要学的词是 permanent. Permanent 永久性的。British Finance Minister George Osborne warned voters that leaving the European Union would do permanent damage to the British economy. 英国财政大臣奥斯本警告英国选民，离开欧盟会对英国经济造成永久性的伤害。Former NBA star Stephon Marbury has become a permanent Chinese resident. 美国前NBA球星马布里取得了中国永久居民的身份。好的，我们今天学习的词是 permanent, permanent, permanent…

title: felon
article: 今天我们要学的词是 felon. Felon 名词，意思是重犯。Virginia Governor Terry McAuliffe signed an executive order to restore voting rights for roughly 200,000 convicted felons. 美国弗吉尼亚州州长麦考利夫签署行政命令，恢复了大约20万在押重犯的投票权。A man described as “a perfect donor” by a sperm bank who fathered 36 children turned out to be a mentally ill felon. 一个被精子库形容为“完美捐赠人”的男子，实际上是一个患有精神疾病的重犯人，他的精子先后孕育出36个孩子。好的，我们今天学习的词是 felon, felon, felon…

title: overturn
article: 今天我们要学的词是 overturn. Overturn 动词，有推翻，废除的意思。U.S. President Barack Obama called for North Carolina to overturn a state law that requires transgender people to use public bathrooms according to the sex on their birth certificates. 美国总统奥巴马呼吁北卡罗来纳州废除要求跨性别者按出生性别使用公共厕所的州立法。Tennessee’s House of Representatives failed to overturn Governor Bill Haslam’s veto of a bill to designate the Bible as the “official book” of Tennessee. 田纳西州议会众议院没能推翻州长哈斯拉姆对把圣经定为田纳西州“州书”的否决。好的，我们今天学习的词是 overturn, overturn, overturn…

title: renewed
article: 今天我们要学的词是 renewed. Renewed 作为形容词，有复兴的，更新的意思。The death of seven-time Grammy-winner Prince sparked renewed interest in his music. 七次获得格莱美奖的传奇人物“王子”的去世让人们对他的音乐重新产生了兴趣。U.S. Senate Democrats are making a renewed effort to address the danger of lead water pipes across the country. 美国国会参议院民主党人重新努力，着手解决美国各地铅制输水管道所带来的危害性的问题。好的，我们今天学习的词是 renewed, renewed, renewed…

title: law enforcement
article: 今天我们要学的词是 law enforcement. Law enforcement 是执法的意思。Federal law enforcement investigators are searching for more than 500 pounds of stolen explosives. 联邦执法人员正在寻找500多磅被盗的爆炸物。苹果公司的报告显示，U.S. law enforcement agencies sought information from Apple 4,000 times in the second half of 2015. 美国执法机构2015年下半年总计四千次要求苹果公司提供信息。好的，我们今天学习的词是 law enforcement, law enforcement, law enforcement…

title: uptick
article: 今天我们要学的词是 uptick. Uptick 名词，是小幅上扬的意思。Taxi drivers in New York City are on alert because of an uptick in armed robberies in Queens. 纽约皇后区持械抢劫事件有所增加，纽约市出租车司机格外小心。最新公布的统计数字显示，美国1999年到2014年间的自杀率上扬24%。Middle-aged men between the ages of 45 and 64 saw the greatest uptick in suicide rates among any male age groups, increasing by 43 percent over the 15-year period. 在男性各年龄组中，45-64岁的中年人自杀率上扬幅度最大，在这15年间上升了43%. 好的，我们今天学习的词是 uptick, uptick, uptick…

title: default
article: 今天我们要学的词是 default. Default 作为动词，有债务违约的意思。Puerto Rico defaulted on a $422 million debt payment due on Monday, and the Governor of the island partially blamed it on the U.S. 波多黎各星期一出现4亿2200万美元的债务违约，波多黎各总督认为美国要对此负部分责任。Puerto Rico has defaulted before, but Monday’s default is the largest ever for the island. 波多黎各以前也曾出现过债务违约的情况，但星期一的债务违约是数额最大的一次。好的，我们今天学习的词是 default, default, default…

title: retweet
article: 今天我们要学的词是 retweet. Retweet 动词，转发推特。美国中央情报局发推特，详述五年前打死本拉登的行动细节。The CIA’s tweets were retweeted thousands of times, drawing likes and criticism. 中央情报局的推特被数千次转发，有人点赞，有人批评。歌星贾斯汀·比伯在推特上的粉丝四月底超过8000万。Justin Bieber’s most popular tweet was retweeted over 617,000 times when he thanked his followers for standing by his side after he was charged with driving under the influence.他最受欢迎的一条推特是被控酒驾后感谢粉丝的继续支持，那条推特被转推61万7千多次。好的，我们今天学习的词是 retweet, retweet, retweet…

title: presence
article: 今天我们要学的词是 presence. Presence 名词，存在。美国总统奥巴马上周表示，The United States will significantly enhance its military presence in Syria to fight the Islamic State. 美国将大幅度增加在叙利亚的军事存在，打击伊斯兰国恐怖组织。Iran’s Supreme Leader criticized the U.S. presence in the Persian Gulf region, saying American forces should go back to the Bay of Pigs. 伊朗最高领袖对美国在波斯湾的存在提出批评，说美军部队应该回到猪湾去。好的，我们今天学习的词是 presence，presence, presence…

title: extension
article: 今天我们要学的词是 extension. Extension 有延期的意思。Germany will ask the European Commission for an extension of the temporary border controls within the Schengen passport-free travel zone. 德国准备请求欧洲委员会延长对免护照申根区的临时性边境管制。The European Space Agency announced a two-week extension for British astronaut Tim Peake to remain aboard the International Space Station. 欧洲航天局宣布，将英国宇航员提姆·匹克在国际空间站停留的时间延长两个星期。好的，我们今天学习的词是 extension, extension, extension…

title: gap year
article: 今天我们要学的词是 gap year. Gap year 空档年。A gap year refers to a year off between high school and college. 空档年是指高中毕业，上大学前休学一年。The concept of a gap year has long been popular in Britain and other countries, and has been gaining traction in the U.S. 空档年在英国等国家一直很流行，美国近年也慢慢开始。Malia Obama, President Obama’s elder daughter, will take a gap year before attending Harvard in 2017. 美国总统奥巴马的大女儿玛丽亚准备高中毕业后空档一年，2017年再去哈佛上大学。好的，我们今天学习的词是 gap year, gap year, gap year…

title: expel
article: 今天我们要学的词是 expel. Expel动词，有驱逐，赶走的意思。Nepal threatened to expel the Indian ambassador for interfering in its internal affairs. 尼泊尔威胁要将印度驻尼泊尔大使驱逐出境，因为他插手尼泊尔内政。North Korea expelled a team of BBC journalists, apparently because officials were not happy with their reports. 朝鲜将BBC的一个报道小组驱逐出境，显然是因为朝鲜官员对这些记者的报道感到不满。好的，我们今天学习的词是 expel, expel, expel…

title: referendum
article: 今天我们要学的词是referendum. Referendum 名词，全民公决。Britain is scheduled to hold a referendum on June 23rd to decide whether Britain is to remain in or leave the EU. 英国定于6月23号举行全民公决，决定是否继续留在欧盟。与此同时，Forty-five percent of voters surveyed in eight big EU member countries want to have a UK-style referendum to decide whether to remain in the bloc. 对欧盟八大成员国选民进行的民调显示，45%的人希望举行像英国一样的全民公决，决定是否留在欧盟。好的，我们今天学习的词是 referendum，referendum, referendum…

title: captivity
article: 今天我们要学的词是captivity. Captivity名词，有囚禁的意思。Three Spanish freelance journalists were released after spending almost ten months in captivity in Syria. 三位西班牙自由撰稿记者在叙利亚被关押将近十个月后获得释放。A group of 13 Ukrainian medics were freed from captivity by the Islamic State terrorist group last week. 被伊斯兰国恐怖组织关押的13名乌克兰医护人员上周被释放。好的，我们今天学习的词是 captivity, captivity, captivity…

title: refugee camp
article: 今天我们要学的词是refugee camp. Refugee camp名词，难民营。A senior UN official called for an investigation into an airstrike on a Syrian refugee camp that killed at least 28 people. 叙利亚一个难民营被空袭，至少28人丧生，联合国一位高级官员要求对此展开调查。Kenya plans to shut down the world largest refugee camp, where nearly 330,000 Somali refugees currently live. 肯尼亚计划关闭世界上最大的难民营，那里住着将近33万索马里难民。好的，我们今天学习的词是 refugee camp, refugee camp, refugee camp…

title: medical error
article: 今天我们要学的词是 medical error. Medical error 医疗过失。Researchers from Johns Hopkins University say medical errors are the third leading cause of death in the United States. 约翰斯霍普金斯大学研究人员说，医疗过失在美国是造成死亡的第三大原因。According to their study, more than 250,000 people die from medical errors every year. 他们的研究结果发现，每年有25万多人死于医疗过失。好的，我们今天学习的词是 medical error, medical error, medical error…

title: identify
article: 今天我们要学的词是 identify. Identify is spelled i-d-e-n-t-i-f-y, identify. Identify 动词，有确认的意思。Using documents provided by an ISIS defector, NBC News identified at least 15 U.S. citizens or residents who went overseas and joined ISIS. 美国全国广播公司从一名叛离伊斯兰国恐怖组织的人那里得到文件，确认出至少15名离开美国，加入伊斯兰国组织的美国公民和永久居民。英国皇家植物园发表报告说，Scientists have identified 391,000 plants, and more than 80,000 of those are in danger of becoming extinct. 科学家总共确认出39万1千种植物，其中8万多种面临绝种。好的，我们今天学习的词是 identify, identify, identify…

title: uptick
article: 今天我们要学的词是uptick。 Uptick, 名词，意思是上升。 “There has been an uptick in violent crimes in the past year,” 过去一年里暴力犯罪有所上升。”Local retailers expect to see a sales uptick in this year’s holiday shopping season,” 本地零售商估计，今年节假购物季节的销量会出现上扬。跟去年同期相比，赌城拉斯维加斯七月份的游客数量上升了2.3%。有评论认为， “The visitor uptick in Las Vegas is reflective of a nationwide trend,” 拉斯维加斯游客数量的上扬反应了全国范围内的总趋势。好的，今天我们学习的词是uptick…

title: graduation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 graduation. Graduation is spelled g-r-a-d-u-a-t-i-o-n, graduation. Graduation 毕业。Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump attended his youngest daughter’s graduation ceremony at the University of Pennsylvania. 共和党总统参选人川普在宾夕法尼亚大学参加他小女儿的毕业典礼。President Obama delivered the commencement address at Rutgers University’s graduation ceremony. 美国总统奥巴马在罗斯格大学毕业典礼上发表毕业演讲。好的，我们今天学习的词是 graduation, graduation, graduation…

title: disheartened
article: 今天我们要学的词是 disheartened. Disheartened is spelled d-i-s-h-e-a-r-t-e-n-e-d, disheartened. Disheartened 形容词，沮丧的，心灰意冷的。Angelina Jolie, the special envoy for the United Nations refugee agency, said she is disheartened by the U.S. response to the global migration crisis. 联合国难民署特使安吉莉娜·朱莉说，美国对全球移民危机的反应让她很沮丧。Fiji’s Prime Minister urged families who had lost their homes in Tropical Cyclone Winston not to be disheartened. 斐济总理敦促在热带气旋温斯顿中失去家园的家庭不要心灰意冷。好的，我们今天学习的词是 disheartened, disheartened, disheartened…

title: state sponsored
article: 今天我们要学的词是 state-sponsored. State-sponsored is spelled s-t-a-t-e，dash， s-p-o-n-s-o-r-e-d, state-sponsored. State-sponsored 形容词，意思是国家支持的。Russian officials denied the latest allegations that Russia ran a state-sponsored doping program to help athletes win medals at the Sochi Winter Olympics. 俄罗斯否认曾存在国家支持的兴奋剂项目，帮助俄罗斯运动员在索契冬奥会上赢得奖牌。The Thai Ministry of Education dismissed rumors that the government is planning to shorten15-year state-sponsored free education for all. 泰国教育部否认有关政府将缩短15年免费教育的传言。好的，我们今天学习的词是 state-sponsored, state-sponsored, state-sponsored…

title: right wing
article: 今天我们要学的词是 right-wing. Right-wing 形容词，右翼的。According to annual crime statistics, violent crimes motivated by right-wing political opinions rose more than 40 percent in Germany last year. 年度犯罪数字显示，去年德国因右翼政见引发的暴力犯罪上涨了40%多。A court in Munich ruled that the tavern where Adolf Hitler gave his first public speech must honor its contract and allow a right-wing party to hold an event. 慕尼黑一家法院裁决，希特勒发表第一次公开演讲的酒店必须履行合约，允许一个右翼党派在那里举行活动。好的，我们今天学习的词是 right-wing, right-wing, right-wing…

title: embargo
article: 今天我们要学的词是 embargo. Embargo 有禁运的意思。President Obama said at a news conference in Hanoi that the United States will fully lift an embargo on arms sales to Vietnam. 美国总统奥巴马在河内举行的记者会上说，美国将全面取消对越南的武器禁运。The CEO of Caterpillar Inc. said that the world’s largest maker of heavy equipment is ready to move into the Cuban market once the U.S. trade embargo is lifted. 卡特彼勒公司首席执行官说，美国对古巴的贸易禁运一取消，这家世界上最大的重型器械制造商就准备进军古巴市场。好的，我们今天学习的词是 embargo, embargo, embargo…

title: peace corps
article: 今天我们要学的词是 Peace Corps. Peace Corps 和平队，两个字首写字母都是大写。The Peace Corps is a U.S. international service organization that sends American volunteers to tackle the most pressing needs of people around the world. 和平队是美国的一个国际服务组织，向世界各地派遣义工，协助解决最急需解决的问题。President Obama announced on Monday that the Peace Corps will go to Vietnam for the first time. 美国总统奥巴马星期一宣布，和平队将首次前往越南。好的，我们今天学习的词是 Peace Corps, Peace Corps, Peace Corps…

title: infection
article: 今天我们要学的词是 infection. Infection 名词，有感染的意思。美国疾病预防控制中心的数字显示，279 pregnant women in the United States and U.S. territories have tested positive for Zika infection. 美国本土和属地已经有279名孕妇检测结果显示，感染了寨卡病毒。There are 5,000 new cases of HIV infection in 14 Southern and Eastern African countries each week, half of which are in South Africa. 南部和东部非洲的14个国家每周新发现HIV感染病例共5千例，其中一半来自南非。好的，我们今天学习的词是 infection, infection, infection…

title: visa free
article: 今天我们要学的词是 visa-free. Visa-free 免签的。The European Commission reached a preliminary agreement, making it easier to suspend visa-free travel for non-E.U. citizens from certain countries. 欧洲委员会达成初步协议，更便于暂停非欧盟特定国家公民所享受的免签待遇。German Chancellor Angela Merkel urged Turkey to meet all conditions set by the European Union before its citizens can enjoy visa-free travel. 德国总理默克尔敦促土耳其满足欧盟提出的全部条件，这样土耳其公民才能享受免签旅行的待遇。好的，我们今天学习的词是 visa-free, visa-free, visa-free…

title: ongoing
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ongoing. Ongoing is spelled o-n-g-o-i-n-g, ongoing. Ongoing 形容词，正在进行当中的。India and China have agreed to continue ongoing boundary negotiations and resolved to maintain peace along the border. 印度和中国同意继续进行中的边界问题协商，并决心保证边界地区和平。125 public health experts released a letter, calling for this summer’s Olympic Games to be postponed or moved from Rio de Janeiro due to the ongoing Zika virus outbreak in Brazil. 125名公共健康专家发表公开信提出，考虑到巴西寨卡病毒的盛行，呼吁让即将在里约热内卢举行的夏季奥运会推迟或换地方。好的，我们今天学习的词是 ongoing, ongoing, ongoing…

title: tourism
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tourism. Tourism is spelled t-o-u-r-i-s-m, tourism. Tourism 旅游业。Saudi Arabia plans to relax restrictions on visas for Muslim pilgrims, hoping to boost religious tourism. 沙特阿拉伯计划放松对穆斯林朝圣者的签证限制，希望借此推动宗教旅游业的发展。The number of tourists visiting Turkey fell by 28% in April from a year earlier, making it the biggest drop in 17 years for Turkey’s tourism industry. 四月份土耳其接待外国游客的数量比一年前跌落28%，是土耳其旅游业17年来的最大跌幅。好的，我们今天学习的词是 tourism, tourism, tourism…

title: abortion
article: 今天我们要学的词是 abortion. Abortion is spelled a-b-o-r-t-i-o-n, abortion. Abortion 堕胎。South Carolina’s Governor signed a bill that bans most abortions past 19 weeks unless the mother’s life is at risk. 南卡罗莱纳州州长签署法案规定，除非母亲性命攸关，否则怀胎超过19周后禁止堕胎。与此同时，A law passed by the Georgia Legislature reduced the abortion window from 24 weeks to 20 weeks. 乔治亚州议会通过法案，将合法堕胎的孕期从24周减少到20周。好的，我们今天学习的词是 abortion, abortion, abortion…

title: understaffed
article: 今天我们要学的词是 understaffed. Understaffed is spelled u-n-d-e-r-s-t-a-f-f-e-d, understaffed. Understaffed 形容词，人手不足的。The head of the U.S. Transportation Security Administration told Congress that airports across the country will be understaffed during the peak summer travel season. 美国运输安全局负责人告诉国会说，夏季旅行旺季全国各地机场都存在人手短缺的情况。加拿大政府一项审计报告说，The Canadian Army Reserves is understaffed, under-equipped and not fully ready to deploy. 加拿大陆军预备役人员装备短缺，不能随时投入部署。好的，我们今天学习的词是 understaffed, understaffed, understaffed…

title: posting
article: 今天我们要学的词是 posting. Posting is spelled p-o-s-t-i-n-g, posting. Posting 作为名词，可以指在社交媒体上发的帖子。A study of 10 million Facebook postings shows that women used gentler words while men were more likely to swear and use argumentative language. 对脸书上1000万条帖子进行的研究发现，女性用语更温和，男性更倾向于说话不干不净，喜欢争吵。Three city councilors were suspended by Britain’s Labor Party over anti-Israel postings. 英国工党暂停了三名市议员的职务，因为他们发表有关反以色列言论的帖子。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 posting, posting, posting…

title: consecutive
article: 今天我们要学的词是 consecutive. Consecutive 形容词，连续的。Novac Djocovic won his first French Open title and his fourth consecutive major title. 诺瓦克.德约科维奇第一次赢得法国网球公开赛冠军，这也是他连续赢得的第四个重要赛事的冠军。The latest report shows that Scotland’s GDP growth will slow down for the third consecutive year. 最新报告预计，苏格兰的国内生产总值将连续第三年放缓。好的，我们今天学习的词是 consecutive, consecutive, consecutive…

title: runaway
article: 今天我们要学的词是 runaway. Runaway 作为形容词，有失控的意思。埃及人口在半年里增长了一百万。Egypt’s authorities warn that runaway population growth is a main obstacle to improving the standard of living. 埃及有关当局警告说，人口增长失控是提高生活质量的主要障碍。英格兰银行数字显示，消费者信贷在过去一年中增长了近10%。Runaway debt levels exposed 14 million Brits to new financial risks. 失去控制的债务负担让1400万英国人暴露在新的金融风险之下。好的，我们今天学习的词是 runaway, runaway, runaway…

title: alcohol
article: 今天我们要学的词是 alcohol. Alcohol 酒精。The U.S. Navy banned alcohol for all sailors stationed in Japan, citing a string of “alcohol-related incidents detrimental to the U.S.-Japan alliance.” 美国海军表示，鉴于最近一系列由酒精导致的有损美日联盟关系的事件，禁止驻日美军喝酒。The alcohol industry is anxiously waiting for a court decision in Scotland on whether the government can mandate minimum prices. 制酒业紧张地等待苏格兰的一项法院裁决，决定政府是否可以设定酒精产品的最低价格。好的，我们今天学习的词是 alcohol, alcohol, alcohol…

title: reassure
article: 今天我们要学的词是 reassure. Reassure 动词，是让某人安心的意思。South Africa’s government reassured its citizens that they are not in “immediate danger” following a U.S. warning of a possible terror attack in the country during Ramadan. 南非政府让民众放心，他们并不面临随时可能发生的危险，此前美国警告说，斋月期间南非可能会受到恐怖袭击。Three Republican senators visited South Korea to reassure Seoul that U.S. policy toward the country will not change even if Donald Trump was to win the election. 三位共和党联邦参议员访问韩国，让韩国放心，即便川普当选，美国对韩政策也不会改变。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 reassure, reassure, reassure…

title: celebrity
article: 今天我们要学的词是 celebrity. Celebrity 名人，名流。Several celebrities’ twitter accounts were hacked, including that of Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg. 一些名人的推特账户遭到黑客袭击，受害者包括脸书首席执行官马克·扎克伯格。纽约大学研究人员的最新研究发现，Almost all food or drink a music celebrity endorses and promotes is unhealthy. 音乐界名人代言或是推荐的所有食物或饮料都是不利于身体健康的。好的，我们今天学习的词是 celebrity, celebrity, celebrity…

title: overtake
article: 今天我们要学的词是 overtake.To overtake 动词，有超过，超越的意思。最新统计数字显示，法国2015年防务武器出口贸易额从8亿美元猛增至18亿美元。Analysts say if the rate continues, France will overtake Russia as the second largest defense exporter by 2018. 分析人士说，如果这样的发展速度继续下去的话，法国2018年前将超过俄罗斯，成为全球第二大防务出口国。A new report is predicting that Hong Kong’s online advertising revenue will overtake that of television for the first time next year. 一份最新报告预计，香港网上广告收入明年将首次超过电视广告收入。好的，我们今天学习的词是 overtake, overtake, overtake…

title: massacre
article: 今天我们要学的词是 massacre. Massacre 名词，屠杀。美国佛罗里达州发生枪击案，造成49人丧生。President Barack Obama ordered U.S. flags to be flown at half-staff in memory of the victims of the worst massacre in U.S. history. 美国总统奥巴马下令降半旗，向美国历史上最惨重的一起屠杀事件中的遇难者致哀。In a televised speech, President Obama called the Orlando nightclub massacre “an act of terror and an act of hate.” 奥巴马总统在电视上发表讲话，称奥兰多夜总会发生的屠杀事件是一次恐怖行为，仇恨之举。好的，我们今天学习的词是 massacre, massacre, massacre…

title: reopen
article: 今天我们要学的词是 reopen. Reopen 动词，是重开的意思。A Romanian court ruled that an investigation into the 1989 revolution can be reopened. 罗马尼亚一家法院裁定，围绕1989年革命展开的调查可以重开。The gorilla exhibit at the Cincinnati Zoo reopened 10 days after a boy fell into the exhibit and a special response team had to kill a gorilla to protect the boy. 辛辛那提市动物园猩猩馆重新对外开放，十天前，一个男孩掉了进去，动物园应急小组为保护孩子安全，不得不射杀了一只猩猩。好的，我们今天学习的词是 reopen, reopen, reopen…

title: geopolitical
article: 今天我们要学的词是 geopolitical. Geopolitical 形容词，地缘政治的。The European Union President warned that voting to leave the EU would be a geopolitical setback for Britain. 欧盟主席警告说，投票决定离开欧盟将给英国带来地缘政治上的一大挫败。The former Russian finance minister urged President Vladimir Putin to ease geopolitical tensions for the sake of the Russian economy. 俄罗斯前财政部长敦促俄罗斯总统普京为俄罗斯经济着想，缓和地缘政治上的紧张状态。好的，我们今天学习的词是 geopolitical, geopolitical, geopolitical…

title: permission
article: 今天我们要学的词是 permission. Permission 名词，许可。Six U.S. airlines won permission to resume scheduled commercial flights from the U.S. to Cuba for the first time in more than five decades. 美国六家航空公司赢得许可，半个多世纪以来首次恢复美国到古巴的定期商业航班。A Chinese drone company has been granted permission to test its passenger-carrying aerial vehicle in Nevada. 一家中国无人机公司得到许可，可以在内华达州进行载客无人机飞行试验。好的，我们今天学习的词是 permission, permission, permission…

title: running mate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 running mate. Running mate 竞选伙伴。The Wall Street journal reported that Hillary Clinton is considering U.S. Senator Elizabeth Warren for her running mate. 华尔街日报报道，希拉里·克林顿考虑让联邦参议员伊丽莎白·沃伦做她的竞选伙伴。与此同时，It seems like former Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice has no interest in being Donald Trump’s running mate. 美国前国务卿赖斯好像对做川普的竞选伙伴没有兴趣。好的，我们今天学习的词是 running mate, running mate, running mate…

title: time frame
article: 今天我们要学的词是 time frame. Time frame 时限。Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said his country backs ratification of a treaty banning nuclear tests but didn’t commit to a time frame. 以色列总理内塔尼亚胡表示，以色列支持批准禁止核试验的条约，但是没有在时限上做出承诺。Federal Reserve Chairwoman Janet Yellen said future interest rate hikes would be appropriate but gave no time frame. 美联储主席耶伦表示，未来升息是恰当的，但是没有给出时间表。好的，我们今天学习的词是 time frame, time frame, time frame…

title: restrict
article: 今天我们要学的词是 restrict. Restrict 动词，限制。China is restricting TV shows based on foreign formats such as “The Voice of China,” hoping to generate more original programming among Chinese TV channels. 中国对中国好声音这类以外国节目为模本制作的电视节目加以限制，希望借此让中国电视台制作更多原创节目。Democrats revived the long-stalled effort to restrict gun access after the Orlando mass shooting. 奥兰多大规模枪击案的发生，让民主党人得以重新启动拖延已久的加强枪支管制的努力。好的，我们今天学习的词是 restrict, restrict, restrict…

title: boycott
article: 今天我们要学的词是 boycott. Boycott 动词，抵制。The leaders of the world’s Orthodox Christian churches met on the Greek island of Crete for a landmark meeting despite a boycott by the Russian church. 尽管俄罗斯教会抵制，但是世界各地东正教领袖还是在希腊克里特岛举行了一次历史性会议。Gun enthusiasts are calling for a boycott against a Texas-based sporting goods store for no longer putting certain firearms on display. 总部位于得克萨斯州的一家体育用品商店决定停止陈列特定类型的枪支，枪支爱好者因此呼吁抵制这家商店。好的，我们今天学习的词是 boycott, boycott, boycott…

title: sweeping
article: 今天我们要学的词是 sweeping. Sweeping 形容词，有全面彻底的意思。India announced sweeping reforms to ease foreign investment in defense, civil aviation and a number of other industries. 印度宣布全面改革，放松对国防，民航等工业外来投资的限制。Belgian authorities conducted a sweeping round of security raids in connection with an imminent threat of attack. 比利时有关当局为了防范一次即将发生的袭击威胁，展开了一轮全面的安全突袭行动。好的，我们今天学习的词是 sweeping, sweeping, sweeping…

title: mistreatment
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mistreatment. Mistreatment 名词，有虐待的意思。Pope Francis said Christians and the Roman Catholic Church should seek forgiveness from gays for previous mistreatment. 教宗方济各表示，基督徒和罗马天主教会应该为过去虐待同性恋的行为向他们寻求宽恕。Officials at a Virginia jail dismissed claims of mistreatment made by many inmates as unfounded. 针对很多在押犯提出被虐待的指控，维吉尼亚一所监狱的官员表示，这种指控完全子虚乌有。好的，我们今天学习的词是 mistreatment, mistreatment, mistreatment…

title: flash flooding
article: 今天我们要学的词是 flash flooding. Flash flooding 名词，骤发洪水。President Obama declared a major disaster in West Virginia after flash flooding left at least 24 people dead. 西维吉尼亚州骤发洪水造成至少24人丧生，奥巴马总统宣布重大灾害。This was the deadliest flash flooding in the U.S. since 2010. 这次骤发洪水是美国2010年以来造成死亡人数最多的一次。好的，我们今天学习的词是 flash flooding, flash flooding, flash flooding…

title: overturn
article: 今天我们要学的词是 overturn. Overturn 动词，推翻。The U.S. Supreme Court overturned the bribery conviction of former Virginia governor Bob McDonnell. 美国联邦最高法院推翻了前维吉尼亚州长麦克唐纳贪污受贿的判决。A British opposition lawmaker said the British parliament should overturn the referendum result calling for Britain to leave the EU. 英国一位反对派议员表示，英国议会应该推翻让英国脱离欧盟的公投结果。好的，我们今天学习的词是 overturn, overturn, overturn…

title: genocide
article: 今天我们要学的词是 genocide. Genocide 名词，种族灭绝。Pope Francis called the Ottoman-era slaughter of some 1.5 million Armenians a genocide and urged the world never to forget it. 教宗方济各称奥斯曼时代150万亚美尼亚人被杀戮为种族灭绝，敦促世界永远不要忘记。The Rhode Island governor signed a new law to make it mandatory for schools to teach the subject of genocides and the Holocaust. 罗德岛州长签署法律，要求学校一定要把种族灭绝和犹太人大屠杀纳入教材内容。好的，我们今天学习的词是 genocide, genocide, genocide…

title: orderly
article: 今天我们要学的词是 orderly. Orderly 形容词，有序的，有条不紊的。President Obama said that Britain is committed to an orderly transition out of the European Union. 美国总统奥巴马说，英国决心要有条不紊地过渡脱离欧盟。与此同时，U.S. Treasury Secretary Jacob Lew said the impact of the U.K.’s Brexit vote on the markets had been orderly. 美国财政部长雅各布·卢表示，英国脱欧的投票结果对市场产生的影响是符合规律的。好的，我们今天学习的词是 orderly, orderly, orderly…

title: date back
article: 今天我们要学的词是 date back. Date back 追溯到。An Australian commission is investigating complaints about students at a military academy being sexually abused that date back to the 1970s. 澳大利亚一个委员会就一所军校学生被性虐事件展开调查，据悉这种情况可以追溯到上世纪70年代。Archaeologists unearthed a campsite in Canada that could date back 12,000 years. 考古学家在加拿大挖掘出一片古营地，其历史可以追溯到一万两千年前。好的，我们今天学习的词是 date back, date back, date back…

title: malnutrition
article: 今天我们要学的词是 malnutrition. Malnutrition 营养不良。The United Nations Children’s Fund said nearly 250,000 Nigerian children are suffering from “severe acute malnutrition.” 联合国儿童基金会说，尼日利亚有将近25万儿童“严重急性营养不良”。A team of researchers won this year’s World Food Prize for developing more nutrient-rich strains of sweet potato to combat malnutrition. 一组研究人员因为研发营养更丰富的甘薯品种，打击营养不良，而赢得今年的世界食品奖。好的，我们今天学习的词是 malnutrition, malnutrition, malnutrition…

title: trial
article: 今天我们要学的词是 trial. Trial 作为名词，有选拔赛的意思。Michael Phelps won the 200-meter butterfly at the U.S. swimming trials, earning a trip to his fifth Olympics Games. 菲尔普斯在美国游泳选拔赛上赢得了200米蝶泳冠军，为他第五次参加奥运会拿到了入场券。Olympians Carmelita Jeter and Nick Symmonds both pulled out of the 2016 U.S. Olympic Track and Field trials due to injury. 美国往届奥运选手卡美莉塔·杰特和尼克·西蒙兹都因伤病退出2016年美国奥运选拔赛。好的，我们今天学习的词是 trial, trial, trial…

title: backlog
article: 今天我们要学的词是 backlog. Backlog 作为名词，有积压的意思。A latest report says the backlog at the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services has skyrocketed 1400 percent since 2011. 最新报告显示，美国移民局的积压案件自2011年以来猛增了14倍。The Department of Justice plans to hire at least 500 prosecutors to handle a backlog of over 10,000 cases. 美国司法部准备招聘至少五百位检察官，处理一万多个被积压的案件。好的，我们今天学习的词是 backlog, backlog, backlog…

title: unapproved
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unapproved. Unapproved 形容词，未经批准的。Researchers found that there are 570 clinics in the United States that offer unapproved stem cell therapy to patients. 研究人员发现，美国各地有570家诊所在未经批准的情况下向患者提供干细胞治疗。Indonesian lawmakers urged authorities to seize from hospitals and clinics all vaccines made by unapproved manufacturers. 印尼议员敦促有关当局收缴医院和诊所里所有由未经批准的厂商生产的疫苗。好的，我们今天学习的词是 unapproved, unapproved, unapproved…

title: deploy
article: 今天我们要学的词是 deploy. Deploy 动词，部署。South Korea and the United States announced their plan to deploy an advanced American missile defense system on the Korean peninsula. 韩国和美国宣布，计划在朝鲜半岛上部署先进的美国导弹防御系统。President Obama announced that the U.S. will deploy an additional 1,000 troops to Poland as part of a NATO effort to show strength against Russian aggression. 美国总统奥巴马宣布，将增派1000人的部队前往波兰，让北约面对俄罗斯咄咄逼人的姿态，展现自身实力。好的，我们今天学习的词是 deploy, deploy, deploy…

title: protectionism
article: 今天我们要学的词是 protectionism. Protectionism 名词，保护主义。IMF Managing Director Christine Lagarde warned that Donald Trump-style protectionism could hurt the global economy. 国际货币基金组织总裁拉加德警告说，川普那样的保护主义会伤害全球经济。China claimed that India has adopted trade protectionism to promote its domestic steel industry. 中国称，印度采取贸易保护主义，推动本土钢铁产业的发展。好的，我们今天学习的词是 protectionism, protectionism, protectionism…

title: preliminary
article: 今天我们要学的词是 preliminary. Preliminary 形容词，初步的。A British judge has set July 19 for a preliminary hearing of the first legal attempt to prevent Brexit. 英国一位法官确定7月19号初审，听取第一个旨在防止英国脱欧的诉案。According to preliminary estimates of a UN report, per capita fish consumption around the world topped 20 kilograms for the first time in 2014. 联合国一份报告的初步估计数字显示，全球人均鱼摄入量2014年首次超过20公斤。好的，我们今天学习的词是 preliminary, preliminary, preliminary…

title: bipartisan
article: 今天我们要学的词是 bipartisan. Bipartisan 形容词，跨党派的。House Republican and Democratic leaders began bipartisan talks to address growing gun violence in the country. 美国国会众议院共和民主两党领袖开始跨党派会谈，设法解决美国不断加剧的枪支暴力问题。The White House and congressional democrats pressured Republicans for bipartisan Zika-funding legislation. 美国政府和国会民主党议员向共和党人施压，争取通过为打击寨卡病毒拨款的跨党派议案。好的，我们今天学习的词是 bipartisan, bipartisan, bipartisan…

title: consumption
article: 今天我们要学的词是 consumption. Consumption 名词，有消耗，消费的意思。A recent study on news consumption habits of American adults shows that most people don’t get their news from social media. 一项就美国成年人新闻消费习惯的研究显示，大多数人的新闻来源并非社交媒体。最新统计数字显示，China’s energy consumption last year grew at its slowest pace since 1998. 中国去年能源消耗的增长速度是1998年以来最缓慢的一年。好的，我们今天学习的词是 consumption, consumption, consumption…

title: coup
article: 今天我们要学的词是 coup. Coup 名词，政变。Turkish officials say nearly 8,000 police officers have been suspended on suspicion of having links to the coup attempt last Friday. 土耳其官员说，近八千警察因为涉嫌跟上周五的政变企图有关联而被停职。Turkish President Erdogan has said that the Parliament will consider introducing the death penalty to deal with those who were responsible for the failed coup. 土耳其总统埃尔多安表示，土耳其议会将考虑启用死刑，来惩罚制造这次未遂政变的人。好的，我们今天学习的词是 coup, coup, coup…

title: involvement
article: 今天我们要学的词是 involvement. Involvement 名词，有牵连，卷入的意思。U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry denounced any suggestion of American involvement in the Turkish failed coup. 美国国务卿克里驳斥了有关美国跟土耳其未遂政变有关的说法。Saudi Arabia says it had no involvement in the 911 terror attack and welcomed the release of a once-classified chapter of a U.S. congressional report. 沙特阿拉伯表示，跟911恐怖袭击无关，并对一份美国国会报告其中一章的解密表示欢迎。好的，我们今天学习的词是 involvement, involvement, involvement…

title: honor killing
article: 今天我们要学的词是 honor killing. Honor killing 名词，荣誉处死。Pakistan model and social media icon Qandeel Baloch was murdered by her brother in an honor killing. 巴基斯坦模特和网红卡迪尔·巴洛赫被兄弟荣誉处死。Human Right Watch is calling on Pakistan to investigate and prosecute those responsible for an increase in honor killings in the country. 人权观察呼吁巴基斯坦对境内荣誉处决增加的情况展开调查，对肇事者提出起诉。好的，我们今天学习的词是 honor killing, honor killing, honor killing…

title: cut off
article: 今天我们要学的词是 cut-off. Cut-off 作为形容词，有截止的意思。Brexit Secretary David Davis said the British government may set a cut-off entry date for European Union nationals who want to migrate to the U.K. 英国脱欧大臣戴维斯说，英国政府可能会规定一个欧盟公民移民英国的入境截止日期。South Korea’s Olympic committee lifted its ban on Park Tae-hwan before the cut-off date to submit its finalized lineup of swimmers for the Rios Games. 韩国奥委会在递交参加里约热内卢夏季奥运会游泳参赛选手名单前取消了对朴泰桓的禁赛。好的，我们今天学习的词是 cut-off, cut-off, cut-off…

title: stroke
article: 今天我们要学的词是 stroke. Stroke 名词，中风。Stroke is a leading cause of death and disability. 中风是导致死亡和残疾的主要原因之一。According to a new study, 9 out of 10 strokes could be prevented. 一项最新研究显示，百分之九十的中风都是可以防止的。The study confirms that hypertension is the most important risk factor and stroke cases can be reduced by 48% if hypertension is eliminated. 这项研究还确认，高血压是导致中风的最主要的危险因素，如果没有了高血压的诱因，中风病例可以减少48%。好的，我们今天学习的词是 stroke, stroke, stroke…

title: allegation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 allegation. Allegation 指控。A retired American general dismissed allegations made by a Turkish newspaper that he masterminded the failed Turkish coup. 一位退休的美国将军对土耳其一家报纸说他策划土耳其未遂政变的指控予以驳斥。Fox News Chairman and CEO Roger Ailes resigned from Fox News amid sexual harassment allegations from women he worked with. 福克斯新闻频道主席和首席执行官罗杰·艾尔斯以前的女同事指控他性骚扰，艾尔斯因此辞职。好的，我们今天学习的词是 allegation, allegation, allegation…

title: arrest warrant
article: 今天我们要学的词是 arrest warrant. Arrest warrant 名词，逮捕证，逮捕令。Turkish authorities have issued arrest warrants for 42 journalists after the failed coup. 未遂政变后，土耳其有关当局对42名记者颁发了逮捕令。A judge in Benin issued arrest warrants for a senior FIFA official and the head of the Ivory Coast football federation. 贝宁一个法官对国际足联一位高层官员和科特迪瓦足联主席颁布了逮捕令。好的，我们今天学习的词是 arrest warrant, arrest warrant, arrest warrant…

title: inspect
article: 今天我们要学的词是 inspect. Inspect 动词，检查。China has sent out special teams to inspect steel mills around the country to see how well they are complying with pollution rules. 中国派遣特别小组，检查全国各地钢厂，看他们是否遵守了防污染的相关规定。Officials from the Australian Olympic Committee inspected the Rio Olympic Village and concluded that the location isn’t ready for its athletes. 澳大利亚奥委会官员去里约热内卢奥运村检查后得出结论，认为那里不适合澳大利亚运动员居住。好的，我们今天学习的词是 inspect, inspect, inspect…

title: shell company
article: 今天我们要学的词是 shell company. Shell company 空壳公司。A senior Treasury official warned that terrorist groups and drug traffickers are using anonymous U.S. shell companies to hide and move their money. 美国财政部一位高级官员警告说，恐怖组织和贩毒团伙利用匿名美国空壳公司隐藏和转移赃款。The Panama Papers revealed wide use of shell companies by corrupt African officials. 巴拿马文件显示，非洲腐败官员普遍利用空壳公司做掩护。好的，我们今天学习的词是 shell company, shell company, shell company…

title: heatwave
article: 今天我们要学的词是 heatwave. Heatwave 热浪。More than 20 states in the U.S. continue to deal with the current heatwave that is being blamed for the deaths of six people nationwide. 美国二十多个州持续热浪天气，全国范围内已经有六人死亡。New York Governor Andrew Cuomo has directed state agencies to conserve electricity to help the state avoid brownouts during the ongoing heatwave. 纽约州州长安德鲁·库默要求州政府机构节约用电，以防在热浪期间出现限电的状况。好的，我们今天学习的词是 heatwave, heatwave, heatwave…

title: inflation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 inflation. Inflation 通货膨胀。The inflation rate in Uganda has decreased to 5.1% for the fiscal year ending in July 2016. 乌干达的通货膨胀率在2016年7月结束的财政年度中下降到了5.1%. The IMF is predicting that the inflation rate of Venezuela will reach 480% by the end of this year, and peak at 1,640% in 2017. 国际货币基金组织预计，委内瑞拉今年年底的通货膨胀率将达到百分之480，2017年通货膨胀率最高将升至百分之1640。好的，我们今天学习的词是 inflation, inflation, inflation…

title: last minute
article: 今天我们要学的词是 last-minute. Last-minute 形容词，最后一分钟的。Last-minute preparations are underway in Rio de Janeiro for what will be the first Olympic games ever held in South America. 里约热内卢为首次在南美洲举行的夏季奥运会做最后准备。The IOC has appointed a three-person panel to make a last-minute ruling on which Russian athletes are eligible to compete in the Rio Games. 国际奥委会指派了一个三人小组，对哪些俄罗斯运动员有资格参加里约热内卢夏季奥运会做出最后裁决。好的，我们今天学习的词是 last-minute, last-minute, last-minute…

title: aborigine
article: 今天我们要学的词是 aborigine.Aborigine 名词，有原住民的意思。Taiwan’s President Tsai-Ing-wen offered a formal apology to aborigines for centuries of “pain and mistreatment.” 中国台湾地区“总统”蔡英文为原住民几百年来承受的痛苦和不平等待遇，向他们正式提出道歉。澳大利亚原住民孩子在押期间受虐待事件引起各方关注。Aborigines comprise just 3 percent of Australia’s population but make up 27 percent of those in prison. 原住民只占澳大利亚总人口的3%，却占了监狱在押人员的27%。好的，我们今天学习的词是 aborigine, aborigine, aborigine…

title: commando
article: 今天我们要学的词是 commando. Commando 名词，突击队员。Turkish special forces captured a group of rebel commandos who tried to kill President Recep Tayyip Erdogan during the failed coup. 土耳其特种部队抓捕了在未遂政变中试图刺杀土耳其总统埃尔多安的反政府突击队员。The Indian government dispatched a team of elite commandos to protect Nita Ambani, the wife of India’s richest man. 印度政府派一组精英突击队员，负责保护印度首富的妻子妮塔·安巴尼。好的，我们今天学习的词是 commando, commando, commando…

title: ruling party
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ruling party. Ruling party 执政党。South Africa’s ruling party is facing a robust challenge from opposition groups in Wednesday’s municipal elections. 南非执政党在星期三举行的市级选举中面临来自反对派的有力挑战。The former head of Mexico’s ruling party was implicated in a long list of crimes including money laundering and bribery. 墨西哥前执政党党主席被指涉嫌包括洗钱和行贿受贿的一系列犯罪行为。好的，我们今天学习的词是 ruling party, ruling party, ruling party…

title: abdicate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 abdicate.
