Abdicate 动词，退位。Japanese Emperor Akihito signaled his wish to abdicate in the near future in a prerecorded video message. 日本明仁天皇在事先录制的视频中，表达了在不久的将来退位的意愿。Under the current law, for an Emperor to abdicate, the Imperial House Law would probably have to be revised. 根据现行法律，天皇要想退位，可能就需要对皇室典范进行修改。好的，我们今天学习的词是 abdicate, abdicate, abdicate…

title: trigger
article: 今天我们要学的词是 trigger. Trigger 动词，引发。Six people died in eastern Mexico last Saturday after they were buried in landslides triggered by heavy rainfall. 上周六墨西哥东部暴雨引发滑坡，造成六人死亡。U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump warned that restoring Ukrainian control over Crimea could trigger World War III. 美国总统候选人川普警告说，恢复乌克兰对克里米亚的控制，可能会引发第三次世界大战。好的，我们今天学习的词是 trigger, trigger, trigger…

title: junta
article: 今天我们要学的词是 junta. Junta 名词，军政府。Thai voters overwhelmingly approved the military junta-backed constitution last Sunday. 泰国选民上周日以压倒多数的票数，批准了军政府支持的新宪法。Critics warned that the new constitution will weaken democracy and entrench the powers of the ruling military junta. 批评人士警告说，这一新宪法将削弱民主，让现任军政府的权力变得更加根深蒂固。好的，我们今天学习的词是 junta, junta, junta…

title: declassify
article: 今天我们要学的词是 declassify. Declassify 动词，解密。The U.S. government declassified some documents related to Argentina’s 1976-1983 “Dirty War.” 美国政府解密了一些跟1976年到1983年间阿根廷肮脏战争有关的文件。The Obama administration declassified the procedures for how it decides to kill or capture terrorists around the globe. 美国政府解密了在全球各地打击或抓捕恐怖分子的决策程序。好的，我们今天学习的词是 declassify, declassify, declassify…

title: Paralympic Games
article: 今天我们要学的词是 Paralympic Games. Paralympic Games残奥会。Russia was banned from the Rio Paralympic Games for allegedly violating international doping rules. 俄罗斯被指违反国际兴奋剂规定，里约残奥会禁赛。Russia finished second in the medal standings at the 2012 London Paralympic Games, and had planned to send 267 athletes to Rio. 俄罗斯2012年伦敦残奥会奖牌总数第二，今年原计划派267名运动员参加里约残奥会。好的，我们今天学习的词是 Paralympic Games, Paralympic Games, Paralympic Games…

title: conditional
article: 今天我们要学的词是 conditional. Conditional 形容词，有条件的。Turkey is open to conditional modification anti-terror laws if the changes don’t interfere with its fight against terrorism. 土耳其愿意考虑修改反恐法，条件是任何改动都不得影响到土耳其打击恐怖主义的努力。John Hinckley Jr., who shot President Ronald Reagan in 1981, was granted conditional release from the mental hospital where he has lived for decades. 1981年开枪射杀美国前总统里根的约翰·欣克利在精神病院度过几十年后，被有条件释放。好的，我们今天学习的词是 conditional, conditional, conditional…

title: instigate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 instigate. Instigate 动词，有煽动，怂恿的意思。Turkey blamed an American scholar for instigating the failed military coup last month. 土耳其指责一位美国学者煽动了上个月在土耳其发生的未遂军事政变。 U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump said the Black Lives Matter movement has in some cases helped instigate recent police killings. 美国总统候选人川普认为，珍视黑人生命运动在一些情况下对最近杀害警察的事件起到了煽动的作用。好的，我们今天学习的词是 instigate, instigate, instigate…

title: hangar
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hangar. Hangar 名词，有飞机库，飞机棚的意思。New satellite images show what appear to be aircraft hangars on three artificial islands created by China. 新的卫星图片显示，在中国的三个人造岛上，貌似可以看到飞机库。The last remnants of the 9/11 terrorist attacks on the World Trade Center have been removed from Hangar 17 at the Kennedy International Airport. 世贸中心遭遇恐怖袭击的最后一批残留物品从肯尼迪国际机场17号飞机库被运走。好的，我们今天学习的词是 hangar, hangar, hangar…

title: closed door
article: 今天我们要学的词是 closed-door. Closed-door 形容词，闭门的。The United Nations Security Council held a closed-door meeting to discuss the rising tensions between Russia and Ukraine. 联合国安理会举行闭门会议，讨论俄罗斯和乌克兰紧张关系的加剧。Pope Francis told a group of Polish bishops during a closed-door meeting that teaching children that they can pick their gender is terrible. 教皇方济各在一次闭门会议中告诉与会的波兰主教说，教育孩子可以自行选择性别是可怕的。好的，我们今天学习的词是 closed-door, closed-door, closed-door…

title: genetically modified
article: 今天我们要学的词是 genetically modified. Genetically modified 形容词，转基因的。China will push for genetically modified soybeans over the next five years. 中国在今后五年内将推动转基因大豆的发展。The FDA has approved the release of genetically modified mosquitoes to fight Zika in Florida. 美国食品和药物管理局批准在佛罗里达释放转基因蚊子，打击寨卡病毒的传播。好的，我们今天学习的词是 genetically modified, genetically modified, genetically modified…

title: injunction
article: 今天我们要学的词是 injunction. Injunction 名词，有法院禁令的意思。A U.S. judge issued a nationwide injunction to block the Obama administration’s guidelines that allow public school transgender students to use bathrooms of their choice. 一位美国法官颁布全国禁令，阻止奥巴马政府有关公立学校跨性别学生可以随意选择厕所的指导意见。U.S. Department of Justice lawyers sought to dismiss the injunction, arguing that the guidelines are non-binding. 美国司法部律师试图推翻这项禁令，他们提出，政府的指导意见本来就是不具备法律效力的。好的，我们今天学习的词是 injunction, injunction, injunction…

title: cleanse
article: 今天我们要学的词是 cleanse. Cleanse 动词，有清洗，净化的意思。Turkey vowed to completely cleanse Islamic State militants from its border region after a suicide bomber killed 54 people at a Kurdish wedding. 一名自杀炸弹杀手在一个库尔德人婚礼上杀死54人后，土耳其誓言要把边境地区的伊斯兰国激进分子彻底铲除干净。An Indian company has sent 6,000 tea bags to U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump to cleanse his soul. 一家印度公司送给美国总统候选人川普6000个茶袋，要帮助他净化灵魂。好的，我们今天学习的词是 cleanse, cleanse, cleanse…

title: stockpile
article: 今天我们要学的词是 stockpile. Stockpile 动词，有储存的意思。Germany is considering to ask its citizens to stockpile food, water and other supplies in case of disasters or an armed attack. 德国正在考虑要求民众储备食物，饮水和其它供给物资，以备自然灾害或是武装进攻的发生。Leading U.S. electricity companies are joining forces to create a new company to stockpile critical pieces of electrical equipment in the event of a catastrophe or terrorist attacks. 美国电力大公司合作建立一家新公司，储备关键性电子设备，以备灾难或恐怖袭击的发生。好的，我们今天学习的词是 stockpile, stockpile, stockpile…

title: hardline
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hardline. Hardline 形容词，强硬的。A senior aide to U.S. Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump suggested a possible shift in his hardline immigration stance. 美国共和党总统候选人川普的一位高级助手表示，川普在移民问题上的强硬立场可能会出现调整。Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe appointed a hardline conservative lawyer as Japan’s new defense minister. 日本首相安倍晋三任命一名强硬保守派律师出任日本的新防卫大臣。好的，我们今天学习的词是 hardline, hardline, hardline…

title: condone
article: 今天我们要学的词是 condone. Condone 动词，有宽恕，无视的意思。Speedo is the first sponsor to cut ties with Ryan Lochte, saying it cannot condone his behavior. 速比涛是第一家跟瑞安·罗切特断绝关系的赞助商，速比涛表示，不能宽恕罗切特的所作所为。The Philippine Department of Foreign Affairs assured the U.S. that the Philippine government doesn’t condone extrajudicial killings. 菲律宾外交部向美国保证，菲律宾政府不会无视法外杀戮。好的，我们今天学习的词是 condone, condone, condone…

title: pivotal
article: 今天我们要学的词是pivotal。 Pivotal, 意思是关键的，重要的。 “The quarterback was pivotal in the team’s postseason success,” 这个四分位对球队季后赛的成功起到了举足轻重的作用。 “This game is a pivotal test for the new team,” 这场比赛是对这支年轻队伍的一次关键性考验。 “The producer played a pivotal role in improving the rating of the program,” 节目制片人在提高节目收视率方面发挥了重要作用。 “As usual, the episode ended at the most pivotal moment,” 这集又是在剧情最关键的时候结束了。 “Health care reform is a pivotal issue for the coming election,” 健保改革是即将举行的选举所涉及的一个核心议题。好的，今天我们学习的词是pivotal…

title: penetrate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 penetrate. Penetrate 动词，渗透。The FBI has found evidence that foreign hackers penetrated two state election databases in recent weeks. 美国联邦调查局发现证据显示，最近几周外国黑客渗透了美国两个州的选举数据库。Xiaomi, the Chinese handset manufacturer, saw a lot of success after it penetrated the Indian market and is eyeing the smartphone market of the United States next. 中国手机生产厂商小米进入印度市场取得了巨大成功，下一步正考虑进军美国智能手机市场。好的，我们今天学习的词是 penetrate, penetrate, penetrate…

title: overstay
article: 今天我们要学的词是 overstay. Overstay 动词，有逾期不归的意思。The U.S. Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump vowed, if elected, to crack down on illegal immigrants who overstay their visa. 美国共和党总统候选人川普誓言，如果当选，要严厉打击那些签证到期逾期不归的非法移民。The Saudi Embassy in Italy warned their nationals against overstaying their tourist visas. 沙特阿拉伯驻意大利大使馆警告沙特公民，持旅游签证不要逾期不归。好的，我们今天学习的词是 overstay, overstay, overstay…

title: underestimate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 underestimate. Underestimate 动词，低估。Germany’s vice Chancellor said Chancellor Angela Merkel had underestimated the challenges of integrating migrants. 德国副总理说，德国总理默克尔低估了帮助移民融入德国社会的难度。New research shows that nearly half of American parents underestimate the harm of school absences on their children’s education. 最新研究显示，将近一半的家长都低估了孩子缺勤对他们教育的负面影响。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 underestimate, underestimate, underestimate…

title: infrastructure
article: 今天我们要学的词是 infrastructure. Infrastructure 名词，基础设施。Japan promised to spend $30 billion by 2018 on infrastructure development, education and healthcare in Africa. 日本保证在2018年以前投入300亿美元，帮助非洲发展基础设施，教育和医疗保健。统计数字显示，Spending on infrastructure has nosedived since the UK voted to leave the EU. 自从英国公投决定脱离欧盟以来，基础设施建设上的开支大幅下降。好的，我们今天学习的词是 infrastructure, infrastructure, infrastructure…

title: on the sidelines
article: 今天我们要学的词是 on the sidelines. On the sidelines 在外围。Syria was a major topic for discussion on the sidelines of the G-20 summit. 叙利亚是G20峰会外围会谈的主要话题。U.S. President Barack Obama and Russian President Vladimir Putin met on the sidelines of the G-20 summit, but failed to reach a deal to end the violence in Syria. 美国总统奥巴马和俄罗斯总统普京在G20峰会外围举行会谈，未能就结束叙利亚暴力冲突达成协议。好的，我们今天学习的词是 on the sidelines, on the sidelines, on the sidelines…

title: saint
article: 今天我们要学的词是 saint. Saint 名词，圣人。Pope Francis officially declared Mother Teresa a saint, 19 years after her death. 教皇方济各正式宣布，19年前过世的特蕾莎修女为圣人。Pope Francis praised her as a merciful saint who defended the lives of the unborn, the sick and the abandoned. 教皇方济各赞扬她是充满怜悯心的圣人，维护了未出生的胎儿，病患和被遗弃者的生命。好的，我们今天学习的词是 saint, saint, saint…

title: savanna
article: 今天我们要学的词是 savanna. Savanna 名词，稀树草原。A comprehensive census shows that the savanna elephant population in 18 African countries decreased by nearly a third between 2007 and 2014. 一项综合全面的研究显示，18个非洲国家稀树草原非洲象的数量在2007到2014年间减少了将近三分之一。The reduction of the number of savanna elephants was largely due to illegal poaching for ivory. 非洲象数量的减少在很大程度上是由为获取象牙非法捕猎造成的。好的，我们今天学习的词是 savanna, savanna, savanna…

title: downgrade
article: 今天我们要学的词是 downgrade. Downgrade 动词，有降级的意思。The World Wildlife Fund has downgraded the giant panda from endangered to vulnerable. 世界野生动物基金会将大熊猫从濒危物种降级为易危物种。The International Monetary Fund Managing Director said the IMF will likely downgrade its 2016 global growth forecast. 国际货币基金组织总裁说，国际货币基金组织可能会下调2016年全球经济增长预期。好的，我们今天学习的词是 downgrade, downgrade, downgrade…

title: antibacterial
article: 今天我们要学的词是 antibacterial. Antibacterial 形容词，抗菌的。The Food and Drug Administration banned 19 ingredients commonly used to make antibacterial soaps. 美国食品和药物管理局宣布，禁止使用生产抗菌肥皂常用的19种成分。The director of the FDA’s Center for Drug Evaluation said some data suggests that antibacterial ingredients may do more harm than good over the long-term. 美国食品和药物管理局药品评估中心主任说，有数据显示，抗菌成分长期使用可能弊大于益。好的，我们今天学习的词是 antibacterial, antibacterial, antibacterial…

title: pneumonia
article: 今天我们要学的词是 pneumonia. Pneumonia 名词，肺炎。U.S. Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton was diagnosed with pneumonia last Friday. 美国民主党总统候选人希拉里·克林顿上星期五被诊断出肺炎。Statistics show that hospitals in the U.S. admit more than 1.1 million people for pneumonia every year, making it one of the top reasons for hospitalization. 数据显示，美国每年有110多万人因为肺炎住进医院，是患者住院的主要原因之一。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 pneumonia, pneumonia, pneumonia…

title: concussion
article: 今天我们要学的词是 concussion. Concussion 名词，脑震荡。最新研究显示，The annual rate of concussions that send youth soccer players to the emergency room increased by nearly 1,600 percent from 1990 to 2014. 每年因为踢足球脑震荡去看急诊的孩子数量在1990到2014年间增长了16倍。U.S. Senator Richard Blumenthal called for the NHL to fund research into concussions and brain trauma. 美国联邦参议员理查德·布鲁门萨尔呼吁美国国家冰球联盟出资进行脑震荡和脑损伤的研究。好的，我们今天学习的词是 concussion, concussion, concussion…

title: blanket ban
article: 今天我们要学的词是 blanket ban. Blanket ban 一律禁止。France has become the first country to issue a blanket ban on plastic dishware. 法国成为第一个全面禁止使用塑料餐具的国家。Russia kicked off its own Paralympics after the International Paralympic Committee issued a blanket ban on the entire Russian Paralympic team.俄罗斯残奥会开幕，此前，国际残奥委员会宣布俄罗斯残疾运动员全体禁赛。好的，我们今天学习的词是 blanket ban, blanket ban, blanket ban…

title: state run
article: 今天我们要学的词是 state-run. State-run 形容词，国有的，国营的。Turkey’s state-run news agency reported a car bomb that wounded 50 people near the ruling party’s headquarters. 土耳其国营通讯社报道，执政党总部附近发生汽车爆炸，造成五十人受伤。China’s top four state-run banks have reportedly cut a total number of 22,260 jobs. 中国四大国有银行据报道共裁减了两万两千两百六十个职位。好的，我们今天学习的词是 state-run, state-run, state-run…

title: jail time
article: 今天我们要学的词是 jail time. Jail time 坐牢。A Volkswagen engineer pleaded guilty to conspiring to cheat on U.S. emissions tests and could face jail time. 大众汽车公司的一名工程师承认合谋在美国尾气排放测试中作弊，可能会被判刑入狱。A top editor at the New York Times said he would publish a story on Donald Trump’s tax returns even if it risks jail time. 纽约时报一名重要主编说，就算面临坐牢的危险，他也会发表关于川普纳税申报记录的报道。好的，我们今天学习的词是 jail time, jail time, jail time…

title: accidental
article: 今天我们要学的词是 accidental. Accidental 形容词，意外的。A U.S.-led accidental airstrike that killed 90 Syrian soldiers has put the Syrian ceasefire at risk. 美国领导的空袭意外击中叙利亚政府军，打死90人，这一事件使叙利亚停火的继续面临威胁。美国疾病控制和预防中心的数字显示，In 2014 the state of Tennessee ranked number one among all states in the category of accidental shooting deaths. 2014年田纳西州意外枪击死亡人数排在全国各州的第一位。好的，我们今天学习的词是 accidental, accidental, accidental…

title: alienate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 alienate. Alienate 动词，有使疏远的意思。German Chancellor Angela Merkel admitted her decision to allow more than a million refugees into the country last year had alienated many voters. 德国总理默克尔承认，她去年接受一百多万难民进入德国的决定使其失去了很多选民的支持。Donald Trump unveiled a number of proposals to help working parents, attempting to court female voters who had been alienated by his provocative remarks in the past. 川普推出一系列帮助在职父母的提案，希望重新赢得此前被其挑衅性言辞所疏远的女性选民的支持。好的，我们今天学习的词是 alienate, alienate, alienate…

title: swing state
article: 今天我们要学的词是 swing state. Swing state 名词，摇摆州。The latest poll shows that Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump are basically tied across 13 swing states. 最新民调显示，希拉里·克林顿和唐纳德·川普在13个摇摆州的支持率基本持平。New census figures show that more than half of the 13 key swing states have seen below average income growth since 2008. 新的人口普查数字显示，13个重要摇摆州有半数以上2008年以来的收入增长速度都低于全国平均水平。好的，我们今天学习的词是 swing state, swing state, swing state…

title: mercy killing
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mercy killing. Mercy killing 名词，安乐死。A terminally ill 17-year-old has become the first minor to be euthanized in Belgium since the age restrictions on such mercy killings were lifted in 2014. 比利时一个17岁绝症男孩安乐死，他是比利时2014年取消对安乐死年龄限制以来第一个安乐死的未成年人。The United Arab Emirates passed a new law banning all mercy killings. 阿联酋通过新法律，禁止安乐死。好的，我们今天学习的词是 mercy killing, mercy killing, mercy killing…

title: estimate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 estimate. Estimate 动词，估计。A recent study estimates that the Indonesian forest fires that created a smoky haze last year may have caused more than 100,000 premature deaths. 一项最新研究估计，去年印尼山火引发的雾霾可能造成了10万人过早死亡。A new survey estimates that Americans own 265 million guns, but half of these guns are in the hands of only 3% of Americans. 最新调查估计，美国人拥有枪支总数2.65亿支，但其中半数都集中在3%的人手中。好的，我们今天学习的词是 estimate, estimate, estimate…

title: curfew
article: 今天我们要学的词是 curfew. Curfew 名词，宵禁。The city of Charlotte in North Carolina has lifted its midnight curfew, but the state of emergency remains in effect. 北卡罗来纳州夏洛特市取消了午夜宵禁，但是紧急状态依旧生效。Authorities in an Austrian city imposed a curfew on young immigrants following a series of sexual attacks at a local beer and wine festival. 奥地利一个城市的有关当局对未成年移民实施宵禁，此前当地一个啤酒葡萄酒节期间发生了一系列性侵事件。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 curfew, curfew, curfew…

title: guerrilla
article: 今天我们要学的词是 guerrilla. Guerrilla 形容词，游击队的。The Columbian government signed a peace agreement on Monday with the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Columbia (FARC), a national guerrilla movement. 哥伦比亚政府星期一跟全国游击队运动“哥伦比亚革命武装力量”签署了和平协议。The agreement needs to be approved by an Oct. 2 referendum before roughly 7,000 guerrilla fighters start their transition to civilian life. 这项协议还需经过10月2号全民公决批准，大约七千名游击队员才会开始向平民生活过渡。好的，我们今天学习的词是 guerrilla, guerrilla, guerrilla…

title: voluntarily
article: 今天我们要学的词是 voluntarily. Voluntarily 副词，自愿地。The International Organization for Migrants says that more people are voluntarily returning to their home countries. 国际移民组织说，越来越多的人开始自愿返回自己的祖国。A high-tech diagnostic company voluntarily withdrew its Zika virus blood test from FDA approval. 一家高科技诊断公司自愿撤回递交美国食品药物管理局的寨卡病毒血液检测批准申请。好的，我们今天学习的词是 voluntarily, voluntarily, voluntarily…

title: deportation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 deportation. Deportation 名词，驱逐出境，递解出境。The Obama administration said it would fully resume deportations of undocumented Haitian immigrants. 奥巴马政府表示，将全面恢复对无证海地移民的遣返工作。China and Canada have reached a new border agreement that would speed up the deportation of Chinese nationals inadmissible in Canada. 中国和加拿大达成新的边境协议，加快遣返那些本不该被允许进入加拿大的中国公民。好的，我们今天学习的词是 deportation, deportation, deportation…

title: endorse
article: 今天我们要学的词是 endorse. Endorse 作为动词，有支持的意思。Senator Ted Cruz endorsed Donald Trump, but later said the decision was “agonizing.” 美国联邦参议员克鲁兹支持川普，但是后来又表示，他做出这一决定十分痛苦。The New York Times endorsed Hillary Clinton for president in a Saturday editorial, and dismissed Donald Trump as “the worst nominee put forward by a major party in modern American history.” 纽约时报在星期六的社论中支持希拉里·克林顿当总统，并批评说，川普是“美国现代史上主要政党推举出的最差劲的候选人”。好的，我们今天学习的词是 endorse, endorse, endorse…

title: reject
article: 今天我们要学的词是 reject. Reject动词，意思是拒绝，驳回。Voters in Columbia rejected a landmark peace deal signed by Columbia’s president and the leaders of the FARC rebels. 哥伦比亚选民拒绝接受哥伦比亚总统和哥伦比亚革命武装力量领袖签署的历史性和平协议。Almost all Hungarian voters who took part in Sunday’s referendum rejected the EU’s migrant quotas but turnout was too low to make the result valid. 几乎所有参加星期天全民公决的匈牙利选民都对欧盟移民配额投了反对票，但是因为投票选民人数太少，投票结果无效。好的，我们今天学习的词是 reject, reject, reject…

title: stampede
article: 今天我们要学的词是 stampede. Stampede 名词，踩踏事件。At least 52 people died in a stampede in central Ethiopia during a holy festival. 埃塞俄比亚中部一次宗教节日发生拥挤踩踏事件，至少52人丧生。Authorities said the stampede was triggered by police firing tear gas and rubber bullets, and shooting warning shots into the air to disperse anti-government protesters. 有关当局表示，这次踩踏事件是因为警察为驱散反政府抗议者向人群释放橡皮子弹和催泪瓦斯，并向空中鸣枪示警而引发的。好的，我们今天学习的词是 stampede, stampede, stampede…

title: finances
article: 今天我们要学的词是 finances. Finances作为名词，有财政的意思。Puerto Rico turned over its finances to a seven-people board appointed by the U.S. federal government. 波多黎各把自己的财政管理大权移交给了一个由美国联邦政府任命的七人董事会。Some of Donald Trump’s tax records that became public last week raised questions about the candidate’s finances. 上周曝光的川普的一些报税记录，让外界对川普的财政状况产生了疑问。好的，我们今天学习的词是finances, finances, finances…

title: terminate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 terminate. Terminate 动词，终止。Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte warned that he might terminate a defense pact his country signed with the U.S. in 2014. 菲律宾总统杜特尔特警告说，他可能会终止菲律宾2014年跟美国签署的一份防御协定的执行。Rome’s city council voted to terminate its bid for the 2024 summer Olympics. 罗马市政会投票决定，终止罗马申办2024年夏季奥运会的努力。好的，我们今天学习的词是 terminate, terminate, terminate…

title: timetable
article: 今天我们要学的词是 timetable. Timetable 时间表。British Prime Minister Teresa May finally set out a timetable for the United Kingdom to exit from the European Union. 英国首相特里莎·梅终于提出了英国脱离欧盟的时间表。Federal Reserve Chairwoman Janet Yellen said recently that there is “no fixed timetable” for raising U.S. interest rates. 美联储主席耶伦最近表示，美国利率的提升没有固定时间表。好的，我们今天学习的词是 timetable, timetable, timetable…

title: rescind
article: 今天我们要学的词是 rescind. Rescind 作为动词，有撤回的意思。A number of senior Republican figures have rescinded their endorsement for Donald Trump after a leaked video showing him making lewd remarks about women. 川普对女性发表侮辱性言辞的视频曝光后，一些共和党重要人物撤回了对川普的支持。House Speaker Paul Ryan and Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell haven’t explicitly rescinded their support. 美国国会众议院议长瑞安和参议院多数党领袖麦康奈尔尚未明确撤回对川普的支持。好的，我们今天学习的词是 rescind, rescind, rescind…

title: xenophobia
article: 今天我们要学的词是 xenophobia. Xenophobia 名词，意思是仇外，排外。A European human rights watchdog claimed that the Brexit vote has led to a rise in xenophobia in the United Kingdom. 欧洲的一个人权观察机构称，英国脱欧的投票导致了英国国内仇外情绪的上涨。The United Nations is warning against rising xenophobia that puts the lives of tens of thousands of refugees at risk. 联合国警告说，排外情绪的上涨让数以万计的难民的生命面临威胁。好的，我们今天学习的词是 xenophobia, xenophobia, xenophobia…

title: press freedom
article: 今天我们要学的词是 press freedom. Press freedom 新闻自由。The OSCE said the closure of Hungary’s main opposition newspaper was a huge blow to the country’s press freedom. 欧洲安全与合作组织说，匈牙利主要反对派报纸的关闭是对匈牙利新闻自由的沉重打击。German Chancellor Angela Merkel criticized Turkey over press freedom, noting that press freedom was outside the boundaries of state control. 德国总理默克尔对土耳其的新闻自由状况提出批评，强调新闻自由不在国家控制范围之内。好的，我们今天学习的词是 press freedom, press freedom, press freedom…

title: partnership
article: 今天我们要学的词是 partnership. Partnership 名词，合作伙伴关系。Steven Spielberg’s Amblin Partners and Alibaba’s media arm announced a partnership to co-produce films for global audiences. 斯皮尔伯格的安柏林合伙人公司和阿里巴巴公司的媒体分支宣布建立合作伙伴关系，共同制作全球发行的影片。Japan’s Honda Motor Co Ltd and Yamaha Motor Co Ltd announced their partnership to develop scooters for the domestic market. 日本本田发动机有限公司和雅马哈发动机株式会社宣布建立合作伙伴关系，共同开发针对国内市场的摩托车。好的，我们今天学习的词是 partnership, partnership, partnership…

title: war crimes
article: 今天我们要学的词是 war crimes. War crimes 战争罪。U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry called for Russia and Syria to face a war crimes investigation for their attacks on Syrian civilians. 美国国务卿克里要求俄罗斯和叙利亚为他们对叙利亚平民的袭击而接受战争罪调查。A top U.N. Human Rights official renewed his call for an international probe into possible war crimes committed in Yemen. 联合国一位高层人权官员再次呼吁，对也门境内可能发生的战争罪行展开国际调查。好的，我们今天学习的词是 war crimes, war crimes, war crimes…

title: ceasefire
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ceasefire. Ceasefire 名词，停火。The United States and Britain called for an immediate and unconditional ceasefire in Yemen. 美国和英国呼吁马上在也门实现无条件停火。Colombian President Juan Manuel Santos has extended a ceasefire with FARC rebels until the end of the year in a bid to save the peace deal. 哥伦比亚总统桑托斯将与哥伦比亚革命武装力量的停火延长到今年年底，努力挽救和平协议。好的，我们今天学习的词是 ceasefire, ceasefire, ceasefire…

title: stronghold
article: 今天我们要学的词是 stronghold. Stronghold 名词，要塞。Iraqi Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi has announced the start of a military push to drive Islamic State extremists from their northern stronghold city of Mosul. 伊拉克总统阿巴迪宣布展开军事行动，将伊斯兰国极端分子从他们的北部要塞城市摩苏尔赶出去。Turkish-backed rebels in Syria has reportedly captured the IS stronghold of Dabiq. 得到土耳其支持的叙利亚反政府武装据报占领了伊斯兰国组织的要塞达比克。好的，我们今天学习的词是 stronghold, stronghold, stronghold…

title: meddle
article: 今天我们要学的词是 meddle. Meddle 作为动词，是干预，插手，管闲事的意思。GOP vice presidential nominee Mike Pence admitted that it appears increasingly likely that Russia has been trying to meddle in U.S. elections. 共和党副总统提名人选彭斯表示，现在看起来，俄罗斯确实很可能是在设法干预美国选举。Turkey urged Iran not to meddle in the internal affairs of the Persian Gulf countries. 土耳其敦促伊朗不要插手波斯湾国家的内政。好的，我们今天学习的词是 meddle, meddle, meddle…

title: backing
article: 今天我们要学的词是 backing. Backing 作为名词，有支持的意思。Thailand’s military government reaffirmed its backing of “a political roadmap” for national elections in late 2017 as the country mourns the passing of King Bhumipol Adulayadej. 泰国民众哀悼国王普密蓬之际，泰国军政府重申了对2017年下半年举行选举的政治路线图的支持。摩苏尔战役已经打响。Iraqi security forces are leading the ground campaign with the backing of coalition airstrikes. 在联军空中打击的支持下，伊拉克安全部队主导地面行动。好的，我们今天学习的词是 backing, backing, backing…

title: transcript
article: 今天我们要学的词是 transcript. Transcript 作为名词，有文字记录的意思。WikiLeaks released what appear to be the transcripts of Hillary Clinton’s three paid speeches at Goldman Sachs. 维基解密公布了看来是希拉里·克林顿在高盛发表的三次有偿讲话的文字记录。The Clinton campaign neither confirmed nor denied the authenticity of any of the transcripts. 克林顿竞选团队既没有证实，也没有否认这些文字记录的真实性。好的，我们今天学习的词是 transcript, transcript, transcript…

title: rigged
article: 今天我们要学的词是 rigged. Rigged 作为形容词，有作弊的，造假的意思。During the last presidential debate, Donald Trump once again claimed that the election is rigged against him. 在最后一次总统候选人辩论中，唐纳德·川普再次声称，这次选举存在对他不利的舞弊行为。Hillary Clinton talked about how Trump habitually claims that things are rigged when he’s not the winner, including the Emmys. 希拉里·克林顿提到，川普习惯性地认为，只要自己不是赢家，就势必存在舞弊，其中也包括艾美奖的评选。好的，我们今天学习的词是 rigged, rigged, rigged…

title: vote registration
article: 今天我们要学的词是 voter registration. Voter registration 选民登记。A federal judge has ordered Virginia to extend its voter registration deadline to Friday at midnight. 一位联邦法官下令维吉尼亚州将选民登记最后期限延长到星期五午夜。Earlier in the week, the Virginia voter registration website crashed due to record demand. 本周早些时候，维吉尼亚州选民登记网站因为创纪录的造访人数而陷入瘫痪。好的，我们今天学习的词是 voter registration, voter registration, voter registration…

title: finalize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 finalize. To finalize 是最终敲定的意思。The European Union’s attempt to finalize a massive free trade deal with Canada has hit another roadblock. 欧盟设法最终敲定与加拿大的综合性自由贸易协定，但是欧盟的努力再次遇到了障碍。Federal health officials finalized a new rule on how Medicare pays the U.S. doctors. 联邦保健部门官员最终确定了一项有关联邦医疗保险要如果向医生支付酬劳的规定。好的，我们今天学习的词是 finalize, finalize, finalize…

title: counterfeit
article: 今天我们要学的词是 counterfeit. Counterfeit 形容词，伪造的，冒牌的。Apple said 90 percent of apple branded products it bought on Amazon were actually counterfeit. 苹果公司说，他们在亚马逊网站上购买的90%所谓苹果正版产品其实都是冒牌货。Amazon identified Mobile Star as the source of the counterfeit goods and has handed over other products produced by Mobile Star to Apple. 亚马逊指出，这些假货的来源都是一家叫 Mobile Star 的公司，并已将该公司的其他产品交给了苹果公司 。好的，我们今天学习的词是 counterfeit, counterfeit, counterfeit…

title: counter
article: 今天我们要学的词是 counter. Counter 作为动词，有对抗的意思。The United States and South Korea agreed to step up military and diplomatic efforts to counter the nuclear threat from North Korea. 美国和韩国同意加强军事和外交努力，对抗来自朝鲜的核威胁。The Czech interior ministry has set up a 20-member team to counter what it sees as a propaganda campaign from Russia that tries to influence public opinion in the country. 捷克内政部成立一个20人小组，对抗他们认为来自俄罗斯，试图影响捷克民意的宣传攻势。好的，我们今天学习的词是 counter, counter, counter…

title: disclose
article: 今天我们要学的词是 disclose. Disclose 作为动词，有公布，公开的意思。Ukrainian officials and law makers have disclosed their income and assets for the first time. 乌克兰的政府官员和立法人员首次公布了他们的收入和财产状况。The FDA said 12 U.S. hospitals failed to promptly disclose patient deaths or injuries related to medical devices. 美国食品和药物管理局说，美国有12家医院没能及时公布跟医疗设备相关的患者死亡和受伤的病案。好的，我们今天学习的词是 disclose, disclose, disclose…

title: search warrant
article: 今天我们要学的词是 search warrant. Search warrant 搜查证。Federal investigators have obtained a search warrant to examine newly discovered emails related to Hillary Clinton’s email probe. 联邦调查人员拿到搜查证，检查新获取的电子邮件，这些邮件跟希拉里·克林顿的电邮调查相关。Investigators in California were granted a search warrant that would allow them to force people at the premises to unlock their phone via fingerprint recognition. 加州调查人员获得搜查证，可以强制搜查现场的人通过指纹识别打开手机。好的，我们今天学习的词是 search warrant, search warrant, search warrant…

title: displaced
article: 今天我们要学的词是 displaced. Displaced 形容词，有无家可归的意思。The Italian prime minister promised to find temporary housing for those displaced by a series of earthquakes in central Italy. 意大利总理保证为意大利中部连续地震后无家可归的人提供临时住所。The United Nations refugee agency is making plans to shelter up to 150,000 displaced people fleeing the fight in Mosul. 联合国难民事务署严阵以待，准备安置最多可能达到15万逃离摩苏尔战役的无家可归者。好的，我们今天学习的词是 displaced, displaced, displaced…

title: derogatory
article: 今天我们要学的词是 derogatory. Derogatory 形容词，有贬义的，诋毁的意思。Germany’s EU representative is facing criticism for using a derogatory term when referring to visiting Chinese businessmen. 德国的欧盟代表因为在谈及来访中国商人时使用带有侮辱性的词汇而受到批评。Harvard University condemned a document in which a member of the men’s soccer team used derogatory comments to describe recruits of the women’s team. 哈佛大学男子足球校队一名队员用侮辱性言辞形容女队新球员，校方对此提出谴责。好的，我们今天学习的词是 derogatory, derogatory, derogatory…

title: toxic
article: 今天我们要学的词是 toxic. Toxic 形容词，是有毒的意思。According to a new report by UNICEF, some 300 million children worldwide are living in areas with toxic levels of air pollution. 联合国儿童基金会的最新报告显示，全球大约三亿儿童生活在有毒的空气污染环境下。New Delhi was shrouded in a toxic fog the morning after the Hindu festival of Diwali when people celebrated by setting off fireworks. 人们放烟花庆祝印度教排灯节，致使次日清晨的新德里被有毒的雾霾所笼罩。好的，我们今天学习的词是 toxic, toxic, toxic…

title: misconduct
article: 今天我们要学的词是 misconduct. Misconduct 名词，不当行为，不法行为。FBI Director James Comey was accused of misconduct over the way he handled Hillary Clinton’s email probe. 在处理希拉里·克林顿电邮调查问题上，美国联邦调查局局长科米被指责行为不端。Bill Cosby appeared at a key pretrial hearing involving his sexual misconduct case. 比尔·考斯比参加了一次有关他性侵案件的重要的审前听证会。好的，我们今天学习的词是 misconduct, misconduct, misconduct…

title: call off
article: 今天我们要学的词是 call off. To call off 有取消，叫停的意思。Pakistan opposition leader Imran Khan called off a massive protest to shut down the capital. 巴基斯坦反对党领袖伊姆兰·汗叫停了一次原定要让首都陷入瘫痪的大规模抗议活动。The search in Myanmar for a missing plane was called off after authorities confirmed there was no airplane crash off its west coast. 有关当局证实，缅甸西海岸没有飞机坠毁，一架失踪飞机的搜寻行动因此被取消。好的，我们今天学习的词是 call off, call off, call off…

title: disputed
article: 今天我们要学的词是 disputed. Disputed 形容词，有争议的。The speaker of the Russian parliament’s upper chamber says Moscow isn’t giving up any of the disputed islands to Japan. 俄罗斯议会上院议长表示，俄罗斯不会放弃任何跟日本存在争议的岛屿的主权。China said the situation at the disputed Scarborough Shoal in the South China Sea has not changed and will not change. 中国表示，南中国海有争议的斯卡伯勒浅滩的局面没有变化，也不会发生变化。好的，我们今天学习的词是 disputed, disputed, disputed…

title: stealth fighter
article: 今天我们要学的词是 stealth fighter. Stealth fighter 名词，隐形战斗机。China’s J-20 stealth fighter made its first public appearance at an air show in Zhuhai. 中国的J-20隐形战斗机在珠海航展上首次公开亮相。The Pentagon is sending a total of 16 stealth fighter jets next year to a Marine Corps base in Japan. 美国五角大楼明年将向日本一个美国海军陆战队基地派遣16架隐形战斗机。好的，我们今天学习的词是 stealth fighter, stealth fighter, stealth fighter…

title: correlation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 correlation. Correlation 名词，相关性。A new study finds a strong correlation between anger and heart attacks in first-time heart-attack patients. 一项新研究发现，愤怒的情绪跟第一次发心脏病之间有很强的关联性。A Brown University study finds a new correlation between the time kids spend on digital devices and the likelihood they finish their homework. 布朗大学的一项研究发现，孩子花在数码产品上的时间长短跟他们按时完成作业的可能性之间存在关联性。好的，我们今天学习的词是 correlation, correlation, correlation…

title: prioritize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 prioritize. Prioritize 动词，优先考虑，优先处理。President-elect Donald Trump said he would prioritize the deportation of two to three million illegal immigrants who are dangerous or have criminal records. 美国当选总统川普表示，他的当务之急是把两到三百万危险的，或是有犯罪记录的非法移民遣送出境。A recent poll finds that more Britons want their government to prioritize favorable trade deals with the EU rather than reducing immigration. 最近的一项民调显示，更多的英国人希望政府把工作重点放在跟欧盟达成更有利于英国的贸易协定，而不是减少移民人数。好的，我们今天学习的词是 prioritize, prioritize, prioritize…

title: fringe
article: 今天我们要学的词是 fringe. Fringe有边缘的意思，可以指政治团体里的极端派。President-elect Donald Trump named Steven Bannon, who embraces fringe ideology, his senior counselor and chief strategist. 美国当选总统川普任命持极端理念的史蒂夫· 巴农担任自己的高级顾问和首席策略师。The Yes California Independence Campaign, a fringe political group, wants California to opt out of the Trump presidency by secession. 一个名叫“对加州独立说是”的边缘政治团体希望加州脱离联邦，退出川普领导下的美国。好的，我们今天学习的词是 fringe, fringe, fringe…

title: deal maker
article: 今天我们要学的词是 deal maker. Deal maker 意思是擅长促成交易的人。British Foreign Minister Boris Johnson said U.S. President-elect Donald Trump is a deal maker whose presidency could be good for Britain and Europe. 英国外相约翰逊说，美国当选总统川普是个会谈交易的人，他当总统对英国和欧洲有好处。川普任命共和党全国委员会主席普里伯斯为白宫办公厅主任。Reince Priebus is widely viewed as a deal maker who would push Trump to make compromises on key issues. 外界普遍认为普里伯斯擅长促成交易，在重要问题上会说服川普做出妥协。好的，我们今天学习的词是 deal maker, deal maker, deal maker…

title: en route
article: 今天我们要学的词是 en route.En route 是在途中的意思。A Colorado couple who were expecting their first baby on Election Day made a stop to cast their votes en route to the hospital. 科罗拉多州一对夫妇预产期适逢选举日，他们在前往医院的路上中途停下，投下了自己的选票。好的，我们今天学习的词是 en route, en route, en route…

title: wait and see
article: 今天我们要学的词是 wait-and-see. Wait-and-see 等着瞧，静观其变。European Union foreign ministers have adopted a wait-and-see approach towards the upcoming Trump administration. 欧盟外长对即将上台的川普政府把持一种静观其变的态度。The markets have been in a wait-and-see mode since Donald Trump was elected president. 川普当选美国总统以来，市场一直处于一种静观其变的状态。好的，我们今天学习的词是 wait-and-see, wait-and-see, wait-and-see…

title: hate crime
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hate crime. Hate crime 仇恨犯罪。The FBI reported that hate crimes against minorities rose seven percent in the United States last year. 美国联邦调查局报告说，美国去年针对少数族裔的仇恨犯罪上涨了百分之七。By contrast, hate crimes against Muslims rose 67% in just one year. 与此形成对照的是，针对穆斯林的仇恨犯罪一年间的涨幅高达67%。好的，我们今天学习的词是 hate crime, hate crime, hate crime…

title: cholera
article: 今天我们要学的词是 cholera. Cholera 名词，霍乱。According to the World Health Organization, suspected cases of cholera in Yemen have doubled to over 4,000 within 12 days. 世界卫生组织说，也门疑似霍乱的病例在12天里翻了一番，如今已经超过4000起。与此同时，Haiti has launched a massive cholera vaccination campaign in parts of the country, targeting 820,000 people. 海地在部分地区展开大规模霍乱疫苗接种行动，涉及人口多达82万人。好的，我们今天学习的词是 cholera, cholera, cholera…

title: radical
article: 今天我们要学的词是 radical. Radical 作为名词，有激进分子的意思。Austria’s interior ministry says that of the 287 Islamic radicals identified in the country in the past few years, 40 percent arrived as migrants looking for asylum. 奥地利内政部说，过去几年在国内发现的287名伊斯兰激进分子中，40%是以申请庇护的移民身份进入奥地利的。German police detained five Islamic radicals suspected of recruiting fighters to join Islamic State in Syria. 德国警方拘捕了五名伊斯兰激进分子，他们涉嫌为叙利亚的伊斯兰国招募战斗人员。好的，我们今天学习的词是 radical, radical, radical…

title: expedition
article: 今天我们要学的词是 expedition. Expedition 作为名词，有探险的意思。Israel is embarking on an archaeological expedition to try to find more of the Dead Sea Scrolls. 以色列派出一支考古探险队，寻找更多死海古卷。Researchers from 10 European countries have set out on an Antarctic expedition to locate the oldest ice on the planet. 来自10个欧洲国家的研究人员组成一支南极探险队，寻找地球上最古老的冰体。好的，我们今天学习的词是 expedition, expedition, expedition…

title: apprehension
article: 今天我们要学的词是 apprehension. Apprehension 作为名词，有逮捕的意思。The U.S. Customs and Border agency will deploy an additional 150 agents to the southern border to deal with a recent rise in apprehensions. 美国海关和边境署将向南部边境增派150名探员，解决近期内被拘捕的非法越境者人数增多的情况。In the year through September, there have been over 408,000 apprehensions along the southwest border. 截止到九月底的一年内，西南边境共逮捕了40万8千多人次。好的，我们今天学习的词是 apprehension, apprehension, apprehension…

title: recount
article: 今天我们要学的词是 recount. Recount 作为名词，有重新计算的意思。Green Party candidate Jill Stein raised $4.8 million to push for an election recount in three key states won by Donald Trump. 绿党候选人斯坦恩集资480万美元，推动在川普获胜的三个重要州对选票进行重新清点。President-elect Donald Trump assured voters that a recount wouldn’t change the outcome of the election. 美国当选总统川普让选民放心，重新点票不会改变大选结果。好的，我们今天学习的词是 recount, recount, recount…

title: mourning
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mourning. Mourning 作为名词，有哀悼的意思。The Cuban government has declared a nine-day period of mourning following the death of Fidel Castro. 菲德尔· 卡斯特罗去世后，古巴政府宣布，进行为期九天的哀悼。The Queen of England is in mourning after her best friend and first cousin Margaret Rhodes passed away at the age of 91. 英国女王哀悼挚友和表姐玛格丽特· 罗德兹的去世，玛格丽特· 罗德兹享年91岁。好的，我们今天学习的词是 mourning, mourning, mourning…

title: cronyism
article: 今天我们要学的词是 cronyism. Cronyism 名词，任人唯亲。South Korean President Park Geun-hye has been named a suspect in a cronyism scandal that has gripped the nation. 在一起牵动全国神经的任人唯亲丑闻案中，韩国总统朴槿惠被确定为涉案嫌疑人。A new report by a South African watchdog agency reveals widespread corruption and cronyism at the highest level of President Jacob Zuma’s government. 南非一个监督组织的最新报告指出，南非总统祖马政府最高层普遍存在腐败和任人唯亲的情况。好的，我们今天学习的词是 cronyism, cronyism, cronyism…

title: conflicts of interest
article: 今天我们要学的词是 conflicts of interest. Conflicts of interest 利益冲突。President-elect Donald Trump has been facing questions about conflicts of interest for not putting his personal assets in a blind trust. 美国当选总统川普不肯将个人资产转入保密信托，引发潜在利益冲突的质疑。President Obama suggested that Trump should distance himself from his global business operations to avoid conflicts of interest. 美国总统奥巴马建议川普远离自己的跨国商业运作，避免产生利益冲突。好的，我们今天学习的词是 conflicts of interest, conflicts of interest, conflicts of interest…

title: divided
article: 今天我们要学的词是 divided. Divided 形容词，有分裂的意思。A new poll shows that 85 percent of Americans believe the country is more divided on major issues than it has been in recent years. 一项新民调显示，85%的美国人认为，在重大问题上，美国目前的分裂状态是近年来最严重的。Italians are deeply divided over Prime Minister Matteo Renzi’s constitutional reform. 意大利民众在意大利总理伦齐的宪法改革议题上，存在严重的意见分歧。好的，我们今天学习的词是 divided, divided, divided…

title: repeal
article: 今天我们要学的词是 repeal. Repeal 作为动词，有废止，废除的意思。President-elect Donald Trump repeatedly vowed to repeal Obamacare on the campaign trail. 美国当选总统川普在竞选期间，多次誓言要废除奥巴马医改。然而，The latest poll shows that only 26 percent of Americans want to fully repeal President Obama’s signature health care law. 最新民调显示，美国只有26%的民众主张彻底废除奥巴马总统的这一标志性医改法案。好的，我们今天学习的词是 repeal, repeal, repeal…

title: come forward
article: 今天我们要学的词是 come forward. To come forward 有站出来的意思。Around 350 victims have come forward to say that they were sexually abused as children by youth football coaches in Britain. 英国已经有大约350名受害者站出来表示，他们小时候曾被足球教练性侵。Police say the allegations came in just six days and they expect more victims to come forward. 警方表示，短短六天里就出现了这么多指控，估计会有更多受害者站出来。好的，我们今天学习的词是 come forward, come forward, come forward…

title: excessive
article: 今天我们要学的词是excessive。 Excessive, 过度的。美国政府计划提出议案。 “The planned legislation would allow the government to block excessive rate hikes by insurance companies,” 拟议中的提案可以让政府有权制止医疗保险公司过度上调保费。 “The policeman was charged for using excessive force,” 这个警察被控过份使用暴力。英国的最新调查发现， “Only 15 % of alcohol labels clearly spell out the health dangers of excessive drinking,” 只有15%的酒精产品标签上注明了饮酒过度的健康危害。好的，今天我们学习的词是excessive…

title: human shield
article: 今天我们要学的词是 human shield. Human shield 人体盾牌。ISIS militants have reportedly taken civilians captive and used them as human shields. 伊斯兰国激进分子据报抓捕平民，用他们做自己的人体盾牌。Some 2,000 U.S. military veterans plan to form a human shield to protect protesters of a pipeline project in North Dakota. 约两千名美国退役军人准备组成人体盾牌，保护北达科他州输油管道项目的抗议者。好的，我们今天学习的词是 human shield, human shield, human shield…

title: in exchange for
article: 今天我们要学的词是 in exchange for. In exchange for 作为交换。In exchange for keeping a thousand jobs in Indiana, the heating and air conditioning maker Carrier will get $7 million in tax breaks. 暖通空调生产商开利同意将1000个工作机会留在印第安纳州，换取700万美元的减税好处。Vermont Senator Bernie Sanders considered it a dangerous precedent in which U.S. companies could threaten to leave the U.S. in exchange for government incentives. 佛蒙特州联邦参议员桑德斯认为这是一个危险的先例，美国公司可以用离开美国为要挟，换取激励措施。好的，我们今天学习的词是 in exchange for, in exchange for, in exchange for…

title: intelligence
article: 今天我们要学的词是 intelligence. Intelligence 名词，意思是情报。President elect Donald Trump rejected U.S. intelligence findings that Russia worked hard to help him win the election. 美国当选总统川普驳回了美国情报部门有关俄罗斯帮助川普赢得大选的结论。Trump also said that he doesn’t need presidential intelligence briefings every day。川普还表示，他不需要每天听取情报部门向总统做的情报简报。好的，我们今天学习的词是 intelligence, intelligence, intelligence…

title: shutdown
article: 今天我们要学的词是 shutdown. Shutdown 名词，有关闭，停止运作的意思。The Senate cleared a bill to fund the government just before midnight last Friday, narrowly averting a shutdown. 美国国会参议院星期五夜里12点前通过了政府拨款法案，避免使政府运作陷入停顿。There have been 12 full or partial government shutdowns since 1980, mostly for just a couple of days. 1980年以来，美国政府先后12次全部或是部分关闭，大多只持续了一两天。好的，我们今天学习的词是 shutdown, shutdown, shutdown…

title: stumbling block
article: 今天我们要学的词是 stumbling block. Stumbling block 名词，障碍。The release of political prisoners continues to be a major stumbling block for peace negotiations between the Philippine government and the rebels. 释放政治犯始终是菲律宾政府和反政府武装间和平谈判的绊脚石。以色列立法人员通过法案，使约旦河西岸约四千个定居点住宅合法化，此举受到联合国的批评。All Israeli settlements in the West Bank are viewed as stumbling blocks to peace efforts. 约旦河西岸所有以色列定居点都被认为是和平努力的绊脚石。好的，我们今天学习的词是 stumbling block, stumbling block, stumbling block…

title: market economy
article: 今天我们要学的词是 market economy. Market economy 市场经济。The Obama administration has decided it won’t grant China official market economy status. 奥巴马政府决定，不会承认中国正式的市场经济地位。China subsequently launched a legal challenge against the EU and US over their reluctance to treat China as a market economy. 中国随即针对欧盟和美国不肯按市场经济对待中国提出法律挑战。好的，我们今天学习的词是 market economy, market economy, market economy…

title: operative
article: 今天我们要学的词是 operative. Operative 作为名词，有间谍，特工的意思。A U.S. drone attack killed a French ISIS operative suspected of conducting a terrorist attack on a tourist beach in Tunisia. 美国无人机打死了一个法国籍伊斯兰国激进组织特工，此人涉嫌制造了突尼斯度假海岸的恐怖袭击事件。A former CIA operative and independent presidential candidate Evan McMullin accused Donald Trump of not being a “loyal American.” 曾是中央情报局特工的前独立党派总统候选人麦克马林指责川普不是忠诚的美国人。好的，我们今天学习的词是 operative, operative, operative…

title: equivalent
article: 今天我们要学的词是 equivalent. Equivalent 等同于，相当于，可以是名词也可以是形容词。Former acting director of the CIA Mike Morell called Russia’s interference in the 2016 elections “the political equivalent of 9/11.”。前中央情报局代局长莫雷尔称，俄罗斯干预2016年美国大选等同于“政治上的911.” A recent study concludes that drowsy driving is equivalent to drunk driving. 最新研究得出结论，昏昏欲睡时开车跟酒后驾车同样危险。好的，我们今天学习的词是 equivalent, equivalent, equivalent…

title: confirmation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 confirmation. Confirmation 确认，批准。Attorney general nominee Jeff Sessions’ senate confirmation hearing is set for early January. 美国司法部长提名人选塞申斯定于一月初参加参议院为确认其提名举行的听证会。President elect Donald Trump tapped ExxonMobile CEO Rex Tillerson for secretary of state, setting up a contentious confirmation fight. 当选总统川普提名埃克森美孚石油公司首席执行官蒂勒森担任国务卿，对其提名的批准势必引发激烈辩论。好的，我们今天学习的词是 confirmation, confirmation, confirmation…

title: headquarters
article: 今天我们要学的词是 headquarters. Headquarters 总部。Boeing has announced its decision to move the headquarters of its defense unit to Washington DC. 波音公司宣布，将负责国防的部门总部迁往首都华盛顿特区。A House committee has approved the project to build a new 2.1 million-square-foot headquarters for the FBI. 美国国会众议院一个小组委员会通过了为美国联邦调查局兴建占地210万平方英尺的新总部的建设项目。好的，我们今天学习的词是 headquarters, headquarters, headquarters…

title: go public
article: 今天我们要学的词是 go public. Go public 有上市的意思。The parent company of the Social media network Snapchat has reportedly filed the paperwork to go public next year. 社交媒体Snapchat 的母公司据报道已经递交了明年上市的申请文件。Other big companies rumored to go public in 2017 include Uber and Airbnb. 传言2017年可能上市的大公司还包括优步和空中食宿。好的，我们今天学习的词是go public, go public, go public …

title: nonprofit
article: 今天我们要学的词是 nonprofit. Nonprofit 作为名词，是非赢利机构的意思。The head of a West Virginia nonprofit wrote a racist post on social media about first lady Michelle Obama. 西维吉尼亚州一家非赢利机构的负责人在社交媒体上发表了针对第一夫人米歇尔·奥巴马的带有种族歧视色彩的言论。最新报告说，Nearly 75% of nonprofits reported reductions or delays in funding during the past year. 将近75%的非赢利机构过去一年内都出现了资金减少或资金到位滞后的情况。好的，我们今天学习的词是nonprofit, nonprofit, nonprofit …

title: chopping block
article: 今天我们要学的词是 chopping block. Chopping block 作为名词，有砧板的意思。Boeing says its $17 billion deal with Iran Air might be on President-elect Donald Trump’s chopping block. 波音公司说，他们跟伊朗航空公司170亿美元的交易可能会被当选总统川普砍掉。For average American homeowners, the mortgage interest deduction might be on Trump’s chopping block. 美国普通房产所有者关心，房贷利率的减税优惠可能会成为川普裁减的对象。好的，我们今天学习的词是chopping block, chopping block, chopping block …

title: takeover
article: 今天我们要学的词是 takeover. Takeover 作为名词，有接收，接管的意思。The United Nations secretary-general says a takeover by Gambia’s security forces of the country’s electoral commission office could compromise sensitive electoral material. 联合国秘书长说，冈比亚保安部队接管选举委员会办公室可能会使敏感的选举资料受到破坏。A Chinese takeover bid for Aixtron SE of Germany collapsed. 中国公司对德国爱思强公司的收购投标陷入破裂。好的，我们今天学习的词是takeover, takeover, takeover…

title: reshuffle
article: 今天我们要学的词是 reshuffle. Reshuffle 动词，有重组，重新洗牌的意思。Uzbekistan’s new president Shavkat Mirziyoyev signaled plans for a major government reshuffle. 乌兹别克斯坦新总统米尔济约耶夫暗示，计划进行大规模的政府重组。Australia’s foreign minister Julie Bishop downplayed rumors that a ministerial reshuffle is in the cards. 澳大利亚外交部长朱莉·毕晓普低调回应有关内阁可能出现重大改组的传言。好的，我们今天学习的词是reshuffle, reshuffle, reshuffle …

title: trove
article: 今天我们要学的词是 trove. Trove 作为名词，意思是价值不菲的收藏。A Dutch court has ruled that a trove of historical artefacts being held by an Amsterdam museum must be returned to Ukraine. 荷兰一家法院裁决，现由阿姆斯特丹一家博物馆保存的一大批历史文物必须归还给乌克兰。A treasure trove of gold and silver objects dating back about 3600 years have been found at an Israeli archeological site. 以色列一个考古挖掘点找到了一大批约3600年前的金银制品。好的，我们今天学习的词是trove, trove, trove …

title: safeguard
article: 今天我们要学的词是 safeguard. Safeguard 动词，有保护的意思。In an effort to safeguard a senate report on the CIA’s use of torture, it will be archived in President Obama’s presidential papers. 为保证参议院一份有关中央情报局使用酷刑报告的安全，该报告将按奥巴马总统文件存入档案。Scientists have begun copying critical climate data onto independent servers to safeguard it from political interference. 科学家开始将重要的气候数据拷贝存入独立服务器，保证数据安全，不受政治左右。好的，我们今天学习的词是 safeguard, safeguard, safeguard…

title: farewell
article: 今天我们要学的词是 farewell. Farewell 名词，有告别的意思。UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon delivered his farewell speech last Friday at the UN headquarters in New York. 联合国秘书长潘基文上星期五在纽约的联合国总部发表了他的告别讲话。U.S. President Barack Obama will deliver his farewell address on January 10th to reflect on his time in office. 美国总统奥巴马1月10号将发表他的离职告别演说，回顾自己的总统任期。好的，我们今天学习的词是 farewell, farewell, farewell…

title: baseless
article: 今天我们要学的词是 baseless. Baseless 形容词，毫无根据的。Israeli police questioned Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu about corruption allegations, which he called “baseless.” 以色列警方就腐败指控质询以色列总理内塔尼亚胡，内塔尼亚胡称，这些指控完全是子虚乌有。A Fox news host apologized on air for a baseless report on food stamp fraud. 福克斯电视台一位新闻主播在节目中为毫无事实根据的食品券欺诈事件的报道做出道歉。好的，我们今天学习的词是 baseless, baseless, baseless…

title: pass out
article: 今天我们要学的词是 pass out. To pass out 意思是失去知觉。A pilot who allegedly passed out in the cockpit was arrested on suspicion of being drunk. 一个据报道在驾驶舱内不省人事的飞行员因涉嫌醉酒被逮捕。A Texas couple was arrested after they passed out in the car with drugs and their two young children inside. 得克萨斯州一男一女被警方逮捕，发现他们时，他们已经不省人事，车里还有他们的两个小孩子和毒品。好的，我们今天学习的词是 pass out, pass out, pass out…

title: inaugural
article: 今天我们要学的词是 inaugural. Inaugural 形容词，就职的。President-elect Donald Trump is drafting his inaugural speech and is looking to President Ronald Reagan and John F. Kennedy for inspiration. 当选总统川普正在草拟就职演说，他希望从里根和约翰·肯尼迪两位前总统的讲话中寻找灵感。Forty organizations will be part of the inaugural parade held on January 20th. 1月20日举行的就职游行将有40个机构参加。好的，我们今天学习的词是 inaugural, inaugural, inaugural…

title: upscale
article: 今天我们要学的词是 upscale. Upscale 形容词，高端的。Turkey’s tourism is facing serious challenges after the New Year’s attack on an upscale nightclub in Istanbul. 伊斯坦布尔一家高端夜总会新年遭遇袭击后，使土耳其旅游业面临严峻挑战。Upscale SUVs are outselling traditional luxury cars and are expected to grab 60 percent of the luxury car market this year. 高端运动型多功能车的销量正在超过传统豪华车，估计今年将占领豪华车市场60%的份额。好的，我们今天学习的词是 upscale, upscale, upscale…

title: acknowledge
article: 今天我们要学的词是 acknowledge. Acknowledge 作为动词，有承认的意思。President Barack Obama acknowledged that his administration underestimated the threat posed by hacking and misinformation. 奥巴马总统承认，他领导下的美国政府低估了黑客和不实信息所构成的威胁。High level Indian political leaders acknowledged in a report that Kashmir needs a political solution. 高级别的印度政界领袖在一份报告中承认，克什米尔问题需要政治解决方案。好的，我们今天学习的词是 acknowledge, acknowledge, acknowledge…

title: fire back
article: 今天我们要学的词是 fire back. To fire back 意思是予以还击。President-elect Donald Trump fired back at Meryl Streep after the actress criticized him during her Golden Globe speech. 梅丽尔·斯特里普在金球奖获奖感言中对当选总统川普提出批评，川普予以反击。General Motors fired back at a Donald Trump tweet, saying only a small number of Mexican-made Chevy Cruze hatchbacks are sold in the U.S. 通用汽车公司针对川普的推文发起反击，说只有很少数量在墨西哥生产的雪佛兰科鲁兹掀背车在美国市场出售。好的，我们今天学习的词是 fire back, fire back, fire back…

title: stopover
article: 今天我们要学的词是 stopover. Stopover 有中途停留的意思。U.S. Senator Ted Cruz and Texas Governor Greg Abbott met with Taiwanese President Tsai Ing-Wen during her stopover in Houston en route to Central America. 美国联邦参议员克鲁兹和得克萨斯州州长阿伯特会见了前往中美洲中途在休斯敦停留的逐年中国台湾省“领导人”蔡英文。Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi made a brief stopover at Dhaka International Airport on his way to Africa. 中国外长王毅前往非洲途中在达卡国际机场短暂停留。好的，我们今天学习的词是 stopover, stopover, stopover…

title: plagiarism
article: 今天我们要学的词是 plagiarism. Plagiarism 是剽窃，抄袭的意思。Donald Trump’s pick for senior communications director for the National Security Council has been accused of plagiarism in her 2012 bestseller. 川普任命的国家安全委员会负责沟通事务的主任被指2012年发表的畅销书中有抄袭现象。A number of college professors have expressed concerns over the growing trend of plagiarism among Saudi university students. 一些大学教授对沙特大学生越来越严重的剽窃情况提出关注。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 plagiarism, plagiarism, plagiarism…

title: infrastructure
article: 今天我们要学的词是 infrastructure. Infrastructure 名词，基础设施。The U.S. Department of Homeland Security recently designated U.S. election infrastructure as critical. 美国国土安全部最近将涉及美国选举的基础设施定位为关键性基础设施。Japan has promised to encourage its companies to invest in the Czech Republic, especially in its infrastructure development. 日本保证要鼓励日本公司在捷克共和国投资，特别是在基础设施开发领域。好的，我们今天学习的词是 infrastructure, infrastructure, infrastructure…

title: outgoing
article: 今天我们要学的词是 outgoing. Outgoing 形容词，有即将离职的意思。The outgoing CIA Director criticized Donald Trump for not fully understanding the threat Moscow poses to the United States. 即将离任的美国中央情报局局长批评川普，说他对俄罗斯给美国带来的威胁缺乏全面的认识。Outgoing Vice President Joe Biden visited Ukraine before leaving office. 即将卸任的美国副总统拜登在离任前对乌克兰进行访问。好的，我们今天学习的词是 outgoing, outgoing, outgoing…

title: obsolete
article: 今天我们要学的词是 obsolete. Obsolete 形容词，有陈旧的，过时的意思。U.S. President-elect Donald Trump called NATO obsolete but said it was still very important to him. 美国当选总统川普称，北约早已过时，但对他来说还是十分重要。The Department of Homeland Security decided to scrap an obsolete program once used to track people from countries with sizeable Arab and Muslim populations. 美国国土安全部决定取消一个过时的项目，该项目原来被用来追踪从阿拉伯和穆斯林国家来到美国的人。好的，我们今天学习的词是 obsolete, obsolete, obsolete…

title: strike down
article: 今天我们要学的词是 strike down.To strike down 有驳回的意思。An Egyptian court struck down a government decision to transfer two uninhabited islands to Saudi Arabia. 埃及一家法院驳回了政府将两座无人岛屿送给沙特阿拉伯的决定。A Louisiana appeals court struck down funding for some charter schools because they are not considered public schools. 路易斯安那州一家上诉法院认为，某些特许学校不能得到政府资金，因为他们不是公立学校。好的，我们今天学习的词是 strike down, strike down, strike down…

title: specifics
article: 今天我们要学的词是 specifics. Specifics 名词，有具体内容的意思。President-elect Donald Trump said his goal is to have insurance for everyone, but declined to reveal specifics. 美国当选总统川普说，他的目标是让人人有保险，但不愿透露具体计划。Wisconsin Governor Scott Walker said he would like to reduce in-state tuition, but didn’t provide specifics in the budget plan. 美国威斯康辛州州长沃克表示，他将降低本州学生上州立大学的学费，但是在预算案中没有给出具体做法。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 specifics, specifics, specifics…

title: superhero
article: 今天我们要学的词是 superhero. Superhero 超级英雄。A new study shows that children who often engage with the superheroes culture are more likely to show aggressive behavior. 一项新研究显示，经常接触超级英雄文化的孩子会表现出更多的攻击性行为。In addition, superhero fans are not likely to stand up for their friends when they get picked on by bullies. 此外，超级英雄的粉丝们在自己的朋友被欺负的时候，也不太可能挺身而出。好的，我们今天学习的词是 superhero, superhero, superhero…

title: regulation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 regulation. Regulation 名词，法规。The new Trump administration issued a memorandum to freeze all new and pending regulations. 川普新政府发布备忘录，冻结一切新的和待定出台的法规。President Donald Trump told business leaders that his administration can cut regulations by 75 percent or maybe more. 美国总统川普告诉商界领袖，他领导下的美国政府可能会将管理规定砍掉75%，甚至更多。好的，我们今天学习的词是 regulation, regulation, regulation…

title: watchdog
article: 今天我们要学的词是 watchdog. Watchdog 作为名词，有监督者的意思。An ethics watchdog group claimed that President Donald Trump is violating the Constitution by accepting payments from foreign governments. 一个伦理道德监督团体表示，美国总统川普接受外国政府付款违反了宪法。A U.S. government watchdog warned that the federal debt is unsustainable and Congress needs to bring it under control. 美国一个政府监督机构警告说，美国联邦负债无法支撑，国会必须使其得以控制。好的，我们今天学习的词是 watchdog, watchdog, watchdog…

title: withdraw
article: 今天我们要学的词是 withdraw. Withdraw 作为动词，有退出的意思。President Donald Trump signed an executive order to withdraw from the Trans-Pacific Partnership trade deal. 美国总统川普签署行政命令，退出跨太平洋合作伙伴贸易协定。A bill was introduced in the House of Representatives in early January that called for the United States to withdraw from the UN. 美国国会众议院一月初的一份议案，提议美国退出联合国。好的，我们今天学习的词是 withdraw, withdraw, withdraw…

title: reinstate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 reinstate. Reinstate 作为动词，有恢复的意思。President Donald Trump reinstated a ban on foreign aid for international NGOs that provide or promote abortions. 美国总统川普恢复了禁止向提供或推动堕胎的国际非营利机构提供外援的规定。House Republicans reinstated a procedural rule that allows lawmakers to cut an individual federal worker’s pay down to $1. 美国国会众议院共和党人恢复了一项程序规定，允许国会议员将某位联邦政府雇员的工资减少到一美元。好的，我们今天学习的词是 reinstate, reinstate, reinstate…

title: coordination
article: 今天我们要学的词是 coordination. Coordination 名词，有协调的意思。The Pentagon denied a Russian claim about U.S. military coordination with Russia in Syria. 五角大楼对俄罗斯所谓美军在叙利亚跟俄罗斯协同作战的说法予以否认。The South Korean acting president vowed to carry out seamless policy coordination with the new US administration to counter the North Korean threat. 韩国代总统誓言，在对付朝鲜威胁方面，要跟美国新政府进行天衣无缝的政策协调。好的，我们今天学习的词是 coordination, coordination, coordination…

title: with a bang
article: 今天我们要学的词是with a bang。 Bang, 是突然一声巨响，with a bang, 意思就是猛烈的，刺激的，热火朝天的。”The retired boxer came back with a bang,” 这位退役拳击手风风火火地东山再起了。”The winter storm began with a bang,” 这场暴风雪下得特别猛。美国圣诞节长周末三天的电影票房总收入两亿七千八百万美元。”The box office is ending the year with a bang,” 电影票房年终表现出色。好的，今天我们学习的词是with a bang…

title: fake news
article: 今天我们要学的词是 fake news. Fake news 名词，虚假新闻。A British parliamentary committee has launched an investigation into the “fake news” phenomenon. 英国一个议会委员会对所谓“虚假新闻”的现象展开调查。The European Commission has warned Facebook and other social media entities to take a tougher stance against fake news. 欧洲委员会警告脸书和其他社交媒体，要求他们对虚假新闻采取更为强硬的立场。好的，我们今天学习的词是 fake news, fake news, fake news…

title: in the works
article: 今天我们要学的词是 in the works. In the works 正在准备中，正在进行中。A recent report said Google’s next generation Pixel phone is in the works. 最近有报告说，谷歌下一代Pixel手机正在研发之中。The Kremlin said a meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and U.S. President Donald Trump is in the works. 克里姆林宫表示，俄罗斯总统普京和美国总统川普间的会谈正在筹备中。好的，我们今天学习的词是 in the works, in the works, in the works…

title: roll back
article: 今天我们要学的词是 roll back. To roll back 意思是回归到原来的水平或状态，也有取消，减少的意思。U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order to roll back regulations on businesses. 美国总统川普签署行政令，取消对企业的部分法规。Danish business minister Brian Mikkelsen wants the European Union to roll back some of its financial regulations. 丹麦商业部长米克森希望欧盟取消一些金融法规。好的，我们今天学习的词是 roll back, roll back, roll back…

title: unlimited
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unlimited. Unlimited 没有限制的。France has banned restaurants from offering unlimited soda refills to fight obesity. 为了打击肥胖，法国禁止餐馆再向顾客提供碳酸饮料无限制的续杯服务。U.S. national wireless carrier Sprint is cutting the price of its unlimited data plan to lure customers from its competitors. 美国全国无线通信公司斯普林特为把客户从竞争对手那里吸引过来，下调了无限数据计划的月费。好的，我们今天学习的词是 unlimited, unlimited, unlimited…

title: common ground
article: 今天我们要学的词是 common ground. Common ground 共同点，一致之处。German Chancellor Angela Merkel said she would seek common ground with the new U.S. administration wherever possible. 德国总理默克尔说，她将在一切可能的议题上寻求与美国新政府的共同点。The former French foreign minister argued that sanctions on Russia have not worked and we should try to find common ground with Russia. 法国前外长表示，制裁俄罗斯并未奏效，我们应该设法寻找跟俄罗斯的共同点。好的，我们今天学习的词是 common ground, common ground, common ground…

title: financial hub
article: 今天我们要学的词是 financial hub.Financial hub 金融中心。France is reportedly trying to make Paris the European Union’s financial hub once Britain leaves the EU. 据报道，法国准备等英国退欧后，使巴黎成为欧盟新的金融中心。最新报告说，Singapore has overtaken Hong Kong as the top financial hub in Asia, trailing only London and New York globally. 新加坡已超越香港，成为亚洲第一金融中心，在世界范围内也只排在伦敦和纽约的后面。好的，我们今天学习的词是 financial hub, financial hub, financial hub…

title: implicated
article: 今天我们要学的词是 implicated. Implicated 形容词，有牵连的，涉嫌的。Rwanda’s government dismissed 200 police officers who were implicated in corruption. 卢旺达政府开除了200名涉嫌贪污腐败的警察。The British High Court has found that members of Rolls-Royce’s former senior management were implicated in bribes and corruption over a long period of time. 英国最高法院认定，劳斯莱斯公司的前高管成员涉嫌长期从事贪污受贿。好的，我们今天学习的词是 implicated, implicated, implicated…

title: resettlement
article: 今天我们要学的词是 resettlement. Resettlement 名词，重新安置。Asylum seekers protested in Indonesia and urged the UN refugee agency to speed up the process of resettlement. 寻求庇护者在印尼抗议示威，要求联合国难民署加快重新安置的速度。The Australian Foreign Minister said the Trump administration would honor a refugee resettlement deal between the two countries. 澳大利亚外长说，川普政府会执行两国间达成的难民重新安置协议。好的，我们今天学习的词是 resettlement, resettlement, resettlement…

title: casualties
article: 今天我们要学的词是 casualties. Casualties 名词，人员伤亡。The United Nations reported a 24 percent spike in conflict-related child casualties in Afghanistan in 2016. 联合国报告说，阿富汗2016年因冲突造成的儿童伤亡人数猛增了24%。The report also pointed out that the number of civilian casualties caused by extremists in Afghanistan increased nearly ten times in 2016 compared to the previous year. 报告还指出，阿富汗2016年由极端分子造成的平民伤亡跟前一年相比增长了近十倍。好的，我们今天学习的词是 casualties, casualties, casualties…

title: jihadist
article: 今天我们要学的词是 jihadist. Jihadist 名词，圣战主义者。The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said some Syrian jihadists close to the Islamic State battled a rival hardline Islamic faction in northwestern Syria. 叙利亚人权了望台说，一些跟伊斯兰国组织联系密切的叙利亚圣战主义者在叙利亚西北地区与对立的强硬派伊斯兰分支交火。A French jihadist who was suspected of inspiring several attacks in France was targeted in a coalition air strike. 一个涉嫌激发了法国数起恐怖袭击事件的法国圣战主义者成为一次联军空袭的打击目标。好的，我们今天学习的词是 jihadist, jihadist, jihadist…

title: face to face
article: 今天我们要学的词是 face-to-face. Face-to-face 面对面的。In their first face-to-face meeting, U.S. president Donald Trump and Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau talked about trade. 美国总统川普和加拿大总理特鲁多在首次面对面会谈中围绕贸易问题进行了讨论。Russian President Vladimir Putin said he is ready for a face-to-face meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump. 俄罗斯总统普京说，他已经做好了跟美国总统川普面对面会谈的准备。好的，我们今天学习的词是 face-to-face, face-to-face, face-to-face…

title: compliance
article: 今天我们要学的词是 compliance. Compliance 名词，遵守。OPEC’s January production data confirmed its members’ general compliance with an agreement to slash output. 石油输出国组织一月份的产量数据显示，其成员国基本上遵守了减产的协议。U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres called on North Korea to return to full compliance with its international obligations. 联合国秘书长古铁雷斯要求朝鲜，恢复对其国际义务的全面遵守。好的，我们今天学习的词是 compliance, compliance, compliance…

title: avalanche
article: 今天我们要学的词是 avalanche. Avalanche 名词，雪崩。At least four skiers were killed and five others are missing after being buried by an avalanche Monday in the French Alps. 法国阿尔卑斯山脉星期一发生雪崩，造成至少四名滑雪者丧生，另外五人下落不明。Due to the recent accumulation of snow, officials have posted warnings of avalanche dangers near Mount Washington. 鉴于最近积雪的增加，有关官员对华盛顿山附近地区发布了雪崩警告。好的，我们今天学习的词是 avalanche, avalanche, avalanche…

title: overdose
article: 今天我们要学的词是 overdose. Overdose 用药过量。Authorities responded to 52 overdose calls in a 32-hour period last week in Louisville, Kentucky. 美国肯塔基州路易维尔市官员上周32小时内收到了52起用药过量的求助电话。West Virginia, which has the highest rate of overdose deaths, distributed more than 8,000 overdose antidote kits. 美国全国因用药过量死亡率最高的西维吉尼亚州散发了八千多个用药过量解毒急救包。好的，我们今天学习的词是 overdose, overdose, overdose…

title: finalist
article: 今天我们要学的词是 finalist. Finalist 名词，最终人选。U.S. President Donald Trump interviewed four finalists last Sunday for the position of national security adviser. 美国总统川普上周日面试了国家安全顾问一职的四位最终人选。The Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame announced 14 finalists for the class of 2017. 奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂宣布了2017年篮球名人堂的14位最终候选人。好的，我们今天学习的词是 finalist, finalist, finalist…

title: famine
article: 今天我们要学的词是 famine. Famine 名词，饥荒。Famine has been declared in two counties of South Sudan by its government as well as three UN agencies. 苏丹政府和联合国的三个机构宣布，南苏丹的两个县已陷入饥荒。The UN World Food Programme said that more than 20 million people are at risk of dying from starvation within the next six months in four separate famines. 联合国粮食计划署说，全球各地四个地方的饥荒意味着今后半年里有两千多万人面临饿死的威胁。好的，我们今天学习的词是 famine, famine, famine…

title: withhold
article: 今天我们要学的词是 withhold. Withhold 动词，有保留，隐瞒的意思。Vice President Mike Pence said he was disappointed that former national security adviser Michael Flynn withheld information from him. 美国副总统彭斯表示，他对前国家安全顾问弗林向他隐瞒信息感到失望。President Donald Trump has threatened to withhold federal funding from “sanctuary cities.” 美国总统川普威胁说，将停止对非法移民庇护城市的联邦拨款。好的，我们今天学习的词是 withhold, withhold, withhold…

title: shortfall
article: 今天我们要学的词是 shortfall. Shortfall 名词，有短缺的意思。Norway has joined other countries to replace funding shortfalls left by U.S. President Donald Trump’s ban on U.S. funding for abortion related services. 挪威和其他国家共同集资，弥补川普禁止美国为堕胎相关服务提供资金后出现的资金缺口。The commander of U.S. and NATO forces in Afghanistan said he has a shortfall of a few thousand troops. 驻阿富汗的美军和北约部队指挥官说，他缺少几千人的兵力。好的，我们今天学习的词是 shortfall, shortfall, shortfall…

title: undocumented
article: 今天我们要学的词是 undocumented. Undocumented 形容词，无证的，非法的。New Department of Homeland Security guidelines give immigration officers more power to go after undocumented immigrants. 美国国土安全部新的指导方针增加了移民官员抓捕非法移民的权力。皮尤研究中心的数字显示，One in four of the 200,000 immigrants living in Philadelphia are undocumented. 费城20万移民中，有四分之一是非法移民。好的，我们今天学习的词是 undocumented, undocumented, undocumented…

title: prime time
article: 今天我们要学的词是 prime-time. Prime-time 形容词，黄金时段的。U.S. President Donald Trump will deliver a prime-time speech at a joint session of Congress on Tuesday night. 美国总统川普星期二晚上的黄金时段将在国会联席会议上发表讲话。Two new categories, Outstanding Music Supervision and Outstanding Casting in a Reality Series, have been added to this year’s prime-time Emmy Award. 黄金时段的艾美奖今年将增设两个奖项：最佳音乐监制奖和最佳真人秀演员选拔奖。好的，我们今天学习的词是 prime-time, prime-time, prime-time…

title: indispensable
article: 今天我们要学的词是 indispensable. Indispensable 形容词，不可缺少的。Former President George W. Bush said Monday that the media is “indispensable to democracy.” 美国前总统小布什星期一表示，媒体对民主制度而言是不可缺少的。The South African Finance Minister said he “is not indispensable” amid speculation that he may be replaced by President Jacob Zuma. 外界有传言，南非总统祖马可能会更换财政部长，现任财政部长对此表示，他不是无可替代的。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 indispensable, indispensable, indispensable…

title: transformation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 transformation. Transformation 名词，有改造，转变的意思。Democratic Senator Bernie Sanders called for “a total transformation” of the Democratic Party. 民主党参议员桑德斯呼吁，民主党需要彻底转变。Intel’s CEO said during a recent speech that data plays an invaluable role in retail transformation. 英特尔公司首席执行官在最近一次讲话中提出，数据在零售业的转变中扮演重要角色。好的，我们今天学习的词是 transformation, transformation, transformation…

title: call off
article: 今天我们要学的词是 call off. To call off 意思是取消。Talks between North Korean diplomats and former American officials were called off after the death of Kim Jong Un’s half brother。金正恩同父异母的兄长死后，朝鲜外交官和美国前政府官员原定举行的会谈被取消。German Chancellor Merkel’s visit to Algeria was called off because President Bouteflika was too sick to meet. 德国总理默克尔取消了对阿尔及利亚的访问，因为阿尔及利亚总统布特弗利卡因病无法会见。好的，我们今天学习的词是 call off, call off, call off…

title: bacteria
article: 今天我们要学的词是 bacteria. Bacteria 名词，细菌。The World Health Organization issued a list of the top 12 types of bacteria that are most dangerous to humans. 世界卫生组织公布了对人体危害最严重的12个类别的细菌清单。New research shows that some friendly bacteria on our skin can produce natural antibiotics and help ward off bad bacteria. 最新研究显示，人体皮肤上对人体有利的细菌可以产生天然抗生物质，防范有害细菌的威胁。好的，我们今天学习的词是 bacteria, bacteria, bacteria…

title: wiretap
article: 今天我们要学的词是 wiretap. Wiretap 作为名词，意思是窃听。President Donald Trump claimed that the Obama administration illegally ordered a wiretap on the Trump Tower last year. 川普总统声称，奥巴马政府去年曾下令非法对川普大厦进行窃听。FBI Director James Comey asked Justice Department officials to publicly reject President Trump’s wiretap claims. 联邦调查局局长科米要求司法部官员公开否认川普总统声称自己曾被窃听的说法。好的，我们今天学习的词是 wiretap, wiretap, wiretap…

title: revised
article: 今天我们要学的词是 revised. Revised 形容词，经过修改的。President Trump signed a revised executive order that will suspend America’s refugee program and temporarily ban entry of people from certain countries. 川普总统签署经过修改的总统令，暂停美国难民项目，暂停特定国家公民进入美国。The revised travel ban removed Iraq from the list of Muslim-majority countries whose citizens face a 90-day ban on travel to the U.S. 根据修改后的旅行限令，伊拉克不再被包括在90天不得入境美国的穆斯林国家里。好的，我们今天学习的词是 revised, revised, revised…

title: waters
article: 今天我们要学的词是 waters. Waters 水域，海域。North Korea launched four missiles on Monday morning, three of which landed in Japanese waters. 朝鲜星期三早上发射了四枚导弹，其中三枚落入日本海域。A crocodile shark, a rare species typically found in tropical waters off Brazil and Australia, was discovered dead on the UK coast. 英国海滩上发现了一条已经死去的鳄鱼鲨，鳄鱼鲨是一种罕见的鲨鱼物种，通常生活在巴西和澳大利亚的热带海域。好的，我们今天学习的词是 waters, waters, waters…

title: conspire
article: 今天我们要学的词是 conspire. Conspire 动词，有阴谋，密谋的意思。A special prosecutor said that South Korean President Park Geun-hye conspired to take bribes from Samsung. 一位特别检察官说，韩国总统朴槿惠阴谋从三星公司收取贿赂。A UK watchdog claims that two pharmaceutical companies have been conspiring illegally to keep drug prices high. 英国一个监督机构表示，两家医药公司非法合谋，让药物价格居高不下。好的，我们今天学习的词是 conspire, conspire, conspire…

title: thwart
article: 今天我们要学的词是 thwart. Thwart 动词，有阻挠，挫败的意思。British security forces have thwarted 13 terrorist attacks in less than four years, according to the UK’s most senior anti-terrorism official. 英国反恐最高官员说，英国保安部队在过去不到四年时间里，挫败了13起恐怖袭击事件。Islamic State claimed responsibility for a suicide attack in Algeria which was thwarted by the police. 伊斯兰国组织声称制造了阿尔及利亚发生的一起自杀袭击事件，这起袭击遭到了警方的挫败。好的，我们今天学习的词是 thwart, thwart, thwart…

title: unusable
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unusable. Unusable 形容词，意思是无法使用的。南苏丹部分地区已陷入饥荒，To make matters worse, aid workers say once rain arrives in April, roads will be cut off and airstrips will become unusable. 更糟糕的是，援助人员说，一旦四月份雨季来临，道路就会被切断，飞机跑道也将变得无法使用。联合国儿童基金会发表叙利亚战争使儿童深受其害的报告，报告指出，A third of Syria’s schools are now unusable, and many children have missed years of school. 叙利亚三分之一学校已经关闭，很多孩子都已经好几年没有上过学了。好的，我们今天学习的词是 unusable, unusable, unusable…

title: critical point
article: 今天我们要学的词是 critical point. Critical point 关键时刻。联合国人道行动协调人表示，非洲和中东四个国家两千万人面临被饿死的威胁。He called the crisis the largest since 1945 and claimed “we stand at a critical point in history.” 他称这是1945年以来最严重的危机，并声称，“我们正处于历史的关键时刻”。阿里巴巴集团召开首届技术大会。Jeff Zhang, Chief Technology Officer of Alibaba said the company has reached “a critical point in technology innovation.” 阿里巴巴首席技术官张建锋说，阿里巴巴正处于技术创新的临界点。好的，我们今天学习的词是 critical point, critical point, critical point…

title: anti Semitic
article: 今天我们要学的词是 anti-Semitic. Anti-Semitic 形容词，反犹太的。French presidential candidate Francois Fillon apologized for his party’s anti-Semitic tweet about rival Emmanuel Macron. 法国总统候选人菲永为他所在政党在推特上发表反犹太漫画攻击对手马克龙表示道歉。A synagogue in Seattle was vandalized with anti-Semitic graffiti. 西雅图的一个犹太教堂遭到破坏，出现了反犹太的涂鸦。好的，我们今天学习的词是 anti-Semitic, anti-Semitic, anti-Semitic…

title: pardon
article: 今天我们要学的词是 pardon. Pardon 作为动词，有赦免的意思。Egypt’s president Abdel-Fattah el-Sissi has pardoned 203 people jailed for their participation in illegal protests. 埃及总统塞西赦免了因参加非法抗议被判刑的203人。A former U.S. spy was pardoned by Italy in connection with the CIA kidnapping of a terrorist suspect in Milan. 一名前美国间谍获得了意大利的特赦，她涉嫌参与中情局在米兰劫持一名恐怖主义嫌疑人的行动。好的，我们今天学习的词是 pardon, pardon, pardon…

title: daylight saving time
article: 今天我们要学的词是 daylight saving time. Daylight saving time 夏时制。Daylight saving time officially began this year at 2am on March 12th in the U.S. 3月12号凌晨两点美国今年的夏时制正式开始。For most Americans, daylight saving time means only one thing: losing one hour’s sleep. 对于大多数美国人来说，夏时制只意味着一件事情，那就是损失一小时的睡眠时间。好的，我们今天学习的词是 daylight saving time, daylight saving time, daylight saving time…

title: press corps
article: 今天我们要学的词是 press corps. Press corps 记者团。White House press secretary Sean Spicer had a heated exchange with the press corps over President Trump’s allegations that he was wiretapped. 白宫新闻秘书斯派塞就川普总统说自己被监听一事与记者团发生激烈争执。Secretary of State Rex Tillerson chose not to bring the State Department press corps with him on his first official trip to Asia. 美国国务卿蒂勒森上任后首次出访亚洲，选择不让记者团随行。好的，我们今天学习的词是 press corps, press corps, press corps…

title: mechanism
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mechanism. Mechanism 机制。Britain will trigger the mechanism to leave the European Union next week. 英国下星期将启动离开欧盟的机制。Pakistan and Afghanistan agreed last week to form a joint mechanism to counter the common threat of terrorism. 巴基斯坦和阿富汗上星期一致同意，建议一种联合机制，共同打击双方共同面对的恐怖主义威胁。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 mechanism, mechanism, mechanism…

title: step up
article: 今天我们要学的词是 step up. To step up 有加强的意思。Japan and Russia agreed to step up work towards resolving their longstanding territorial disputes. 日本和俄罗斯一致同意，要加强努力，设法解决两国间长期存在的领土争端。Southeast Asian countries have pledged to step up efforts to end tuberculosis by 2030. 东南亚国家保证，要加强力度，努力在2030年以前做到根除肺结核病。好的，我们今天学习的词是 step up, step up, step up…

title: forgiveness
article: 今天我们要学的词是 forgiveness. Forgiveness 名词，宽恕，原谅。Pope Francis begged forgiveness for the “sins and failings of the church and its members” during Rwanda’s genocide. 教皇方济各为罗马天主教会及其成员在卢旺达种族灭绝中的罪孽和失败请求宽恕。A Canadian senator begged forgiveness for his sexual misconduct but declined to resign. 加拿大一位参议员为自己的不当性行为请求宽恕，但是拒绝辞职。好的，我们今天学习的词是 forgiveness, forgiveness, forgiveness…

title: legalize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 legalize. To legalize 意思是合法化。Four former FDA commissioners are warning against legalizing the importation of drugs from other countries. 美国食品药物管理局四位前任局长就进口药物合法化提出警告。A new report indicates that marijuana could be legalized in all 50 states by the year 2021. 一份最新报告显示，2021年之前，美国全部50个州都可能实现大麻合法化。好的，我们今天学习的词是 legalize, legalize, legalize…

title: orchestrate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 orchestrate. Orchestrate 动词，有组织策划的意思。Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny orchestrated nationwide anti-government protests. 俄罗斯反对派领袖纳瓦尔尼协调策划了全国范围内的反政府抗议活动。French conservative presidential candidate Francois Fillon accused the Socialist government of orchestrating leaks of his financial affairs to damage his chances of getting elected. 法国保守派总统候选人菲永指责社会党政府策划泄漏他的金融信息，破坏他当选的可能性。好的，我们今天学习的词是 orchestrate, orchestrate, orchestrate…

title: jeopardize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 jeopardize. Jeopardize 动词，有危及，损害的意思。U.S. Vice President Mike Pence said the Trump administration will not tolerate Iranian efforts to jeopardize Israel’s security. 美国副总统彭斯说，川普政府不会任由伊朗的行为威胁到以色列的安全。Former House Majority Leader Eric Cantor warned that failure on the health care bill could jeopardize the rest of Trump’s agenda. 前国会众议院多数党领袖坎托警告说，医保改革议案的失败会危及川普其它政策纲领的实施。好的，我们今天学习的词是 jeopardize, jeopardize, jeopardize…

title: well wisher
article: 今天我们要学的词是 well-wisher. Well-wisher 名词，祝福者。The family of an American who was killed in last week’s attack in London thanked well-wishers for their generosity. 在上星期伦敦恐怖袭击中遇害的一个美国人的家人对好心人的祝福表示感谢。在英国，Well-wishers donated £500,000 in just 24 hours to the family of a slain police officer. 好心人在24小时内就向一位遇害的警察的家人捐助了50万英镑。好的，我们今天学习的词是 well-wisher, well-wisher, well-wisher…

title: pursue
article: 今天我们要学的词是 pursue. Pursue 动词，追求，寻求。Turkey’s president Recep Tayyip Erdogan said Turkey might hold a referendum to decide whether to pursue European Union membership. 土耳其总统埃尔多安表示，土耳其可能会举行全民公决，决定是否继续寻求欧盟成员国地位。The United Nations commission of inquiry for South Sudan was given broader powers to pursue human rights abuses in the country’s three-year civil war. 联合国的南苏丹调查委员会获得更大的权力，调查南苏丹三年内战中践踏人权的情况。好的，我们今天学习的词是 pursue, pursue, pursue…

title: genetically modified
article: 今天我们要学的词是 genetically modified. Genetically modified 转基因的。Officials are considering using genetically modified mosquitoes to fight the zika virus in Houston. 有关官员考虑使用转基因蚊子在休斯敦打击寨卡病毒。A majority of European countries voted against allowing two new genetically modified crops to be grown in Europe. 大多数欧洲国家都投票反对接受两种转基因作物在欧洲种植。好的，我们今天学习的词是 genetically modified, genetically modified, genetically modified…

title: immunity
article: 今天我们要学的词是 immunity. Immunity 名词，豁免。Former national security advisor Michael Flynn is discussing receiving immunity with the House and Senate intelligence committees in exchange for testimony. 美国前国家安全顾问弗林正在跟参众两院情报委员会协商，以司法豁免为条件提供证词。President Trump’s lawyers claimed immunity in a sexual harassment case against the president. 美国总统川普的律师称，在一起针对川普性骚扰的诉案中，川普享有豁免权。好的，我们今天学习的词是 immunity, immunity, immunity…

title: dictatorship
article: 今天我们要学的词是 dictatorship. Dictatorship 名词，专制，独裁。Venezuela’s Supreme Court tried to take over the legislature, a move opposition leaders considered a step further towards dictatorship. 委内瑞拉最高法院试图接管议会，反对派领袖认为这是向独裁迈出的一步。In the lead-up to Turkey’s referendum on April 16th, analysts are questioning if Turkey is moving towards dictatorship. 随着4月16号土耳其全民公决的临近，分析人士提出，不知土耳其是否正在向独裁靠近。好的，我们今天学习的词是 dictatorship, dictatorship, dictatorship…

title: roll back
article: 今天我们要学的词是 roll back. To roll back 有退回，取消的意思。North Carolina Governor Roy Cooper signed legislation to roll back a year-old law that requested transgender people to use the public restrooms corresponding to their birth gender. 北卡罗来纳州州长库珀签署议案，取消了一年前通过的要求跨性别者按出生性别使用公厕的法律。Congress passed bills to roll back Internet privacy rules from the Obama era. 国会通过议案，取消奥巴马任内通过的保护互联网隐私的规定。好的，我们今天学习的词是 roll back, roll back, roll back…

title: hospitalized
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hospitalized. Hospitalized 住院就医。223 Macedonian workers were hospitalized for food poisoning. 223名马其顿工人因食物中毒住院治疗。Africans living in Northern India are afraid of going out after a spate of mob attacks left several people hospitalized. 住在印度北部地区的非洲人不敢出门，此前发生的一波暴民袭击事件，让好几个非洲人受伤，被送进医院接受治疗。好的，我们今天学习的词是 hospitalized, hospitalized, hospitalized…

title: never before seen
article: 今天我们要学的词是 never-before-seen. Never-before-seen 从未见过的。The FBI released never-before-seen photos of the 911 attack on the Pentagon. 美国联邦调查局公布了五角大楼受到911恐怖袭击的新照片。NASA’s Juno Spacecraft captured never-before-seen photos of Jupiter. 美国航空航天局的朱诺号太空探测器捕捉到了前所未见的木星图像。好的，我们今天学习的词是 never-before-seen, never-before-seen, never-before-seen…

title: chemical attack
article: 今天我们要学的词是 chemical attack. Chemical attack 化学武器袭击。The United States launched a missile attack on Syria for its alleged chemical attack on civilians. 因据信叙利亚对平民发动的化学武器袭击，美国对叙利亚发动导弹打击。President Trump said there was no doubt that Syrian President Bashar al-Assad was responsible for the chemical attack. 美国总统川普说，毫无疑问，叙利亚总统阿萨德要对这次化学武器袭击事件负责。好的，我们今天学习的词是 chemical attack, chemical attack, chemical attack…

title: credit rating
article: 今天我们要学的词是 credit rating. Credit rating 信用评级。The Fitch agency has downgraded South Africa’s credit rating to junk status. 国际评级机构惠誉将南非的信用评级降至垃圾地位。Standard and Poor’s has raised Argentina’s credit rating from B- to B, saying the country is on the verge of exiting recession. 标准普尔将阿根廷的信用评级从B-上调到B, 并表示，阿根廷即将走出经济衰退。好的，我们今天学习的词是 credit rating, credit rating, credit rating…

title: pretext
article: 今天我们要学的词是 pretext. Pretext 名词，借口。Russia called the U.S. missile attack on Syria “an act of aggression against a sovereign state delivered in violation of international law under a made-up pretext.” 俄罗斯指责美国对叙利亚的导弹打击是“对主权国家的侵略，借助子虚乌有的借口，违反了国际法规定”。Authorities have rescued about 160 women since last year who were lured to Kuwait under the pretext of job opportunities. 有关当局自去年来已经营救了大约160名以工作机会为由被骗到科威特的妇女。好的，我们今天学习的词是 pretext, pretext, pretext…

title: armed conflict
article: 今天我们要学的词是 armed conflict. Armed conflict 武装冲突。The Red Cross said the situation in Syria amounts to an international armed conflict following the U.S. missile strikes. 美国实施导弹打击后，红十字会说，叙利亚局势已构成了国际武装冲突。A new report by the UN Secretary-General detailed the impact of armed conflicts on children in Sudan. 联合国秘书长的一份最新报告详细描述了苏丹武装冲突对儿童的影响。好的，我们今天学习的词是 armed conflict, armed conflict, armed conflict…

title: autopsy
article: 今天我们要学的词是 autopsy. Autopsy 尸检，尸体解剖。Autopsy results showed that chemical weapons were used in a recent attack in Syria’s Idlib province. 尸检结果显示，最近叙利亚伊德利卜省发生的袭击中使用了化学武器。According to autopsy result, a 20-year-old college student choked to death after a pancake eating contest. 尸体解剖结果显示，一个20岁的大学生参加薄煎饼大胃王比赛后窒息身亡。好的，我们今天学习的词是 autopsy, autopsy, autopsy…

title: anti dumping
article: 今天我们要学的词是 anti-dumping. Anti-dumping 反倾销的。The European Commission has imposed anti-dumping duties on steel products from China. 欧洲委员会对中国的钢铁产品实施了反倾销关税。The United States has launched an anti-dumping investigation against imports of Chinese aluminium foil. 美国对中国的锡箔纸进口产品展开了反倾销调查。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 anti-dumping, anti-dumping, anti-dumping…

title: inadvertently
article: 今天我们要学的词是 inadvertently. Inadvertently 无意的。A chain of Dutch stores has apologized for inadvertently selling children’s coloring books featuring an image of Adolf Hitler. 荷兰一家连锁店为不小心出售了带有希特勒图像的儿童彩色图画本表示道歉。A Transportation Department employee inadvertently tweeted under Secretary Elain Chao’s name, urging a member of congress to sue President Trump. 美国运输部一名雇员无意间用运输部长赵小兰的名义发推文，呼吁一名国会议员起诉川普总统。好的，我们今天学习的词是 inadvertently, inadvertently, inadvertently…

title: encrypted
article: 今天我们要学的词是 encrypted. Encrypted 形容词，加密的。A recent survey revealed that nearly a quarter of information security professionals are blind to encrypted threats. 最新调查发现，将近四分之一的信息安全专业人士都对加密的威胁毫不知情。A 24-year-old Brazilian man who was obsessed with UFOs has vanished, leaving behind a wall covered with encrypted messages. 一个痴迷于不明飞行物的24岁巴西男子下落不明，留下了一墙加密的信息。好的，我们今天学习的词是 encrypted, encrypted, encrypted…

title: rock bottom
article: 今天我们要学的词是rock bottom。 Rock bottom, 最低水平。”His acting career has hit rock bottom,” 他的演艺事业陷入了谷底。纽约棒球扬基队明星选手A-Rod承认，”I hit rock bottom this spring,” 今年春天是我的低谷。”She was at rock bottom when she filed for divorce,” 她提出离婚时，生活陷入了最低潮。“The prices of real estate markets had nearly hit rock bottom,” 房地产市场的价格已经几乎触底。然而，”House sales volumes are still at rock bottom,” 房屋销量依旧处于最低点。 好的，今天我们学习的词是rock bottom…

title: yo yo dieting
article: 今天我们要学的词是 yo-yo dieting. Yo-yo dieting 溜溜球节食法。Yo-yo dieting refers to the repeated loss and regain of body weight as a result of dieting. 溜溜球节食法指的是由节食引起的体重在减少和增加中的循环往复。A new study suggests that for people with heart disease, yo-yo dieting may increase their risks of heart attacks and strokes. 一项新研究显示，对有心脏病的人来说，溜溜球节食法可能会增加他们心脏病和中风的风险。好的，我们今天学习的词是 yo-yo dieting, yo-yo dieting, yo-yo dieting…

title: runoff
article: 今天我们要学的词是 runoff. Runoff 作为名词，有决选的意思。French centrist candidate Emmanuel Macron and nationalist candidate Marine Le Pen are heading into a runoff in two weeks. 法国中间派候选人马克龙和民族主义者候选人勒庞将在两周后参加决选。A political newcomer in the Democratic Party will face a veteran Republican candidate in a runoff election for a Georgia Congressional seat. 民主党的一个新秀将在争夺乔治亚一个众议院席位的决选中对阵共和党一个经验丰富的候选人。好的，我们今天学习的词是 runoff, runoff, runoff…

title: holocaust
article: 今天我们要学的词是 Holocaust. Holocaust 名词，犹太人大屠杀。Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu spoke at the opening ceremony of Holocaust Remembrance Day at the Yad Vashem Holocaust Memorial. 以色列总理内塔尼亚胡在犹太人大屠杀纪念馆的大屠杀纪念日开幕式上讲话。Six Holocaust survivors lit torches during the ceremony. 纪念活动中，六名大屠杀幸存者点燃了火炬。好的，我们今天学习的词是 Holocaust, Holocaust, Holocaust…

title: in defiance of
article: 今天我们要学的词是 in defiance of. In defiance of 有无视警告的意思。North Korea is expected to press ahead with more missile tests in defiance of United Nations sanctions. 朝鲜预计将无视联合国的制裁，进行更多的导弹试验。The California Senate passed a sanctuary state bill in defiance of Trump’s immigration policies. 加州参议院不顾川普的移民政策，通过了定加州为庇护州的议案。好的，我们今天学习的词是 in defiance of, in defiance of, in defiance of…

title: uptick
article: 今天我们要学的词是 uptick. Uptick 作为名词，是增长，上扬的意思。U.S. officials suggested that drought and famine could be the cause of the uptick in piracy off Somalia. 美国官员表示，干旱和饥荒可能是索马里沿海海盗活动加剧的起因。There has been an uptick in the number of seals making an appearance on New Jersey beaches this year and experts are advising people to give the animals space. 美国新泽西州沿海今年出现的海豹数量有所上扬，专家建议人们给海豹留出空间。好的，我们今天学习的词是 uptick, uptick, uptick…

title: unannounced
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unannounced.
