Unannounced 形容词，事先未经宣布的。U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis made an unannounced visit to Afghanistan. 美国国防部长马蒂斯对阿富汗进行了事先未经宣布的访问。U.S. Vice President Pence made an unannounced visit to the demilitarized zone between North and South Korea during his 10-day Asia trip. 美国副总统彭斯在十天亚洲之行中对朝鲜半岛非军事区进行了事先未经宣布的访问。好的，我们今天学习的词是 unannounced, unannounced, unannounced…

title: negotiator
article: 今天我们要学的词是 negotiator. Negotiator 名词，谈判人员。Congressional negotiators reached an agreement to fund the federal government until the end of September. 美国国会谈判人员达成协议，保证联邦政府九月底以前的正常拨款。British Prime Minister Theresa May met with the EU’s chief Brexit negotiator ahead of a crucial summit of the EU members. 欧盟会员国召开重要峰会前，英国首相特蕾莎·梅与欧盟负责英国脱欧事务的首席谈判代表进行了会谈。好的，我们今天学习的词是 negotiator, negotiator, negotiator…

title: markedly
article: 今天我们要学的词是 markedly. Markedly 意思是显著地。The number of migrants crossing into the U.S. has dropped markedly since President Trump took office. 美国总统川普上任以来，跨境进入美国的移民人数显著下降。Official data showed that business activities in China slowed markedly in April after months of steady expansion. 官方数据显示，经过数月的稳定增长后，中国四月份的经济活动显著放缓。好的，我们今天学习的词是 markedly, markedly, markedly…

title: controversial
article: 今天我们要学的词是 controversial. Controversial 形容词，有争议的。President Trump has invited the Philippine’s controversial president Duterte to the White House. 美国总统川普邀请颇具争议的菲律宾总统杜特尔特来白宫会面。Sebastian Gorka, a controversial security adviser to President Trump, will be leaving the White House. 川普总统颇具争议的国家安全顾问戈克将离开白宫。好的，我们今天学习的词是 controversial, controversial, controversial…

title: activate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 activate. Activate 作为动词，有激活，启动的意思。Google activated a line of servers in Cuba, becoming the first foreign company to provide online content in the country. 谷歌在古巴激活了一整套服务器，成为第一个在古巴提供网上内容的外国公司。The Kansas emergency operation center has been partially activated in response to a severe winter storm system. 为应对暴风雪来袭，堪萨斯州的应急行动中心被部分启动，投入救援。好的，我们今天学习的词是 activate, activate, activate…

title: persecution
article: 今天我们要学的词是 persecution. Persecution 名词，意思是迫害。Russian police detained activists protesting the persecution of gay men in Chechnya. 俄罗斯警察拘捕了抗议车臣对同性恋男子进行迫害的活动人士。The Pew Research Center noted in a recent report that global religious persecution spiked from 2014 to 2015. 皮尤研究中心最近的一份报告指出，全球范围内的宗教迫害在2014到2015年间出现了大幅增加。好的，我们今天学习的词是 persecution, persecution, persecution…

title: safe zone
article: 今天我们要学的词是 safe zone. Safe zone 名词，安全区。Russia, Iran and Turkey have agreed to establish four safe zones across the northern, central and southern parts of Syria. 俄罗斯，伊朗和土耳其同意在叙利亚北部，中部和南部地区建立四个安全区。These safe zones are designed to offer refuge and humanitarian aid to displaced people fleeing violence. 建立这些安全区的设想是为逃离战乱流离失所的人提供安身之处和人道救援。好的，我们今天学习的词是 safe zone, safe zone, safe zone…

title: tax break
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tax break. Tax break 意思是减税优惠。District of Columbia lawmakers are considering to give first responders a big tax break if they live in the city. 华盛顿特区的立法人员正在考虑让住在特区的一线救援人员享受大额减税优惠。Warren Buffet said his company could get a tax break of over $9 billion just on its stock holdings of other companies if President Trump’s proposed corporate tax cut becomes law. 巴菲特说，如果川普总统的公司减税议案成为法律，自己公司光是因为在其他公司的持股就能享受90多亿美元的减税优惠。好的，我们今天学习的词是 tax break, tax break, tax break…

title: remains
article: 今天我们要学的词是 remains. Remains 名词，意思是遗骨。The remains of a sailor killed during the attack on Pearl Harbor nearly 76 years ago will be returned for burial on his family’s plot. 将近76年前在珍珠岛袭击中丧生的一名海军士兵的遗骨将被送回他的家族墓地进行安葬。A construction crew found the remains of at least 21 Soviet Red Army soldiers in eastern Germany. 一个施工队在德国东部发现了至少21名苏联红军士兵的遗骨。好的，我们今天学习的词是 remains, remains, remains…

title: misinformation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 misinformation. Misinformation 名词，错误信息。Facebook has given advice to its British users on how to identify misinformation online ahead of general elections next month. 英国下个月大选前夕，脸书向英国用户提供建议，教他们如何分辨虚假信息。此前，Facebook acknowledged that “malicious actors” had created “fake personas” to spread misinformation during last year’s U.S. presidential election. 脸书承认，去年美国大选期间，曾有恶意力量通过建立假账户散布虚假信息。好的，我们今天学习的词是 misinformation, misinformation, misinformation…

title: alternative
article: 今天我们要学的词是 alternative. Alternative 作为形容词，意思是另外的，可以用于替代的。Stephen Hawking predicts that planet Earth will only survive another 100 years, and it’s urgent to consider an alternative planet. 霍金预言，地球还能存活100年，人类急需寻找另外的星球。Chinese property developers are looking for alternative funding strategies in anticipation of further government measures to rein in housing prices. 鉴于中国政府可能为抑制房价出台更多政策，中国房地产开发商正在寻找另外的融资策略。好的，我们今天学习的词是 alternative, alternative, alternative…

title: ransomware
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ransomware. Ransomware 名词，勒索病毒。Ransomware is a malicious software that locks files on a computer and demands payments to unlock them. 勒索病毒是一种恶意软件，对电脑中的文件加密，受害者必须支付赎金才能解密文件。Ransomware known as WannaCry affected thousands of organizations in over 150 countries over the weekend. 一种名叫 WannaCry 的勒索病毒这个周末使150多个国家数以千计的机构受到影响。好的，我们今天学习的词是 ransomware, ransomware, ransomware…

title: warhead
article: 今天我们要学的词是 warhead. Warhead 名词，弹头。North Korea claimed a successful weekend launch of a medium long-range ballistic rocket that can carry a heavy nuclear warhead. 朝鲜声称，周末成功试射了可以携带重型核弹头的中远程导弹。A new Government Accountability Office report concludes that more funding is needed to update and maintain America’s nuclear warheads. 美国政府问责办公室的报告得出结论，要更新和维护美国的核弹头库存，需要增加拨款。好的，我们今天学习的词是 warhead, warhead, warhead…

title: unknown
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unknown. Unknown 形容词，未知的，鲜为人知的。French President Emmanuel Macron appointed a relatively unknown figure, Edouard Philippe, as his new Prime Minister. 法国总统马克龙任命没有多少人熟知的爱德华·菲利普出任法国总理。Scientists are baffled by a new mystery space signal from an unknown cosmic source. 一个不知源于宇宙何处的神秘太空信号让科学家们百思不得其解。好的，我们今天学习的词是 unknown, unknown, unknown…

title: tear down
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tear down. To tear down 意思是拆毁，推翻。Thousands of people rallied in Moscow to protest the plan to tear down Soviet-era apartment buildings. 数以千计的人在莫斯科集会，抗议拆除苏联时代公寓楼的计划。A statue of former Venezuelan dictator Hugo Chaves was torn down and smashed by angry protesters. 愤怒的抗议者将委内瑞拉前独裁领导人查韦斯的雕像推翻砸碎。好的，我们今天学习的词是 tear down, tear down, tear down…

title: press briefing
article: 今天我们要学的词是 press briefing. Press briefing 新闻发布会。President Trump indicated that he is considering cancelling the daily White House press briefing. 美国总统川普表示，他考虑取消白宫每天举行的例行新闻发布会。The president of the White House Correspondents’ Association said that cancelling future press briefings would “reduce accountability.” 白宫记者协会主席表示，取消新闻发布会将降低问责能力。好的，我们今天学习的词是 press briefing, press briefing, press briefing…

title: summon
article: 今天我们要学的词是 summon. Summon 作为动词，有召唤，召见的意思。The State Department summoned Turkish ambassador Serdar Kilic following violence between Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s guards and protesters in D.C. 土耳其总统埃尔多安的保镖和抗议者在华盛顿特区发生暴力冲突后，美国国务院召见了土耳其驻美大使克勒奇。President Trump summoned the Muslim world to confront “the crisis of Islamic extremism.” 美国总统川普号召穆斯林世界抗击伊斯兰极端主义危机。好的，我们今天学习的词是 summon, summon, summon…

title: commencement
article: 今天我们要学的词是 commencement. Commencement 毕业典礼。More than 100 Notre Dame graduates walked out on Sunday as Vice President Mike Pence began his address at their commencement ceremony. 美国副总统彭斯星期天在圣母诺特丹大学的毕业典礼上发表讲话，100多名毕业生离席以示抗议。Oprah Winfrey was the commencement speaker at the Smith college graduation. 奥普拉·温弗瑞是史密斯大学邀请的毕业演讲嘉宾。好的，我们今天学习的词是 commencement, commencement, commencement…

title: directive
article: 今天我们要学的词是 directive. Directive 作为名词，有指令的意思。Criminal defense lawyers are concerned about a new Department of Justice directive instructing federal prosecutors to seek the most serious charges possible.刑事辩护律师对美国司法部的一项新指令感到担忧，该指令要求联邦检察官对嫌疑人寻求最严厉的指控。The European Council recently adopted a directive on control of the acquisition and possession of weapons. 欧洲委员会最近采纳新指令，对获取和持有武器加强管控。好的，我们今天学习的词是 directive, directive, directive…

title: action plan
article: 今天我们要学的词是 action plan. Action plan 行动计划。Greece and China signed a three-year action plan for joint projects. 希腊和中国签署了一份三年行动计划，开发合资项目。G20 health ministers agreed to work together to tackle issues such as the growing resistance to antibiotics and to start implementing action plans at the national level by the end of 2018. 20国集团的卫生部长一致同意，合作解决抗生素耐药性不断恶化等问题，各国还承诺在2018年年底前落实行动计划。好的，我们今天学习的词是 action plan, action plan, action plan…

title: donation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 donation. Donation 捐赠。Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates will make a combined $100 million donation to a World Bank fund for women entrepreneurs. 沙特阿拉伯和阿拉伯联合酋长国将联合向世界银行的一个女企业家基金会捐赠一亿美元。Australian businessman Andrew Forrest and his wife will give away a $400 million donation to fund a variety of social and medical causes. 澳大利亚企业家弗里斯特和夫人将捐出四亿美元，用于各种社会和医疗事业 。好的，我们今天学习的词是 donation, donation, donation…

title: wreath
article: 今天我们要学的词是 wreath. Wreath 名词，花圈。U.S. President Trump laid a wreath at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier on Memorial Day. 美国总统川普在阵亡将士纪念日当天向无名战士墓敬献了花圈。Rolling Thunder, with hundreds of motorcycle riders, held wreath-laying ceremonies at the World War Two Memorial and the Vietnam Veterans Memorial. 数以百计的“滚雷”摩托车手在二战纪念碑和越战老兵纪念碑敬献了花圈。好的，我们今天学习的词是 wreath, wreath, wreath…

title: thorny
article: 今天我们要学的词是 thorny. Thorny 形容词，棘手的。Russian President Vladimir Putin visited France to talk about Syria, the Ukrainian crisis and other thorny issues. 俄罗斯总统普京访问法国，讨论叙利亚，乌克兰危机和其他一些棘手问题。President Trump pushed for peace between Israelis and Palestinians, but avoided all the thorny details that have stymied peace efforts for decades. 川普总统推动以色列和巴勒斯坦人之间的和平，但是对几十年来阻碍和平努力的所有棘手细节避而不谈。好的，我们今天学习的词是 thorny, thorny, thorny…

title: justify
article: 今天我们要学的词是 justify. Justify 动词，有提出辩护的意思。Poland’s officials cited security concerns to justify a move to collect data on foreigners in the country. 波兰官员以安全考虑为由，为针对波兰境内外国人收集数据的做法提出辩护 。The former CIA director, John Brennan, said there were enough contacts between members of the Trump campaign and Moscow by last summer to justify the investigation by the FBI. 前美国中央情报局局长布伦南说，截止去年夏天川普竞选团队与莫斯科之间的接触，已足以让联邦调查局有理由就此展开调查了。好的，我们今天学习的词是 justify, justify, justify…

title: internal
article: 今天我们要学的词是 internal. Internal 形容词，内部的。Britain’s MI5 has begun an internal review of how it handled intelligence on the Manchester suicide bomber. 英国军情五处开始展开内部审查，看军情五处对所掌握的曼彻斯特自杀炸弹杀手的情报的处理方式是否得当。The Wisconsin Department of Corrections closed an internal unit which was responsible for investigating employee misconduct. 威斯康辛州惩教部关闭了一个负责调查工作人员不轨行为的内部单位。好的，我们今天学习的词是 internal, internal, internal…

title: foothold
article: 今天我们要学的词是 foothold. Foothold 名词，有据点，立足点的意思。The Philippines’ President Rodrigo Duterte has declared martial law in southern Philippines to contain efforts by ISIS to establish a permanent foothold. 为阻止伊斯兰国建立永久性据点，菲律宾总统杜特尔特在菲律宾南部宣布了戒严令。Israel is seeking U.S. support to prevent Iran from establishing a military foothold in Syria. 以色列寻求美国支持，阻止伊朗在叙利亚建立军事立足点。好的，我们今天学习的词是 foothold, foothold, foothold…

title: relocate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 relocate. Relocate 动词，有迁移，重新安置的意思。President Trump decided not to relocate the U.S. Embassy in Israel from Tel Aviv to Jerusalem, at least for now. 美国总统川普决定暂时不将美国驻以色列大使馆从特拉维夫迁往耶路撒冷，至少是目前这一阶段。Aetna, the third-largest health insurer in the U.S., is moving forward with plans to relocate its headquarters out of Connecticut. 美国第三大健康保险公司安泰公司着手落实将总部从康涅狄格州迁走的计划。好的，我们今天学习的词是 relocate, relocate, relocate…

title: friendly fire
article: 今天我们要学的词是 friendly fire. Friendly fire 友军炮火。At least 10 Philippine soldiers have been killed in a friendly fire incident in the city of Marawi. 至少有十名菲律宾士兵在马拉维的一次友军炮火误袭事件中丧生。The Defense Department is looking into the possibility that two service members were killed by friendly fire in eastern Afghanistan. 美国国防部正在调查两名军人在阿富汗东部丧生的事件，看他们是否死于友军炮火。好的，我们今天学习的词是 friendly fire, friendly fire, friendly fire…

title: blasphemy
article: 今天我们要学的词是 blasphemy. Blasphemy 是亵渎的意思。Denmark’s governing party changed its previous position and threw its support behind abolishing a blasphemy paragraph from the criminal law. 丹麦执政党改变立场，支持把刑法里有关亵渎罪的段落去除掉。Britain’s humanist, Stephen Fry, is under investigation for blasphemy in the Republic of Ireland. 英国人文主义者史蒂芬·弗莱在爱尔兰因亵渎罪接受调查。好的，我们今天学习的词是 blasphemy, blasphemy, blasphemy…

title: decriminalize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 decriminalize. To decriminalize 意思是非刑事化。The New Hampshire House of Representatives passed a bill to decriminalize possession of small amounts of marijuana. 新罕布什尔州众议院通过议案，少量持有大麻不再属于刑事犯罪。France’s Interior Minister said that the country would like to decriminalize marijuana possession by September. 法国内政部长说，法国希望能在九月份之前使持有大麻不再面临刑事处罚。好的，我们今天学习的词是 decriminalize, decriminalize, decriminalize…

title: patriotic
article: 今天我们要学的词是 patriotic. Patriotic 形容词，爱国的。Russian President Vladimir Putin admitted that “patriotic” hackers might have staged cyberattacks on their own against countries that had strained relations with Russia. 俄罗斯总统普京承认，“爱国”黑客可能自行针对跟俄罗斯关系紧张的国家发动过网络袭击。Former French presidential candidate Le Pen is asking her supporters for “patriotic loans” to fund her party’s campaign. 法国前总统候选人勒庞请求支持者为其所在政党的竞选活动提供“爱国贷款”。好的，我们今天学习的词是 patriotic, patriotic, patriotic…

title: testify
article: 今天我们要学的词是 testify。Testify 动词，意思是作证、证实。When Attorney General Jeff Sessions testifies before the Senate Intelligence Committee, it will be in a hearing that is open to the public. 司法部长杰夫·塞申斯将向参议院情报委员会作证，这会是一场面向公众开放的听证会。The former director of the FBI, James Comey, testified on Capitol Hill, shedding light on the circumstances that led to his controversial firing by US President Donald Trump. 前联邦调查局局长詹姆斯·科米在国会山作证，阐明了导致美国总统川普颇有争议解雇他的情形。好的，我们今天学习的词是 testify, testify, testify…

title: on hold
article: 今天我们要学的词是on hold。On hold 意思是暂时保留、搁置。The parts of Trump’s executive order that prevent people from entering the US remain on hold. 川普的行政令中阻止人们进入美国境内的那部分依旧是被暂时保留的状态。The US president said he did not want to visit Britain if there would be large-scale protests and his remarks in effect put the visit on hold for some time. 美国总统表示，他不想在有大规模抗议时访问英国，他的话实际上将使这趟访问搁置一段时间。好的，我们今天学习的词是on hold, on hold, on hold…

title: expand
article: 今天我们要学的词是expand。Expand动词，意思是扩大、发展。German grocery chain Aldi said it would invest $3.4 billion to expand its U.S. store base to 2,500 by 2022. 德国连锁超市阿尔迪表示，将投资34亿美元，在2022年前使其在美国的店面数量基础扩大到2500家。The Tanzania Ports Authority signed a $154 million contract with China Harbor Engineering Company to expand the nation’s main port Dar es Salaam. 坦桑尼亚港务局与中国港湾工程有限责任公司签订一份价值1.54亿美元的合同，来扩大该国的主要港口达累斯萨拉姆。好的，我们今天学习的词是expand, expand, expand…

title: riveting
article: 今天我们要学的词是riveting。Riveting形容词，意思是吸引人的、引人入胜的 。Despite fans’ doubts and fears going in, the 2017 French Open turned out to be a riveting, satisfying spectacle. 尽管网球迷们存有疑虑和恐慌，2017法网公开赛还是一场引人入胜、令人心满意足的表演。US Representative Emanuel Cleaver describes Comey’s testimony as “riveting”. 美国国会众议院议员克里弗用“引人入胜”来形容科米的证词。好的，我们今天学习的词是riveting, riveting, riveting…

title: overwhelmingly
article: 今天我们要学的词是overwhelmingly。Overwhelmingly副词，意思是压倒性的、占绝对优势的 。Puerto Ricans overwhelmingly voted for U.S. statehood for their island in a non-binding referendum. 在一场没有法律约束力的全民公投中，波多黎各人以压倒性的票数投票赞成让他们的岛成为美国的州。Starring Israeli Gal Gadot as the Amazonian warrior princess, “Wonder Woman” is the rare female-led film in an overwhelmingly male superhero landscape. 电影《神奇女侠》中以色列女星盖儿·加朵主演亚马逊战斗民族的公主，这在由男性占绝对优势的超级英雄世界里，是罕见的由女性领衔的电影。好的，我们今天学习的词是overwhelmingly, overwhelmingly, overwhelmingly…

title: identify
article: 今天我们要学的词是identify。Identify动词，意思是确定、识别。James T. Hodgkinson, the man identified as shooting a Republican member of congress and four others, was a small business owner in Illinois. 詹姆斯·霍奇金森被确定为是枪击一名共和党籍国会议员和其他四人的凶手，他是伊利诺伊州的一名小企业主。A police commander, Stuart Cundy, called the apartment building fire London’s worst “in many, many years” and said it would be “a long operation” to locate and identify the victims. 警方主管斯图尔特·坎迪说这场公寓楼火灾是伦敦“很多很多年来”最严重的一次，他说要找到所有受害者并识别他们的身份将是一个“长期行动”。好的，我们今天学习的词是identify, identify, identify…

title: unity
article: 今天我们要学的词是unity。Unity名词，意思是团结、一致。Trump calls for unity after a republican congressman was shot at a baseball field. 一名共和党籍国会议员在棒球场遭到枪击后，川普呼吁大家团结一致。As terror-hit Borough market reopens, the people in London have come together in unity. 发生了恐怖袭击的巴罗市场重新开放，伦敦人团结一致凝聚在一起。好的，我们今天学习的词是unity, unity, unity…

title: connect
article: 今天我们要学的词是connect。Connect动词，意思是联系、关联。On Twitter, Donald Trump Jr. connected the shooting to the recent controversy over a version of the play “Julius Caesar” that features the assassination of a ruler who resembles Donald Trump. 小唐纳德·川普在推特上将枪击事件和最近由改版戏剧《凯撒大帝》引发的争议事件联系起来，这部剧主要演绎的是行刺一名长得很像唐纳德·川普的统治者。Michelle Carter, 20, is on trial on a charge of involuntary manslaughter that is connected with the death of her boyfriend Conrad Roy III. 20岁的米歇尔·卡特因为过失杀人的指控接受审判，此项罪名与她的男友康拉德·罗伊的死亡相关联。好的，我们今天学习的词是connect, connect, connect…

title: review
article: 今天我们要学的词是review。Review动词，意思是回顾、查阅。Dr. Peter Breggin, who did not treat Michelle Carter, told Bristol County Juvenile Court Judge Lawrence Moniz that he reached his conclusions after reviewing Carter’s educational records, text messages and police files. 彼得·布利金医生并不是米歇尔·卡特的治疗医生，他对布里斯托郡少年法庭法官劳伦斯·莫尼兹说，他是在查阅了卡特的教育历史、短信以及警察的档案后得出的结论。Trump’s Justice Department has asked the Supreme Court to review the travel ban matter. 川普政府的司法部已经向最高法院要求重新审阅旅行禁令。好的，我们今天学习的词是review, review, review…

title: candidate
article: 今天我们要学的词是candidate。Candidate名词，意思是候选人、应试者。Tom Perriello shook hands with Lt. Gov. Ralph Northam at the start of the first debate of Virginia’s Democratic candidates for governor. 在维吉尼亚州州长选举的民主党候选人首场辩论开场时，汤姆·派瑞罗与副州长拉夫·诺沙姆握了握手。India’s ruling party has announced its candidate for the presidential election. 印度的执政党宣布了他们将要参与总统选举的候选人。好的，我们今天学习的词是candidate, candidate, candidate…

title: evacuate
article: 今天我们要学的词是evacuate。Evacuate is spelled e-v-a-c-u-a-t-e, evacuate. Evacuate动词，意思是疏散、撤退。Rescuers searching for more than 90 people missing after a huge landslide in southwest China were ordered to evacuate due to the risk of another landslide. 中国西南部发生大型山体滑坡，寻找失踪的90余人的搜救人员收到撤退的命令，因为存在再次发生山体滑坡的风险。As water levels on the Kings River in California begin to recede, some evacuated residents began to assess the damage left behind by flooding days ago. 随着位于加州的国王河的水位开始下降，一些被疏散的居民开始评估几天前的洪涝灾害造成的损失。好的，我们今天学习的词是evacuate, evacuate, evacuate…

title: hospitalize
article: 今天我们要学的词是hospitalize。Hospitalize动词，意思是就医、把某人送进医院治疗。British Queen Elizabeth II’s 96-year-old husband, Prince Philip the Duke of Edinburgh, was hospitalized in London to receive treatment for an infection. 英国女王伊丽莎白二世96岁的丈夫爱丁堡公爵菲利普亲王在伦敦被送入医院，接受感染治疗。House Majority Whip Steve Scalise continues to be hospitalized after the shooting on June 14th. 国会众议院多数党党鞭史蒂夫·斯卡利斯在6月14日遭遇枪击后，现在仍在住院治疗。好的，我们今天学习的词是hospitalize, hospitalize, hospitalize…

title: scandal
article: 今天我们要学的词是scandal。Scandal名词，意思是丑闻、流言蜚语。After six months of scandals and public relations crises, Uber CEO Travis Kalanick resigned. 经历了六个月的丑闻和公关危机后，优步公司首席执行官特拉维斯·卡兰尼克辞职了。According to an auditor’s report, state companies at the heart of Mozambique’s debt scandal failed to account for at least a quarter of more than $2 billion in questionable loans. 一份审计报告显示，处于莫桑比克债务危机中心的国有公司无法就至少一个季度中20多亿的争议性贷款做出合理解释。 好的，我们今天学习的词是scandal, scandal, scandal…

title: predecessor
article: 今天我们要学的词是predecessor。Predecessor名词，意思是前任、前辈。President Donald Trump continued to blast his predecessor, former President Barack Obama for his response to alleged Russian interference in the 2016 election in a series of tweets. 美国总统唐纳德·川普继续通过一系列推文来抨击他的前任巴拉克·奥巴马，批评奥巴马对2016年总统大选中据称是俄罗斯干扰的回应。好的，我们今天学习的词是predecessor, predecessor, predecessor…

title: diagnose with
article: 今天我们要学的词组是diagnose with。Diagnose with，意思是确诊患有。 The Philippine Department of Health reported that in April 2017, 629 persons, most of whom are millennials, were diagnosed with the Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV). 据菲律宾卫生部报告，2017年4月该国有629人被确诊感染艾滋病毒（人体免疫缺损病毒），其中大部分为千禧一代。好的，我们今天学习的词是diagnose with, diagnose with, diagnose with…

title: dignity
article: 今天我们要学的词是dignity。Dignity名词，意思是尊严、威严。At least three GOP senators used Twitter to blast President Trump’s attack on the hosts of MSNBC’s “Morning Joe”, saying the insults were “beneath the dignity” of the office of the president. 至少有三名共和党籍国会参议员在推特上抨击了川普总统对MSNBC电视新闻频道《早安，乔》节目主持人的攻击，称川普对他们的侮辱有失总统办公室的尊严。 The Russian Foreign Minister said Russia will “react with dignity” if the US takes military action to prevent what it says could be a chemical attack by Syrian government forces. 俄罗斯外长表示，如果美国采取军事行动来阻止美方认为可能由叙利亚政府军进行的化学袭击，那么俄方会“有尊严的回应”。好的，我们今天学习的词是dignity, dignity, dignity…

title: partnership
article: 今天我们要学的词是partnership。Partnership名词，意思是合伙关系、伙伴关系。Nike CEO Mark Parker has confirmed the company is currently testing out a partnership with Amazon. 耐克公司首席执行官马克·帕克证实，其公司正在与亚马逊测试合伙关系。 Software company OpenDataSoft and GPS navigation software company Waze announced a partnership that promises quicker commutes and better transit planning. 软件公司OpenDataSoft和移动导航软件位智宣布合伙，承诺提供更快捷的通勤和更优化的交通规划。好的，我们今天学习的词是partnership, partnership, partnership…

title: assail
article: 今天我们要学的词是assail。Assail动词，意思是 抨击、质问 。Women’s health advocates have assailed the plans put forward by congressional Republicans to replace the Affordable Care Act, saying they would cause harm to half the adult population. 女性健康的倡导者们抨击了由国会共和党人提出的替代《平价医疗法案》的方案，他们说这些方案会给一半成年人口造成伤害。In India, critics assailed a government proposal to build 100 waste-fueled power plants, saying the plan is against the nation’s efforts to cut air pollution. 在印度，批评人士抨击了政府就建造100座垃圾焚烧发电厂的提议，称这个计划违背了印度减少空气污染的努力。好的，我们今天学习的词是assail, assail, assail…

title: curb
article: 今天我们要学的词是curb。Curb动词，意思是 抑制、控制 。Trump’s remarks of no more patience with the North Korean regime show that he is growing increasingly frustrated with the lack of progress in curbing North Korea’s nuclear and ballistic missile programs. 川普称对朝鲜不再有耐心的讲话，体现了他对于在控制朝鲜核与弹道导弹项目上缺乏进展，而愈发感到失意。Google is making increasing efforts to curb gun violence, with a $2 million grant to benefit prevention programs in cities across the country. 谷歌正在为控制枪支暴力做出更多努力，拨款两百万援助全美各个城市阻止枪支暴力的项目。 好的，我们今天学习的词是curb, curb, curb…

title: plummet
article: 今天我们要学的词是plummet。Plummet动词，意思是大幅下跌、骤然跌落 。US crude oil prices plummeted, as news of a rise in US oil production weighed heavily on the commodity. 美国产油量增加的新闻对大宗商品造成很大影响，因此美国原油价格大跌。Malaysia remains two spots ahead of Singapore in the latest FIFA rankings, but both nations plummeted on the most recent list below Myanmar, Bhutan and the Solomon Islands. 在最新的国际足联排行中，马来西亚仍比新加坡靠前两位，不过这两个国家的最新排名都直线下跌，排在了缅甸、不丹和所罗门群岛之后。 好的，我们今天学习的词是plummet, plummet, plummet…

title: mix up
article: 今天我们要学的词是mix-up。Mix-up名词，意思是混淆、搞错 。Chinese scholars slammed White House aides after their mix-up of the People’s Republic of China and the Republic of China, which Beijing does not acknowledge. 中国学者猛烈抨击白宫助理，他们把中华人民共和国与北京方面不承认主权的中华民国弄混了。The University of Eastern Finland has received dozens of complaints over a mix-up in which 71 applicants were mistakenly informed that they had been granted admission to a teacher training course. 东芬兰大学收到了几十份投诉，因为学校弄混了，错误告知71名申请者他们被一个教师培训课程录取。好的，我们今天学习的词是 mix-up, mix-up, mix-up…

title: stir
article: 今天我们要学的词是stir。Stir名词，意思是轰动、骚动。When Ivnaka Trump sat in on behalf of her father during a working session at the Group of 20 Summit, her presence caused a stir among Trump critics on social media. 当伊万卡·川普在20国集团峰会的一个工作会议期间代替她的父亲坐在了椅子上时，她的出席在社交媒体上的川普批评者中引发了骚动。An episode of the reality TV show “Live PD” which showed a suspect struggling with an officer even as he held his daughter created a stir among audiences. 真人电视节目“Live PD”的一集中，放映了一名嫌疑人与一名警官搏斗，手中还抱着他的女儿，这在观众当中制造了骚动。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 stir, stir, stir…

title: paranoia
article: 今天我们要学的词是paranoia。Paranoia名词，意思是疑虑、恐惧。Both of America’s primary rivals, China and Russia, have been taking advantage of Pakistan’s paranoia about India, and gaps in Washington’s regional policy, to expand their sphere of influence. 美国的两大主要竞争对手中国和俄罗斯，都在利用巴基斯坦对印度的恐惧以及华盛顿方面对该地区政策的缺失，来扩大他们的影响范围。Paranoia in Zimbabwe has soared as its intelligence apparatus increases surveillance on its own ruling Zanu-PF party and government officials. 随着津巴布韦情报机构加强对其执政党非洲民族联盟-爱国阵线和政府官员的监控，该国官员的疑虑也与日俱增。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 paranoia, paranoia, paranoia…

title: liberate
article: 今天我们要学的词是liberate。Liberate动词，意思是解放、释放 。The entire city of Mosul has been liberated from ISIS, Iraqi Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi announced from the war-torn city. 伊拉克总理海德尔·阿巴迪在这个饱受战争之苦的城市宣布，摩苏尔全城已被从“伊斯兰国”手中解放出来。Yemeni army forces on June 28th liberated al-Mukhadara district in Marib, a Houthi-held province east of the capital city Sanaa. 6月28日，也门军队解放了马里布省的穆卡达拉地区，这是首都萨那以东由胡塞反叛组织控制的省份。 好的，我们今天学习的词是liberate, liberate, liberate…

title: impoverished
article: 今天我们要学的词是impoverished。Impoverished形容词，意思是贫困的、枯竭的 。North Korea, desperate for foreign currency, has sent tens of thousands of its impoverished citizens to cities and towns across Russia to work at construction sites. 迫切需要外汇的朝鲜派遣了成千上万名贫困潦倒的本国公民到俄罗斯各地城镇，在建筑工地务工。The two Yemeni military sources said many newly-recruited pro-government soldiers were injured in the latest car bomb attack in the impoverished Arab country. 两名也门军队的知情人员表示，这个贫困阿拉伯国家最近一次发生的汽车炸弹袭击，导致许多新招的支持政府的士兵受伤。好的，我们今天学习的词是impoverished, impoverished, impoverished…

title: laureate
article: 今天我们要学的词是laureate。Laureate名词，意思是得奖者、获奖者 。Chinese dissident and Nobel Peace Prize laureate Liu Xiaobo died of liver cancer on medical parole at 61. 中国异议人士、诺贝尔和平奖获得者刘晓波在保外就医期间死于肝癌，终年61岁。The Tang Prize Foundation extended its condolences to the family of William Theodore de Bary, last year’s sinology prize laureate, who passed away at his home in New York. 唐奖基金会向去年汉学奖得主狄培理的家人致以了哀悼，他在位于纽约家中去世。好的，我们今天学习的词是laureate, laureate, laureate…

title: fatally
article: 今天我们要学的词是fatally。Fatally副词，意思是致命的、毁灭性的。A woman was fatally shot by a Minneapolis police officer after she called 911 to report a possible assault near her home just before midnight.一名女性在半夜十二点前拨打911，报告一起发生在她家附近的疑似袭击事件，之后她遭到了一名明尼阿波利斯警官的致命枪击。A fisherman was fatally injured by a whale off New Brunswick, Canada, shortly after helping untangled it from fishlines. 一名渔民在加拿大新不伦瑞克省海岸受到一头鲸鱼的致命伤害。而就在不久前，他在帮助解开了困住这条鲸鱼的钓鱼线。好的，我们今天学习的词是fatally, fatally, fatally…

title: approval rating
article: 今天我们要学的词组是approval rating。Approval rating，意思是满意度、认可率 。A new poll has found, only 36% of Americans approve of President Trump’s performance in the Oval Office, which gives Trump the lowest approval rating at the six-month mark of any president in 70 years. 一份新的民调发现，只有36%的美国人认可川普总统在总统办公室的表现，这使川普成为70年来所有总统中任职六个月时满意度最低的一位。Amidst an ongoing battle against ISIS-linked militants in the south of the country, and accusations of human rights abuses, Philipphines President Rodrigo Duterte has experienced a boost in his approval rating, according to a new survey. 根据一份新的调查显示，在菲律宾南部持续进行的一场与伊斯兰国有联系的武装分子的战斗，和践踏人权的指控中，该国人民对总统罗德里戈·杜特尔特的满意度提高了。好的，我们今天学习的词组是approval rating, approval rating, approval rating …

title: cameo
article: 今天我们要学的词是cameo。Cameo名词，意思是电影、戏剧中的配角、小角色 。Pop star Ed Sheeran’s brief performance, during his cameo in the season premier of “Game of Thrones”, has divided fans on social media. 流行明星艾德·希兰在影视剧《冰与火之歌》本季首集中作为配角的短暂演出，使社交媒体上他的粉丝们意见出现分歧。The sequel to the box office hit “Wonder Woman” may feature a cameo from the original Wonder Woman actress Lynda Carter. 卖座电影《神奇女侠》的续集影片可能会有一个小角色，由最初扮演神奇女侠的演员琳达·卡特出演。好的，我们今天学习的词是cameo, cameo, cameo…

title: parole
article: 今天我们要学的词是parole。Parole名词，意思是假释、有条件释放 。O.J. Simpson has been granted parole after nine years in prison for a robbery in Las Vegas, a group of four Nevada commissioners decided on July 20th. 7月20日由四名内华达州假释委员会委员组成的小组裁定，批准O.J.辛普森假释，他因为一起发生在拉斯维加斯的抢劫案已经服刑九年。A taxi driver was stabbed five times in the face in Rochester NY, and the man accused is currently on parole for a 2011 robbery. 在罗彻斯特，一名出租车司机脸上被人砍了五刀，被告因为2011年的一起抢劫案正在假释中。 好的，我们今天学习的词是parole, parole, parole…

title: sweltering
article: 今天我们要学的词是sweltering。Sweltering形容词，意思是闷热的、酷热的。Besides the eight undocumented immigrants that were found dead inside a sweltering truck in San Antonio, two more people who had been hospitalized have died, making it one of the deadliest human smuggling cases in recent history. 除了在圣安东尼奥一辆闷热卡车里发现的八名已经死亡的无证移民外，另有两人在入院就医后死亡，使这成为了近来历史上死亡最惨重的人口走私案件之一。St. Louis will install temporary air conditioners in a sweltering city jail after temperatures in the city topped 100 degrees Fahrenheit, triggering protests outside the prison. 圣路易斯将在酷热的城市监狱里安装临时空调，此前该城市温度达到100华氏度（约38摄氏度），在监狱外引发了抗议活动。 好的，我们今天学习的词是sweltering, sweltering, sweltering…

title: at large
article: 今天我们要学的词组是at large。At large，意思是逍遥法外的，未被俘获的。Police in northern Switzerland are conducting a manhunt for an attacker who injured five people, including at least one seriously, , and warned the public that the man at large is “dangerous”. 警察正在瑞士北部追捕一名袭击者，他用电锯伤害了五人，其中至少一人伤势严重，警察还警告民众这名在逃的袭击者是“危险的”。Las Vegas police said, two people were shot on the morning of July 24th at an eastern valley casino, and the shooter is at large. 拉斯维加斯警方表示，7月24日上午有两人在位于东部的一家赌场遭到枪击，枪手还没有被俘获。 好的，我们今天学习的词组是at large, at large, at large…

title: in remission
article: 今天我们要学的词组是in remission。In remission，意思是缓解期、有所缓解。A 9-year-old South African child diagnosed with HIV when he was 1 month old has been in HIV remission for 8½ years, without regular treatment. 南非一个9岁的孩子在出生一个月时被诊断携有艾滋病病毒，8年半后，在没有常规治疗的情况下，他的艾滋病病毒仍处于缓解期。An exciting therapy for leukemia once again shows its efficacy – this time, nearly 71% of terminal leukemia patients saw their tumors in remission following the clinical trial. 一项令人兴奋的白血病疗法再一次显现了其功效，这一次，近71%的白血病晚期患者在接受临床试验后发现他们的肿瘤缓解了。 好的，我们今天学习的词组是in remission, in remission, in remission…

title: startled
article: 今天我们要学的词是startled。Startled形容词，意思是震惊的、受惊吓的。One week after an unarmed Australian woman was shot and killed by a police officer in Minneapolis, street signs criticizing “easily startled” police have popped up in the Twin Cities. 一名手无寸铁的澳大利亚女性，被一名明尼阿波利斯警察枪杀，一周后，双子城就突然出现了批评“容易受到惊吓的”警察的街道指示牌。A new report claims the Minneapolis police officer who shot and killed the Australian woman was “startled” not only by a loud noise, but also because she was allegedly running toward his car. 一份新报告称，枪杀了这名澳大利亚女性的明尼阿波利斯警察当时不仅是被一声巨响“惊吓”，另一个原因是据称受害者当时跑向了他的车。好的，我们今天学习的词是startled, startled, startled…

title: normalcy
article: 今天我们要学的词是normalcy。 Normalcy正常状态。美国著名流行歌星迈克尔.杰克逊突然去世后，”The Jackson family is trying to give Michael’s three children a sense of normalcy,” 杰克逊的家人努力让迈克尔三个孩子的生活保持正常。美国南卡罗来纳州州长桑福德为情出走，跑到阿根廷去会情人的丑闻上星期曝光。”As her husband’s affair exploded nationwide, Jenny Sanford and their four sons stayed on Sullivan’s Island, striving for normalcy,” 丈夫的婚外恋丑闻在全国曝光后，桑福德的妻子詹尼带着四个儿子待在所罗门岛上，设法维持生活的常态。好的，今天我们学习的词是normalcy…

title: rein in
article: 今天我们要学的词组是rein in。Rein in，意思是控制、放慢。Trump administration officials urged China and other nations to band together to confront North Korea over its nuclear and ballistic-missile ambitions, with Vice President Mike Pence declaring “all options are on the table” to rein in Pyongyang. 川普政府官员敦促中国和其他国家团结起来，控制朝鲜在核与弹道导弹方面的野心，与此同时副总统彭斯宣称为了控制朝鲜，“一切选择都在讨论范围之内”。At a conference on financial regulation convened by President Xi Jinping in July, policy makers pledged to rein in corporate borrowing and said that preventing systemic risk was an “eternal theme”. 七月，在中国主席习近平召集的一场有关金融监管的会议上，决策者们承诺要控制企业贷款，并表示预防系统性风险是“永恒的主题”。好的，我们今天学习的词组是rein in, rein in, rein in…

title: dangling
article: 今天我们要学的词是dangling。Dangling形容词，意思是悬挂的、摇摆的。Dozens of people were left dangling high above the Rhine River when the wheels of a cable car came off their guiding line in Cologne, Germany. 在德国科隆，一辆缆车的轮子脱离了轨道，导致数十人被高高地悬挂在莱茵河上空。 A dangling tractor-trailer on a overpass in Tampa, FL shut down the southbound lanes from Interstate 4 to Interstate 275, and likely caused plenty of drivers to grip their steering wheel a little tighter. 一辆悬挂在坦帕市天桥上的拖拉机导致从州际4号公路到州际275号公路之间向南行驶的道路关闭，很可能也让很多司机把方向盘握得更紧了。好的，我们今天学习的词是dangling, dangling, dangling…

title: flex muscle
article: 今天我们要学的词组是flex muscle。Flex muscle，意思是炫耀武力、展示力量。China flexed military muscle with more than 100 planes flying overhead and almost 600 types of weaponry on display to celebrate the 90th anniversary of the People’s Liberation Army. 为庆祝人民解放军建军90年，中国展示其军事力量，逾百架飞机从头顶飞过，并展出近600种武器。The US flexed its muscle by flying two bombers over the Korean peninsula “in direct response” to North Korea’s announcement that it conducted another test of an intercontinental ballistic missile. 美国派出两架轰炸机飞跃朝鲜半岛以炫耀武力，这是对朝鲜宣布其再一次进行了洲际弹道导弹测试的“直接回应”。好的，我们今天学习的词组是flex muscle, flex muscle, flex muscle…

title: strike a deal
article: 今天我们要学的词组是strike a deal。Strike a deal，意思是成交、达成协议。Los Angeles has struck a deal with the International Olympic Committee to host the 2028 Summer Olympics, according to a spokeswoman for the L.A. City Council. 据洛杉矶市政府一名发言人称，洛杉矶和国际奥委会达成协议，将主办2028年夏季奥运会。Swedish music streaming company Spotify is close to striking a new licensing deal with Warner Music, the last big music royalty agreement it needs before pushing ahead with a U.S. stock market listing. 瑞典音乐流媒体公司Spotify很快就将与华纳音乐达成一项新的授权交易，这是该公司推动在美国上市前需要的最后一份大型的音乐版权税协议。好的，我们今天学习的词组是strike a deal, strike a deal, strike a deal…

title: overdraft
article: 今天我们要学的词是overdraft。Overdraft名词，意思是透支 。In 2016, US consumers paid a total of $15 billion in overdraft fees – which is when a customer tries to make a purchase without enough money in their account to cover the transaction – according to new data released by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau. 根据美国消费者金融保护局发布的新数据，2016年美国消费者总共支付150亿美元的透支费用，这是当顾客购物而账户中没有足够进行这项交易的数额时产生的费用。 Earlier in July, one of the UK’s largest lender, Lloyds, said it was getting rid of unarranged overdraft fees altogether starting in November. 七月早些时候，英国最大借贷商之一劳埃德银行表示，将从11月起完全取消非约定透支的费用。好的，我们今天学习的词是overdraft, overdraft, overdraft…

title: gridlock
article: 今天我们要学的词是gridlock。Gridlock名词，意思是僵局、交通堵塞 。The office of former president Barack Obama continues to respond to wedding invitations – even though he’s left the White House. Apparently mail forwarding is one government function that has avoided Washington gridlock. 尽管前总统巴拉克·奥巴马已经离开白宫，他的办公室仍在继续回复人们的婚礼邀请。很显然，邮件转递服务是一个避开了华盛顿僵局的政府职能。 As the Aug. 21 solar eclipse approaches, South Carolina public safety officials urge traffic safety and brace for road gridlock. 随着8月21日日全食的临近，南卡罗来纳州公共安全官员敦促人们注意交通安全，并为道路堵塞做准备。好的，我们今天学习的词是gridlock, gridlock, gridlock…

title: motivated by
article: 今天我们要学的词组是motivated by。Motivated by，意思是受某事的驱使。Neymar says the decision to leave Barcelona was “one of the toughest” of his life after completing a world-record move to Paris Saint-Germain and has insisted his move was not motivated by money. 在打破世界纪录转会巴黎圣日尔曼俱乐部后，内马尔称离开巴萨是他一生中“最艰难的”决定之一，并简称他的转会并不是受金钱的驱使。 A recent Harris Poll survey reveals 33 percent of Millennials say having a yard for their dog motivated them to buy their first home, compared to only 25 percent of millennial homeowners who said they were motivated by their marriage. 一份近期的哈里斯民调显示，33%的千禧一代称，想要给宠物狗一个后院促使他们购买了第一套房子，而仅有25%的千禧一代房主是受到婚姻的驱使。好的，我们今天学习的词组是motivated by, motivated by, motivated by…

title: asylum seeker
article: 今天我们要学的词组是asylum seeker。Asylum seeker，意思是寻求避难者 。Olympic Stadium in Montreal, Canada has opened its doors as a temporary shelter to a growing number of asylum seekers who have fled the US and come to Canada. 加拿大蒙特利尔开放了奥林匹克体育场馆，让越来越多的寻求避难者在逃离美国来到加拿大时用作临时的避难所。 According to a report in the Independent, earlier this year, Donald Trump told the Prime Minister of Australia that he hates taking in asylum seekers, adding “I guarantee you they are bad”. 据《独立报》一篇报道称，今年早些时候，唐纳德·川普告诉澳大利亚总理，他厌恶接收寻求避难的人，并补充说“我向你保证，他们都很坏”。好的，我们今天学习的词组是asylum seeker, asylum seeker, asylum seeker…

title: VPN
article: 今天我们要学的词是VPN。VPN，意思是虚拟私人网络 。Russian President Vladimir Putin has signed a bill that prohibits services, including VPNs, that enable users to avoid government censorship efforts. 俄罗斯总统普京签署了一项法案，禁止包括虚拟私人网络在内的服务，这些服务使用户可以绕开政府的审查。 The Chinese government’s crackdown on the internet continues with the news that Apple has removed all major VPN apps from the App Store in China. 中国政府对互联网的管理仍在继续，报道指出苹果公司从中国的苹果应用商店撤下了所有主要的虚拟私人网络服务应用程序。好的，我们今天学习的词是VPN, VPN, VPN…

title: ram
article: 今天我们要学的词是ram。Ram作为动词，意思是撞击、冲撞。维吉尼亚小镇夏洛茨维尔发生一起恐怖袭击事件。An Ohio man accused of ramming his car into a crowd of protestors at a white nationalist rally in Virginia will remain in jail without bail. 在维吉尼亚白人优越主义集会中开车冲撞示威人群的俄亥俄州男子将被关在监狱，不得保释。伦敦骑助力车犯罪率在过去几年直线上升。The robbers use a moped to ram another bike off the road, attacks the victim and steals phones, watches, jewelry and money. 这些强盗使用助力车撞向另一辆车，对受害者进行攻击，并抢去手机、手表、珠宝或者现金。好的，我们今天学习的词是ram, ram, ram…

title: lay out
article: 今天我们要学的词是lay out。Lay out，意思是布置，编排。美国现在正在为升级的朝鲜问题头疼。 As President Donald Trump focuses on “fire and fury” towards North Korea, Secretary of State Rex Tillerson and Secretary of Defense Jim Mattis have laid out the US’s comprehensive approach to deal with the country. 川普总统宣称要用“烈焰和怒火”应对朝鲜的同时，国务卿蒂勒森和国防部长马蒂斯安排勒美国全面应对朝鲜的策略。 好的，我们今天学习的词是lay out, lay out, lay out…

title: e commerce
article: 今天我们要学的词是e-commerce。E-commerce, 意思是电子商务。Facebook is stepping up its modest moves into e-commerce by expanding its service for connecting local buyers and sellers into 17 new European markets. 脸书将其服务扩展到17个新的欧洲市场，连接当地买家和卖家，以此加强自己的电子商务业务。美国的各大超市都希望在电子商务领域取得突破。Target’s e-commerce grew 22% last quarter, below the growth enjoyed by Walmart and Amazon. 塔吉特上个季度的电子商务业绩上涨了22%，不如沃尔玛和亚马逊的业绩上涨。好的，我们今天学习的词是e-commerce, e-commerce, e-commerce…

title: longstanding
article: 今天我们要学的词是longstanding。Longstanding, 意思是长期的。川普总统下令要求其贸易代表办公室对中国侵犯知识产权的政策进行调查。China’s policy of forcing foreign companies to turn over technology to Chinese joint venture partners has been a longstanding problems for several US. Administrations. 中国政府迫使外国公司必须向中国合作方交出核心技术的政策是困扰好几届美国政府的长期问题。Despite longstanding local opposition, the US is expanding its Okinawa military base. 尽管当地长期的反对声音，美国仍将扩大其在日本冲绳的军事基地。好的，我们今天学习的词是longstanding, longstanding, longstanding…

title: denounce
article: 今天我们要学的词是denounce。Denounce，意思是声讨，谴责。U.S President Donald Trump denounced the whites supremacists who staged the deadly rally in Charlottesville, Virginia on August 12th. 美国总统川普谴责制造了8月12日维吉尼亚夏洛茨维尔致命集会的白人至上主义者。美国很多城市的民众也进行集会，对此表示谴责。After street battles at a white supremacist demonstration in Virginia led to the death of a 32-year-old woman, hundreds converged on downtown Chicago to denounce hate groups. 在维吉尼亚白人至上主义集会的打斗造成一名32岁妇女死亡后，上百人走上芝加哥街头，谴责仇恨组织。好的，我们今天学习的词是denounce, denounce, denounce…

title: plow into
article: 今天我们要学的词组是plow into。Plow into，意思是大力撞击。 At least 13 people have died after a van plowed into pedestrians in the center of Barcelona on Aug 17th in what police said was a terrorist attack. 8月17日，一辆厢式货车撞入巴塞罗那市中心的行人中，至少13人丧生，警察称此次事件是恐怖袭击。The man suspected of plowing a car into a crowd of counter demonstrators at a white-nationalist rally is facing multiple charges, including second-degree murder. 那名在一场白人民族主义集会上开车撞入反对派抗议人群中的嫌疑男子面临多项指控，其中包括二级谋杀罪。 好的，我们今天学习的词是plow into, plow into, plow into…

title: feud
article: 今天我们要学的词是feud。Feud名词，意思是不和、争执。 President Trump attacked two Republican lawmakers, Sens. Lindsey Graham of South Carolina and Jeff Flake of Arizona in tweets, deepening his feud with members of his party. 川普总统在推特上攻击了两名共和党议员，分别是南卡罗来纳州的参议员林赛·格雷厄姆和亚利桑那州的参议员杰夫·弗莱克，这加深了他与共和党成员之间的不和。A political feud erupted when the Australian Foreign Minister accused New Zealand’s opposition Labor Party of conspiring to undermine the Australian government. 当澳大利亚外长指责新西兰反对党工党密谋要破坏澳大利亚政府时，两国爆发了政治上的争执。 好的，我们今天学习的词是feud, feud, feud…

title: commenmorate
article: 今天我们要学的词是commemorate。Commemorate动词，意思是庆祝、纪念。 U.S. President Donald Trump said it is “so foolish” for American cities to be removing statues commemorating Confederate generals and soldiers who fought on the losing side of the country’s 19th century Civil War. 美国总统唐纳德·川普表示美国城市移除纪念南方将领和士兵的雕塑“很愚蠢”，这些人生前在美国十九世纪的南北内战中为战败方效力。 Statues commemorating “comfort women” who were forced to work as sex slaves for Japanese soldiers in WWII were installed on five buses in Seoul, South Korea. 在韩国首尔，有五辆公交车上安装了雕塑来纪念“慰安妇”，她们在第二次世界大战期间被迫成为日本军人的性奴隶。 好的，我们今天学习的词是commemorate, commemorate, commemorate…

title: white supremacist
article: 今天我们要学的词组是white supremacist。White supremacist，意思是白人至上主义者 。Many of Charlottesville’s 47,000 residents blamed white supremacists for bringing violence to their normally quiet city, the home of the University of Virginia’s main campus. 夏洛茨维尔的四万七千居民中大部分都谴责白人至上主义者给他们这个通常很平静的城市带来了暴力，这里是维吉尼亚大学主校区所在地。Silicon Valley joined a backlash against neo-Nazi groups in the United States as more technology companies removed white supremacists from their services in response to the violence in Charlottesville, VA. 随着越来越多科技公司除名白人至上主义者，来回应发生在维吉尼亚州夏洛茨维尔的暴力事件，硅谷也加入到强力抵制美国的新纳粹组织中来。 好的，我们今天学习的词组是white supremacist, white supremacist white supremacist…

title: pardon
article: 今天我们要学的词是pardon。Pardon动词，意思是宽恕、赦免 。A U.S. backed Syrian group pardoned 96 alleged members of ISIS in what it said was an attempt to dissuade low-ranking ISIS members from pledging allegiance to the terror group. 一个由美国支持的叙利亚组织赦免了据信是伊斯兰国的成员共96名，该组织称此举是阻止低级别伊斯兰国成员为该恐怖组织效忠的一个尝试。A group of Arizona Democrats urged President Donald Trump not to pardon former Maricopa County Sheriff Joe Arpaio. 一群亚利桑那州民主党人敦促总统唐纳德·川普不要赦免前马里考帕郡警长乔·阿帕约。好的，我们今天学习的词是pardon, pardon, pardon…

title: disgruntled
article: 今天我们要学的词是disgruntled。Disgruntled形容词，意思是不满的、不高兴的。A “disgruntled employee” held hostages on Aug. 24th after shooting one person at a restaurant in downtown Charleston, South Carolina, official said. 有官员称，8月24日在南卡罗来纳州查尔斯顿市中心的一家餐馆里，一名“不满的员工”在枪击一人后挟持了人质。The 26-year-old man accused of shooting the owner of the popular restaurant Zanzibar in Cleveland, Ohio was a disgruntled employee, the owner said. 据俄亥俄州克利夫兰一家备受欢迎的餐馆Zanzibar的店主称，那名被指控在这家餐馆枪击店主的26岁男子是一名心怀不满的员工。好的，我们今天学习的词是disgruntled, disgruntled, disgruntled…

title: ride out
article: 今天我们要学的词组是ride out。Ride out，意思是安全度过。People who rode out Hurricane Harvey in devastated Rockport, Texas, described how their houses felt like they were breathing. 那些在满目苍夷的德州罗克伯特市安全度过飓风哈维的人们，描述了当时他们的房子是如何感觉好像在呼吸一样的。Donie Hatcher-Walters and her family live near Galveston, Texas, and decided to stay home and ride out Hurricane Harvey there. 多尼·哈彻-沃尔特斯和她的家人住在德克萨斯州加尔维斯顿附近，他们决定留守在家里，来安全度过飓风哈维。好的，我们今天学习的词组是ride out, ride out, ride out…

title: unveil
article: 今天我们要学的词是unveil。Unveil动词，意思是揭开、公布。The Trump administration unveiled a new plan to lift limits on a controversial program that provides local law enforcement agencies with surplus military gear. 川普政府公布了一项新的计划，要解除对一个备受争议项目的限制，这个项目给地方执法机关提供超量的军事设备。Apple has reportedly scheduled a product launch event for Sep. 12th, starting a countdown to when the company plans to unveil its much-anticipated 10th anniversary iPhone. 据称苹果公司计划在9月12日举行产品发布活动，开启了人们对该公司计划何时揭开其备受期待的10周年纪念版iPhone面纱的倒计时。好的，我们今天学习的词是unveil, unveil, unveil…

title: slash
article: 今天我们要学的词是slash。Slash动词，意思是大幅度裁剪、削减。After completing its $13.7 billion purchase of Whole Foods, Amazon slashed the prices of dozens of items at all 460 of its new grocery stores. 亚马逊在完成了对全食超市价值137亿美元的收购后，在所有460家超市大幅度削减了数十件商品的价格。Research on 20,000 middle-aged men and women found that drinking four cups of coffee a day could slash the chance of early death. 一项对两万名中年男女的调查发现，每天饮用四杯咖啡可以大幅度降低早逝的几率。好的，我们今天学习的词是slash, slash, slash…

title: refinery
article: 今天我们要学的词是refinery。Refinery名词，意思是精炼厂、冶炼厂。Energy markets are closely watching for signs of damage at Gulf Coast refineries, many of which had shut down to prepare for rainfall and flooding from Tropical Storm Harvey. 能源市场正密切关注墨西哥湾区炼油厂遭受损害的迹象，很多炼油厂已经歇业来应对热带风暴哈维带来的降雨和洪涝。The intense tropical storm that’s disrupting a number of major oil refineries in Texas is unlikely to drive up gas prices in British Columbia, Canada, according to experts. 专家表示，导致德州一些主要炼油厂中断生产的强烈热带风暴不太可能会使加拿大不列颠哥伦比亚省的油价上涨。好的，我们今天学习的词是refinery, refinery, refinery…

title: iodine
article: 今天我们要学的词是iodine。Iodine名词，意思是碘 。The western German city of Aachen has started issuing free iodine tablets to some 500,000 residents and people living nearby because an ageing Belgian nuclear plant is seen as a risk. 德国西部城市亚琛开始向50万名居民和居住在附近的居民发放免费碘片，因为一个老化的比利时核电站被视为风险。Radioactive iodine from nuclear reprocessing plants in the United Kingdom and France has been detected in the ocean near Bermuda. 百慕大附近海域探测到放射性碘，这来自于英国和法国的核再处理设施。好的，我们今天学习的词是iodine, iodine, iodine…

title: mounting
article: 今天我们要学的词是mounting。Mounting动词或形容词，意思是逐渐增加或不断增加的 。President Donald Trump is under mounting pressure from members of his own party not to end an Obama-era program that grants work permits to hundreds of thousands of undocumented immigrants who arrived in the country as children. 美国总统唐纳德·川普正面临来自他自己政党成员的不断增加的压力，要他不要终止一项奥巴马时代的项目，该项目为成千上万名在孩童时代来到这个国家的无证移民提供工作许可。Questions about the ownership and corporate structure of the HNA Group, one of China’s biggest – and most acquisitive – companies, are mounting. 对海航集团所有权和公司结构的疑问正在逐步增加，该集团是在海外采购最积极的中国最大企业之一。好的，我们今天学习的词是mounting, mounting, mounting…

title: reshuffle
article: 今天我们要学的词是reshuffle。Reshuffle动词，意思是重新洗牌、改组 。The Chinese Communist Party will hold a once-every-five-years leadership reshuffle in October, the state-run news media reported on Aug. 31st. 据中国官方媒体8月31日报道，中国共产党将在10月份对领导层进行五年一次的改组。Thailand’s King endorsed the annual reshuffle of 990 senior military officers on Sep. 1st, with a balance of officers from different factions moving into top positions. 9月1日，泰国国王认可了对990名军队高级官员的年度改组，均衡地让来自不同派别的官员们升迁至高级职位。好的，我们今天学习的词是reshuffle, reshuffle, reshuffle…

title: potent
article: 今天我们要学的词是potent。Potent形容词，意思是有效的、强有力的 。Fentanyl, a super potent synthetic drug at the center of a new overdose crisis in America, is presenting huge challenges for law enforcement officials. 处在美国新一波药物滥用危机中心的一种毒性极强的合成药物芬太尼，正在给执法部门带来巨大的挑战。A new potent weather system was intensifying in the far eastern Atlantic to the west of the Cape Verde Islands last week. 一个新的强有力的气象系统在大西洋远东佛得角群岛的西边不断增强。好的，我们今天学习的词是potent, potent, potent…

title: retaliate
article: 今天我们要学的词是retaliate。Retaliate动词，意思是报复、以牙还牙 。The Trump administration ordered Russia to close its consulate in San Francisco and two diplomatic annexes, retaliating against Russia’s order that the US reduce its embassy staff in Moscow by 755 people. 川普政府下令俄罗斯关闭驻旧金山领事馆以及两处外交附属机构，报复俄罗斯下令美国将其在莫斯科的大使馆工作人员减少755人一事。The Russian Foreign Minister warned that Moscow may retaliate against the US order closing the Russian consulate in San Francisco. 俄罗斯外交部长警告称，莫斯科方面可能会就美国要求关闭俄罗斯驻旧金山领事馆一事以牙还牙。好的，我们今天学习的词是retaliate, retaliate, retaliate…

title: quandary
article: 今天我们要学的词是quandary。Quandary名词，意思是困境、为难 。The Chinese billionaire Guo Wengui who is applying for political asylum in the US is a diplomatic quandary for the Trump administration, which wants China’s aid in isolating North Korea. 中国亿万富翁郭文贵在美国申请政治庇护，这令正在寻求中国帮助孤立朝鲜的川普政府陷入外交困境。Germany’s rapidly worsening relations with Turkey could lead to a quandary for the roughly one million German voters of Turkish origin. 德国与土耳其之间迅速恶化的关系可能会让大约一百万的土耳其裔德国选民感到为难。好的，我们今天学习的词是quandary, quandary, quandary…

title: captivate
article: 今天我们要学的词是captivate。Captivate动词，意思是迷住、吸引。President Rodrigo Duterte’s son and son-in-law appeared before the Senate to deny involvement in a drug smuggling case that has captivated the Philippines. 罗德里戈·杜特尔特总统的儿子与女婿在参议院否认参与毒品走私，这起案件吸引了菲律宾人的热切关注。 Four cast members of the Netflix hit sci-fi series “Stranger Things” captivated fans at the annual comics convention in Manila, the Philippines. 在菲律宾马尼拉的年度动漫展上，网飞公司大热科幻剧集《怪奇物语》的四名演员迷住了一众粉丝。好的，我们今天学习的词是captivate, captivate, captivate…

title: data breach
article: 今天我们要学的词组是data breach。Data breach，意思是数据泄漏。In the US, a data breach at Equifax, one of the country’s three major credit reporting agencies, left driver’s license numbers and other sensitive information for 143 million people vulnerable to hackers. 在美国，三大主要信评机构之一的Equifax发生数据泄漏，导致1.43亿人的驾照号码及其他敏感信息暴露在黑客攻击之下。In Singapore, AXA Insurance’s data breach affected users of its health portal including past customers. 在新加坡，安盛保险公司的数据泄漏会影响到其健保系统的用户，这也包括过去的客户。 好的，我们今天学习的词组是data breach, data breach, data breach…

title: exodus
article: 今天我们要学的词是exodus。Exodus名词，意思是成群结队的离去、退出。Floridian began a mass exodus on Sep. 7th as Hurricane Irma, the powerful Category 4 storm, plowed through the Caribbean toward the Sunshine State. 随着强劲的4级飓风艾玛辗过加勒比海域，朝着阳光之州佛罗里达行进，佛罗里达人从9月7日开始大规模撤离。The exodus of Rohingya to Bangladesh has reached about 270,000 over the past two weeks, according to the UN refugee agency. 据联合国难民署称，过去两周来，大批离开缅甸前往孟加拉国的罗兴亚人已达27万之多。 好的，我们今天学习的词是exodus, exodus, exodus…

title: picturesque
article: 今天我们要学的词是picturesque。Picturesque形容词，意思是如画一般的、别具一格的。At least 58 people died when the most powerful earthquake in over eight decades hit Mexico, with most fatalities taking place in the picturesque state of Oaxaca. 墨西哥发生80多年来最猛烈的地震，造成至少58人丧生，其中大多数伤亡发生在风景如画的瓦哈卡州。A wildfire outside Portland, Oregon, forced hundreds of local residents to evacuate as it burned the picturesque Columbia River Gorge. 俄勒冈州波特兰城外发生山火，烧毁了风景如画的哥伦比亚河峡谷，迫使数百名当地居民撤离。 好的，我们今天学习的词是picturesque, picturesque, picturesque…

title: engulf
article: 今天我们要学的词是engulf。Engulf动词，意思是吞没、吞噬。A home-made bomb on a packed rush-hour commuter train in London engulfed a car in flames and injured 29 people on Sep. 15th. 9月15日，伦敦一辆高峰期客满的通勤列车上的一枚自制炸弹，使一节车厢被火焰吞噬，29人受伤。Emergency personnel responded to a mobile home engulfed in flames in Gresham, Oregon shortly after midnight on Sep. 12th. 9月12日午夜过后不久，俄勒冈州格雷沙姆的紧急救援人员对一座被大火吞噬的拖车住房采取行动。 好的，我们今天学习的词是engulf, engulf, engulf…

title: maiden
article: 今天我们要学的词是maiden。Maiden形容词，意思是首次的、初次的。Ahead of his maiden speech to the annual UN General Assembly, President Donald Trump hosted a short event to boost support for reforms to the United Nations. 美国总统唐纳德·川普在年度联合国大会上进行他的首次演说前，组织了一场简短的活动来推动人们对改革联合国的支持。Kazakh Zarina Diyas won her maiden WTA(Women’s Tennis Association) title at the Japan Women’s Open. 哈萨克斯坦的萨莉纳·迪亚斯在日本女子公开赛上赢得了她的首个女子网球协会冠军。 好的，我们今天学习的词是maiden, maiden, maiden…

title: provocative
article: 今天我们要学的词是provocative。Provocative形容词，意思是挑衅的、刺激的。The UN Security Council strongly condemned North Korea’s “highly provocative” launch of a missile that flew over Japan and demanded that Pyongyang immediately halt such actions. 联合国安理会强烈谴责朝鲜发射一枚导弹飞跃日本这一“高度挑衅”的行为，并要求平壤方面立即停止此类行动。Renowned street artist JR has installed a provocative new piece on the US-Mexico border, which is a poster of a large baby peering over the border fence from the Mexican side. 著名街头艺术家JR在美国墨西哥边境上安置了一个具有挑衅意味的新作品，海报上是一个巨大的婴儿从墨西哥一边朝边境栅栏的另一边张望。好的，我们今天学习的词是provocative, provocative, provocative…

title: phase out
article: 今天我们要学的词组是phase out。Phase out，意思是逐渐淘汰、停止。The chief executive of General Motors cautioned against the growing trend of officials in China and a number of other countries of making plans to phase out sales of gasoline- and diesel-powered cars. 通用汽车公司首席执行官对中国官员和其他一些国家逐步淘汰销售汽油和柴油动力汽车的计划提出了警告。The Scottish government has pledged to phase out new gasoline and diesel cars across Scotland by 2032. 苏格兰政府许诺要在2032年前逐步淘汰新的汽油和柴油汽车。好的，我们今天学习的词组是phase out, phase out, phase out…

title: brick and mortar
article: 今天我们要学的词组是brick-and-mortar。Brick-and-mortar，意思是实体店、传统企业。Alibaba is planning to open its first brick-and-mortar mall in April 2018 at its headquarters in Hangzhou, China, MarketWatch reports. 据财经网站MarketWatch报道，阿里巴巴准备明年四月在其位于中国杭州的总部开设第一家实体商场。Opening a brick-and-mortar store can boost a retailer’s website traffic from local customers by 52% in six weeks, according to a report from British commercial real estate company British Land. 根据英国商业地产公司 British Land的一份报告，开设实体店可以在六周内促进零售商网站的本地顾客流量增加52%。好的，我们今天学习的词组是brick-and-mortar, brick-and-mortar, brick-and-mortar…

title: scrap
article: 今天我们要学的词是scrap。Scrap动词，意思是废弃、拆毁。President Donald Trump’s ban on travelers from six majority-Muslim nations will reportedly be scrapped and replaced with more targeted restrictions on visitors from eight countries. 据信，川普总统那份针对来自六个以穆斯林人口为主国家的人的旅行禁令将被废弃，取而代之的是对八个国家的游客更具针对性的限制。Education Secretary Betsy DeVos scrapped 6-year-old guidance intended to better protect victims of sexual misconduct on college campuses. 教育部长贝奇·德沃斯废弃了一份六年之久的指导方案，该方案旨在更好的保护那些大学校园里不当性行为的受害者。好的，我们今天学习的词是scrap, scrap, scrap…

title: dire
article: 今天我们要学的词是dire。Dire形容词，意思是可怕的、极端的。President Donald Trump threatened to destroy North Korea if the US has to defend itself or its allies against the Pyongyang regime. He delivered the dire warning during his first address to the United Nations General Assembly. 川普总统威胁称如果美国不得不保护本国或其盟国抵御朝鲜政府，那么美国会摧毁朝鲜。他在联合国大会的第一次讲话上传达了这一骇人的警告。As Venezuela’s government grows increasingly autocratic, shortages of food, medicine and the basics of life grow more dire. 随着委内瑞拉政府越来越独裁，该国食物、药品和生活必需品短缺的情况变得愈发极端。好的，我们今天学习的词是dire, dire, dire…

title: ratchet up
article: 今天我们要学的词组是ratchet up。Ratchet up，意思是激化、加剧 。North Korea’s foreign minister ratcheted up tensions, saying his country had the right to shoot down U.S. planes even outside North Korean airspace. 朝鲜外交部长加剧了紧张关系，称他的国家有权利击落美国飞机，即使是在朝鲜领空之外。Turkey announced that it had finalized a multibillion-dollar purchase of Russia’s most sophisticated surface-to-air-missile system, which has ratcheted up tensions with the NATO military alliance to a new level. 土耳其宣布，已经完成了一笔数十亿美元的交易，购买俄罗斯最尖端的地对空导弹系统，这使其与北约军事联盟的紧张关系进一步激化。好的，我们今天学习的词组是ratchet up, ratchet up, ratchet up…

title: far right
article: 今天我们要学的词是 far-right。Far-right形容词，意思是极右派的 。With the lower vote of Angela Merkel’s Christian Democratic Union and a stronger showing than expected by Germany’s controversial far-right populist party Alternative for Germany, Merkel’s win is arguably bittersweet. 由于默克尔的基民盟得票少于预期，而德国有争议的极右翼民粹主义政党“德国另类选择党”的表现好于预期，因此默克尔的胜利可以说是苦乐参半的。Austria’s far-right anti-immigration Freedom Party is seeking to soften its image before Austrians go to the polls next month. 在下个月奥地利人进行投票前，该国极右翼的反移民政党自由党正在努力软化其形象。好的，我们今天学习的词是far-right, far-right, far-right…

title: crumbling
article: 今天我们要学的词是 crumbling。Crumbling形容词，意思是破碎的、崩塌的 。Many people living near a crumbling dam in storm-battered Puerto Rico have been evacuated, Governor Ricardo Rossello said. 波多黎各总督里卡多·罗赛洛表示，居住在一个崩塌水坝附近的许多居民都已被疏散。Over the last year or two, the city of Saginaw, MI has been forced to tear down a handful of buildings after they began crumbling into the street below. 过去一两年来，密歇根州城市萨吉诺被迫拆毁了一些楼房，这些房子开始往楼下的路上倒塌。好的，我们今天学习的词是crumbling, crumbling, crumbling…

title: backlog
article: 今天我们要学的词是 backlog。Backlog名词，意思是存货、积压 。A representative of the Puerto Rican Governor said, part of the reason for the supply distribution backlog is that only 20% of truck drivers have reported back to work since Hurricane Maria swept through. 波多黎各总督的发言人表示，分发供应品出现积压的一部分原因是只有20%的卡车司机在飓风玛丽亚过境后重新回到工作岗位。House Speaker Paul Ryan said he and his Republican colleagues are “frustrated” by a backlog of more than 270 House-passed bills in the Senate. 众议院议长保罗·瑞安称，他与他的共和党同仁们因为有超过270份由众议院通过的法案被积压在参议院而感到“失望”。 好的，我们今天学习的词是backlog, backlog, backlog…

title: motorcade
article: 今天我们要学的词是 motorcade。Motorcade名词，意思是车队 。As President Donald Trump’s motorcade drove to Indianapolis International Airport, a man took a knee on the sidewalk, with a folded American flag in his hand. 总统唐纳德·川普的车队向印第安纳波利斯国际机场驶去时，一名男子手持叠着的美国国旗在人行道上跪着。An Indianapolis motorcycle police officer was injured in a crash while working on President Trump’s motorcade in Indiana. 一名印第安波纳利斯的摩托骑警在撞车事故中受伤，当时他正为川普总统在印第安纳州的车队工作。 好的，我们今天学习的词是motorcade, motorcade, motorcade…

title: exhaustive
article: 今天我们要学的词是 exhaustive。Exhaustive形容词，意思是详尽的、彻底的。The decision of pulling out US embassy staff from Cuba came after an exhaustive review of US diplomats’ safety in Havana and discussions with the Cuban government. 从古巴撤回美国大使馆员工的决定是在对哈瓦那的美国外交官安全进行了彻底的检查，以及和古巴政府讨论后做出的。The body of a teen from Carbondale was found after an exhaustive search of Newton Lake in Pennsylvania. 在对宾夕法尼亚州纽顿湖进行彻底搜索后，找到了一名来自卡本代尔的青少年的尸体。 好的，我们今天学习的词是exhaustive, exhaustive, exhaustive…

title: capsize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 capsize。Capsize动词，意思是翻船。At least 23 Rohingya refugees died when the boat they were fleeing in capsized in the Bay of Bengal, the UN’s migration agency announced. 联合国的移民机构称，罗兴亚难民逃难乘坐的船在孟加拉湾翻船，至少23人死亡。Investigators have confirmed that a fisherman, who went missing after his boat capsized off Plymouth, England, has died. 调查人员已证实，那名在英格兰普利茅斯翻船后失踪的渔民已经死亡。 好的，我们今天学习的词是capsize, capsize, capsize…

title: joint venture
article: 今天我们要学的词组是 joint venture。Joint venture，意思是合资企业。China is closing North Korean joint ventures and ordering North Korean companies to leave by January. 中国正在关闭中朝合资企业，并要求朝鲜公司在一月前撤出中国。Boeing Company will invest $33 million for a majority stake in a joint venture with Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China. 波音公司将投资3300万美元，在与中国商用飞机有限责任公司的合资企业中占主要股份。 好的，我们今天学习的词组是joint venture, joint venture, joint venture…

title: elusive
article: 今天我们要学的词是 elusive. Elusive形容词，意思是难以捉摸的。Investigators say the reason why Stephen Paddock killed 58 people and injured hundreds more before taking his own life remains elusive. 调查人员表示，依旧令人难以捉摸的是为什么史蒂芬·帕多克在结束自己的生命前要杀害58人，并导致数百人受伤。One of the most elusive species of songbird, the Liberian Greenbul, may be so rarely seen because it never actually existed, according to researchers. 研究人员称，利比里亚旋木鹎是鸣鸟中最神出鬼没的一种，它很少被人看到可能是因为它其实根本不存在。 好的，我们今天学习的词是elusive, elusive. elusive…

title: turmoil
article: 今天我们要学的词是 turmoil. Turmoil名词，意思是混乱、骚动。Shares in Sabadell, the second-biggest bank in Catalonia and the fifth largest in Spain, have fallen 10% as the independence turmoil between Catalonia and Madrid escalated. 加泰罗尼亚独立诉求使其与马德里政府间的紧张关系升级之际，当地第二大、西班牙全国第五大的萨瓦德尔银行股票已经下跌了10%。Low-cost long-haul carrier Norwegian Air has enjoyed strong passenger growth in September despite the wider airline industry’s turmoil. 尽管航空产业普遍混乱，廉价长途航空公司挪威航空乘客数量九月份却出现了强势增长。 好的，我们今天学习的词是turmoil, turmoil, turmoil…

title: ambush
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ambush. Ambush作为名词，有埋伏、伏击的意思。Three U.S. Army Special Forces soldiers were killed and two were wounded in Niger in an ambush by suspected Islamic militants. 在尼日尔发生的一场疑似由伊斯兰国武装分子制造的伏击中，美国陆军特种部队有三名士兵遇害，两名士兵受伤。Two staff members of a technical college were killed in an ambush while their convoy was driving along Kenya’s Indian Ocean coast. 一所技术学院的车队在沿肯尼亚的印度洋海岸行进过程中遭到伏击，两名教职员工遇害身亡。 好的，我们今天学习的词是ambush, ambush, ambush…

title: secessionist
article: 今天我们要学的词是 secessionist. Secessionist 作为形容词，有分离主义的意思。Spain’s Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy asked Catalan secessionist leader Carles Puigdemont to clarify whether he declared independence. 西班牙首相霍伊要求加泰罗尼亚分离主义领导人普伊格蒙特澄清，他到底有没有宣布独立。The latest independence votes in parts of Iraq and Spain have added fuel to secessionist movements in West Africa. 伊拉克和西班牙部分地区最近的独立公投为非洲西部的分离主义运动增加了驱动力。好的，我们今天学习的词是secessionist, secessionist, secessionist…

title: accommodate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 accommodate. To accommodate有容纳的意思。Bangladesh plans to build a single, huge refugee camp to accommodate 800,000 Rohingya refugees. 孟加拉国计划修建一个巨大的难民营，把80万罗兴亚难民全部安置在那里。Facebook will add three floors to its Chicago office building to accommodate hundreds of new employees. 脸书公司计划将芝加哥办公大楼加盖三层，为几百名新员工提供办公场所。好的，我们今天学习的词是accommodate, accommodate, accommodate…

title: fire back
article: 今天我们要学的词是 fire back. To fire back意思是还击。Iranian President Hassan Rouhani fired back at the Trump administration for decertifying the 2015 Iran nuclear deal. 伊朗总统鲁哈尼对川普政府不认证2015年伊朗核协议的决定予以还击。The mayor of San Juan fired back at President Trump’s comment that the U.S. couldn’t keep FEMA, the military and first responders in Puerto Rico forever. 美国总统川普表示，联邦紧急事务管理局、军队和应急人员不可能永远待在波多黎各，此番评论遭到圣胡安市长的严辞反击。好的，我们今天学习的词是fire back, fire back, fire back…

title: ordeal
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ordeal. Ordeal 折磨，痛苦经历。A western couple and their three kids were rescued after a five-year ordeal as Taliban prisoners. 西方国家的一对夫妇被塔利班关押五年后，和他们的三个孩子一起获得营救。A battlefield photographer who was kidnapped in Syria in 2013 recounted his 81-day ordeal in his new book. 一个战地摄影师发表新书，讲述了他2013年在叙利亚被绑架后81天的痛苦经历。好的，我们今天学习的词是ordeal, ordeal, ordeal …

title: signatory
article: 今天我们要学的词是 signatory. Signatory 名词，签约国，签约方。美国总统川普宣布不认证伊朗核协议后，Iranian President Hassan Rouhani said the 2015 nuclear deal could not be revoked and urged all signatories to honor their commitments. 伊朗总统鲁哈尼说，2015年伊朗核协议不能被废除，并敦促所有签约方遵守承诺。Arizona governor Doug Ducey signed a Memorandum of Understanding with other signatories to create an Electric Vehicle Corridor. 亚利桑那州州长道格·杜西和其他签约人共同签署了一项建立电动汽车走廊的备忘录。好的，我们今天学习的词是signatory, signatory, signatory …

title: atrocity
article: 今天我们要学的词是 atrocity. Atrocity 残暴的行为。Army officials in Myanmar have opened an investigation into allegations that the Myanmar army committed atrocities against the Rohingya minority. 缅甸军方官员围绕缅甸军队对罗兴亚少数族裔犯下暴行的指控展开调查。Western diplomats are pushing to establish an international inquiry into atrocities in Yemen. 西方国家的外交官们正在推动建立一个国际调查小组，对也门发生的残暴行为进行调查。好的，我们今天学习的词是atrocity, atrocity, atrocity …

title: round up
article: 今天我们要学的词是 round up. To round up 有赶在一起，围捕的意思。Gay and transgender people were rounded up in recent weeks in Azerbaijan, Egypt and Indonesia. 同性恋和跨性别者最近几周在阿塞拜疆、埃及和印度尼西亚遭到了围捕。Federal investigators rounded up 33 gang members of three violent gangs in the Bronx, New York. 联邦调查人员突击抓捕了纽约布鲁克斯区三个暴力团伙的33名成员。好的，我们今天学习的词是round up, round up, round up …

title: reconnaissance
article: 今天我们要学的词是 reconnaissance. Reconnaissance 名词，意思是侦察。U.S. military officials say the American forces ambushed in Niger were on a reconnaissance patrol. 美国军方官员说，在尼日尔遭遇伏击的美军当时正在执行侦察任务。Reports say an Israeli aircraft was on a routine reconnaissance mission over Lebanon when a Syrian missile was fired at it. 有报道说，一架以色列飞机在黎巴嫩上空执行例行侦察任务时遭到叙利亚导弹的袭击。好的，我们今天学习的词是reconnaissance, reconnaissance, reconnaissance …

title: goodwill ambassador
article: 今天我们要学的词是 goodwill ambassador. Goodwill ambassador 亲善大使。The World Health Organization is under fire for naming President Robert Mugabe of Zimbabwe a “goodwill ambassador”. 世界卫生组织任命津巴布韦总统穆加贝出任“亲善大使”，引起强烈批评。Ukrainian singer Jamala has become the UN’s goodwill ambassador in the battle against human trafficking. 乌克兰歌手亚马拉成为打击人口走私的联合国亲善大使。好的，我们今天学习的词是goodwill ambassador, goodwill ambassador, goodwill ambassador …

title: displaced
article: 今天我们要学的词是 displaced. Displaced 形容词，无家可归的，颠沛流离的。According to the UN refugee agency, there are about 3.9 million internally displaced people in the Democratic Republic of Congo. 联合国难民机构说，刚果共和国国内有约390万人流离失所。Since its civil war erupted in late 2013, a third of South Sudan’s 12 million citizens have either fled the country or have been displaced internally. 自从2013年年底内战爆发以来，南苏丹1200万人口中三分之一的人要么已经逃离南苏丹，要么在国内颠沛流离。好的，我们今天学习的词是displaced, displaced, displaced …

title: escalate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 escalate. Escalate 动词，有增加，升级的意思。The feud between President Trump and Senator Bob Corker escalated over Trump’s tax cut plan. 美国总统川普和参议员科克围绕川普的减税计划的争执进一步升级。The tensions over Catalonia’s independence drive escalated with Spanish Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy announcing he would remove Catalonia’s leadership. 加泰罗尼亚独立之争引起的紧张局势加剧，西班牙首相拉霍伊宣布将解除加泰罗尼亚自治政府领导人的职务。好的，我们今天学习的词是escalate, escalate, escalate …

title: dependence
article: 今天我们要学的词是 dependence. Dependence 名词，有依赖的意思。Saudi Arabia announced a $500 billion plan to build a business and industrial zone, seeking to reduce its dependence on oil export. 沙特阿拉伯宣布投资5000亿美元，兴建一个商业和工业园区，努力降低沙特经济对石油出口的依赖。After 57 years of independence, Nigeria’s dependence on external loans to keep its economy running remains. 独立57年过后，尼日利亚经济的运转继续依赖国外贷款。好的，我们今天学习的词是dependence, dependence, dependence …

title: grand jury
article: 今天我们要学的词是 grand jury. Grand jury 大陪审团。A U.S. federal grand jury has approved the first charges in an investigation of Russian influence on U.S. elections. 一个美国大陪审团批准了对俄罗斯影响美国选举提起的第一批起诉。The head coach of the University of Miami men’s basketball team received a grand jury subpoena in a corruption and bribery case. 迈阿密大学男篮校队主教练收到了参与一起行贿受贿和腐败案件调查的大陪审团传票。好的，我们今天学习的词是grand jury, grand jury, grand jury …

title: vetting
article: 今天我们要学的词是 vetting. Vetting 名词，意思是审查。The Trump administration has allowed refugee admissions to resume, but with more vetting and screening procedures. 川普政府允许恢复接收难民，但是加大了审查力度。The Pentagon is tightening the vetting process for immigrants to join military service and slowing their path to citizenship. 美国五角大楼收紧了对移民服役备选人员的审查，同时延长了他们归化入籍的时间。好的，我们今天学习的词是vetting, vetting, vetting …

title: clause
article: 今天我们要学的词是 clause. Clause 名词，有条款的意思。美国国会要求对一家小公司是如何获得波多黎各电力修复合同一事展开调查。The contract offers pay rates five times higher than what is normal in Puerto Rico and includes a clause preventing authorities from auditing those rates. 这项合同的工资标准是波多黎各正常标准的五倍，而且合同里还有一项条款规定，有关当局不得对工资标准进行审计。U.S. Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer proposed adding a “sunset clause” to the North American Free Trade Agreement. 美国贸易代表莱特希泽提议，给北美自由贸易协定增加一个“日落条款”。好的，我们今天学习的词是clause, clause, clause …

title: dysfunctional
article: 今天我们要学的词是 dysfunctional. Dysfunctional 形容词，存在功能障碍的，运转失灵的。A new poll finds that nearly 6 out of 10 Americans say the U.S. political system is more dysfunctional under President Trump. 一项新民调发现，将近六成美国人认为，川普任期内美国政治体系变得越来越无法正常运转了。Former CIA Director Leon Panetta said the political climate in Washington is “awfully partisan” and he has never seen it “more dysfunctional.”前美国中央情报局局长帕内塔说，华盛顿的政治气候“极度党派化”，他从没见过华盛顿的运转“如此失灵”。好的，我们今天学习的词是dysfunctional, dysfunctional, dysfunctional …

title: dual citizenship
article: 今天我们要学的词是 dual citizenship. Dual citizenship 双重国籍。Australia’s Deputy Prime Minister Barnaby Joyce was removed from office because of his dual citizenship. 澳大利亚副总理乔伊斯因为双重国籍被免除职务。The Dutch government announced that it will allow its citizens living in the UK to take up dual citizenship after Brexit. 荷兰政府宣布，允许居住在英国的荷兰公民在英国脱欧后享有双重国籍。好的，我们今天学习的词是dual citizenship, dual citizenship, dual citizenship …

title: designate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 designate. Designate 动词，有指定的意思。The United States is considering designating North Korea as a state sponsor of terrorism. 美国正在考虑将朝鲜定为支持恐怖主义的国家。Six heavyweight senators have asked Secretary of States Rex Tillerson to designate Pakistan as “a country of concern” on the issue of religious freedom violation. 六个重量级参议员要求美国国务卿蒂勒森把巴基斯坦确定为在侵犯宗教自由问题上“需要关注的国家”。好的，我们今天学习的词是designate, designate, designate …

title: leeway
article: 今天我们要学的词是 leeway. Leeway 作为名词，有余地的意思。A leaked internal email shows that Twitter plans to tighten rules on its platform and give its reviewers more leeway to remove tweets and ban offenders. 一份外漏的内部邮件显示，推特公司计划收紧对平台使用的规定，给审查员更多删除推文和取缔帐号的自由。Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe wants to revise Japan’s anti-war constitution, allowing the country more leeway in case it needs to shoot down North Korean missiles. 日本首相安倍晋三希望修改日本的反战宪法，在需要击落朝鲜导弹的情况下有更大的行动自由。好的，我们今天学习的词是leeway, leeway, leeway …

title: unionize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unionize. To unionize 动词，是成立工会，加入工会的意思。A group of Georgetown University graduate students are asking the president of Georgetown to support their effort to unionize. 乔治敦大学一群研究生敦促校长支持他们加入工会的努力。The National Labor Relations Board decided in 2016 to grant teaching and research assistants the legal protection to unionize. 美国全国劳工关系委员会2016年决定，给予教学助理和研究助理加入工会的法律保护。好的，我们今天学习的词是unionize, unionize, unionize …

title: cut ties with
article: 今天我们要学的词是 cut ties with. To cut ties with 意思是切断联系，断绝关系。Netflix cut ties with Oscar-winning actor Kevin Spacey amid a growing number of allegations of sexual harassment against him. 奥斯卡获奖演员凯文·史派西受到多起性骚扰指控，Netflix为此跟他切断了关系。Sears has cut century-old ties with Whirlpool, and will stop selling its products. 西尔斯百货公司切断了跟惠而浦公司的百年合作关系，将不再销售惠而浦公司的产品。好的，我们今天学习的词是cut ties with, cut ties with, cut ties with …

title: tax haven
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tax haven. Tax haven 避税地，避税港。EU members discussed plans for a tax haven blacklist after the release of the so-called “Paradise Papers”. 所谓的“天堂文件”公诸于众后，欧盟国家开会讨论，计划建立一个避税港的黑名单。Rhode Island Senator Sheldon Whitehouse urged Congress to take action and shut down tax havens. 美国罗德岛州参议员怀特豪斯敦促国会采取行动，让避税港无法继续运转。好的，我们今天学习的词是tax haven, tax haven, tax haven …

title: stockpile
article: 今天我们要学的词是 stockpile. Stockpile 做为动词，有储备的意思。Pope Francis is urging countries not to stockpile nuclear weapons, even for the purpose of deterrence. 罗马天主教宗方济各敦促各国不要储备核武器，即便是出于威慑的目的。Recent Goldman Sachs research shows that U.S. companies have stockpiled as much as $3.1 trillion offshore. 高盛公司最近的一项研究显示，美国公司在离岸账户里积累了多达3万1000亿美元的资产。好的，我们今天学习的词是stockpile, stockpile, stockpile …

title: extravaganza
article: 今天我们要学的词是 extravaganza. Extravaganza 名词，有盛会，盛典的意思。Alibaba’s annual 11.11 shopping extravaganza broke last year’s record just past midday. 阿里巴巴一年一度的双11购物盛会刚过半天就打破了去年整整一天的销售记录。Chicago will host the NBA all-star extravaganza in 2020, making its first return to the Windy City since 1988. 芝加哥将主办2020年NBA全明星赛盛会，芝加哥上次主办全明星赛是1988年。好的，我们今天学习的词是extravaganza, extravaganza, extravaganza …

title: political motivation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 political motivation. Political motivation 政治动机。An attorney for the man who assaulted U.S. Senator Rand Paul said there was no political motivation behind the attack. 殴打美国联邦参议员兰德·保罗的人的律师说，这次事件没有政治动机。Alabama Republican Senate candidate Roy Moore vehemently denied allegations of sexual misconduct and claimed these attacks are driven by political motivations. 阿拉巴马州共和党参议员候选人莫尔对不当性行为的指控坚决否认，称其有政治动机。好的，我们今天学习的词是political motivation, political motivation, political motivation…

title: lash out
article: 今天我们要学的词是 lash out. To lash out 有猛烈抨击的意思。North Korea lashed out at U.S. President Donald Trump, calling him “a destroyer” of peace who “begged for nuclear war”. 朝鲜猛烈抨击美国总统川普，称他是“和平的摧毁者”，“求着要打核战争” 。U.S. President Trump lashed out at unfair trade practices during a key speech at the APEC summit. 美国总统川普在亚太经合组织的一次重要会议上对不公平的贸易行为提出猛烈抨击。好的，我们今天学习的词是lash out, lash out, lash out…

title: mistrial
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mistrial. Mistrial 无效审判。The corruption case against New Jersey’s senator Bob Menendez ended in a mistrial after jurors reached a hopeless deadlock. 由于陪审团成员完全没有希望达成一致意见，新泽西州参议员梅嫩德斯的腐败案以无效审判告终。A judge declared a mistrial in the case against a biker gang leader who was indicted for his role in a deadly gang gunfight. 一位法官宣布，针对涉嫌致命的帮派枪战的一个摩托车帮派领袖的审判无效。好的，我们今天学习的词是mistrial, mistrial, mistrial …

title: government funded
article: 今天我们要学的词是 government-funded. Government-funded 政府资助的。Russia warned nine U. S. government-funded news operations that they would probably be designated “foreign agents.” 俄罗斯警告9家美国政府资助的新闻机构，它们有可能被确定为“外国代理人”。The administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency signed a directive to bar government-funded scientists from three advisory groups. 美国环保署署长签署命令，禁止得到政府资助的科学家成为3个顾问小组的成员。好的，我们今天学习的词是government-funded, government-funded, government-funded …

title: house arrest
article: 今天我们要学的词是 house arrest. House arrest 软禁。Zimbabwe’s president Robert Mugabe made his first public appearance at a graduation ceremony since the military placed him under house arrest. 津巴布韦总统穆加贝被军方软禁后，首次公开露面，参加一次毕业典礼。Venezuelan opposition leader Antonio Ledezma, who was under house arrest since 2015, has fled over the border to Colombia. 2015年以来一直被软禁的委内瑞拉反对派领袖莱德斯马越境逃往哥伦比亚。好的，我们今天学习的词是house arrest, house arrest, house arrest …

title: insider
article: 今天我们要学的词是 insider. Insider圈内人。U.S. Senator John McCain warned President Trump against nominating more defense industry insiders to top Pentagon posts. 美国联邦参议员麦凯恩警告川普总统，不要再提名更多国防业界人士出任五角大楼要职。A new report shows that 90% of companies and government agencies feel vulnerable to insider attacks. 一项最新报告显示，90%的公司和政府机构都觉得自己面临内部攻击的风险。好的，我们今天学习的词是insider, insider, insider …

title: disclose
article: 今天我们要学的词是 disclose. Disclose动词，意思是公布，公开。Online payment company Paypal was given 45 days to hand over information about its Canadian account holders to the Canadian Revenue Agency. 网上支付服务商“贝宝”被要求在45天内，将贝宝在加拿大的用户信息上交给加拿大税务局。The Pentagon disclosed base-by-base sexual assault data for the first time. 美国五角大楼首次公布了每个军事基地的性侵事件的数据。好的，我们今天学习的词是disclose, disclose, disclose …

title: child labor
article: 今天我们要学的词是 child labor. Child labor童工。World leaders pledged two years ago to end child labor by 2025. 国际领导人两年前承诺，要在2025年以前结束童工的存在。然而，A new UN report estimates there were 152 million children involved in child labor around the world in 2016. 联合国最新报告显示，2016年全球有大约1亿5200万童工。Almost half of the children engaged in child labor were between the ages of 5 and 11. 其中几乎一半童工的年龄在5岁到11岁之间。好的，我们今天学习的词是child labor, child labor, child labor …

title: inadequate
article: 今天我们要学的词是inadequate. Inadequate 形容词，不充分的。Texas Governor Greg Abbott criticized the Trump administration’s $44 billion disaster relief request to Congress as “completely inadequate.” 德克萨斯州州长阿伯特批评川普政府向国会提出的440亿美元的救灾拨款要求“根本不够”。An Uber rider is suing the company for inadequate background checks on its drivers. 一位优步乘客起诉优步公司，指责该公司在启用司机前，缺少对他们进行充分的背景调查。好的，我们今天学习的词是inadequate, inadequate, inadequate …

title: petition
article: 今天我们要学的词是petition. Petition 有请愿的意思。The U.S. Highway Traffic Safety Administration rejected a petition by Ford Motor Co. to delay recalling about 3 million vehicles. 美国高速公路交通安全管理局拒绝了福特汽车公司要求暂缓召回约300万辆福特汽车的请求。More than 80,000 people have signed a petition, asking New York Governor Andrew Cuomo to reverse an order that renamed a bridge after his father. 8万多人签署请愿书，要求纽约州州长科莫废除用他父亲的名字将一座桥梁重新命名的指令。好的，我们今天学习的词是petition, petition, petition …

title: disclaimer
article: 今天我们要学的词是disclaimer. Disclaimer 名词，免责声明。The Federal Election Commission unanimously agreed to strengthen the online political ad disclaimer rules. 美国联邦选举委员会成员一致同意，加强对网上政治广告免责声明的规定。A new law in France requires images of models that have been digitally altered to come with a disclaimer. 法国一项新法律要求，凡是经过数字处理的模特的照片都要加以注明。好的，我们今天学习的词是disclaimer, disclaimer, disclaimer …

title: prone
article: 今天我们要学的词是 prone. Prone 形容词，更易于，更倾向于。A study finds that frequent drivers and those with neurotic and extroverted personalities are more prone to distraction while driving. 一项研究发现，经常开车的人，以及那些神经质和性格外向的人开车时更容易分心。Research suggests that African Americans are more prone to being overweight because 8% of them carry a genetic mutation that causes calories to remain in tissue. 研究显示，非洲裔美国人更容易超重，因为他们中8%的人带有一种基因变异，这种基因会导致热量留在人体组织中。好的，我们今天学习的词是prone, prone, prone …

title: workplace
article: 今天我们要学的词是 workplace. Workplace 名词，工作场所，单位。NBC fired its star morning anchor, Matt Lauer, over allegations of sexual misconduct in the workplace. NBC早间节目明星主持人马特·劳尔因为被控在工作场所有不当性行为被NBC开除。A new report calls on Congress to enact a federal law against anti-LBGT workplace discrimination. 一份新报告敦促国会进行联邦立法，禁止让同性恋、双性恋和跨性别者在职场受到歧视。好的，我们今天学习的词是workplace, workplace, workplace …

title: within range
article: 今天我们要学的词是 within range. Within range 在射程内。North Korea claimed its intercontinental ballistic missile has now put the U.S. mainland within range. 朝鲜声称，朝鲜的洲际弹道导弹已经将美国大陆纳入射程范围。A senior commander of Iran’s Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps warned European governments not to challenge its missile program unless they wants Iran to boost its missile capabilities to bring Europe within range. 伊朗伊斯兰革命卫队一名高级指挥官警告欧洲国家，不要挑战伊朗的导弹项目，否则伊朗会提高导弹性能，把欧洲纳入射程范围。好的，我们今天学习的词是within range, within range, within range …

title: large scale
article: 今天我们要学的词是 large-scale. Large-scale 形容词，大规模的。South Korea and the United States kicked off large-scale joint aerial drills on Monday. 韩国和美国星期一开始举行大规模联合空中演习。General Motors Co. is planning a large-scale launch of self-driving cars in many densely populated urban areas in 2019. 美国通用汽车公司计划2019年在很多人口密集的城市地区大规模推广无人驾驶汽车。好的，我们今天学习的词是large-scale, large-scale, large-scale …

title: retaliation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 retaliation. Retaliation 报复。Russia designated nine U.S. media outlets as “foreign agents”, in retaliation for similar U.S. moves against the Russian network RT. 俄罗斯将9家美国媒体定为“外国代理人”，报复美国对今日俄罗斯电视台采取的类似行动。North Korea threatened retaliation amid U.S.-South Korea joint exercises. 美国和韩国举行联合军演之际，朝鲜威胁要采取报复行动。好的，我们今天学习的词是retaliation, retaliation, retaliation …

title: endorse
article: 今天我们要学的词是 endorse. Endorse 背书，支持。U.S. President Donald Trump endorsed Republican candidate Roy Moore in Alabama’s senate race. 美国总统川普为参加阿拉巴马州参议员选举的共和党候选人罗伊·莫尔背书。61.6% of Australians voted to endorse same-sex marriage in a nonbinding referendum conducted by mail. 在一次不具法律效力的邮递公投中，61.6%的澳大利亚人投票支持同性婚姻合法化。好的，我们今天学习的词是endorse, endorse, endorse …

title: imminent
article: 今天我们要学的词是 imminent. Imminent 形容词，即将发生的，迫在眉睫的。The United Nations said Yemeni cities are running out of clean water and fuel, facing an imminent catastrophe. 联合国表示，也门的城市面临迫在眉睫的灾难，清洁水和燃料正在耗尽。China warned its nationals in Pakistan of imminent “terrorist attacks” on Chinese targets there. 中国对巴基斯坦境内的中国人发出警告称，那里的中国目标可能近期内会受到“恐怖袭击”。好的，我们今天学习的词是imminent, imminent, imminent …

title: invalid
article: 今天我们要学的词是 invalid. Invalid 形容词，无效的。South Africa’s High Court ruled that President Jacob Zuma’s appointment of a state prosecutor was invalid. 南非最高法院裁决，南非总统祖马对一名政府检察官的任命无效。The Greek Supreme Court ruled as invalid the first same-sex marriage which was conducted in 2008. 希腊最高法院裁决，2008年希腊的第一个同性恋婚姻在法律上无效。好的，我们今天学习的词是invalid, invalid, invalid …

title: run counter to
article: 今天我们要学的词是 run counter to. Run counter to意思是违反，背道而驰。Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said the U.S.’ recognition of Jerusalem as Israel’s capital runs counter to common sense. 俄罗斯外长拉夫罗夫说，美国承认耶路撒冷是以色列首都有悖常理。South Korea raised corporate taxes, running counter to the global trend. 韩国与国际上给企业减税的趋势背道而驰，提高了公司税率。好的，我们今天学习的词是run counter to, run counter to, run counter to …

title: tumble
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tumble. Tumble动词，意思是跌落。The latest poll shows that British Prime Minister Theresa May’s approval rating has tumbled to its lowest level, with only a third of the public satisfied with her work. 最新民调显示，英国首相特蕾莎·梅的支持率跌落到最低点，只有三分之一的民众对她的工作感到满意。After dramatic gains, bitcoin tumbled nearly 20% in 10 hours on Friday. 价值暴涨过后，比特币星期五在10小时的时间内大跌，跌幅近20%。好的，我们今天学习的词是tumble, tumble, tumble …

title: in tatters
article: 今天我们要学的词是 in tatters. In tatters意思是被损坏的，支离破碎的。U.S. President Donald Trump tweeted recently that the FBI’s reputation is “in tatters”. 美国总统川普最近发推说，美国联邦调查局名誉扫地。New Zealand’s Health Minister David Clark said the country’s health sector is in tatters due to years of underfunding and neglect. 新西兰卫生部长克拉克说，由于多年的拨款不足和缺乏重视，新西兰的健康部门严重受损 。好的，我们今天学习的词是in tatters, in tatters, in tatters …

title: cleanup
article: 今天我们要学的词是 cleanup. Cleanup名词，意思是清理。The Environmental Protection Agency released a list of 21 sites that need “immediate and intense cleanup.” 美国环境保护署公布了一份名单，名单上的21个地点需要“立即进行彻底清理”。An oil company responsible for a produced water spill in the Delaware River spent two month to complete its cleanup. 一家在特拉华河泄漏采油废水的石油公司花了两个月的时间完成了事故清理工作。好的，我们今天学习的词是cleanup, cleanup, cleanup …

title: surrogate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 surrogate. Surrogate作为名词，有代孕母亲的意思。A former aide to Republican Representative Trent Franks said he offered her $5 million to act as a surrogate for him and his wife. 共和党籍联邦众议员弗兰克斯以前的一名助手说，他曾出价500万美元，要这名助手替他们夫妇代孕。A British court recently ruled against a surrogate who attempted to keep the baby she carried for a gay couple. 一家英国法院最近驳回了一个代孕者的诉求，这名代孕者替一对同性恋伴侣代孕，而后想把孩子归为己有。好的，我们今天学习的词是surrogate, surrogate, surrogate …

title: step down
article: 今天我们要学的词是 step down. Step down意思是下台，离职。Democratic Senator Al Franken announced his resignation amid calls for him to step down. 面对要求他下台的强烈呼声，民主党参议员弗兰肯宣布辞职。Macy’s executive chairman and former CEO Terry Lundgren will step down from the board of directors effective January 31, 2018. 梅西百货执行主席，前首席执行官特里·兰格伦2018年1月31日将从执行董事会离职。好的，我们今天学习的词是step down, step down, step down …

title: willingness
article: 今天我们要学的词是 willingness. Willingness名词，意思是意愿。North Korea said the UN envoy expressed willingness to ease tensions on the Korean peninsula during his visit. 朝鲜说，联合国特使访问朝鲜期间表达了缓和朝鲜半岛紧张局势的意愿。A Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson said that both China and Canada showed willingness to negotiate and sign a free trade agreement. 中国外交部一位发言人说，中国和加拿大都愿意谈判达成自由贸易协定。好的，我们今天学习的词是willingness, willingness, willingness …

title: inevitable
article: 今天我们要学的词是 inevitable. Inevitable形容词，不可避免的。North Korea said a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula is inevitable against the backdrop of U.S.-South Korea joint exercises. 针对美韩联合军演，朝鲜表示，朝鲜半岛上的核战争不可避免。The head of the International Campaign to Abolish Nuclear Weapons said that as long as atomic bombs exist, a disaster is inevitable. 国际废除核武器运动负责人说，只要氢弹继续存在，灾难就不可避免。好的，我们今天学习的词是inevitable, inevitable, inevitable …

title: hunger strike
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hunger strike.
