Hunger strike 绝食抗议。Former Georgian President Mikheil Saakashvili has gone on a hunger strike to protest his arrest in Ukraine. 格鲁吉亚前总统萨卡什维利绝食，抗议自己在乌克兰被抓捕。A Turkish academic on a hunger strike for nearly nine months to protest her dismissal after last year’s failed coup has been released from jail. 土耳其未遂政变后被解职关押的一名土耳其学界人士绝食抗议 近9个月后获得释放。好的，我们今天学习的词是hunger strike, hunger strike, hunger strike …

title: orientation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 orientation. Orientation 做为名词，有取向的意思。A new study comparing the DNA of gay and straight men suggests that sexual orientation is determined by genes. 一项新研究对同性和异性恋男子的基因进行比较后发现，一个人的性取向取决于基因。Palm Beach County is on track to become the first county in Florida to ban therapists from trying to change a child’s sexual orientation. 佛罗里达州棕榈滩郡可能将成为该州第一个禁止治疗师试图改变儿童性取向的郡。好的，我们今天学习的词是orientation, orientation, orientation …

title: boycott
article: 今天我们要学的词是 boycott. To boycott意思是抵制。Two prominent black lawmakers refused to attend the opening of the Mississippi Civil Rights Museum to boycott President Trump’s presence. 为抵制川普的出席，两位著名非洲裔美国议员拒绝参加密西西比民权博物馆开馆仪式。Russian President Vladimir Putin said that Russia won’t boycott the Pyeongchang Olympics. 俄罗斯总统普京说，俄罗斯不会抵制平昌冬奥会。好的，我们今天学习的词是boycott, boycott, boycott …

title: enlist
article: 今天我们要学的词是 enlist. To enlist意思是招募，入伍。The Pentagon said that transgender recruits will be allowed to enlist in the military beginning January 1st. 美国五角大楼说，将从明年1月1日开始，允许变性人入伍从军。To keep up with recruitment demands, the Army is granting hundreds of waivers to enlist past Marijuana users. 为了满足招募需求，美国陆军批准了数以百计的豁免令，允许以前曾吸食大麻的人入伍。好的，我们今天学习的词是enlist, enlist, enlist …

title: pervasive
article: 今天我们要学的词是 pervasive. Pervasive形容词，意思是普遍的，无处不在的。House minority whip Steny Hoyer said he didn’t know sexual harassment on Capitol Hill was so pervasive. 美国国会众议院少数党党鞭霍耶说，他不知道国会山性骚扰事件如此普遍。A new NPR poll shows that other forms of discrimination against women are also pervasive in American society. 美国国家公共电台的一项新民调显示，女性受到的其它形式的歧视在美国社会中也很普遍。好的，我们今天学习的词是pervasive, pervasive, pervasive …

title: conciliatory
article: 今天我们要学的词是 conciliatory. Conciliatory形容词，意思是和解的，调停的。North Korean leader Kim Jong Un struck a conciliatory note in his New Year’s Day address, declaring his wish “for peaceful resolution” with Seoul. 朝鲜领导人金正恩在元旦讲话中表达和解意愿，希望能与韩国“和平解决问题”。Iranian President Hassan Rouhani struck a conciliatory note, calling the ongoing protests “an opportunity, not a threat.” 伊朗总统鲁哈尼释放和解信息，称伊朗民众抗议是“机遇，不是威胁”。好的，我们今天学习的词是conciliatory, conciliatory, conciliatory …

title: annual report
article: 今天我们要学的词是 annual report. Annual report年度报告。U.S. Supreme Court Chief Justice John Roberts announced in an annual report that he has called for an evaluation of how the judicial branch handles allegations of sexual harassment. 美国联邦最高法院首席大法官罗伯茨在年度报告中宣布，他要求对司法系统处理性骚扰指控的做法进行评估。The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation reported in its annual report that there were only 15 cases of Polio worldwide in 2017. 比尔和梅林达·盖茨基金会在年度报告中说，2017年全球只有15例小儿麻痹症。好的，我们今天学习的词是annual report, annual report, annual report …

title: reshuffule
article: 今天我们要学的词是 reshuffle. Reshuffle 动词，意思是洗牌，重组。Syria’s state media reported that President Bashar al-Assad reshuffled his government, replacing the ministers of defense, information and industry. 叙利亚官方媒体报道，叙利亚总统阿萨德进行政府人员调整，替换了国防、信息和工业部长。British Prime Minister Theresa May is preparing a cabinet reshuffle that could see foreign secretary Boris Johnson moved to a different position. 英国首相特蕾莎·梅正在准备内阁洗牌，外交大臣约翰逊可能会被安排担任其它职务。好的，我们今天学习的词是reshuffle, reshuffle, reshuffle …

title: poaching
article: 今天我们要学的词是 poaching. Poaching 名词，非法狩猎。China’s ban on its domestic ivory trade has been hailed as the “greatest single step toward reducing elephant poaching.” 中国禁止国内的象牙产品交易被誉为“减少大象非法狩猎最有力的一步” 。A fisherman shot down an anti-poaching drone being used to monitor illegal activities in the Gulf of California. 一名渔民在加利福尼亚湾击落了一架用于监督非法猎捕行为的无人机。好的，我们今天学习的词是poaching, poaching, poaching …

title: extinguish
article: 今天我们要学的词是 extinguish. Extinguish 动词，扑灭。Pope Francis described migrants and refugees as the “weakest and most needy”, and asked the world not to extinguish hope in their hearts. 罗马天主教宗方济各称移民和难民是“最弱势，最需要帮助的人”，要求世界不要熄灭他们心中的希望。Apple pledged $1 million to help extinguish the wildfires raging across Southern California. 苹果公司认捐100万美元，帮助扑灭在加州南部肆虐的野火。好的，我们今天学习的词是extinguish, extinguish, extinguish …

title: betrayal
article: 今天我们要学的词是 betrayal. Betrayal 名词，背叛。Pakistani officials accused the United States of betrayal after the Trump administration decided to suspend military aid to Pakistan. 川普政府决定暂停对巴基斯坦的军事援助，巴基斯坦官员指责美国说，这是背叛行为。The dramatic U.S. policy shift on contested Jerusalem is seen by the Palestinian leadership as a dangerous betrayal. 巴勒斯坦领导人认为，美国在有争议的耶路撒冷归属问题上的政策突变是一种危险的背叛。好的，我们今天学习的词是betrayal, betrayal, betrayal …

title: intercept
article: 今天我们要学的词是 intercept. Intercept 动词，拦截。Saudi Arabia said it intercepted a ballistic missile near the kingdom’s border with Yemen. 沙特阿拉伯说，沙特在与也门交界处拦截了一枚弹道导弹。Two US F-22 stealth fighters intercepted two Russian aircraft and fired warning flares after the Russian jets crossed the Euphrates River in Syria. 两架美军F-22隐形战斗机在叙利亚境内发现两架俄罗斯飞机飞越幼发拉底河后，进行了拦截并发出警告信号弹。好的，我们今天学习的词是intercept, intercept, intercept …

title: withdraw
article: 今天我们要学的词是 withdraw. Withdraw 动词，退出。Defending champion Serena Williams has withdrawn from the Australian Open, saying she is not ready to return to tournament tennis. 澳大利亚网球公开赛卫冕冠军小威廉姆斯退出本届比赛，说自己尚未做好返回赛场的准备。The head of the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization expressed “deep regret” over Israel’s decision to withdraw from the agency. 联合国教科文组织负责人对以色列决定退出教科文组织的决定深表遗憾。好的，我们今天学习的词是withdraw, withdraw, withdraw …

title: disposable
article: 今天我们要学的词是 disposable. Disposable 形容词，一次性的。British lawmakers called on the government to impose a 25-pence “latte levy” on disposable coffee cups. 英国议员呼吁政府对一次性咖啡杯子征收25便士的“拿铁税”。A New Jersey doctor accused of reusing disposable anal catheters on patients has had his license to practice medicine temporarily suspended. 新泽西州一名医生被控重复使用一次性肛门导管，行医执照被暂时吊销。好的，我们今天学习的词是disposable, disposable, disposable …

title: project
article: 今天我们要学的词是 project. Project 做为动词，有预计的意思。An international aid agency projects that 48,000 babies will be born this year in overcrowded refugee camps for the Rohingya Muslims. 一个国际援助组织预计，人满为患的罗兴亚穆斯林难民营里今年会有4万8000个婴儿出生。A market research firm projects that smartphone production will increase by another 5 percent in 2018 to reach 1.53 billion units. 一家营销研究公司预计，智能手机的产量2018年会增加5%，升至15亿3000万部。好的，我们今天学习的词是project, project, project …

title: cancellation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 cancellation. Cancellation 名词，取消。U.S. President Donald Trump’s cancellation of his scheduled London trip dealt a further blow to relations between the allies. 美国总统川普取消原定对伦敦的访问，使美英同盟关系受到又一打击。More than 100 artists signed an open letter in support of pop singer Lorde’s cancellation of her show in Israel. 100多位艺术家签署公开信，对流行歌手洛德取消在以色列的表演表示支持。好的，我们今天学习的词是cancellation, cancellation, cancellation …

title: loophole
article: 今天我们要学的词是 loophole. Loophole 名词，漏洞。Experts say a loophole in the new U.S. tax law could allow multinational corporations to avoid paying billions of dollars in taxes on their overseas profits. 专家指出，美国新税法里的一大漏洞会让跨国大公司少交数十亿美元的海外盈利所得税。China has banned non-bank financial institutions from channeling funds into the property and infrastructure sectors, closing a major loophole for non-traditional financing.中国禁止非银行金融机构对房地产和基础设施部门投放资金，堵住了非传统融资的一个重要漏洞。好的，我们今天学习的词是loophole, loophole, loophole …

title: intact
article: 今天我们要学的词是 intact. Intact 形容词，原封不动的，完好无损的。U.S. President Donald Trump will extend sanctions relief granted to Iran under its 2015 nuclear deal, leaving the accord intact for now. 美国总统川普将延长让伊朗免受制裁的2015年伊朗核协议，暂时保持协议的完整性。A vodka bottle worth $1.3 million that was stolen from a bar in Copenhagen has been recovered, dented and empty of alcohol but otherwise intact. 在哥本哈根一个酒吧失窃的一个价值130万美元的伏特加酒瓶被找到，瓶子有磕碰的痕迹，里面的酒也没了，但除此以外完好无损。好的，我们今天学习的词是intact, intact, intact …

title: arbitrary
article: 今天我们要学的词是 arbitrary. Arbitrary 形容词，任意的，武断的。Turkey warned its citizens against travelling to the United States, saying Turks face the risk of arbitrary arrest and should take precautions if they do decide to go. 土耳其警告国民不要去美国，说土耳其人面临被任意抓捕的风险，如果要去应该做好预防措施。The United Nations urged the Sri Lankan government to end war-time arbitrary arrests. 联合国敦促斯里兰卡政府，终止战争时期任意拘捕的做法。好的，我们今天学习的词是arbitrary, arbitrary, arbitrary …

title: overheat
article: 今天我们要学的词是 overheat. Overheat 动词，过热。New York Federal Reserve President William Dudley is worried new tax cuts could risk overheating the U.S. economy in the next few years. 纽约联储行长杜德利担心，新的减税政策会让今后几年美国经济面临过热的风险。Dallas Fed President Robert Kaplan thinks the central bank ought to keep raising rates as a way to stop the economy from overheating. 达拉斯联储行长卡普兰认为，美联储应该继续加息，借此防止经济出现过热现象。好的，我们今天学习的词是overheat, overheat, overheat …

title: shortlist
article: 今天我们要学的词是 shortlist. Shortlist 作为动词，有入选决选名单的意思。Amazon shortlisted 20 cities for its second headquarters which will create 50,000 new jobs for the community. 亚马逊公布了建立公司第二总部的最后20个候选城市名单，亚马逊的入驻会给当地创造5万个新的就业机会。Ai Weiwei is among a handful of artists that have been shortlisted for the redevelopment of San Francisco’s Treasure Island. 艾未未等几位艺术家入选了加州旧金山金银岛重新开发项目的艺术家决选名单。好的，我们今天学习的词是shortlist, shortlist, shortlist …

title: repatriate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 repatriate. Repatriate 动词，有遣返，送回的意思。Myanmar and Bangladesh reached an agreement to repatriate Rohingya Muslims who fled Myanmar to escape a brutal military crackdown. 缅甸和孟加拉国达成协议，将逃离残酷军事镇压的罗兴亚穆斯林送回缅甸。Apple announced plans to repatriate $250 billion in overseas cash because of the new tax law. 苹果公司宣布，根据新税法，计划让海外2500亿美元的资金回归美国。好的，我们今天学习的词是repatriate, repatriate, repatriate …

title: delegation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 delegation. Delegation 名词，代表团。Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s delegation to the World Economic Forum at Davos will offer daily yoga classes. 印度总理莫迪亲率前往达沃斯参加世界经济论坛的印度代表团将在会议期间每天开办瑜伽课程。North Korea said its delegation to the Winter Olympic Games in Pyeongchang would include artists, officials and journalists, as well as athletes. 朝鲜说，朝鲜派往平昌参加冬季奥运会的代表团除了运动员外还包括艺术家、官员和记者。好的，我们今天学习的词是delegation, delegation, delegation …

title: embezzlement
article: 今天我们要学的词是 embezzlement. Embezzlement 名词，有盗用公款的意思。The governor of a Mexican state claimed that federal authorities are withholding funding from it because of a state investigation into possible embezzlement involving the ruling party. 墨西哥一个州的州长称，由于该州对牵涉执政党盗用公款案的调查，联邦当局扣着资金不予发放。A Romanian court ordered a top Romanian doctor to be placed under house arrest in an embezzlement case. 罗马尼亚一家法院下令，对涉嫌贪污案的一位著名医生实施软禁。好的，我们今天学习的词是embezzlement, embezzlement, embezzlement …

title: birth rate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 birth rate. Birth rate 出生率。The birth rate in China fell last year despite the country easing its family planning policies and allowing all couples to have two children. 尽管中国政府放宽计划生育政策，允许生二胎，但是中国去年的出生率还是出现了下滑。The number of babies born in Japan in 2017 has fallen to the lowest level in almost 120 years, when officials began recording the birth rate. 日本2017年新生儿数量跌至出生率有官方记录近120年来的最低点。好的，我们今天学习的词是birth rate, birth rate, birth rate …

title: reciprocal
article: 今天我们要学的词是 reciprocal. Reciprocal 作为形容词，有互惠的意思。U.S. President Donald Trump emphasized in his Davos speech that the United States supports free trade, but it needs to be fair and reciprocal. 美国总统川普在达沃斯讲话中强调，美国支持自由贸易，但是必须公平互惠。The United States and Turkey have resumed issuing reciprocal visas after a two-month suspension over a diplomatic dispute. 由于外交争执暂停两个月后，美国和土耳其恢复了互发签证的服务。好的，我们今天学习的词是reciprocal, reciprocal, reciprocal …

title: coalition
article: 今天我们要学的词是 coalition. Coalition 名词，联盟。New York, New Jersey and Connecticut have formed a multistate coalition to sue the Trump administration over the 2017 tax bill. 纽约、新泽西和康涅狄格三个州组成联盟，一起对川普政府的2017年新税法提出起诉。The U.S.-led coalition fighting the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria acknowledged that it had killed a total of 831 civilians since the start of the war. 以美国为首的在伊拉克和叙利亚打击伊斯兰国武装的同盟承认，战斗开始以来已经造成831名平民丧生。好的，我们今天学习的词是coalition, coalition, coalition …

title: tariff
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tariff. Tariff 名词，是关税的意思。A top Chinese economic official promised to gradually lower tariffs on imported automobiles, but gave no specifics on a possible timeline. 中国政府经济系统一名高级官员保证将逐步降低进口汽车的关税，但是没有给出具体的时间表。China and South Korea are protesting U.S. President Donald Trump’s decision to impose steep tariffs on washing machines and solar panels. 中国和韩国针对美国总统川普对洗衣机和太阳能板征收高额关税的决定提出抗议。好的，我们今天学习的词是tariff, tariff, tariff …

title: overdose
article: 今天我们要学的词是 overdose. Overdose 名词，有吸食药物或毒品过量的意思。费城是美国大都市里吸食毒品过量死亡人数最多的城市。More than 1,200 people died from opioid overdoses in 2017 in Philadelphia. 费城2017年有1200多人死于吸食毒品过量。Philadelphia wants to be the first city to allow safe drug injection sites as a way to prevent overdose deaths in drug addicts. 费城希望成为第一个开设安全毒品注射站点的城市，防止瘾君子吸食过量致死。好的，我们今天学习的词是overdose, overdose, overdose …

title: clone
article: 今天我们要学的词是 clone. Clone 动词，克隆。Chinese scientists have successfully cloned two monkeys, using the same technique that created Dolly the sheep more than two decades ago. 中国科学家使用20多年前克隆桃莉羊的技术，克隆出了两只猴子。The scientists acknowledged that while their work could theoretically lead to cloning humans, they have no intention to do so. 这些科学家承认，虽然他们的工作理论上是向克隆人类再进了一步，但是他们并没有这种打算。好的，我们今天学习的词是clone, clone, clone …

title: biased
article: 今天我们要学的词是 biased. Biased 形容词，带有偏见的。President Donald Trump approved the release of a classified memo alleging that top law enforcement officials were biased against the president. 美国总统川普批准公布一份保密备忘录，备忘录指控美国执法系统高级官员对总统有偏见。A federal judge ruled that Florida’s ban on ex-felons’ voting is unconstitutional and biased. 一位联邦法院法官裁定，佛罗里达州禁止有犯罪前科者投票的做法违反宪法，带有偏见。好的，我们今天学习的词是biased, biased, biased …

title: depression
article: 今天我们要学的词是 depression. Depression 名词，抑郁。The oldest son of Cuba’s late leader Fidel Castro committed suicide after months of treatment for depression. 古巴前领导人卡斯特罗的长子自杀身亡，自杀前因患有抑郁症接受了几个月的治疗。A British study of blood samples found that people who suffer from depression and anxiety have lower levels of omega-3 in their blood. 英国一项对血样的研究发现，患有抑郁症和焦虑症的人血液中omega-3脂肪酸的水平偏低。好的，我们今天学习的词是depression, depression, depression …

title: politicize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 politicize. Politicize 动词，政治化。China’s Ministry of Commerce urged the United States not to “politicize” economic and trade issues between the two countries. 中国商务部敦促美国，不要将双边经贸问题“政治化”。The Director of The United Nations Relief and Works Agency’s operations in Gaza called on the US not to politicize its aid to the international organization which serves Palestinian refugees. 联合国难民救济及工程局加沙地带的负责人呼吁美国，不要把向这个帮助巴勒斯坦难民的国际机构的援助问题政治化。好的，我们今天学习的词是politicize, politicize, politicize …

title: criminal code
article: 今天我们要学的词是 criminal code. Criminal code 刑法。The Indonesian parliament seems poised to pass a sweeping set of revisions to the nation’s criminal code that would criminalize extramarital and gay sex. 印尼议会看似准备对国家刑法做出大规模修订，将婚外性行为和同性恋性行为都界定为犯罪。Cambodia’s Cabinet endorsed an amendment to the criminal code making insulting the king a criminal offense. 柬埔寨内阁支持一项刑法修正案，将侮辱国王定为犯罪行为。好的，我们今天学习的词是criminal code, criminal code, criminal code …

title: lone wolf
article: 今天我们要学的词是 lone wolf. Lone wolf 孤狼，指独来独往的人，单独行动的人。A new report argues that the term “lone wolf terrorist” can be counterproductive in the fight against terror because radicalization rarely happens in a vacuum. 一份最新报告认为，使用“孤狼恐怖分子”一词对反恐可能会适得其反，因为激进化的过程很少是在真空状态下发生的。A New Jersey congressman introduced a bill that requires background checks for all rental vehicles in order to prevent “lone wolf” attacks using rental cars. 新泽西州一位众议员提出议案，要求对租车的人进行背景调查，防止发生使用租来的车辆制造“孤狼“袭击事件。好的，我们今天学习的词是lone wolf, lone wolf, lone wolf …

title: on the eve of
article: 今天我们要学的词是 on the eve of. On the eve of 意思是前夜，前夕。North Korea staged a military parade in Pyongyang on the eve of the opening ceremony of the Winter Olympics in South Korea. 韩国冬季奥运会开幕式前夕，朝鲜在平壤举行了阅兵式。U.S. Senate leaders reached a two-year budget deal on the eve of the government shutdown deadline. 政府停摆最后期限到来前夕，美国联邦参议院领袖就一项为期两年的预算案达成了协议。好的，我们今天学习的词是on the eve of, on the eve of, on the eve of …

title: counterpart
article: 今天我们要学的词是 counterpart.Counterpart 地位相当的人，对应的人。North Korea’s leader Kim Jong Un has invited his South Korean counterpart to visit the North at the South Korean leader’s earliest convenience. 朝鲜领导人金正恩邀请韩国领导人在方便的时候尽早访问朝鲜。Chinese President Xi Jinping exchanged Spring Festival greetings with his Vietnamese counterpart. 中国国家主席习近平与越共中央总书记阮富仲互致春节贺信。好的，我们今天学习的词是Counterpart, Counterpart, Counterpart …

title: interact
article: 今天我们要学的词是 interact. Interact 动词，互动。A White House official said that U.S. Vice President Mike Pence and the sister of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un did not interact during the Olympic opening ceremony. 白宫一位官员说，美国副总统彭斯和朝鲜领导人金正恩的妹妹在冬奥会开幕式上没有互动。Twitter said 1.4 million users in the U.S. had interacted with Russian propaganda accounts during the 2016 presidential election. 推特说，140万美国用户在2016年总统大选期间曾跟俄罗斯宣传帐号进行过互动。好的，我们今天学习的词是interact, interact, interact …

title: defector
article: 今天我们要学的词是 defector. Defector 名词，叛离者。 U.S. Vice President Mike Pence met with North Korean defectors while in PyeongChang attending the Winter Olympics. 美国副总统彭斯出席韩国平昌冬季奥运会期间，接见了一些逃离朝鲜的脱北者。Famous North Korean defector Ji Seong-ho described Communism as Hell on earth in a recent interview. 知名的脱北者池成镐最近在接受一次采访的时候形容说，朝鲜就是人间地狱。好的，我们今天学习的词是defector, defector, defector …

title: Domestic abuse
article: 今天我们要学的词是 domestic abuse. Domestic abuse 家庭虐待。Two White House staff members resigned in recent days over allegations of domestic abuse. 白宫两名工作人员近日先后因为受到家庭虐待的指称而辞去职务。Scotland passed a bill to criminalize domestic abuse, which includes psychological abuse as well as violence. 苏格兰通过一项法案，将包括精神折磨和暴力在内的家庭虐待界定为犯罪。好的，我们今天学习的词是domestic abuse, domestic abuse, domestic abuse …

title: bitcoin
article: 今天我们要学的词是 bitcoin. Bitcoin 比特币。Engineers at a Russian nuclear research facility have been detained after they attempted to mine bitcoins using its powerful computers. 俄罗斯一家核研究设施的几名工程师被拘捕，因为他们用那里的强大电脑系统挖掘比特币。The head of the World Bank compared cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin to “Ponzi schemes”. 世界银行集团总裁将比特币等加密货币比做“庞氏骗局”。 好的，我们今天学习的词是bitcoin, bitcoin, bitcoin …

title: clemency
article: 今天我们要学的词是 clemency. Clemency 仁慈，宽恕。Illinois Gov. Bruce Rauner denied clemency for a Chicago veteran who is facing deportation. 伊利诺伊州州长劳纳驳回了芝加哥一个面临递解出境的退伍军人的宽赦请求。Colorado’s governor is considering granting clemency to a handful of state inmates in prison on marijuana-related convictions. 科罗拉多州州长正在考虑赦免州监狱里一些因为跟大麻有关的罪行而被关押的犯人。好的，我们今天学习的词是clemency, clemency, clemency …

title: white paper
article: 今天我们要学的词是 white paper. White paper 白皮书。The White House released a 30-page white paper that promotes easing government regulations and spurring innovation to lower drug prices.白宫公布了一份30页的白皮书，支持放松政府管控，刺激创新，借此降低药物价格。The UK government plans to delay the publication of its white paper on immigration until just months before Britain leaves the EU. 英国政府计划将移民白皮书推迟到脱欧前的几个月发表。好的，我们今天学习的词是white paper, white paper, white paper …

title: Down syndrome
article: 今天我们要学的词是 down syndrome. Down syndrome 唐氏综合症。An 18-month-old baby with Down syndrome has been chosen by baby food maker Gerber as its “Spokesbaby” for 2018. 一个18个月大患有唐氏综合症的幼儿被美国幼儿食品公司嘉宝公司挑选为2018年“代言幼儿”。There is a pending bill in Utah to prevent doctors from performing abortions on the basis of a Down syndrome diagnosis. 美国犹他州一项有待投票的议案将禁止医生对被诊断出唐氏综合症的胎儿实施流产。好的，我们今天学习的词是down syndrome, down syndrome, down syndrome …

title: abaya
article: 今天我们要学的词是 abaya. Abaya 名词，指宽大的阿拉伯长袍。A senior member of the Saudi Arabian Council of Senior Scholars said Muslim women should dress modestly, but not necessarily in abayas. 沙特阿拉伯高级伊斯兰学者委员会的一名重要成员说，穆斯林女性穿着要朴素，但并不一定要穿长袍。Soccer team abayas have allowed Saudi women to show their support for their favorite teams after the General Sports Authority allowed women into sports stadiums. 沙特体育总局允许女性进入体育场馆后，女性穿着带有特定足球队标识的长袍，表达对自己喜爱的球队的支持。好的，我们今天学习的词是abaya, abaya, abaya …

title: resume
article: 今天我们要学的词是 resume. Resume 动词，意思是恢复、重新开始。Classes have resumed at the Florida school where 17 people were killed in a mass shooting nearly two weeks ago. 两周前发生了一起大型枪击案导致17人丧生的那所佛罗里达中学恢复了上课。Air strike by the Syrian government on a rebel-held area have resumed hours after the UN passed a ceasefire resolution. 就在联合国通过一项停火决议的几个小时后，叙利亚政府重新开始对一个由叛军控制的地区进行空袭。好的，我们今天学习的词是resume, resume, resume…

title: unveil
article: 今天我们要学的词是 unveil. Unveil 动词，意思是公布、揭开。Samsung is expected to unveil its latest Galaxy S-class smartphone at the GSMA World Congress in Barcelona. 预计三星公司将在巴塞罗那的世界移动通信大会上公布其最新的盖乐世S型智能手机。The Trump administration unveiled sweeping new sanctions in its effort to stop North Korea’s weapons development. 为了努力停止朝鲜的武器研制，川普政府公布了广泛的制裁新措施。好的，我们今天学习的词是unveil, unveil, unveil…

title: descend on
article: 今天我们要学的词是descend on. Descend on，意思是突然袭击、涌入。Foreign immigrants continue to descend on Sydney, making it their gap-year playground, lifestyle retreat or refuge from danger. 外国移民继续涌入悉尼，把这里作为他们的间隔年旅游胜地、度假中心或是逃离危险的避难所。A mix of snow, ice pellets, rain and freezing rain descended on Canada’s Montreal on Feb. 25th. 2月25日，雨雪、冰雹和冻雨混杂在一起突袭了加拿大城市蒙特利尔。好的，我们今天学习的词是descend on, descend on, descend on…

title: reiterate
article: 今天我们要学的词是reiterate. Reiterate动词，意思是重申。US President Donald Trump reiterated that he would negotiate with North Korea, but only under the right conditions. 美国总统唐纳德·川普重申他会与朝鲜谈判，但仅在恰当的前提之下。A few dozen officials from Jersey Shore towns gathered in Ocean City, NJ to reiterate their opposition to drilling for oil along the East Coast. 数十位来自泽西海岸城市的官员们聚集在新泽西的大洋城，重申他们反对在东岸沿线开采石油的立场。 好的，我们今天学习的词是reiterate, reiterate, reiterate…

title: scrutinize
article: 今天我们要学的词是scrutinize。Scrutinize动词，意思是仔细检查。US counterintelligence officials are scrutinizing one of Ivanka Trump’s international business deals, according to two sources familiar with the matter. 据两名了解情况人士表示，美国反情报官员正在详查伊万卡·川普的一笔国际贸易交易。Federal inspectors found scores of New Jersey Transit train cars with fire risks, faulty brakes and electrical hazards as they scrutinized the troubled railroad. 联邦检察员在详查问题多多的新泽西通勤铁路时，发现许多列车存在火险、有问题的刹车以及触电风险。好的，我们今天学习的词是scrutinize, scrutinize, scrutinize…

title: nascent
article: 今天我们要学的词是nascent。Nascent形容词，意思是初生的、正在发展中的。The new Governor of Taiwan’s Central Bank, Yang Ching-Long stated for the first time that nascent blockchain technology would be included by the Central Bank and its operations. 中国台湾地区“中央银行”新行长杨金龙在讲话中说到，新生的区块链技术将首次被纳入台湾“中央银行”及其运营中。A new surety bond approval from the California Department of Insurance is giving the state’s nascent cannabis industry a push in the right regulatory direction. 加利福尼亚州保险部门批准一种新的担保债券，推动该州新生的大麻产业走向正确的监管方向。好的，我们今天学习的词是nascent, nascent, nascent…

title: propagandist
article: 今天我们要学的词是propagandist。Propagandist名词，意思是宣传者。The US news site the Daily Beast has claimed that Russian propagandists targeted the popular news-sharing website Reddit to influence American political debate. 美国新闻网站《每日野兽》指称，俄罗斯宣传人员对准备受欢迎的新闻分享网站Reddit来影响美国的政治辩论。At the height of the 2016 American presidential campaign, Russian propagandists used Twitter accounts to spread conspiracy theories, misinformation, and political division, according to Quartz. 据新闻网站Quartz报道，在2016年美国总统选举的鼎盛时期，俄罗斯宣传人员利用推特账号传播阴谋论、错误消息和政治分歧。好的，我们今天学习的词是propagandist, propagandist, propagandist…

title: gravely
article: 今天我们要学的词是gravely。Gravely副词，意思是严重得、严肃得。With three northern white rhinos left in the world, the only male is gravely ill, raising fears the subspecies is getting closer to extinction. 全世界仅剩的三头北部白犀牛中，唯一的雄性病入膏肓，增加了人们对于这个亚种群更进一步趋向灭绝的担忧。Canada is gravely concerned by the imprisonment of two Reuters journalists in Myanmar, Foreign Minister Chrystia Freeland told the UN Human Rights Council. 加拿大外交部长方慧兰对联合国人权理事会表示，两名路透社记者在缅甸遭到拘禁一事令加拿大深感关切。好的，我们今天学习的词是gravely, gravely, gravely…

title: envoy
article: 今天我们要学的词是envoy。Envoy名词，意思是使节、特使。President Trump says there is a “serious effort” underway with the North and South Koreans following news that North Korean leader Kim Jong Un had met with South Korean envoys. 在新闻报道称朝鲜领导人金正恩会见韩国使团后，川普总统表示，美国与朝鲜及韩国方面正在“认真努力”当中。The UN human rights envoy said, Myanmar has not stopped its ethnic cleansing of the Rohingya people in Rakhine state. 联合国人权特使表示，缅甸还没有停止对若开邦罗兴亚人的种族清洗。好的，我们今天学习的词是envoy, envoy, envoy…

title: amendment
article: 今天我们要学的词是amendment. Amendment 修正案。The National Rifle Association (NRA) is suing the state of Florida for enacting gun control legislation, arguing that it violates the Second Amendment of the Constitution. 美国全国步枪协会对佛罗里达州通过的枪支管制法案提出起诉，称其违反了美国宪法第二修正案。好的，我们今天学习的词是amendment, amendment, amendment…

title: runoff
article: 今天我们要学的词是runoff. Runoff 名词，决选。Sierra Leone will hold a runoff presidential election in two weeks after the country’s 16 candidates failed to clinch the 55 percent of votes necessary to win in the first round.塞拉利昂16位总统候选人在第一轮投票中无一赢得胜选所需的55%的选票，两周后举行决选。Nearly 50 women ran for Congress in Texas this year, and more than half won their primaries outright or advanced to runoffs. 美国得克萨斯州今年有将近50名女性参加州议会选举，其中半数以上要么在初选中胜出，要么将参加决选。好的，我们今天学习的词是runoff, runoff, runoff…

title: veteran
article: 今天我们要学的词是veteran. Veteran 退伍军人。Three women who had devoted their lives to helping traumatized veterans were killed by a patient who had been kicked out of their treatment program. 三名致力于帮助受创伤的退伍军人康复的女性被一个患者杀害，枪手此前被要求离开康复计划。The Pentagon says it is planning a military parade requested by U.S. President Donald Trump on Nov. 11th, Veterans Day. 五角大楼说，计划按照美国总统川普的要求，于11月11日退伍军人节举行阅兵式。好的，我们今天学习的词是veteran, veteran, veteran …

title: witness
article: 今天我们要学的词是witness. Witness 目击者。British police said that 200 witnesses have been identified in their investigation into a nerve agent attack on a Russian ex-spy and his daughter. 英国警方说，他们在调查前俄罗斯间谍及其女儿遭受神经毒剂袭击的案件中，已经找到了200名目击者。Appeals judges at the International Criminal Court upheld most of the convictions of a former Congolese vice president for interfering with witnesses during his war crimes trial. 国际刑事法庭上诉法官宣布，对前刚果一名副总统战争罪审判过程中干扰目击者的指控的大多数定罪维持原判。好的，我们今天学习的词是witness, witness, witness …

title: bump stock
article: 今天我们要学的词是bump stock. Bump stock 撞击枪托。The U.S. Department of Justice formally submitted a regulation to ban “bump stocks”, devices that enables guns to fire like automatic weapons. 美国司法部正式提交一项规定，取缔让枪支像自动武器一样快速发射的改装装置“撞击枪托”。Bump stocks were used in a mass shooting in Las Vegas in last October in which 58 people died. 拉斯维加斯去年10月造成58人丧生的枪击案的肇事人就使用了撞击枪托。好的，我们今天学习的词是bump stock, bump stock, bump stock …

title: walkout
article: 今天我们要学的词是walkout. Walkout 做为名词，有罢工，罢课的意思。Students from around 3,000 schools took part in a nationwide walkout to protest Congressional failure to address gun violence. 全美各地约3千所学校的学生参加了全国性罢课活动，对国会针对枪支暴力事件的不作为提出抗议。West Virginia Governor James C. Justice signed a bill to give teachers a 5 percent pay raise to end a nine-day teachers’ walkout. 西维吉尼亚州州长贾斯特斯签署了给教师加薪5%的法案，从而结束了教师长达九天的罢课行动。好的，我们今天学习的词是walkout, walkout, walkout …

title: nerve agent
article: 今天我们要学的词是nerve agent. Nerve agent 神经毒剂。British officials said the chemical nerve agent known as Novichok was used in the attack on an ex-Russian spy and his daughter. 英国官员说，对一名前俄罗斯间谍和他女儿袭击所使用的是一种叫诺维乔克的化学神经毒剂。U.S. Ambassador Nikki Haley said the US shared the UK belief that Russia is responsible for the attack using a military-grade nerve agent. 美国驻联合国大使黑利说，美国同意英国的看法，相信俄罗斯是这次军用神经毒剂袭击事件的幕后主使。好的，我们今天学习的词是nerve agent, nerve agent, nerve agent …

title: abide by
article: 今天我们要学的词是abide by.To abide by 意思是遵守。Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman Lu Kang reiterated that Beijing was opposed to the Taiwan Travel Act and urged the US to abide by the “one China” policy. 中国外交部发言人陆慷重申，北京反对美国的台湾旅行法，并敦促美国遵守“一个中国政策”。The United Nations urged the warring parties in South Sudan to abide by the peace agreement they signed in 2015. 联合国敦促南苏丹的交战各方遵守他们在2015年签署的和平协议。好的，我们今天学习的词是abide by, abide by, abide by …

title: personally
article: 今天我们要学的词是personally. Personally 亲自地。The FBI’s former Deputy Director Andrew McCabe claimed his firing is not just to slander him personally, but to taint the FBI, law enforcement, and intelligence professionals in general. 前联邦调查局副局长麦凯布说，开除他不光是对他本人的诽谤，也是对联调局、执法机构和所有情报专业人员的抹黑。UK Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson accused Russian President Vladimir Putin of personally ordering the poisoning of a former double spy. 英国外交大臣约翰逊指责俄罗斯总统普京亲自下令对前双料间谍下毒。好的，我们今天学习的词是personally, personally, personally …

title: experimental
article: 今天我们要学的词是experimental. Experimental 试验阶段的。The House of Representatives rejected a Republican bill that would give terminally ill patients the ability to try experimental drugs. 美国国会众议院否决了一项议案，该议案让患绝症的病人有机会尝试仍在试验阶段的药物。Scientists have discovered a new class of experimental drugs that could reduce the severity and number of hot flashes in menopause. 科研人员发现了一类试验阶段的新药，可以降低更年期妇女潮热的次数和严重程度。好的，我们今天学习的词是experimental, experimental, experimental …

title: full scale
article: 今天我们要学的词是full-scale.Full-scale 全面的。The Trump administration announced new tariffs on China, a move that could escalate into a full-scale trade war. 川普政府宣布对中国实施新关税，此举可能会升级为全面贸易战。Former French President Nicolas Sarkozy is under a full-scale investigation for allegedly accepting illegal campaign contributions for his 2007 campaign. 法国前总统尼古拉·萨科齐被指控2007年大选期间收受非法竞选资金，正在接受全面调查。好的，我们今天学习的词是full-scale, full-scale, full-scale …

title: committed
article: 今天我们要学的词是committed. Committed 做为形容词，有坚定的意思。Mark Zuckerberg said Facebook is committed to stop anyone from interfering in the upcoming midterm congressional elections through Facebook. 扎克伯格表示，脸书将坚决防止任何人通过脸书干预即将到来的美国国会中期选举。Indian President Ram Nath Kovind said that India is committed to peace but “will defend its borders with full might.” 印度总统科文德说，印度致力于和平，但是会“全力保卫自己的边境”。好的，我们今天学习的词是committed, committed, committed …

title: confession
article: 今天我们要学的词是confession. Confession 供认，自白。Police say suspected serial bomber Mark Conditt left behind a 25-minute video confession on his cellphone before killing himself. 警方说，连环爆炸案嫌疑人马克·康迪特自杀前在手机上留下了25分钟的视频自白。Saudi authorities beheaded an Indonesian migrant worker for murder, despite suspicions that his confession was forced. 沙特有关当局以谋杀罪斩首了一名印尼流动工人，但是有人怀疑，被告其实是被强迫认罪的。好的，我们今天学习的词是confession, confession, confession …

title: redraw
article: 今天我们要学的词是redraw. Redraw 动词，意思是重新划分。Malaysian Prime Minister Najib Razak’s government is seeking parliamentary approval to redraw electoral boundaries. 马来西亚总理拉扎克领导的政府为重新划分选区寻求议会的批准。The Kosovo Assembly reached the 80 votes needed to ratify a deal with Montenegro to redraw their borders. 科索沃议会得到了所需的80张赞成票，批准了一项与黑山共和国达成的协议，重新划定边界。好的，我们今天学习的词是redraw, redraw, redraw …

title: crowdfunding
article: 今天我们要学的词是crowdfunding. Crowdfunding 众筹。Investors have pledged $200 million and hope to raise four times that amount in crowdfunding in order to bid for up to 400 of the Toys “R” Us stores being liquidated in bankruptcy. 投资人集资2亿美元，并打算众筹8亿美元，投标收购多达400家破产清算的反斗城玩具店。Former adult film star Stormy Daniels raised $160,000 in just two days through crowdfunding as part of her lawsuit against President Trump. 前成人电影女星风暴·丹尼尔斯两天众筹16万多美元，用于跟川普总统打官司。好的，我们今天学习的词是crowdfunding, crowdfunding, crowdfunding …

title: privatize
article: 今天我们要学的词是privatize. Privatize 私有化。David Shulkin, who President Donald Trump fired as Veterans Affairs secretary, warned that privatizing Veterans Affairs services could hurt veterans. 被川普总统解除职务的前退伍军人事务部部长舒尔金警告说，退伍军人服务的私有化会给退伍军人带来伤害。The White House says the firing of David Shulkin doesn’t signal a desire to privatize veterans’ health services. 白宫表示，舒尔金的解职并不意味着白宫打算让退伍军人服务私有化。好的，我们今天学习的词是privatize, privatize, privatize …

title: summon
article: 今天我们要学的词是summon. Summon动词，有召见，传唤的意思。The Russian Foreign Ministry summoned envoys of foreign states that expelled Russian diplomats to hand them notes of protest and inform them of Russia’s retaliatory measures. 俄罗斯外交部召见了驱逐俄罗斯外交官的外国特使，向他们提出抗议书，并告知俄罗斯将采取报复性措施。Former South African President Jacob Zuma, who has been charged with corruption, fraud and racketeering, was summoned to appear in court. 被控腐败、舞弊和诈骗的前南非总统祖马被法庭传唤。好的，我们今天学习的词是summon, summon, summon …

title: extradite
article: 今天我们要学的词是extradite. Extradite动词，是引渡的意思。A Russian man accused of hacking three American technology companies in 2012 was extradited to the United States by the Czech Republic. 一名被控2012年对三家美国科技公司发动黑客袭击的俄罗斯男子被捷克共和国引渡回美国。A former Cameroonian minister was arrested in Nigeria and extradited home. 喀麦隆的一名前部长级官员在尼日利亚被捕后被引渡回喀麦隆。好的，我们今天学习的词是extradite, extradite, extradite …

title: anonymous
article: 今天我们要学的词是anonymous. Anonymous形容词，匿名的。An anonymous donor has pledged $9 million for the construction of two new Planned Parenthood health centers in West Texas. 一名匿名捐款人捐赠900万美元，用于在得克萨斯州西部为计划生育联盟建造两个新的健康医疗中心。Wall Street Journal staffers circulated an anonymous email accusing a senior editor of suppressing a story. 华尔街日报员工转发一份匿名邮件，指责一名资深编辑故意压稿不发。好的，我们今天学习的词是anonymous, anonymous, anonymous …

title: telemarketing
article: 今天我们要学的词是telemarketing. Telemarketing电话推销。The owner of a Canadian telemarketing operation was found guilty of mail and wire fraud. 加拿大一家电话推销公司的老板被认定犯有邮政电信欺诈罪。The Arizona Attorney General has banned two telemarketing companies from operating in the state for six years. 亚利桑那州司法部长宣布，禁止两家电话推销公司六年内在亚利桑那州从事任何商业活动。好的，我们今天学习的词是telemarketing, telemarketing, telemarketing …

title: trade deficit
article: 今天我们要学的词是trade deficit. Trade deficit贸易赤字。The monthly U.S. trade deficit increased to a near 9½-year high in February to $57.6 billion. 美国二月份的贸易赤字升至576亿美元，是近9年半以来的最高水平。U.S. government figures show the U.S. had a $375 billion trade deficit with China at the end of 2017. 美国政府公布的数据显示，美国2017年年底对中国的贸易赤字是3750亿美元。好的，我们今天学习的词是trade deficit, trade deficit, trade deficit …

title: exceptional
article: 今天我们要学的词是exceptional。 Exceptional, 少见的，杰出的。 “An exceptional leader,” 一位杰出的领袖。 “Retailers focus on delivering an exceptional customer service experience to maintain their customer base,” 为了保证客源，零售商非常重视提供最周到的顾客服务。美国共和党籍的前国务卿鲍威尔将军星期天公开表态，支持民主党总统候选人奥巴马。 “Powell said that Obama could be an ‘exceptional President,'” 鲍威尔说，奥巴马可能会成为一位“杰出的总统”。好的，今天我们学习的词是exceptional…

title: overreact
article: 今天我们要学的词是overreact.Overreact动词，反应过激。President Donald Trump’s chief economic adviser told investors not to overreact to the possibility of a trade war between the U.S. and China. 美国总统川普的首席经济顾问告诉投资者说，不要对美中贸易战的可能性做出过激反应。Senator Bernie Sanders said that Israel “overreacted” during Gaza protests. 伯尼·桑德斯参议员表示，以色列方面对加沙地带的抗议活动“反应过激了”。好的，我们今天学习的词是overreact, overreact, overreact …

title: zero tolerance
article: 今天我们要学的词是zero tolerance. Zero tolerance零容忍。U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions announced a “zero-tolerance” policy on illegal border crossings into the United States. 美国司法部长塞申斯宣布，对非法入境美国者实行“零容忍”的政策。France’s Defence Minister has promised “zero tolerance” of discrimination in the armed forces. 法国国防部长保证说，对部队中存在的歧视现象将做到“零容忍”。 好的，我们今天学习的词是zero tolerance, zero tolerance, zero tolerance …

title: quota
article: 今天我们要学的词是quota. Quota 作为名词，是配额，限额的意思。A group is suing Harvard University for discrimination against Asian-American students and comparing its admission process to an illegal quota system. 一个团体正在起诉哈佛大学，指责哈佛在录取程序中对亚裔美国学生不平等对待，称这一程序好似非法的限额系统。The Department of Justice announced that it would impose quotas on immigration judges, aiming to address a backlog of nearly 700,000 unresolved immigration cases. 美国司法部宣布，要对移民法官实现配额制，力求进快解决积压的近70万件移民案。好的，我们今天学习的词是quota, quota, quota …

title: stance
article: 今天我们要学的词是stance. Stance名词，立场。French President Emmanuel Macron sharpened his stance on Syria, claiming that France has “proof” of a chemical attack earlier in April. 法国总统马克龙强化对叙利亚的立场，称法国掌握了叙利亚四月份早些时候发动化学武器攻击的“证据”。U.S. President Donald Trump ordered his top economic and trade advisers to look into rejoining the TPP, signaling his willingness to reassess his stance on the trade pact. 美国总统川普指示他的最高经济和贸易顾问，考虑重新加入跨太平洋伙伴关系协定(TPP)，显示出川普愿意重新评估他对TPP的立场。好的，我们今天学习的词是stance, stance, stance …

title: suspected
article: 今天我们要学的词是suspected. Suspected形容词，被怀疑的，疑似的。UN investigators are in Syria, trying to verify the nature of the suspected gas attack on April 7th. 联合国调查人员目前正在叙利亚，努力核实4月7日发生的疑似化学气体袭击的事件真相。Social media network Reddit said that it had banned 944 accounts suspected of links to Russia’s Internet Research Agency. 社交媒体网站红迪网说，他们已经取缔了944个被怀疑跟俄罗斯因特网研究局有关联的账户。好的，我们今天学习的词是suspected, suspected, suspected …

title: bootleg
article: 今天我们要学的词是bootleg. Bootleg作为形容词，是非法制造并销售的意思。Deaths from drinking toxic bootleg alcohol in Indonesia have surpassed 100 this month. 印度尼西亚这个月因为饮用有毒私酒致死的人数已经超过了100人。A researcher said the ban of the sale of alcohol at convenience stores and mini-marts in 2015 has encouraged bootleg liquor sales. 一位研究人员说，2015年开始实施的便利店和小商场不得卖酒的禁令刺激了黑市私酒销量的增加。好的，我们今天学习的词是bootleg, bootleg, bootleg …

title: wildlife
article: 今天我们要学的词是wildlife.Wildlife 野生动物。Experts warn that prescription and over-the-counter drugs are polluting rivers and it is taking a toll on wildlife. 有关专家警告说，处方药和非处方药正在对河流造成污染，进而使野生动物受到伤害。A new report identified Uganda as one of the common transit points for the trafficking of wildlife and wildlife products in the Central and East Africa region. 一份最新报告称，乌干达是非洲中部和东部地区走私野生动物和野生动物产品的常用中转站。好的，我们今天学习的词是wildlife, wildlife, wildlife …

title: maintenance
article: 今天我们要学的词是maintenance. Maintenance 维修，养护。The U.S. Interior Department will hike fees at the most popular national parks to $35 a vehicle to raise funds for park maintenance. 美国内政部宣布，全美游客最多的国家公园每辆车进园的门票将升至35美元，筹集资金用于公园养护。A new report says that nearly a quarter of heavy U.S. aircraft maintenance is performed offshore, up from 7% in 2003. 一份最新报告称，美国飞机大型维修近四分之一都是在海外进行的，在2003年7%的基础上大幅度上涨。好的，我们今天学习的词是maintenance, maintenance, maintenance …

title: conditions
article: 今天我们要学的词是conditions. Conditions 名词，有条件的意思。South Korean President Moon Jae-in said North Korea is not imposing conditions on the upcoming summits with him and U.S. President Donald Trump over banning nuclear weapons from the Korean peninsula. 韩国总统文在寅说，朝鲜对即将围绕朝鲜半岛去核化展开的韩朝会和川金会没有预设条件。The Palestinian group Hamas has laid down the conditions for a prisoner swap with Israel, insisting Israel release all of its members. 巴勒斯坦组织哈马斯提出了跟以色列交换在押者的条件，坚持要求以色列释放所有哈马斯成员。好的，我们今天学习的词是conditions, conditions, conditions …

title: liable
article: 今天我们要学的词是liable. Liable 形容词，有责任的，需要承担责任的。U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders introduced a bill that would implement the harshest penalties yet on drugmakers found liable for contributing to the drug epidemic. 美国联邦参议员伯尼·桑德斯提出一项议案，要求对吸毒泛滥负有责任的处方药制造商施加最严厉的惩罚。An appeals court in Wisconsin ruled that a firearms trading website can be held liable for negligence for facilitating the purchase of a gun that is subsequently used in a shooting. 威斯康辛州一家上诉法院裁定，武器交易网站可以因为玩忽职守，方便后来被用于枪击案的枪支购买负有责任。好的，我们今天学习的词是liable, liable, liable …

title: disposal
article: 今天我们要学的词是disposal. Disposal 名词，有处理，处置的意思。The disposal of an unexploded World War II bomb led to the evacuation of thousands of people in a large area in Berlin. 为拆除一枚二战期间没有引爆的炸弹，柏林疏散了一大片地区的数千名民众。Drug stores like CVS and Walgreens are installing machines for leftover prescription drug disposal in their stores. 美国CVS和沃尔格林等药店都在安装机器，方便顾客将没有吃完的处方药处理掉。好的，我们今天学习的词是disposal, disposal, disposal …

title: malign
article: 今天我们要学的词是malign. Malign 作为形容词，有恶意的意思。Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg admitted the company had not been proactive in safeguarding its users from misuse of data or those sowing malign messages. 脸书首席执行官扎克伯格承认，脸书没有主动采取措施，保护用户不受数据滥用或恶意信息传播的伤害。British lawmakers set up a special task force to better understand the extent of Moscow’s “malign influence.” 英国议员成立了一个专项小组，以便能更好地了解莫斯科“恶意影响力”的波及范畴。好的，我们今天学习的词是malign, malign, malign …

title: irreversible
article: 今天我们要学的词是irreversible. Irreversible 形容词，不可逆转的。The European Union’s top diplomat welcomed North Korea’s announcement of stopping nuclear tests, and called for an “irreversible denuclearization” of North Korea. 欧盟首席外交官对朝鲜宣布停止核试验表示欢迎，并敦促朝鲜“不可逆转地去核化”。Scientists say that global warming has caused irreversible damage to Australia’s Great Barrier Reef. 科学家说，全球气候变暖给澳大利亚的大堡礁造成了不可逆转的破坏。好的，我们今天学习的词是irreversible, irreversible, irreversible …

title: redacted
article: 今天我们要学的词是redacted.Redacted 形容词，意思是内容经审查后被遮盖的。The Republican-led House intelligence committee released a redacted report, saying it found no evidence that the Trump campaign colluded with Russia in the 2016 presidential election. 共和党人领导的众议院情报委员会公布了一份部分内容被遮盖的报告，称没有发现川普竞选团队在2016年总统大选中跟俄罗斯勾结的证据。Switzerland published a heavily redacted report on an anti-communist paramilitary group during the cold war era. 瑞士公布了一份有关冷战时期一个反共民兵团体的报告，但是报告中很多内容被遮盖。好的，我们今天学习的词是redacted, redacted, redacted …

title: turning point
article: 今天我们要学的词是turning point. Turning point 转折点。The sentencing of Indonesia’s former Speaker of the House is seen as a turning point in the country’s war on corruption. 印度尼西亚前议长被判刑被看成是印尼反腐战争的一个转折点。Former Vice President Al Gore said he sees an impending “turning point” for climate action in this country, much like other social movements. 前美国副总统戈尔说，他预见美国在应对气候变化的行动上很快会呈现一个“转折点”，就像其它社会运动一样。好的，我们今天学习的词是turning point, turning point, turning point …

title: open letter
article: 今天我们要学的词是open letter. Open letter 公开信。Myanmar’s civil groups signed an open letter to the country’s president, urging him to immediately release two Reuters reporters. 缅甸民权团体签署了一份呈交给缅甸总统的公开信，敦促他立即释放两名被押的路透社记者。An open letter published in a French newspaper condemning a “new anti-Semitism” in France has stirred heated debate in the country. 在一份法国报纸上发表的一封公开信谴责法国出现了“新一轮反犹太主义思潮”，引起法国国内的激烈辩论。好的，我们今天学习的词是open letter, open letter, open letter …

title: warfare
article: 今天我们要学的词是warfare. Warfare战争。Russia has aggressively engaged in information warfare against the West for a decade, said a declassified U.S congressional panel report. 美国国会一个小组委员会新近解密的报告称，俄罗斯过去十年里一直在积极展开对西方国家的信息战。The Trump administration has sent to Congress its national policy for cyberspace and cyber warfare. 川普政府向国会提交了涉及网络空间和空间战的美国国家政策报告。好的，我们今天学习的词是warfare, warfare, warfare …

title: fabricated
article: 今天我们要学的词是fabricated. Fabricated形容词，捏造的。The Syrian government denies that any chemical attack took place in early April, saying it was fabricated or staged by the rebels. 叙利亚政府否认4月初曾发动化学气体攻击行动，说这是反政府武装捏造或导演的。A MSNBC host stood by her claim that hackers “fabricated” old blog posts to make her appear homophobic. MSNBC的一位主持人坚持说，是黑客在她博客帐户里假造了旧帖子，让她听起来对同性恋持有偏见。好的，我们今天学习的词是fabricated, fabricated, fabricated …

title: time zone
article: 今天我们要学的词是time zone. Time zone时区。North Korea readjusted its time zone to match South Korea’s last Saturday. 朝鲜上星期六调整时区，开始跟韩国的时区保持一致。The Koreas used the same time zone for decades before the North created its own “Pyongyang Time” in 2015 by setting its clocks 30 minutes behind South Korea and Japan. 韩国和朝鲜在2015年前的几十年使用的一直都是同样的时区，直到2015年朝鲜创建了自己的所谓“平壤时间”，比韩国和日本的时间晚30分钟。好的，我们今天学习的词是time zone, time zone, time zone …

title: temporary
article: 今天我们要学的词是temporary. Temporary形容词，临时的。The Trump administration will end temporary protections for immigrants in the United States from Honduras, leaving potentially 57,000 people vulnerable to deportation. 川普政府将终止对美国境内洪都拉斯移民的临时保护，5万7千多人可能因此面临遣返。The Venezuelan government announced its decision to assume temporary control over the country’s leading private bank for 90 days. 委内瑞拉政府宣布，对委内瑞拉最大的私人银行实行90天的临时接管。好的，我们今天学习的词是temporary, temporary, temporary …

title: substantive
article: 今天我们要学的词是substantive. Substantive形容词，实质性的。U.S. President Donald Trump said a time and place have been determined for the planned meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, and Washington and Pyongyang are engaged in “very substantive talks.” 美国总统川普说，已经确定了与朝鲜领导人金正恩会面的时间和地点，美朝正在展开“非常实质性的对话”。Brexit Secretary David Davis told lawmakers that he wants a “very substantive” agreement on future relations with the EU in place by October. 英国脱欧大臣戴维斯告诉议员说，他希望在10月底以前看到英国和欧盟就双方未来的关系达成具有“实质性的协议”。好的，我们今天学习的词是 substantive, substantive, substantive …

title: follower
article: 今天我们要学的词是follower. Follower 名词，追随者，粉丝。European Commission President Jean-Claude Juncker says German philosopher Karl Marx shouldn’t be judged for the crimes that his followers committed decades after his death. 欧盟委员会主席容克说，不应该用德国哲学家马克思去世后他的追随者们犯下的罪行来评价他。Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi is the most liked world leader when it comes to Facebook popularity, with 43.2 million followers on the social media platform. 印度总理莫迪在社交媒体脸书上有4320万粉丝，是脸书上粉丝人数最多的国际领导人。好的，我们今天学习的词是 follower, follower, follower …

title: turmoil
article: 今天我们要学的词是turmoil. Turmoil 名词，意思是混乱。A suicide-attack against the headquarters of the Libyan electoral commission has thrown plans for parliamentary and presidential elections into turmoil. 利比亚选举委员会受到的自杀式袭击让利比亚的国会和总统选举计划陷入了混乱状态。The Swedish Academy decided not to give the Nobel Prize for Literature this year because of a sexual misconduct scandal that has caused turmoil in its ranks. 鉴于性丑闻在瑞典学院内部引起的混乱，瑞典学院决定今年暂停颁发诺贝尔文学奖。好的，我们今天学习的词是 turmoil, turmoil, turmoil …

title: predecessor
article: 今天我们要学的词是predecessor. Predecessor前任。Malaysia’s new Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad said his predecessor, former Prime Minister Najib Razak, was barred from leaving the country. 马来西亚新当选的总理马哈蒂尔说，他的前任，马来西亚前总理纳吉布已经被禁止离境。U.S. President Donald Trump pulled out of the Iran deal, the signature foreign policy achievement of his predecessor Barack Obama. 美国总统川普宣布退出伊朗协议，这是他的前任奥巴马总统取得的标志性外交政策成就。 好的，我们今天学习的词是 predecessor, predecessor, predecessor …

title: finalize
article: 今天我们要学的词是finalize. To finalize意思是最后敲定。U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo finalized details of the June 12th summit between North Korean leader Kim Jong-un and U.S. President Donald Trump last week. 美国国务卿蓬佩奥上周最后敲定了朝鲜领导人金正恩和美国总统川普6月12日峰会的细节。Ugandan President Yoweri Museveni directed government officials to finalize a $2.3 billion Chinese loan for a new railway by September. 乌干达总统约韦里·穆塞韦尼指示政府官员在9月底以前完成从中国借23亿美元新建铁路的贷款项目。好的，我们今天学习的词是 finalize, finalize, finalize …

title: symbolic
article: 今天我们要学的词是symbolic. Symbolic形容词，意思是有象征性的，有象征意义的。Two black men arrested for sitting in a Philadelphia Starbucks without ordering anything settled with the city for a symbolic $1 each. 在费城一家星巴克因光坐着，不点东西被捕的两名黑人男子跟费城市政府和解，每人接受了政府象征性的一美元赔偿。In a symbolic move, The United States opened its new embassy in Jerusalem, changing its decades-old policy of withholding recognition of Jerusalem as Israel’s capital. 美国在耶路撒冷开设新使馆，这一带有象征意义的举动改变了美国几十年来不正式承认耶路撒冷是以色列首都的政策。好的，我们今天学习的词是 symbolic, symbolic, symbolic …

title: subject to
article: 今天我们要学的词是subject to. Subject to形容词，有受制于，被迫接受的意思。U.S. diplomats and embassy staff in Pakistan have recently complained of being subject to searches and questioning by intelligence officials when leaving the embassy compound. 美国驻巴基斯坦外交官和使馆工作人员最近抱怨说，离开使馆会受到巴基斯坦情报官员的搜查和问讯。New U.S. ambassador to Germany, Richard Grenell, warned that German companies continuing to work with Iran could be subject to U.S. penalties. 美国派驻德国的新大使理查德·格雷内尔警告德国公司，继续跟伊朗做生意可能会受到美国的责罚。好的，我们今天学习的词是 subject to, subject to, subject to …

title: worst case scenario
article: 今天我们要学的词是worst case scenario. Worst case scenario最坏的情况。The World Health Organization said it is preparing for “the worst case scenario” for an Ebola outbreak in the Democratic Republic of Congo. 世界卫生组织说，正在为埃博拉病毒在刚果民主共和国的爆发做“最坏的打算”。The Hawaii National Guard is preparing for a worst-case scenario more than a week after Hawaii’s Kilauea volcano erupted. 夏威夷基拉韦厄火山一个多星期前爆发，夏威夷国民警卫队正在为最坏的情况做准备。好的，我们今天学习的词是 worst case scenario, worst case scenario, worst case scenario …

title: take off
article: 今天我们要学的词是take off.To take off意思是起飞。A Boeing 737 with 113 people aboard crashed and burned just after taking off from a Havana airport. 一架载有113人的波音737客机从古巴哈瓦那一家机场起飞后不久坠机起火。China’s Air Force said that several bombers, including the H-6K, took off from an undisclosed air base, and made a simulated strike against sea targets before landing on an island reef in the South China Sea. 中国空军说，轰-6K等多型多架轰炸机，从某空军基地起飞，进行海上目标模拟打击后，在南中国海的一处岛礁进行了起降训练。好的，我们今天学习的词是 take off, take off, take off …

title: slum
article: 今天我们要学的词是slum. Slum贫民窟。The United Nations human rights chief has slammed Israel, saying that 1.9 million people in Gaza are “caged in a toxic slum from birth to death.” 联合国人权事务高级专员批评以色列，说加沙地带190万人“从生到死一直都被关在毒气冲天的贫民窟牢笼里”。Four members of an NGO that provided sanitary products in the slums of Mumbai were invited to the royal wedding of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle.一个为孟买贫民窟居民提供卫生用品的非政府组织的四位成员应邀出席了英国王子哈里和梅根·马克尔的皇家婚礼。好的，我们今天学习的词是 slum, slum, slum …

title: salvage
article: 今天我们要学的词是salvage. Salvage动词，有拯救，挽救的意思。South Korean President Moon Jae-in’s visit to Washington on Tuesday was focused on how to salvage the upcoming Trump-Kim summit. 韩国总统文在寅星期二访问华盛顿，重点目的是要设法挽救即将举行的川普和金正恩的峰会。Britain, France and Germany are trying to salvage economic and trade ties with Tehran after the U.S. pulled out of the Iran nuclear deal. 美国宣布撤出伊朗核协议后，英国、法国和德国正在努力挽救与德黑兰之间的经济和贸易纽带。好的，我们今天学习的词是 salvage, salvage, salvage …

title: downward
article: 今天我们要学的词是downward. Downward作为形容词，有向下的意思。The U.S. prison population extended an eight-year downward trend that has been driven by federal and state sentencing reforms over the past decade. 过去10年美国联邦和各州判刑制度的改革，使美国监狱人口出现连续8年的跌势。The United Nations revised the forecast for economies in transition including Russia and the world’s poorest countries to “marginally downward” for 2018. 联合国将包括俄罗斯在内的过渡型经济和世界上最贫穷的经济体2018年的经济增长速度调整为“少许下滑”。好的，我们今天学习的词是 downward, downward, downward …

title: nosedive
article: 今天我们要学的词是nosedive. Nosedive作为动词，是大跌，暴跌的意思。New CDC research shows that birth rates for teens in the United States continued to nosedive in 2017, dropping 7 percent from the year before. 美国疾病控制与预防中心的最新研究数字显示，2017年美国十几岁年龄段的生育率继续大跌，比一年前下降了7%。Western European smartphone shipments nosedived in the first quarter of 2018, according to a market research company. 一家市场调研公司表示，西欧智能手机的货运量2018年第一季度大幅度下跌。好的，我们今天学习的词是 nosedive, nosedive, nosedive …

title: call off
article: 今天我们要学的词是call off. Call off意思是取消。President Donald Trump called off his planned June 12th summit in Singapore with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un. 美国总统川普取消了原定6月12日与朝鲜最高领导人金正恩在新加坡举行的峰会。The Malaysian government confirmed that the search for the missing flight MH370 will be officially called off this week. 马来西亚政府证实，MH370失踪客机的搜寻工作将于这个星期正式取消。好的，我们今天学习的词是 call off, call off, call off …

title: partner
article: 今天我们要学的词是partner. Partner伙伴。Colombian President Juan Manuel Santos announced that his country will formally become NATO’s first Latin American “global partner,” beginning this week. 哥伦比亚总统桑托斯宣布，哥伦比亚本周起将正式成为北约在拉丁美洲的第一个“全球伙伴”。好的，我们今天学习的词是 partner, partner, partner …

title: getaway
article: 今天我们要学的词是getaway。 Getaway, 是逃跑的意思。 “The police found the getaway car in the robbery case,” 警方找到了抢劫犯开的车。我们常说weekend getaway，这里的意思可不是逃跑，而是利用周末的时间跑出去玩。九月二号是美国劳工节，也标志着夏天的结束。 “Many families like to have a Labor Day getaway before school starts,” 很多家庭都喜欢在学校开学前借着劳工节的机会最后出去玩一趟。 “The husband planned a romantic getaway for the couple’s ten-year anniversary,” 丈夫筹划了一次浪漫的假期，庆祝夫妇两人结婚十周年。好的，今天我们学习的词是getaway…

title: invitation
article: 今天我们要学的词是invitation. Invitation 名词，意思是邀请，邀请函。Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov accepted an invitation to visit North Korea last month. 俄罗斯外交部长拉夫罗夫上个月接受了出访朝鲜的邀请。The United States withdrew an invitation for China to participate in a multinational naval drill hosted by the U.S. 美国撤销了邀请中国参加一次由美国主办的多国联合海上军事演习的邀约。好的，我们今天学习的词是 invitation, invitation, invitation…

title: boycott
article: 今天我们要学的词是boycott. Boycott 动词，意思是抵制。A former Russian oil tycoon-turned-dissident said fellow Kremlin critics should not boycott the upcoming 2018 FIFA World Cup held in Russia. 一位原俄罗斯石油大亨，后来成为异议人士的人说，克里姆林宫的批评者不应该抵制即将在俄罗斯召开的2018年足球世界杯比赛。Human Rights Watch recently called on world leaders to boycott the tournament’s opening ceremony unless Putin takes steps to protect Syrian civilians. 人权观察最近呼吁国际领导人抵制世界杯开幕式，除非普京采取保护叙利亚平民的措施。好的，我们今天学习的词是 boycott, boycott, boycott…

title: roadmap
article: 今天我们要学的词是roadmap. Roadmap 路线图，行动方案。The United States and Turkey have agreed on a roadmap to resolve the future of the northern Syrian city of Manbij。美国和土耳其就解决叙利亚北部城市曼比季的未来达成了行动路线图。Rival Libyan leaders tentatively agreed on a roadmap leading to parliamentary and presidential elections on Dec. 10th. 利比亚对立派系领袖暂时就12月10日举行议会和总统选举的计划达成了一致意见。好的，我们今天学习的词是 roadmap, roadmap, roadmap …

title: misstep
article: 今天我们要学的词是misstep. Misstep 有过失的意思。The head of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, Scott Pruitt, is facing a growing list of accusations related to his spending and reported ethical missteps. 美国环保署署长斯科特·普鲁特面临涉及其开销和职业道德过失的指控日益增加。Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg has apologized for a privacy misstep involving the political consulting firm Cambridge Analytica. 脸书首席执行官扎克伯格为脸书涉及政治咨询公司剑桥分析公司的用户隐私的过失进行道歉。好的，我们今天学习的词是 misstep, misstep, misstep …

title: representative
article: 今天我们要学的词是representative. Representative 代表。Representatives from major political parties in Pakistan urged the Election Commission to bar militant-turned-political parties from participating in the election. 巴基斯坦主要政党代表敦促选举委员会，禁止激进分子改立的政党参加选举。Student representatives of the University of California said that while the Board of Regents has improved in diversity in recent years, it’s still mainly composed of wealthier, white males. 加州州立大学的学生代表说，尽管州立大学校董会的多元化近年来有所改善，但主要成员依然是有钱的白人男性。好的，我们今天学习的词是 representative, representative, representative …

title: espionage
article: 今天我们要学的词是espionage. Espionage 间谍活动。A former U.S. intelligence officer was charged with attempted espionage for trying to sell secrets to China. 一名前美国情报官员被指控试图从事间谍行动，向中国出售机密情报。A Russian court has found a Ukrainian journalist guilty of espionage and sentenced him to 12 years in prison。俄罗斯一家法院认定一名乌克兰记者犯有间谍罪，并判处他12年徒刑。好的，我们今天学习的词是 espionage, espionage, espionage …

title: undergo
article: 今天我们要学的词是undergo. Undergo 经历，经受。Most women diagnosed with early stages of common forms of breast cancer may be able to avoid having to undergo chemotherapy, according to a new study. 最新研究认为，大多数被诊断出早期常见乳腺癌的女性可能不必接受化疗。Having safely returned to Earth after completing a five-month mission, three astronauts will undergo medical tests in Karaganda before flying back their countries. 完成5个月的太空使命后安全返回地面的3名宇航员要在卡拉干达接受医疗检查后才能乘机返回自己的国家。好的，我们今天学习的词是 undergo, undergo, undergo …

title: victim
article: 今天我们要学的词是victim. Victim 受害者。Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull says he will offer a formal apology later this year to victims of institutional child sexual abuse. 澳大利亚总理特恩布尔说，他今年晚些时候会向在各种机构里发生的儿童性侵案受害者正式道歉。Colombia’s child protection agency has identified 350 Venezuelan children who were victims of child labor in Colombia since March. 哥伦比亚儿童保护机构确认，三月份以来，已经在哥伦比亚发现了350名来自委内瑞拉的童工受害者。好的，我们今天学习的词是 victim, victim, victim …

title: commit to
article: 今天我们要学的词是commit to. To commit to something意思是承诺做某事。The Singapore summit ended with the United States and North Korea committing to denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula. 新加坡峰会结束，美国和朝鲜共同承诺，要致力于在朝鲜半岛上实现无核化。Burger King has committed to using recyclable packaging in all its 500 UK stores by 2025. 汉堡王承诺，要在2025年之前让汉堡王在英国的500家分店全部使用可回收的包装。好的，我们今天学习的词是 commit to, commit to, commit to …

title: approval
article: 今天我们要学的词是approval. Approval名词，有赞成，批准的意思。AT&T won approval from a U.S. court to buy Time Warner for $85 billion. 美国电话电报公司赢得了一家法院的批准，斥资850亿美元收购时代华纳公司。World leaders mostly voiced approval for Tuesday’s agreement between U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un. 国际领导人大多对美国总统川普和朝鲜领导人金正恩星期二达成的协议表示赞同。好的，我们今天学习的词是 approval, approval, approval …

title: welfare
article: 今天我们要学的词是welfare. Welfare 有福利的意思。French President Emmanuel Macron said France should stop throwing large amounts of cash into a welfare system that doesn’t rescue the poor from poverty. 法国总统马克龙说，法国应该停止将大笔资金投入一个不能让穷人摆脱贫困的福利系统。Italy’s new coalition government has promised to roll back pension reform, cut taxes and boost welfare spending. 意大利新的联合政府保证要取消退休金改革，降低税收，提高政府的福利支出。好的，我们今天学习的词是 welfare, welfare, welfare …

title: spike
article: 今天我们要学的词是spike. Spike 作为动词，有猛增的意思。The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reported that suicide rates rose in nearly every U.S. state from 1999 to 2016, with the rate spiking by more than 30 percent in half of the country. 美国疾病控制与预防中心报告说，1999到2016年间，美国几乎所有州的自杀率都出现增长，其中一半地区的自杀率猛增30%以上。The number of families caught entering the United States illegally at its southwest border spiked in May, compared with the same month in 2017. 美国西南边界地带5月份因非法入境被拦截的家庭数量跟2017年同月相比大幅度增加。好的，我们今天学习的词是 spike, spike, spike …

title: credibility
article: 今天我们要学的词是credibility. Credibility 名词，信誉，可信度。The U.S. government is shutting down a planned study testing whether moderate drinking has health benefits over concerns that its funding by the alcohol industry would compromise its credibility. 美国政府取消了一项计划中有关适量饮酒是否有益健康的研究，担心研究经费由制酒业买单会影响研究的可信度。The U.S. Justice Department’s internal auditor sharply criticized former FBI Director James Comey for “damaging the FBI’s credibility.” 美国司法部内部审计部门对联邦调查局前局长科米提出严肃批评，说他“伤害了联调局的信誉”。好的，我们今天学习的词是 credibility, credibility, credibility …

title: advisory
article: 今天我们要学的词是advisory. Advisory 名词，有公告，通告的意思。The U.S. State Department has issued a travel advisory for Russia, urging Americans to “reconsider” their travel plans “due to terrorism and harassment.” 美国国务院发布俄罗斯旅行公告，敦促美国公民鉴于“恐怖主义和骚扰的威胁”，“重新”考虑去俄罗斯的计划。The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention issued an official health advisory on June 11 regarding an ongoing hepatitis A outbreak. 美国疾病控制与预防中心6月11日就正在发生的甲肝疫情，发布了官方健康公告。好的，我们今天学习的词是 advisory, advisory, advisory …

title: identify
article: 今天我们要学的词是identify. To identify意思是发现，确认。The United States is renewing calls for the Cuban government to identify the source of the attacks on U.S. diplomats since late 2016. 美国再次要求古巴政府确认2016年年底以来对美国驻古巴外交人员造成伤害的原因。Computer analysts have identified a fresh hacking campaign conducted by North Korea, just days after Trump’s historic summit with Kim Jong-un. 川普和金正恩进行历史性会晤短短几天后，电脑分析人员就发现，朝鲜发动了新一轮的黑客袭击。好的，我们今天学习的词是 identify, identify, identify …

title: cryptocurrency
article: 今天我们要学的词是cryptocurrency. Cryptocurrency加密货币。Switzerland’s government has requested a report into the risks and opportunities of launching its own cryptocurrency. 瑞士政府要求有关部门就启用自己的加密货币的风险和机遇提出研究报告。Illegal gambling operators have ramped up activities in Asia ahead of the World Cup, using savvy technology and cryptocurrencies to evade detection. 世界杯开始前，亚洲各地的非法博彩业主就开始加紧行动，靠先进技术和加密货币来避免被发现。好的，我们今天学习的词是 cryptocurrency, cryptocurrency, cryptocurrency …

title: original
article: 今天我们要学的词是original. Original做为形容词，有原创的意思。Apple Inc. announced a multiyear deal with media mogul Oprah Winfrey to create original content. 苹果公司宣布，已经与媒体巨人奥普拉·温弗瑞达成多年合约，由温弗瑞为苹果公司提供原创内容。As part of Apple’s push into original programming, Apple is also reportedly talking to an Irish animation studio about producing an animated feature film. 据报，苹果公司也在与一家爱尔兰动画工作室就制作一部动画电影进行接洽，这是苹果进军原创节目领域的一部分。好的，我们今天学习的词是 original, original, original …

title: reunite
article: 今天我们要学的词是reunite. Reunite作为动词，有团聚，重逢的意思。U.S. President Donald Trump told federal agencies to reunite immigrant families separated after illegally crossing into the country from Mexico. 美国总统川普下令联邦机构，让那些从墨西哥非法入境后被分开的家庭团聚。However, experts say there is no system in place to reunite separated families, and it is easier said than done. 然而，有关专家说，目前并没有帮助离散家庭团聚的相关体系，因此这件事说起来容易，落实恐怕并不简单。好的，我们今天学习的词是 reunite, reunite, reunite …

title: logistics
article: 今天我们要学的词是logistics. Logistics作为名词，有后勤保障的意思。The Defense Department is trying to figure out the logistics for how to provide up to 20,000 temporary beds for the immigrant children. 美国国防部正在研究如何保证为2万个移民孩子提供临时床铺。U.S. National Security Adviser John Bolton met with Russian officials to work out logistics, including the date, time, and location for the planned summit between Trump and Putin. 美国国家安全顾问博尔顿会见俄罗斯官员，为计划进行的川普和普京的峰会做细致安排，包括会面日期、时间和地点等。好的，我们今天学习的词是 logistics, logistics, logistics …

title: engagement
article: 今天我们要学的词是engagement. Engagement作为名词，有接触的意思。Reunions of families separated since the Korean War will resume in August as part of the renewed engagement between the two Koreas. 韩战离散家庭的团聚活动八月份恢复，这是朝鲜和韩国最近重新开始接触后进展的一部分。The United Nations special rapporteur on North Korea says “this is the time” for North Korea to start human rights dialogue and engagement. 联合国朝鲜问题特使说，朝鲜就人权问题进行对话和接触的“时机已到”。好的，我们今天学习的词是 engagement, engagement, engagement …

title: mental disorder
article: 今天我们要学的词是mental disorder. Mental disorder精神疾病。For the first time, the World Health Organization is classifying gaming disorder as a mental disorder. 世界卫生组织首次将游戏成瘾归类为一种精神疾病。At the same time, the World Health Organization also decided that being transgender is not a mental disorder. 与此同时，世界卫生组织也确定，跨性别者不是一种精神疾病的体现。好的，我们今天学习的词是 mental disorder, mental disorder, mental disorder …

title: pinpoint
article: 今天我们要学的词是pinpoint. Pinpoint动词，意思是精准定位。The U.S. Supreme Court imposed limits on the ability of police to obtain cellphone data pinpointing the past location of criminal suspects. 美国联邦最高法院对警察获取手机数据，定位刑事犯罪嫌疑人过往所在位置的权力加以限制。Apple is trying to automatically deliver reliable information pinpointing the location of 911 calls made from iPhones to emergency response centers in the U.S. 苹果公司正设法将用iPhone拨打911求救电话者的可靠位置自动传送给美国各地的应急中心。好的，我们今天学习的词是 pinpoint, pinpoint, pinpoint …

title: uphold
article: 今天我们要学的词是uphold. Uphold动词，有支持，赞成的意思。The Supreme Court of the United States upheld the Trump administration’s travel restrictions on citizens from five mainly Muslim countries. 美国联邦最高法院支持川普政府对5个穆斯林国家实施的旅行禁令。The EU and China pledged to uphold the multilateral trading system and agreed to set up a working group to look at updating the WTO. 欧盟和中国承诺继续支持多边贸易体系，并同意设立一个研究如何对世贸组织进行革新的工作小组。好的，我们今天学习的词是 uphold, uphold, uphold …

title: joint venture
article: 今天我们要学的词是joint venture. Joint venture合资企业。U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said the U.S. can block companies from forming joint ventures in China if there are critical technology transfers involved. 美国财政部长姆努钦说，如果涉及关键技术转移，美国可以阻止美国公司在中国成立合资企业。Airbus and Thai Airways International have confirmed that they will set up a new joint venture at U-Tapao International Airport in eastern Thailand. 空中客车和泰国国际航空公司证实，将在泰国东部的乌塔保国际机场成立一个新的合资企业。好的，我们今天学习的词是 joint venture, joint venture, joint venture …

title: upgrade
article: 今天我们要学的词是upgrade. Upgrade做为动词，有升级的意思。A monitoring group says satellite imagery has shown that North Korea is making rapid upgrades to a nuclear research facility. 一个监督组织说，卫星图片显示，朝鲜正在对朝鲜的一个核研究设施进行快速改善升级。Royal Caribbean Cruise Line invested $120 million to upgrade a 15-year-old ship in an effort to attract younger consumers. 皇家加勒比海游轮投资1.2亿美元，对一艘15年的游轮升级改造，力图吸引更年轻的消费者。好的，我们今天学习的词是 upgrade, upgrade, upgrade …

title: approach
article: 今天我们要学的词是approach. Approach作为名词，有方式方法的意思。President Donald Trump endorsed U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin’s approach to restricting Chinese investments in U.S. technology companies. 美国总统川普支持美国财政部长姆努钦限制中国投资美国高科技公司的做法。German Chancellor Angela Merkel emphasized the need for a European approach to dealing with the influx of asylum seekers. 德国总理默克尔强调，外来的避难申请者纷沓而至，欧洲需要找到一个解决办法。好的，我们今天学习的词是approach, approach, approach …

title: reliance
article: 今天我们要学的词是original. Original做为形容词，有原创的意思。Apple Inc. announced a multiyear deal with media mogul Oprah Winfrey to create original content. 苹果公司宣布，已经与媒体巨人奥普拉·温弗瑞达成多年合约，由温弗瑞为苹果公司提供原创内容。As part of Apple’s push into original programming, Apple is also reportedly talking to an Irish animation studio about producing an animated feature film. 据报，苹果公司也在与一家爱尔兰动画工作室就制作一部动画电影进行接洽，这是苹果进军原创节目领域的一部分。好的，我们今天学习的词是 original, original, original …

title: poison
article: 今天我们要学的词是poison. Poison作为动词，是下毒的意思。A British couple were left in critical condition after exposure to an unknown substance a few miles from where a former Russian spy and his daughter were poisoned by a nerve agent a few months ago. 一对英国夫妇接触“不明物质”后生命危急，事发几英里外就是数月前原俄罗斯间谍和他的女儿遭受神经毒剂袭击的地方。German authorities have arrested a man suspected of killing 21 co-workers by poisoning their food. 德国有关当局逮捕了一名男子，他涉嫌在食物里下毒，杀死了21名同事。好的，我们今天学习的词是poison, poison, poison …

title: separatist
article: 今天我们要学的词是separatist. Separatist是分离主义者的意思。Six jailed Catalan separatist politicians have been moved to prisons closer to their homes. 六名被关押的加泰罗尼亚分离主义政治人物已经被转移到离他们住家更近的监狱关押。Separatist and far-right attacks have increased in Europe, particularly in the U.K., according to the Europol. 欧洲刑警组织说，分离主义者和极右翼分子发动的袭击事件在欧洲有所增加，尤其是在英国。好的，我们今天学习的词是separatist, separatist, separatist …

title: rescind
article: 今天我们要学的词是rescind. Rescind作为动词，有撤销，废除的意思。The Trump administration has rescinded policies that direct colleges and universities to increase diversity by considering race in college admissions. 川普政府废除了要求大学在录取过程中考虑种族因素以便提升学生多元化的政策。Amnesty International called on the Ugandan government to rescind a new tax on social media access, calling it an attempt to smother dissent disguised as a measure to raise revenue. 国际特赦组织呼吁乌干达政府撤销对使用社交媒体征税的做法，称这是以增加税收为由打压异己声音。好的，我们今天学习的词是rescind, rescind, rescind …

title: cover up
article: 今天我们要学的词是cover up. To cover up意思是掩盖事实。An Australian archbishop was sentenced to a year in detention for covering up child sexual abuse by a priest. 澳大利亚一名大主教因为掩盖一名神父性侵儿童的行为被判处一年监禁。An inquiry into a UK contaminated blood scandal in the 1970s and 1980s will look at whether authorities tried to cover up the scandal. 英国对上世纪七、八十年代的血液污染丑闻展开调查，看看有关当局是否曾试图掩盖事实真相。好的，我们今天学习的词是cover up, cover up, cover up …

title: tit for tat
article: 今天我们要学的词是tit-for-tat.Tit-for-tat意思是针锋相对，以牙还牙。Islamist militants’ attacks and tit-for-tat violence between rival ethnic groups have cast doubt on Mali’s upcoming elections. 伊斯兰国激进分子的袭击和对立族群间针锋相对的暴力冲突给马里即将举行的选举带来了不确定性。The tit-for-tat tariffs between Washington and Beijing are sending tremors through the global economy. 华盛顿和北京之间针锋相对的关税战给全球经济带来了震感。好的，我们今天学习的词是tit-for-tat, tit-for-tat, tit-for-tat …

title: alliance
article: 今天我们要学的词是alliance. Alliance 联盟。NATO leaders agreed to formally invite Macedonia to begin accession talks to join the Western alliance. 北约各国领导人一致同意，正式邀请马其顿围绕加入这个西方联盟组织展开谈判。Former Pakistani Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif has accused a covert military-judiciary alliance of trying to keep him out of politics. 巴基斯坦前总理谢里夫一直都在指责说，是巴基斯坦军方和司法部门秘密联手，设法阻止他参政。好的，我们今天学习的词是alliance, alliance, alliance …

title: conspiracy
article: 今天我们要学的词是conspiracy. Conspiracy 阴谋。A federal grand jury indicted 12 Russian military intelligence officers with conspiracy to interfere in the 2016 presidential election. 一个大陪审团对12名俄罗斯军方情报官员提出起诉，罪名是阴谋干预2016年美国总统大选。A jailed Ukrainian filmmaker who was sentenced to 20 years in prison for conspiracy to commit terror acts has been on a hunger strike since mid-May. 一名以阴谋制造恐怖行动的罪名被判20年监禁的乌克兰电影制作人5月中旬以来一直绝食。好的，我们今天学习的词是conspiracy, conspiracy, conspiracy …

title: lobby
article: 今天我们要学的词是lobby. Lobby 做为动词，意思是游说。China tried to step up pressure on Washington in their growing tariff war by suggesting that U.S. companies should lobby American leaders. 在日益升级的美中关税战中，为了对华盛顿施加压力，中国建议美国公司出面游说美国领导人。Environmentalists lobbied the Auckland council to shut down housing developments detrimental to a nearby marine reserve. 环保主义者游说奥克兰市政会叫停对附近一个海洋保护区有害的住房开发项目。好的，我们今天学习的词是lobby, lobby, lobby …

title: high resolution
article: 今天我们要学的词是 high-resolution. High-resolution 高分辨率的。Using high-resolution satellite images, researchers estimate 84 percent of the world’s population live in urban areas. 研究人员依靠高分辨率的卫星图像估计，世界上84%的人口都居住在城镇地区。Researchers have captured the highest-resolution image to date of the Zika virus. 研究人员捕捉到了寨卡病毒迄今为止分辨率最高的图像。好的，我们今天学习的词是high-resolution, high-resolution, high-resolution …

title: breastfeeding
article: 今天我们要学的词是 breastfeeding. Breastfeeding 母乳喂养。U.S. government officials disputed a New York Times report that the government opposed a WTO resolution supporting breastfeeding. 美国政府官员否认纽约时报关于美国政府反对世界卫生组织支持母乳喂养决议案的报道。The WTO says breastfeeding all babies for the first two years would save the lives of more than 820,000 children under the age of five every year. 世界卫生组织说，两岁以前持续母乳喂养每年可以挽救82万名5岁以下儿童的生命。好的，我们今天学习的词是breastfeeding, breastfeeding, breastfeeding …

title: covert
article: 今天我们要学的词是 covert. Covert 形容词，隐秘的。Russia’s Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov complained to U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo about the arrest of a Russian woman on allegations of being a covert agent. 俄罗斯外长拉夫罗夫就美国以秘密特工的罪名抓捕一名俄罗斯女子一事向美国国务卿蓬佩奥提出不满。A team of researchers at the Middlebury Institute have located a suspected covert uranium enrichment plant in North Korea. 蒙特雷国际研究院的一个研究小组发现了朝鲜一个被怀疑在秘密进行铀浓缩的工厂。好的，我们今天学习的词是covert, covert, covert …

title: compel
article: 今天我们要学的词是 compel. Compel 动词，有强迫的意思。U.S. Democratic lawmakers are trying to compel a government interpreter to testify about what was discussed during President Donald Trump’s one-on-one meeting with Russian leader Vladimir Putin. 美国民主党议员希望能强迫一名政府翻译在国会作证，讲述美国总统川普和俄罗斯总统普京单独会面时的谈话内容。The U.N. Commission of Inquiry on Syria condemned the systematic and strategic use of Syrian military forces to encircle and starve the civilian population to compel surrender. 联合国叙利亚调查委员会谴责叙利亚军方以围困手段逼迫平民投降的惯用策略。好的，我们今天学习的词是compel, compel, compel …

title: contract
article: 今天我们要学的词是 contract. Contract作为动词，有收缩的意思。South Korea’s central bank estimated that North Korea’s economy contracted at the sharpest rate in two decades in 2017. 韩国中央银行估计，朝鲜2017年的经济出现了20年最大幅度的收缩。Government statistics show Argentina’s economy contracted 0.9 percent in April compared to the same month the year before. 政府的统计数字显示，阿根廷经济四月份同比收缩了0.9%。好的，我们今天学习的词是contract, contract, contract …

title: wage
article: 今天我们要学的词是 wage. Wage 作为动词，有发动的意思。A top CIA expert on Asia said that China is waging a “quiet kind of cold war” against the United States. 中央情报局一位亚洲问题专家说，中国正在对美国发动一场“静悄悄的冷战”。The Philippine military estimates that about 3,900 Marxist insurgents continue to wage a low-level, rural-based rebellion, which has raged since 1969. 菲律宾军方估计，还有大约3900名反叛力量继续自1969年以来的最基层的，以农村地区为主要阵地的反叛活动。好的，我们今天学习的词是wage, wage, wage …

title: vigilante
article: 今天我们要学的词是 vigilante. Vigilante 名词，指的是自发维护治安的人。Suspected vigilantes killed a Muslim man transporting two cows in India, spotlighting the growing influence of pro-Hindu fringe groups. 印度一个穆斯林男子在运送两头牛的途中被据信是自发维护治安的人杀害，凸显了支持印度教的边缘团体日益增加的影响力。A growing network of vigilantes in China are monitoring the countryside and animal markets to combat wildlife poaching. 在中国，为打击非法狩猎野生动物而自发监督农村地区和动物市场的网络不断壮大。好的，我们今天学习的词是vigilante, vigilante, vigilante …

title: seminarian
article: 今天我们要学的词是 seminarian. Seminarian 名词，神学院学生。Cardinal Theodore McCarrick, one of the most respected U.S. cardinals, was accused of sexually abusing both boys and adult seminarians. 美国最受尊敬的主教之一，红衣主教麦卡瑞克被控性侵男童和成年的神学院学生。Pope Francis had accepted the resignation of a Honduran bishop who was accused of sexually abusing seminarians. 教宗方济各接受了洪都拉斯一名主教的辞职，这名主教被控对神学院学生有不当性行为。好的，我们今天学习的词是seminarian, seminarian, seminarian …

title: call center
article: 今天我们要学的词是 call center. Call center 客户服务中心。The U.S. government has sentenced 21 people to jail terms for their involvement in a call center scam based in India that targeted U.S. victims. 美国政府判处21名参与一起客服欺诈案的人入狱，这个设在印度的客服中心专门以美国人为诈骗对象。Google is pushing ahead with plans to replace call center workers across the globe with its AI-enabled system. 谷歌推动研发计划，希望能用人工智能系统取代全球的人工客服。好的，我们今天学习的词是call center, call center, call center …

title: bolster
article: 今天我们要学的词是 bolster. Bolster 作为动词，有支持，加强的意思。The U.S. Defense Department says it will give $200 million to Ukraine to help bolster its military’s defensive capabilities. 美国国防部表示，将向乌克兰提供两亿美元，支持乌克兰军方加强防御能力。The leaders of Egypt and Sudan have agreed to set differences aside and bolster relations after years of tensions between the two countries. 埃及和苏丹领导人同意搁置分歧，加强两国多年来一直处于紧张状态的关系。好的，我们今天学习的词是bolster, bolster, bolster …

title: national anthem
article: 今天我们要学的词是 national anthem. National anthem 国歌。The NFL and NFL Players Association have agreed to halt enforcement of new rules regarding the national anthem. 美国全国橄榄球联盟和NFL球员协会达成协议，暂停实施有关国歌的新规定。In 2016, then-49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick began protesting police brutality, social injustice and racial inequality by kneeling during the national anthem. 2016年，当时49人队的四分卫卡佩尼克率先开始，在奏国歌的时候单膝跪地，抗议警察暴力，社会不公和种族不平等。好的，我们今天学习的词是national anthem, national anthem, national anthem …

title: destination
article: 今天我们要学的词是 destination. Destination 目的地。Spain has overtaken Italy as the No. 1 destination for migrants crossing the Mediterranean to try to reach Europe. 西班牙取代意大利，成为移民穿越地中海，投奔欧洲的第一目的地。Cathay Pacific Airways is launching two new destinations in the U.S., Washington and Seattle, raising its total U.S. routes to eight. 国泰航空公司准备新开两个美国终点站，华盛顿和西雅图，将其飞往美国的航线增加到八条。好的，我们今天学习的词是destination, destination, destination …

title: assassination
article: 今天我们要学的词是 assassination. Assassination 暗杀。Venezuelan authorities have arrested six people in what President Nicloas Maduro says was an assassination attempt against him. 委内瑞拉有关当局逮捕了6个委内瑞拉总统马杜罗说参加他的暗杀行动的人。U.S. national security adviser John Bolton said the United States had no involvement in the apparent assassination attempt on Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro. 美国国家安全顾问博尔顿说，美国与显然是针对委内瑞拉总统马杜罗的暗杀行动丝毫没有牵连。好的，我们今天学习的词是assassination, assassination, assassination …

title: inconsistent
article: 今天我们要学的词是 inconsistent. Inconsistent 形容词，前后不一致的。U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo suggested that continued work on weapons programs by North Korea was inconsistent with its leader’s commitment to denuclearize.美国国务卿蓬佩奥说，朝鲜继续武器项目的工作，跟朝鲜领导人去核化的承诺相矛盾。A new report said that Los Angeles schools are at risk because of inconsistent campus safety measures, a need for more mental health services and inadequate coordination with other public agencies. 最新报告说，洛杉矶地区不一致的校园安保措施、心理健康服务缺乏，以及跟其它公立机构间缺少协调，让这些学校的安全面临风险。好的，我们今天学习的词是inconsistent, inconsistent, inconsistent …

title: rigged
article: 今天我们要学的词是 rigged. Rigged 形容词，意思是作弊的，暗中操纵的。Zimbabwe’s opposition leader Nelson Chamisa claimed that the presidential election was rigged against him. 津巴布韦反对党领导人查米萨称，这次的总统大选有人舞弊，目的是为了让他落选。A week after the voters went to the polls, leaders of some of Pakistan’s largest political parties gathered in Islamabad to denounce the elections as rigged. 巴基斯坦选民参加投票一周后，一些主要政党领导人聚集在伊斯兰堡，谴责大选存在舞弊现象。好的，我们今天学习的词是rigged, rigged, rigged …

title: outstanding
article: 今天我们要学的词是 outstanding. Outstanding 作为形容词，有尚存的，剩余的意思。The Mexican Economy Minister said talks with the U.S. to revamp the North American Free Trade Agreement would cover all outstanding issues. 墨西哥经济部长说，围绕修订北美自由贸易协定与美国进行的会谈将涉及所有遗留问题。Two U.S. Senators introduced a bill that would slash a major part of Puerto Rico’s $73 billion in outstanding debt. 两位美国参议员提出一项议案，旨在大幅削减波多黎各730亿美元的剩余债务。好的，我们今天学习的词是outstanding, outstanding, outstanding …

title: heat wave
article: 今天我们要学的词是 heat wave. Heat wave 热浪。A recent study warns that the number of people dying during heat waves is likely to rise sharply in some regions by 2080 if policymakers fail to take action in climate and health policies. 最近一项研究警告说，如果政策制定者不采取措施，修改气候和健康政策，到2080年时，世界上一些地区死于热浪天气的人口将显著增加。Three French cities have banned the most polluting cars from the roads as the current heat wave rages on in Europe. 欧洲热浪天气继续肆虐，法国三个城市因此禁止污染最严重的三款汽车上路。好的，我们今天学习的词是heat wave, heat wave, heat wave …

title: outnumber
article: 今天我们要学的词是 outnumber. Outnumber 动词，意思是在数量上超过。Anti-racist protesters far outnumbered the white supremacists who rallied across from the White House last Sunday. 上星期天在白宫对面集会的反种族歧视抗议者的人数远远超过了白人至上主义者的人数。U.S. employers posted slightly more job openings in June than the previous month, outnumbering unemployed people for the third straight month. 美国雇主6月开出的招聘职位的数量稍许超过5月份，连续第三个月超过失业人口数量。好的，我们今天学习的词是outnumber, outnumber, outnumber …

title: due process
article: 今天我们要学的词是 due process. Due process 正当法律程序。The European Union has asked Saudi Arabia about the arrests of female human rights activists, saying the detainees should be granted due process. 欧盟要求沙特解释女性人权活动人士被捕一事，并表示应给予被羁押者正当的法律程序。 Former U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement acting Director John Sandweg recently said that immigrants entering the U.S. are entitled to due process under the law. 前美国移民和海关执法局代理局长约翰·桑德韦格最近说，进入美国的移民有权享受法律赋予的正当法律程序。好的，我们今天学习的词是due process, due process, due process …

title: contingent upon
article: 今天我们要学的词是 contingent upon. Contingent upon 意思是视某前提条件而定。South Korea plans to expand tourism ties with North Korea, contingent upon the lifting of economic sanctions. 韩国计划扩大与朝鲜的旅游联系，前提条件是要等朝鲜受到的经济制裁得到取消。Elon Musk announced his intent to take Tesla private, but any final decision would be contingent upon a vote by shareholders. 埃隆·马斯克宣布，打算让特斯拉私有化，但是任何最后决定都要取决于股东的投票表决。好的，我们今天学习的词是contingent upon, contingent upon, contingent upon …

title: relocation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 relocation. Relocation 意思是迁移，重新安置。Tens of thousands of protesters in Okinawa vowed to stop the planned relocation of a U.S military base, saying they want it off the southern Japanese island entirely. 数以万计民众在冲绳岛抗议，誓言阻止美军基地的迁移计划，要求美军撤出冲绳岛。Human Rights Watch is opposed to Bangladesh’s plan to consider a small, uninhabited island as a relocation option for Rohingya refugees. 人权观察对孟加拉国将一个无人居住的小岛做为重新安置罗兴亚人难民的一种选项提出反对。好的，我们今天学习的词是relocation, relocation, relocation …

title: accelerate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 accelerate.Accelerate 做为动词，有加速，增加的意思。China’s exports accelerated in July despite an escalation in the US-China trade war. 尽管美中两国贸易战不断升级，但是中国7月份的出口依旧持续增长。A recent study shows that the blue light beaming from smartphones and tablets is changing cells in our eyes that could accelerate blindness. 最近一项研究显示，智能手机和平板电脑发出的蓝光会改变人类眼睛中的细胞，加快失明的速度。好的，我们今天学习的词是accelerate, accelerate, accelerate …

title: conservative
article: 今天我们要学的词是 conservative. Conservative 做为形容词，是保守的意思。Twitter has been criticized by some conservative figures for censoring conservative voices. 推特受到一些保守派人物的批评，指责推特对保守派言论进行审查。Facebook has apologized for removing some of the content from a conservative education site. 脸书为移除一个保守派教育网站在其脸书帐户上的某些内容表示道歉。好的，我们今天学习的词是conservative, conservative, conservative …

title: editorial
article: 今天我们要学的词是 editorial. Editorial 做为名词，是社论的意思。More than 300 news publications across the country published editorials in a coordinated effort to defend the role of a free press. 美国300多家新闻媒体联合行动，发表社论，捍卫自由媒体所发挥的作用。President Trump responded to the editorials, tweeting that many of the media are “pushing a political agenda.” 川普总统通过推特对这些社论做出反应，称很多媒体“都是为了推进政治议题”。好的，我们今天学习的词是editorial, editorial, editorial …

title: curtail
article: 今天我们要学的词是 curtail. Curtail 做为动词，有缩减的意思。Technology companies, who have traditionally adopted a hands-off policy, are now struggling to curtail online offensive speech. 传统上往往采取不干预政策的高科技公司，如今却在努力设法减少网上的攻击性言论。The state of Maryland is telling three power plants to curtail their toxic wastewater discharges. 美国马里兰州责令三家发电厂，减少他们的有害废水排放量。好的，我们今天学习的词是curtail, curtail, curtail …

title: reunion
article: 今天我们要学的词是 reunion. Reunion 有团聚的意思。According to Seoul’s Unification Ministry, more than 500 separated South Koreans and their family members will cross the border for two separate rounds of reunions between Aug. 20 and 26. 韩国统一部说，8月20到26号间会有500多名韩国人及其家人参加边境对面的两轮离散家庭团聚活动。Nearly 20,000 people have participated in 20 rounds of face-to-face reunions since 2000. 自2000年以来，面对面的离散家庭团聚活动已经举办了20次，有近两万人参加。好的，我们今天学习的词是reunion, reunion, reunion …

title: alma mater
article: 今天我们要学的词是 alma mater。Alma mater is spelled as a-l-m-a, and mater, m-a-t-e-r. Alma mater 就是“母校”的意思。John McCain will be buried Sunday at his college alma mater, the U.S. Naval Academy in Annapolis, Maryland. , the U.S. Naval Academy in Annapolis, Maryland，刚刚去世的美国资深参议员麦凯恩星期日在他母校美国海军学院下葬。Alma mater 也可以指“校歌”，The fact that people still come together to sing the Alma Mater, whether we win or lose (the football game), is heartwarming, 人们不管球赛输赢，都会齐声唱起校歌，这让人感到温暖。不过记得用作校歌的时候，Alma Mater要以大写字母开头。好，我们今天学习的词是alma mater，alma mater，alma mater…

title: populist
article: 今天我们要学的词是 populist。Populist 指的是“民粹主义者”，Italy’s new populist government has moved to scrap a new high-speed railway line between London and Milan, damning the project as a potential waste of money，意大利新上任的民粹政府已经将伦敦和米兰之间计划修建的新高铁项目取消，批评这个项目将会浪费金钱。Populist 也可用作复数，Europe’s centrists have seen themselves squeezed by populists from the right and the left，欧洲的中间派发现他们被挤在左右两派的民粹主义者中间。好的，我们今天学习的词是populist，populist，populist…

title: midterm
