Bernie Sanders and Elizabeth Warren continue to lag well behind Joe Biden with these voters. 民调显示，非洲裔美国人选民比其他族裔团体更支持全民健保，但这一政策的两个主要推动者、参议员桑德斯和沃伦在这些选民中的支持率仍远远落后于拜登。

title: intractable
article: 今天我们要学的词是 intractable.intractable 的意思是顽固的，棘手的。 Called to resolve the intractable problem of Brexit, the general election delivered the British Conservative Party its first commanding majority in over 40 years. 为了解决英国脱欧这一棘手问题而举行的大选让英国保守党赢得了绝对优势，这是40多年来的第一次。

title: inroad
article: 今天我们要学的词是 inroad.inroad 的意思是进军、进展，成功进入。 Researchers are beginning to make inroads in diagnosing pancreatic cancer – one of the deadliest kinds of cancer as its symptoms only show up when the cancer is advanced. 研究人员开始在胰腺癌诊断上取得进展，由于胰腺癌的症状只有在病患晚期才会出现，因此是最致命的一种癌症。Target’s store in Times Square has created an inroad for the department store chain in dense, urban markets, which largely remain a frontier for fellow mass merchant Walmart. 塔吉特的纽约时代广场分店为这一百货连锁店打入人口稠密的都市开辟了道路，同是大规模零售商的沃尔玛在很大程度上还没有开发这一市场。

title: connectivity
article: 今天我们要学的词是 connectivity.connectivity 是指设备、系统等的联通性。 Technology companies Apple, Google, Amazon and others are pushing for a new connectivity standard to make household devices like smart bulbs, thermostats and refrigerators work together in a slightly more coherent way. 苹果、谷歌、亚马逊及其他一些科技公司正在力推一种新的联通标准，让智能灯泡、温控器和冰箱之类的家电设备工作起来更加协调一致。The industry buzz surrounding 5G technology and its impact on the next generation of connectivity and services is exhilarating, and that excitement is not only shared among consumers, but with developers, tech-driven enterprises and carriers as well. 业界围绕5G技术及其对新一代联通性能和服务的影响的种种讨论振奋人心，这不仅令费者，也让开发人员、技术驱动型企业和运营商劲头十足。

title: upend
article: 今天我们要学的词是upend.upend 的意思是上下颠倒，掀翻。Opposition politicians in Africa face tough challenges as they struggle to upend decades of rule by the parties that originally brought liberation from colonialism. 非洲的反对派政治人士面临着艰巨的挑战，他们在努力推倒最初将非洲从殖民统治中解放出来的政党数十年的统治。The Trump administration has proposed to require hospitals and insurers to disclose their secret negotiated rates. It could upend commercial health-care markets which are rife with hidden charges and secret discounts. 特朗普政府提议要求医院和保险公司披露其保密的议定价格。这可能会彻底颠覆充斥着隐性收费和秘密折扣的商业医疗市场。

title: careen
article: 今天我们要学的词是 careen.careen 的意思是顺着某个方向倾斜，冲入。The standoff between Washington and Tehran has careened from one crisis to another since U.S. President Donald Trump withdrew from the 2015 nuclear deal and imposed crippling sanctions against Iran. 自美国总统特朗普退出2015年的伊核协议并对伊朗实施严厉制裁以来，华盛顿与德黑兰之间的僵局从一个危机进入另一个危机。As the country careens toward the 2020 presidential election, recent polls show that the top Democrat candidates are all closely matched, with no clear winner in sight. 随着美国步入2020年总统大选，最近的民调显示，领先的民主党参选人都旗鼓相当，看不到明显的获胜者。

title: entourage
article: 今天我们要学的词是 entourage.entourage 的意思是随行人员。Meghan Markle was seen with entourage in London just hours before news that she and Prince Harry are stepping back as senior members of the royal family. 在梅根·马克尔和哈里王子退任英国皇室高级成员的消息传出仅几小时前，梅根在随行人员陪同下出现在伦敦。Former Pope Benedict XVI has denied co-writing a book criticizing Pope Francis. Supporters of Francis suggested that Bedict had been manipulated by members of his conservative entourage. 前天主教宗本笃十六世否认与他人合写了一本批评教宗方济各的书。方济各的支持者认为，本笃十六世被跟随他的保守派成员们的操纵。

title: clandestine
article: 今天我们要学的词是 clandestine.clandestine 的意思是秘密的，尤其是指非法行动的保密。 The recent drone strike on Qassem Soleimani killed the commander of the Iranian Revolutionary Guards’ Quds Force which is primarily responsible for military and clandestine operations outside Iran. 最近对索莱马尼进行的无人机袭击击毙了这位伊朗革命卫队圣战军的指挥官，圣战军主要负责在伊朗境外的军事和秘密行动。After a clandestine operation to skip bail and flee Japan, former automotive executive Carlos Ghosn appeared in front of the world’s media, defending himself against charges of financial crimes. 在取保候审期间秘密逃离日本之后，前汽车业高管卡洛斯·戈恩面向全球媒体，为自己受到的金融犯罪指控辩护。

title: homogenize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 homogenize.homogenize 的意思是均质化，同质化。 Disagreement is a foundational point of our democracy. We should welcome opposing viewpoints, and we should not homogenize the thoughts of a nation whose beauty lies in its diversity. 意见不一是我们民主的基点，我们应该欢迎不同观点，而不是在一个因多元化而美好的国家里同化人们的思想。homogenize 的名词形式是 homogenization：For all of the homogenization of modern culture in the U.S., pockets of traditional cultures still thrive, such as Cajun life in Thibodaux, Louisiana. 尽管现代文化在美国一统天下，但有些传统文化仍然在某些社区欣欣向荣，例如路易斯安那州蒂博多的卡津生活。

title: ravage
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ravage.ravage 的意思是破坏，摧残。 Australia’s bushfires have ravaged more than 63-thousand square kilometers of land there, and current estimates put the animal death toll at an astounding 1.25 billion and climbing. 澳大利亚的丛林大火已经烧毁了63000多平方公里的土地，目前估计导致动物死亡数量达到惊人的12.5亿，这个数字还在上升。Deadly storms and rare January tornadoes have ravaged areas in the southern U.S., leaving at least 11 people dead and tens of thousands without power. 致命的风暴和一月份罕见的龙卷风席卷了美国南部地区，造成至少11人死亡，成千上万的用户断电。

title: proxy
article: 今天我们要学的词是 proxy.proxy 的意思是代理，代理人。 The Iranian military commander who was killed recently in a U.S. airstrike in Baghdad was instrumental in expanding Iran’s influence and reach beyond its borders through various proxy groups in the region. 最近在美国的一次空袭中丧生的伊朗军事头目是伊朗通过中东地区多个代理组织扩大其境外影响力和触角的关键人物。The Indian Army chief on Tuesday exhorted Army men deployed along borders with Pakistan and those fighting the “proxy war” in Kashmir to remain vigilant round-the-clock. 印度陆军参谋长周二敦促部署在与巴基斯坦以及那些在克什米尔地区进行“代理人战争”国家交界地区的陆军人员时刻保持警惕。

title: afield
article: 今天我们要学的词是 afield.afield 是远离（家园、话题）的意思。 A Nasa satellite tracking the Australian bush fires has shown that the smoke shrouding many of the country’s major cities has moved as far afield as parts of China, Mongolia and Russia. 美国国家航空航天局的一颗追踪澳大利亚丛林大火的卫星显示，笼罩在澳洲许多大城市的浓烟已经漂移到远在中国、蒙古和俄罗斯的部分地区。In the U.S. more than 3 million shelter animals are adopted every year. But if you can’t find the animal you’ve been waiting for locally or even nationally, you can look even farther afield. 美国每年有300多万收容所的动物被收养。不过如果你在附近甚至全美范围内找不到你期待的宠物，还可以往更远的地方看看。

title: salvage
article: 今天我们要学的词是 salvage.salvage的意思是拯救、营救。 Iran’s admission that its armed forces shot down a Ukrainian passenger airliner appeared to be intended to salvage its credibility at a time of heightened international tension and domestic unrest. 伊朗承认其武装部队击落了一架乌克兰客机，这似乎是为了在国际紧张局势加剧和国内动荡之际挽回其信誉。French President Emmanuel Macron tried to calm nationwide tensions and salvage support for his overhaul of the country’s retirement system, as France faced weeks of crippling strikes. 在法国经历了数周带来严重影响的罢工活动之际，法国总统马克龙试图缓和全国各地的紧张局势，挽回人们对他全面整改退休制度的支持。

title: trough
article: 今天我们要学的词是 trough.trough 的意思是槽，低谷。As global manufacturing slowed down due to geopolitical changes, major central banks across the world are easing their monetary policy in hopes of generating a mini-cycle trough to rebound growth in 2020. 随着全球制造业因地缘政治变化而放缓，各主要国家的央行正在放松其货币政策，以期带来一个微型周期低谷，在2020年实现增长反弹。

title: harbinger
article: 今天我们要学的词是 harbinger.harbinger 的意思是预兆、先驱。 If the Producers Guild Award is a true harbinger of the Oscars’ best film category, then the World War I film “1917” is poised to come away with the top honor in a few weeks. 如果制片人协会奖是奥斯卡最佳影片奖的预兆，那么讲述第一次世界大战的电影《 1917》有望在几周内摘得桂冠President Trump drew the attention of reporters to British Prime Minister Boris Johnson’s historic victory in the United Kingdom’s elections, suggesting it might be a “harbinger” of his own success in 2020. 特朗普总统提请记者注意英国首相鲍里斯·约翰逊在英国大选中取得的历史性胜利，暗示这可能“预示”他自己能在2020年胜选。

title: tout
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tout.tout 的意思是吹捧、大加赞扬。 President Trump touted his economic record in front of world leaders at the 50th annual World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, saying his administration had created a “blue collar boom” with its agenda. 特朗普总统在瑞士达沃斯举行的第50届年度世界经济论坛上，向世界各国领导人大力推崇美国的经济表现，称他政府的政策带来了“蓝领繁荣”。The majority of Democratic presidential candidates endorsed proposals to stop climate change and called for banning fossil fuels, some even touted the idea of banning commercial air travel. 多数民主党总统候选人都支持阻止气候变化的提议，并呼吁禁止使用化石燃料，甚至有人大为赞同禁止商业性航空旅行。

title: malfunction
article: 今天我们要学的词是 malfunction.malfunction 的意思是发生故障，失灵。 Manhattan’s Metro Transportation Authority has announced that more than 300 subway cars were being pulled from service due to malfunctions, which raised questions about how the MTA is spending the hundreds of millions of dollars paid by taxpayers. 曼哈顿地铁运输管理局宣布，有300多辆地铁由于故障停运，引发人们质疑该机构是如何使用纳税人数亿美元资金的。Dozens of 737 MAX jets are being held at the Boeing facility as the FAA continues to keep the model grounded due to malfunctions leading to two crashes, which killed a combined 346 people. 数十架波音737 MAX型飞机被停放在波音工厂，美国联邦航空局仍限制这个机种升空，原因是飞机故障导致两起坠机事故，造成一共346人丧生。

title: perversion
article: 今天我们要学的词是 perversion.perversion 的意思是变态、歪曲。 President Donald Trump’s legal team asserted that the House Democrats’ impeachment case against the president is a “dangerous perversion of the Constitution,” while again saying Trump did “absolutely nothing wrong.” 特朗普总统的法律团队坚持认为，众议院民主党人针对总统的弹劾案是对“宪法的危险歪曲”，并再次指出特朗普“绝对没有做错任何事”。Ex-Nissan chief Carlos Ghosn’s lawyers said Nissan’s claim of “a robust, thorough internal investigation” is a “gross perversion of the truth.” 前日产汽车公司首席执行官戈恩的律师表示，日产汽车所谓“进行了强化、彻底的内部调查”的说法是“对事实的严重歪曲”。

title: excoriate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 excoriate.excoriate 的意思是苛责，责难。 Comments on Chinese social media and by health experts have excoriated local officials in Wuhan for not being more forthcoming about the threat posed by the novel coronavirus. 中国社交媒体上和医务专家们的评论对武汉的地方官员提出责难，认为他们没有及时通报新型冠状病毒带来的威胁。A growing number of Lebanese politicians and political commentators are openly excoriating Hezbollah for endangering their country’s security in the wake of the discovery of tunnels dug by the terrorist organization under the border with Israel. 黎巴嫩越来越多的政客和政治评论人士公开谴责真主党危害国家安全，之前这个恐怖组织在与以色列接壤的边界挖地道的事情曝光。

title: attainment
article: 今天我们要学的词是 attainment.attainment 的意思是取得，达到。 South Africa has been experiencing a rise in the marriage age for women, catching up on a global trend in developed nations, where women’s educational attainment and incomes are rising along with the age of the average bride. 南非妇女的结婚年龄一直在推后，正在赶上全球发达国家的趋势，也就是随着妇女受教育程度和收入增加，新娘的平均年龄也增大。The Justice Department reported recovery of over $3 billion from False Claims cases in 2019, which include fraud schemes such as billing for services not provided, billing for the same service more than once, and inappropriate attainment of various goods and services. 美国司法部称2019年从“虚报费用”案件中追回了30多亿美元，这些案件的欺诈行为包括对未提供服务的收费，或同一服务多次收费，以及不当获取各种物品及服务。

title: tribute
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tribute.tribute 的意思是供奉，致敬。 As the world remembers basketball star Kobe Bryant, who was killed in a helicopter crash on Sunday, fans in Los Angeles paid tribute to the sports legend who made the city his home. 在全球追忆篮球明星科比·布莱恩特之际，洛杉矶的球迷们向这位以他们的城市为家的体育传奇人物致敬。科比在周日的一次直升机失事中丧生。For a period in history, many of China’s neighboring states, such as Annam (Northern Vietnam), Korea and even Japan rendered an annual tribute to the Chinese imperial court. 在历史上一段时期里，中国的许多邻国，例如安南（越南北部）、韩国甚至日本，每年都向中国朝廷进贡。

title: coronavirus
article: 今天我们要学的词是 coronavirus.coronavirus 就是指冠状病毒。It is far too early to tell what effect the coronavirus may have on the global economy, but markets are increasingly assuming the economic effects of this public health crisis will inform US central bank policy. 现在还远远不能确定这一冠状病毒对全球经济可能带来什么影响，但市场越来越相信这一公共卫生危机的经济后果将影响美国央行的政策。

title: prank
article: 今天我们要学的词是 prank.prank 的意思是恶作剧。 Iranian state TV has aired what appears to be a prank call to a U.S. TV network from someone pretended to be a parent of a US soldier, trying to convince their audience that Iranian strikes on US bases in Iraq caused many casualties. 伊朗国家电视台播出了一名假冒美国军人的父亲打给美国一家电视网的恶搞电话，试图说服观众伊朗对伊拉克的美国基地发动的袭击造成多人伤亡。While a college student who attempted to illegally obtain President Donald Trump’s tax returns argued that the act was a college prank, the Justice Department makes it clear that false attempts to obtain any citizen’s IRS filings are a federal crime. 一名试图非法取得特朗普总统报税记录的美国大学生边界说，他的行为是校园恶作剧，不过司法部清楚表明，以欺诈手段获取任何公民的报税记录是一项联邦犯罪行为。

title: apprise
article: 今天我们要学的词是 apprise.apprise 的意思是通知，告知。The White House has announced the formation of the President’s Coronavirus Task Force to lead the U.S. Government response to the novel coronavirus and to keep President Trump apprised of developments. 白宫宣布成立冠状病毒总统特别工作组，主导美国政府对新型冠状病毒的应对，并向特朗普总统通报事态发展。The UN Security Council held a closed-door briefing where senior White House adviser Jared Kushner apprised the members of the world body on President Trump’s new Middle East peace plan. 联合国安理会举行闭门简报会，白宫高级顾问库什纳在会上向安理会成员国通报了特朗普总统的新的中东和平计划。

title: debacle
article: 今天我们要学的词是 debacle.debacle 的意思是崩溃，一败涂地。 The Iowa caucuses, the first test of Democratic Party presidential candidates, had an embarrassing debacle as officials blamed state party and technological problems for not being able to provide results hours after the voting ended. 爱奥华州的党内初选是对民主党总统参选人的首次考验，但随着投票结束数小时后仍无法得出结果而陷入令人尴尬的失败局面，官员们将其归咎于该州的民主党和技术故障。The Latin American region reported little to no growth last year leading some economists to wonder what led to the area’s economic debacle. 拉丁美洲地区报告去年几乎没有经济增长，一些经济学家想了解是什么导致了该地区的经济崩溃。

title: exasperation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 exasperation.exasperation 的意思是恼怒，气恼。 The royal couple Harry and Meghan’s decision to “step back” as senior royals comes after months of exasperation with media coverage that mocked them over issues such as their use of private planes while campaigning against climate change. 王室夫妇哈里和梅根决定不再担当高级王室成员之前，因媒体对他们的报道而数月来耿耿于怀，这些报道嘲笑他们的一些做法，例如乘坐私人飞机推动气候变化议题。

title: ensue
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ensue.ensue 的意思是随后，随之而来。After Britain’s exit from the EU on Januray 31st, further divisions of the country may lie ahead as the battle for Scottish independence ensues, while Wales and Northern Ireland are beginning to reevaluate their positions in the Union. 英国于1月31日退出欧盟后，随之而来的在苏格兰独立问题上的争斗，以及威尔士和北爱尔兰开始重新评估其在联合王国中的地位使得英国可能面临进一步分化。Explorers discovered the world’s seventh continent, Antarctica, 200 years ago. A multinational power grab ensued. 探险家们200年前发现了世界第七大洲南极洲，随后多国开始争夺。

title: acquittal
article: 今天我们要学的词是 acquittal.acquittal 的意思是宣告无罪。 President Trump is poised to win his long-expected acquittal in the impeachment trial after the Senate voted down a motion by Democrats calling for new witnesses to testify in the trial. 在参议院否决了民主党人要求在特朗普总统弹劾案中让新证人出庭作证的议案后，特朗普总统有望赢得期待已久的无罪审判结果。The acquittal of three Belgian doctors charged with unlawful euthanasia in a landmark trial brought applause and cheers in the courtroom. 三名被控非法实行安乐死的比利时医生在一个具有里程碑意义的庭审中被判无罪，法庭上爆发出掌声和欢呼。

title: extinguish
article: 今天我们要学的词是 extinguish.extinguish 的意思是扑灭（大火），消灭。 Torrential rain across Australia’s east could extinguish all remaining bushfires in the New South Wales by the end of the week, authorities said on Tuesday. 有关当局星期二表示，澳大利亚东部的强降雨在周末之前可能会扑灭新南威尔士州所有仍在燃烧的丛林大火。According to a recent poll from the University of Massachusetts, 64 percent of Democratic voters would rather see “a giant meteor strike the Earth, extinguishing all human life” than see President Trump re-elected. 根据马萨诸塞大学最近的一项民调，64％的民主党选民宁愿看到“巨大的流星撞击地球，让人类绝迹”，也不愿看到特朗普再次当选总统。

title: prestigious
article: 今天我们要学的词是 prestigious.prestigious 的意思是受敬重的，享有盛誉的。 Indian Prime Minister Modi’s Hindu Nationalist party lost a prestigious election in Delhi, a setback for the party as it faces protests against a new citizenship law. 印度总理莫迪领导的国大党在首都德里的一次重要的选举中失利，这是该党在面临针对其新公民法的抗议之际受到的一个挫折。A Harvard University professor who chairs the pestigious school’s Chemistry and Chemical Biology Department, is being accused by the U.S. government of lying to officials about his ties to China. 美国政府指控哈佛大学的一位教授，也是这个著名大学的化学及生化系主任对有关官员谎报其与中国的关系。

title: enigma
article: 今天我们要学的词是 enigma.enigma 的意思是令人费解的、迷一般的事。 As the reported number of novel coronavirus cases continuiously updates, the experts face an enigma that the outbreak seems to be stalled outside of China while the number of deaths and infections inside China is climbing everyday. 随着新型冠状病毒病染病人数的报道不断更新，专家们难以理解的是，在中国境外的发病人数似乎不再增多，而境内的死亡和感染人数每天都在上升。A newly-released documentary “Created Equal: Clarence Thomas in His Own Words” offers an eye-opening look at the life of the Supreme Court Justice, which shatters the picture of Thomas as some kind of “enigma.” 一个新推出的纪录片《生而平等：克拉伦斯-托马斯自传》提供了解这位最高法院大法官生平的新鲜视角，打破了人们对托马斯“迷”一般的印象。

title: furious
article: 今天我们要学的词是 furious.furious 的意思是狂怒的，激烈的。 Democratic presidential contenders made a furious last minute push for votes ahead of Tuesday’s New Hampshire primary, where polls showed Vermont Senator Bernie Sanders leading the field. 在新罕布什尔州星期二进行初选投票之前，民主党总统参选人为争取选票进行了激烈的最后一搏，当地民调显示佛蒙特州参议员伯尼·桑德斯领先。The Trump administration’s drafted executive order to bring back Classical architecture for new federal buildings has made the architectural elites furious, according to news reports. 有新闻报道说，特朗普政府的一项行政命令草案将推动新建联邦大楼重返古典建筑风格，这令建筑界的精英们大为恼火。

title: appalling
article: 今天我们要学的词是 appalling.appalling 的意思是令人震惊的，骇人听闻的。 It was appalling that the viewership for Sunday night’s 2020 Oscar ceremony collapsed by 20% to hit an all-time low of 23.6 million. 观看星期天晚上播出的2020年奥斯卡颁奖典礼的人数暴跌两成，降至有史以来最低的2,360万，令人惊异。Republican Senator Mitt Romney was the only lawmaker who broke with his party and voted to convict President Trump for what he called being “guilty of an appalling abuse of public trust” as the Senate acquitted Trump on impeachment charges. 共和党参议员罗姆尼是唯一与自己的党派决裂、投票同意特朗普总统犯下他所称的 “令人震惊的滥用公信罪”的议员，而参议院则宣布受到弹劾指控的特朗普无罪。

title: stifle
article: 今天我们要学的词是 stifle.stifle的意思是压制，令人窒息。 Referring to the possibility that the European Union may hold internet companies responsible for hate speech published on their platforms, Facebook warned that such liability would stifle innovation as well as individuals’ freedom of expression. 针对欧盟可能对网络平台上的仇恨言论向互联网公司问责一事，脸书警告说，这种法律责任将扼杀创新以及个人言论自由。The Federal Trade Commission recently started to examine past acquisitions by big tech firms that were not reported to the government to determine if these companies have stifled competition. 美国联邦贸易委员会最近开始审查未向政府报告的大型科技公司以往的收购案例，以确定这些公司是否压制竞争。

title: precautionary
article: 今天我们要学的词是 precautionary.precautionary 的意思是预防性的。 Countries around the world are introducing precautionary measures to prevent the COVID-19 coronavirus from infecting their citizens. 世界各国都在采取预防措施，以防止其公民感染 COVID-19 冠状病毒。The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration said it was barring American pilots and carriers from flying in Iraqi and Iranian airspace. Such restrictions are often precautionary to prevent civilian aircraft from being confused for ones engaged in armed conflict. 美国联邦航空管理局提出禁止美国飞行员和飞机进入伊拉克和伊朗领空。这种限制通常带有预防性质，以防民航班机被误认为是参与武装冲突的飞机。

title: rogue
article: 今天我们要学的词是 rogue.rogue的意思是流氓、无赖，泛指劣等变异的物种。U.S. Secretary of Defense Mark Esper has put Russia as the top of the Pentagon’s potential adversaries, followed by what he called “rogue states” like North Korea and Iran. 美国国防部长埃斯佩将俄罗斯列为美国军方数一数二的潜在敌人，其次是朝鲜和伊朗等他所称的“流氓国家”。Addressing a meeting of sheriffs in Washington, U.S. Attorney General William Barr criticized some local prosecutors as “rogue” after they became what he called “judge-legislator-prosecutor” and failed to protect law enforcement officers. 美国司法部长巴尔在华盛顿举行的一次警长会议上批评一些地方检察官变成他所说“法官、立法者与检察官集于一身”的“不良分子”，未能保护执法人员。

title: manifesto
article: 今天我们要学的词是 manifesto.manifesto的意思是宣言，尤其是政党的宣言。 House Democrats’ attempt to impeach President Donald Trump failed in the Senate, but it didn’t stop House Speaker Nancy Pelosi from criticizing Trump’s State of the Union address as what she called a “manifesto of untruths.” 美国众议院民主党人试图对特朗普总统进行的弹劾未能获得参议院通过，但这并没有阻止众议院议长佩洛西批评总统的国情咨文为她所说的“谬误的宣言”。The manifesto of Prime Minister Modi’s political party, which won by a landslide in the general election last year, promised a national registry. But Modi backed away from it after pressure mounted with the protests against the citizenship law. 印度总理莫迪的政党在去年的大选中获得压倒性胜利，该政党的竞选宣言承诺要进行全国登记。但是随着对公民法的抗议带来的压力越来越大，莫迪不再坚持这一主张。

title: beefy
article: 今天我们要学的词是 beefy.beef是牛肉，beefy可以理解为像牛一样强壮，结实。Americans want bigger, beefier vehicles if the Chicago Auto Show, billed as the nation’s largest and first-of-the-year showcase for the automotive industry, is any indication. 如果作为美国最大而且是年度首个汽车业展览的芝加哥车展是一个先兆，那么这显示出美国人想要的是更大、更坚固的汽车。As the frontrunner of Democratic presidential candidates, Sen. Bernie Sanders is hoping his campaign’s beefy presence of more than 200 staffers will help push it to a strong finish. 在民主党总统参选人中领先的参议员桑德斯希望他的200多人的竞选团队展现的强势将有助于他最后的强劲表现。

title: disarray
article: 今天我们要学的词是 disarray.disarray 的意思是混乱的，杂乱无章的。 Europe’s left-wing parties ended 2019 in disarray after battling a head wind of disapproval from their traditional supporters, and suffering a series of electoral setbacks in most countries. 欧洲的左翼政党狼狈不堪地送走了2019年，之前他们受到传统的支持者们的反对压力，并在大部分国家的选举中受到一连串的挫败。The Coronavirus has sent the cruise industry into disarray as ports in Asia are shut down, itineraries are canceled or rerouted, and even crew boarding is restricted. 冠状病毒导致游轮业陷入混乱，出现亚洲港口关闭，行程取消或改道，甚至乘务员登船受限。

title: tenable
article: 今天我们要学的词是 tenable.tenable 的意思是站得住脚的，说得过去的。 The Queen is believed to agree that it is no longer tenable for Prince Harry and Meghan Markle to use the word “royal” in their “branding” when they seek commercial opportunities instead of carrying out official duties. 据信英国女王认为哈里王子和梅根在寻求商业机会而非承担皇室公务时，他们在广告中使用“皇家”一词已经说不过去。The Premier of New South Wales Gladys Berejiklian says the status quo is “no longer tenable” in the state’s education system and has flagged reforms that will compel public schools to use approved teaching methods. （澳大利亚）新南威尔士州州长贝瑞吉克莲表示，该州教育系统的现状“不能维持”，并提到了公立学校必须使用批准的教学方法的改革。

title: convulse
article: 今天我们要学的词是 convulse.convulse 的意思是震动，颤动。The spread of the coronavirus has caused stock markets to convulse with indexes experiencing sharp losses across the globe. 冠状病毒的传播日趋扩大，给股市带来震荡，全球各地股指均出现大幅下滑。Egypt’s state TV reported the country’s former President Hosni Mubarak had died at 91. He was ousted in the 2011 Arab Spring uprising that had convulsed several regimes across the Middle East. 埃及国家电视台报道，埃及前总统穆巴拉克去世，享年91岁。穆巴拉克在2011年震撼中东各地政权的阿拉伯之春暴动中下台。

title: assault
article: 今天我们要学的词是 assault.assault 的意思是攻击，突击。 A jury in New York City found former Hollywood movie producer Harvey Weinstein guilty of sexual assault and rape but cleared the disgraced movie executive of charges that carried a possible life sentences. 纽约市的一个陪审团裁定，前好莱坞电影制片人韦恩斯坦犯有性侵罪和强奸罪，但免除了可能让这位自取其辱的影坛高管受到终身监禁的其他罪名。Turkey and Russia exchanged warnings recently after Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan threatened to carry out an operation in Syria to end the regime’s brutal air assault on the last rebel stronghold. 土耳其和俄罗斯最近互放厥词，之前土耳其总统埃尔多安威胁要在叙利亚展开一场行动，结束叙政权对最后一个反叛武装据点的惨无人道的空袭。

title: pluralistic
article: 今天我们要学的词是 pluralistic.pluralistic 的意思是多元的。 U.S. President Trump praised India’s status as a pluralistic society saying, the nation was admired around the world as a place where millions of Hindus, Muslims, Sikhs and Jains worship side by side in harmony. 美国总统特朗普称赞印度作为一个多元化社会，以能够让数百万印度教徒、穆斯林、锡克教徒和耆那教徒和谐共同祷告受到全世界的尊重。The European Committee of the Regions has adopted its members’ view that the key to European integration was a “pluralistic and innovative vision of culture” that actively involves citizens. 欧洲区域委员会采纳了其成员的观点，即欧洲一体化的关键是公民积极参与的“多元及创新的文化观”。

title: botanic
article: 今天我们要学的词是 botanic.botanic 是较为正式的植物统称。The U.S. Botanic Garden in Washington is marking its 200th anniversary this year. It was established by the U.S. Congress in 1820, making it one of the oldest botanic gardens in North America. 华盛顿的美国国家植物园今年庆祝建园200周年。它是美国国会于1820年建立的，是北美最古老的植物园之一。Betty Ford Alpine Gardens in Colorado just put on its winter exhibit that features dozens of stunning illustrations highlighting the majesty and mystery of trees by botanic artists. 科罗拉多州的贝蒂·福特高山植物花园刚刚开放一个冬季展览，展出了植物画家们数十幅令人惊艳的绘画，突出表现了树木的威严和神秘感。

title: mobilize
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mobilize.mobilize 的意思是动员。 The World Health Organization held its two-day global research and innovation forum, which aimed to mobilize international action for the Coronavirus emergency. 世界卫生组织召开了为期两天的全球研究与创新论坛，目的是动员国际社会为应对冠状病毒的紧急情况采取行动。Democrats who say they want voters to keep the focus on health care hope that by shifting the discussion to high prescription drug prices, they might mobilize voters and help the party maintain its edge on health care. 民主党人表示希望选民继续关注医保问题，以期通过将话题转向高价处方药的讨论，他们可以动员选民并帮助民主党维持在医保问题方面的优势。

title: fringe
article: 今天我们要学的词是 fringe.fringe 的意思是边缘的，外围的。 Over the past two weeks, South Korea has found over 5,000 cases of coronavirus, of which more than half have been linked to a fringe religious group in South Korea. 韩国过去两周来出现了5,000多个冠状病毒感染病例，其中一半以上与韩国的一个边缘化的宗教团体有关。House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy said in a recent interview that he believed the Democrat Party had descended into a radical embrace of socialism – it is no longer a fringe phenomenon. 美国众议院少数党领袖麦卡锡在最近的一次采访中说，他相信民主党已经沦落到对社会主义极力推崇，这已不再是一种边缘现象。

title: comprehensive
article: 今天我们要学的词是 comprehensive.comprehensive 的意思是全面的，综合性的。 After the signing of a historic agreement with the U.S., the Taliban committed to beginning talks with Afghan national leaders on a “permanent and comprehensive ceasefire.” 在与美国签署历史性协议后，塔利班承诺将开始与阿富汗国家领导人就“永久和全面停火”展开谈判。The World Health Organization has called for a comprehensive approach to the new coronavirus, saying the virus does not respect borders and nations must prevent new infections in their territory. 世界卫生组织呼吁对新型冠状病毒采取综合措施，并表示病毒不分国界，各国必须防止在其境内出现新的感染病例。

title: marvel
article: 今天我们要学的词是 marvel.marvel 是指奇妙的事，奇迹。 The Grand Canyon is one of the marvels of the natural world, there are more than 5 million visitors attracted to this National Park in Arizona each year. 大峡谷是大自然的奇观之一，每年有500多万游客被吸引到亚利桑那州的这个国家公园。Thousands of people along a swath of southern Asia witnessed the marvel of a so-called “ring of fire” solar eclipse, in which a thin outer ring of the sun is still visible. 有数千人在南亚大片地区目睹了被称为“火环”的日食奇观，就是仍能看到（被遮挡的）太阳露出薄薄的外环。

title: drawdown
article: 今天我们要学的词是 drawdown. Drawdown is spelled D-R-A-W-D-O-W-N, drawdown.Drawdown的意思是缩水，缩编。The United States has started a troop drawdown in Afghanistan as part of a deal with the Taliban that aims to end the nearly 19-year-old war in the country. 美国已经开始从阿富汗撤军，这是与塔利班为结束将近19年的战争而达成的一项协议的一部分。After Saudi Arabia cut its oil price by the most in roughly 20 years, oil futures plummeted almost a third when trading began on Sunday evening – their biggest drawdown since the Gulf War in 1991.沙特阿拉伯将其石油价格进行20年以来最大幅度的削减，导致周日傍晚交易开始时，石油期货价格暴跌了近三分之一，这是自1991年海湾战争以来的最大跌幅。好的，我们今天学习的词是drawdown, drawdown, drawdown.

title: traceability
article: 今天我们要学的词是 traceability. Traceability is spelled T-R-A-C-E-A-B-I-L-I-T-Y, traceability.Traceability 的意思是可追溯的，可追踪的。As food makes its way from farm to table, some consumers are more concerned about genetic modification and environmental impact than taste, and they start asking questions about traceability. 食物从农场走上餐桌的过程让一些消费者更为关注基因改造和环境影响问题，而不是味道，并开始提出有关食品溯源的问题。As 5G telecommunications networks become a national security concern, U.S. lawmakers started questioning technology companies about their strategy to control the software development lifecycle and traceability of their supply chain. 随着5G电信网络成为国家安全问题，美国议员们开始询问科技公司有关控制软件开发周期和供应链可追溯性战略。好的，我们今天学习的词是traceability, traceability, traceability.

title: expenditure
article: 今天我们要学的词是 expenditure. Expenditure is spelled E-X-P-E-N-D-I-T-U-R-E, expenditure.Expenditure 的意思是开支，常用于指财政支出。Women make up about half of the world’s population, but studies show that less than one percent of global corporate expenditures go to women-owned businesses. 女性约占世界人口的一半，但研究表明，全球企业支出中不到百分之一用于女性拥有的企业。The very basis of Modern Monetary Theory, the idea that governments can finance their expenditures themselves and therefore deficits don’t matter, goes back to the Polish Marxist economist, Michael Kalechi. 现代货币理论的基础，即政府可以为他们自己的财政支出提供融资，因此赤字不是问题的观点，可以追溯到波兰马克思主义经济学家迈克尔·卡莱基。好的，我们今天学习的词是expenditure, expenditure, expenditure.

title: vulnerable
article: 今天我们要学的词是 vulnerable. Vulnerable is spelled V-U-L-N-E-R-A-B-L-E, vulnerable.Vulnerable 的意思是脆弱的，容易受害的。Coronavirus is most dangerous to the elderly and those with weakened immune systems, which prompted concerns among health experts, patients and their families that eldercare facilities are especially vulnerable. 冠状病毒对老年人和免疫机能较弱的人来说是最危险的，这引起健康专家、患者及其家人担心，老年护理设施尤其易受侵害。New research from a British consumer watchdog claims nearly a billion Android devices are vulnerable to hacking attacks, since they no longer receive critical security updates from Google. 英国一个消费者监管机构的最新研究表明，有近十亿个安卓设备由于不再得到谷歌的重要安全更新而容易受到黑客攻击的破坏。好的，我们今天学习的词是vulnerable, vulnerable, vulnerable.

title: disenfranchise
article: 今天我们要学的词是 disenfranchise. Disenfranchise is spelled D-I-S-E-N-F-R-A-N-C-H-I-S-E, disenfranchise.Disenfranchise 的意思是剥夺（权利）、失去。The latest employment data from the Labor Department finds that businesses can still pull disenfranchised Americans back into work through higher wages, better working conditions and competitive benefits packages. 劳工部的最新就业数据发现，企业仍然可以通过提高工资、改善工作条件和提供有竞争力的福利待遇来使失去就业的美国人重返工作岗位。There are mounting concerns that the coronavirus pandemic could disenfranchise large numbers of American voters in the U.S. presidential election. 人们越来越担心冠状病毒大流行可能导致大批选民无法参与美国总统大选。好的，我们今天学习的词是disenfranchise, disenfranchise, disenfranchise.

title: hunker
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hunker. Hunker is spelled H-U-N-K-E-R, hunker.Hunker 是蹲着、蹲坐的意思，常与 down 连用，hunker down的意思就是准备长期蹲守。Top U.S. experts on infectious diseases are calling on Americans to “hunker down” significantly more to slow the spread of the coronavirus. 美国顶尖的传染病专家呼吁美国人蹲守在家，以减缓冠状病毒的传播。With borders shut, schools and businesses closing, and increasingly drastic restrictions on movement, tens of millions of people were hunkered down to isolate themselves from coronavirus risk. 随着边界关闭、学校停学和企业停业，以及行动限制越来越严格，数千万人待在家里，以免受到冠状病毒的威胁。好的，我们今天学习的词是hunker, hunker, hunker.

title: biblical
article: 今天我们要学的词是 biblical. Biblical is spelled B-I-B-L-I-C-A-L, biblical.Biblical 来自bible，《圣经》，biblical就是堪比《圣经》里所说的。In East Africa, a massive locust infestation of biblical proportions threatens millions with starvation. The U.N. Food and Agriculture Organization calls it “extremely alarming.” 东非出现了像《圣经》里提到的那种巨大规模的蝗虫肆虐，给数百万万人带来了饥荒的威胁。联合国粮农组织称其“极其令人震惊。”Sudden sandstorms caused by an intense cyclone swept across the Middle East, causing some people to claim a “biblical event” that engulfed Egypt and moved east toward Israel. 强大旋风造成的沙尘暴突起，席卷了中东各地，有些人称这如同那场“《圣经》事件”，吞噬了埃及，向东移动到以色列。好的，我们今天学习的词是biblical, biblical, biblical.

title: normalcy
article: 今天我们要学的词是 normalcy. Normalcy is spelled N-O-R-M-A-L-C-Y, normalcy.Normalcy 的意思是常态。Once subject to strict Islamic State rules, Women in the group’s former self-proclaimed capital Raqqa are now trying to bring a sense of normalcy back to their lives. 在一度被伊斯兰国自认为首都的拉卡，那些曾经受到伊斯兰国严格规定约束的妇女们现在正试图回归正常生活。The last of Apple’s 42 stores in China reopened on March 13, as the country slowly returns to normalcy following weeks of quarantine that forced the closure of businesses. 苹果公司在中国的42家专卖店中最后一家在3月13号重新开业，显示经过数周隔离检疫导致商店被迫停业后，中国逐渐恢复了正常。好的，我们今天学习的词是normalcy, normalcy, normalcy.

title: monolithic
article: 今天我们要学的词是 monolithic. Monolithic is spelled M-O-N-O-L-I-T-H-I-C, monolithic.Monolithic 的意思是一整块的，整体的。In a speech at the National Religious Broadcasters annual convention in Nashville, U.S. Attorney General William Barr said the mainstream press has become “remarkably monolithic in viewpoint.” 在纳什维尔市举行的全美宗教广播公司年度大会上，美国司法部长巴尔发表演讲说，主流媒体已经“超乎异常地统一口径。”Although black Americans represent a larger voting bloc in the U.S., they are continued to be framed as s monolithic group by major polls, while white people were disaggregated by age, political identification and education. 尽管美国黑人代表着一个巨大的选民群体，但主要民调组织仍把他们视为一个整体，而把白人按年龄、政治认同和教育程度进行分类。好的，我们今天学习的词是monolithic, monolithic, monolithic.

title: mitigate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mitigate. Mitigate is spelled M-I-T-I-G-A-T-E, mitigate.Mitigate 的意思是减免，减轻。The trump administration set out to implement a sweeping economic stimulus package, including sending out checks to help Americans, to mitigate the economic impact of the spread of the coronavirus. 特朗普政府着手实施全面的经济刺激计划，包括派发支票以帮助美国人减轻冠状病毒传播带来的经济影响。Last October, The Johns Hopkins Center for Health Security and the Gates Foundation hosted a global pandemic exercise that underscored the need for public-private cooperation to mitigate societal impacts of severe pandemics. 去年10月，约翰·霍普金斯大学健康安全中心和盖茨基金会主持了一场全球大型流行病演习，其中强调需要公私合作来减轻严重流行病的社会影响。好的，我们今天学习的词是mitigate, mitigate, mitigate.

title: invoke
article: 今天我们要学的词是 invoke. Invoke is spelled I-N-V-O-K-E, invoke.Invoke 的意思是调用，实行。U.S. President Donald Trump has invoked the Defense Production Act, which would ensure that the private sector increases manufacturing and distribution of certain emergency medical supplies and equipment. 美国总统特朗普启用《国防生产法案》，以确保私营企业增加某些应急医疗用品和设备的制造和分销。The European Union invoked the solidarity principle when it assigned each EU country a fixed quota of migrants and refugees to accept during the 2015 migrant crisis. 在2015年移民危机时期，欧盟根据休戚与共的原则要求每个成员国接收固定配额的移民或难民。好的，我们今天学习的词是invoke, invoke, invoke.

title: postponement
article: 今天我们要学的词是 postponement. Postponement is spelled P-O-S-T-P-O-N-E-M-E-N-T, postponement.Postponement 的意思是延期。Athletes and sporting federations from around the world reacted with a mixture of sadness, relief and goodwill to the postponement of the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games because of the coronavirus pandemic. 2020年东京奥运会由于冠状病毒大流行而延期举行，世界各地的运动员和体育协会对此表示难过，但同时也感到如释重负，并表达了祝愿。Michigan’s governor Gretchen Whitmer ordered the temporary postponement of all nonessential medical procedures in hospitals, medical care providers and dental facilities until the end of the COVID-19 state of emergency. 密歇根州州长惠特默下令当地医院、医护人员和牙科诊所暂时将所有非必要的医疗程序推迟到冠状病毒紧急状态结束。好的，我们今天学习的词是postponement, postponement, postponement.

title: stimulus
article: 今天我们要学的词是 stimulus. Stimulus is spelled S-T-I-M-U-L-U-S, stimulus.Stimulus 的意思是刺激物、刺激计划。House Speaker Nancy Pelosi expressed “optimism” that Congress can reach a coronavirus stimulus deal after she was criticized that the Democrats had blocked the deal as a political maneuver. 众议院议长佩洛西对国会可能达成一项应对冠状病毒的(经济)刺激计划表示乐观“，她被指民主党为达到政治目的而阻挠这一计划而受到批评。Some economists believed that the globalist establishment has created the largest financial bubble in modern history through central bank stimulus while permitting new highs in national debt, corporate debt and consumer debt. 一些经济学家认为，主张全球化的建制派通过央行的刺激计划，以及允许国债、公司债务和消费者债务屡创新高而创造了现代史上最大的金融泡沫。好的，我们今天学习的词是 stimulus, stimulus, stimulus.

title: mortality
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mortality. Mortality is spelled M-O-R-T-A-L-I-T-Y, mortality.Mortality 的意思是死亡率，死亡数字。A scientific adviser to Italy’s minister of health said on Saturday that the coronavirus mortality rate in Italy may be exaggerated due to the way the country records fatalities. 意大利卫生部长的一位科学顾问周六表示，该国报告死亡记录的方式可能导致意大利的冠状病毒病人死亡率被夸大。Recent research published in the Journal of the American Medical Association found that the number of steps a person takes each day, rather than the intensity of stepping, had a strong association with mortality. 最近发表在《美国医学学会杂志》上的一个研究报告指出，一个人每天走步的数量，而不是步行的强度，与死亡率密切相关。好的，我们今天学习的词是 mortality, mortality, mortality.

title: paramount
article: 今天我们要学的词是 paramount. Paramount is spelled P-A-R-A-M-O-U-N-T, paramount.Paramount 的意思是首要的，至高无上的。It was the hope that 2020 Olympics could still be held as a distraction from the COVID-19 outbreak around the world. However, it was decided that the health of everyone involved was paramount. 尽管人们希望仍然能够举办2020年奥运会，以分散对全球冠状病毒爆发的注意力，但是最终做出的决定是每个参与者的健康高于一切。Since student tuition and fees have become a primary source of funding for U.S. universities and colleges, keeping the student population on an upward trajectory has become paramount to the faculties. 由于学生的学杂费已成为美国大学和学院的主要资金来源，因此，保持学生人数持续上升已成为各院系的首要任务。好的，我们今天学习的词是 paramount, paramount, paramount.

title: scourge
article: 今天我们要学的词是 scourge. Scourge is spelled S-C-O-U-R-G-E, scourge.Scourge 的意思是祸害、灾害。While the flu typically gets considerable attention in the U.S. during flu season, it is nothing close to the astounding coverage level received by the newest coronavirus scourge. 在流感季节期间，感冒通常会在美国引起广泛关注，但远远不如媒体对最新冠状病毒灾害的惊人的大量报道。The U.S. Justice Department recently announced hundreds of arrests and indictments of a powerful Mexican drug cartel, as law enforcement continuously fights this scourge against the United States. 美国司法部最近宣布逮捕了与一个强大的墨西哥毒品犯罪团伙有关的数百人，并对他们提出起诉。执法部门一直在与这个祸害美国的团伙作斗争。好的，我们今天学习的词是 scourge, scourge, scourge.

title: en route
article: 今天我们要学的词是 en route. En is spelled E-N, en, and route, R-O-U-T-E, route, en route.En route 的意思是在途中。The US Navy hospital ship USNS Comfort departed from Norfolk, Virginia, Saturday en route to New York City to assist with the coronavirus outbreak.美国海军医用舰“安慰号”周六从弗吉尼亚州诺福克出发前往纽约，以期在冠状病毒大爆发期间提供协助。Disgraced film producer Harvey Weinstein was diverted to a hospital in New York while en route to Rikers Island prison, after he complained of chest painsfollowing his guilty verdict. 颜面尽失的电影制片人哈维·温斯坦在被判罪名成立之后，因提出胸部疼痛而被转往纽约的一家医院，而不是前去(纽约市)赖克斯岛监狱。好的，我们今天学习的词是 en route, en route, en route.

title: guardian
article: 今天我们要学的词是 guardian. Guardian is spelled G-U-A-R-D-I-A-N, guardian.Guardian 的意思是守护者，监护人。Museums across the U.S. have closed to the public due to Coronavirus concerns, but it hasn’t stopped the guardians of some of the greatest art collections from sharing their treasures with people around the world.美国各地的博物馆由于冠状病毒疫情而对外关闭，但这并没有阻止那些守护着一些顶尖艺术品的人与世界各地的人们分享他们的馆藏。The United States is returning some migrant children who arrived in the U.S. without a parent or guardian to  their home countries under new coronavirus guidelines, a move the Trump administration has, up until now, been unable to do. 根据新的冠状病毒疫情指南，美国将一些抵美时没有父母或监护人陪伴的移民儿童遣返回他们的祖国，这是特明普政府之前无法做到的。好的，我们今天学习的词是 guardian, guardian, guardian.

title: reconciliation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 reconciliation. Reconciliation is spelled R-E-C-O-N-C-I-L-I-A-T-I-O-N, reconciliation.Reconciliation 的意思是和解。 After years of civil war, Sudan’s new transitional unity government is urging citizens to work towards reconciliation and forgiving perpetrators of violence. 经过多年的内战，苏丹新的过渡性的团结政府敦促公民努力寻求和解、宽恕暴力元凶。U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo has held high-level peace talks with the Taliban in Afghanistan. He said the ultimate goal is to find true reconciliation among all Afghans which could pave the way for U.S. forces to finally withdraw. 美国国务卿蓬佩奥曾在阿富汗与塔利班举行高层和平谈判，他说，和谈最终目标是阿富汗各方达成真正的和解，为美国最终撤军铺平道路。好的，我们今天学习的词是 reconciliation, reconciliation, reconciliation.

title: alleviate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 alleviate. Alleviate is spelled A-L-L-E-V-I-A-T-E, alleviate.Alleviate 的意思是减轻，缓解。The medications being tested for coronavirus treatments are focused on neutralizing the virus itself, alleviating its life-threatening symptoms, and boosting a patient’s immune system. 用于治疗冠状病毒的药物正在测试中，这类药物主要针对的是消除病毒本身， 减轻带来生命危险的症状以及增强患者的免疫力。Senate Republicans and Democrats all agree on helping American college students alleviate growing financial strain during the ongoing pandemic, but they have different vlews on how to structure student loan relief plans. 参议院共和党人和民主党人都同意在流行病大爆发期间帮助美国大学生缓解日益加重的经济压力，但是他们对如何规划减免学生贷款计划的看法不同。好的，我们今天学习的词是 alleviate, alleviate, alleviate.

title: quell
article: 今天我们要学的词是 quell. Quell is spelled Q-U-E-L-L, quell.Quell 的意思是压制，消除。In an effort to quell the spread of the coronavirus, most American universities and colleges have shifted to online learning.为了遏制冠状病毒的传播，大多数美国大学已转为网上授课。The Kennedy Center has struck a deal with members of the National Symphony Orchestra to quell public outery when it announced layoffs of musicians hours after President  Trump signed a stimulus package that sent the Kennedy Center 525 million. 肯尼迪中心与国家交响乐团成员达成了协议，以平息在特朗普总统签署一项经济刺激计划后仅数小内宣布裁员而引起的众怒。该计划为肯尼迪中心提供2500万美元。好的，我们今天学习的词是 quell, quell, quell.

title: deprive
article: 今天我们要学的词是 deprive. Deprive is spelled D-E-P-R-I-V-E, deprive.Deprive 的意思是夺去，剥夺。Millions of children in Pakistan are deprived of an education due to family financial reasons. Some are even forced into child labor to earn enough to feed their families. 在巴基斯坦，数百万儿童由于家庭经济原因而被剥夺了接受教育的机会。有些人甚至被迫成为童工，赚钱养家糊口。The U.S. Attorney General William Barr expressed his concern about the policy that enables biological male athletes to compete against biological females, saying it “deprives women of the opportunity to participate fully and fairly in sports.” 美国司法部长巴尔对允许生为男性的运动员与女性竞争的政策表示关切，称这一-政策“剥夺了女性充分、公平地参与体育运动的机会。好的，我们今天学习的词是 deprive, deprive, deprive.

title: proliferate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 proliferate. Proliferate is spelled P-R-O-L-I-F-E-R-A-T-E, proliferate.Proliferate 的意思是激增，迅速扩散。Chinese factories with production lines making face masks are demanding full payment before shipping them. With scams proliferating, those are often unacceptable terms to many buyers. 拥有口罩生产线的中国工厂现在要求在出货之前全额付款。不过在出现大量骗局的情况下，这往往令许多买家无法接受。A Texas education watchdog believes that unnecessary and overpaid administrators have been responsible for much of the rising cost of college tuition, as non-teaching personnel proliferated at many schools. 德克萨斯州的一个教育监管机构认为，随着许多大学的非教职员工激增，行政部门人浮于事和工资过高是造成大学学费上涨的主要原因。好的，我们今天学习的词是 proliferate, proliferate, proliferate.

title: pathogen
article: 今天我们要学的词是 pathogen. Pathogen is spelled P-A-T-H-O-G-E-N, pathogen.Pathogen 的意思是病原体，病因。With new studies indicating that the world population can expect about five new animal-borne pathogens to infect humanity each year, there is an urgency to curb the wildlife trade. 新的研究表明，全球范围内每年可能有大.约五种新的动物传播病原体感染人类，因此限制野生动物交易迫在眉睫。Researchers who model the spread of pathogens say social distancing works because it reduces the effective strength of links between individuals，and that ultimately lowers the rate of transmission. 构筑病原体传播模型的研究人员说，保持社交距离是有效的，因为它削弱了人与之间联系的强度面最终降低了传播速度。好的，我们今天学习的词是 pathogen, pathogen, pathogen.

title: mantra
article: 今天我们要学的词是 mantra. Mantra is spelled M-A-N-T-R-A, mantra.Mantra 的意思是口号，口头禅。With “Social Distancing” now the mantra to keep the coronavirus from spreading further, more American consumers are turning to online delivery apps to get their food and household products. 随着”保持社交距离”成为防止冠状病毒疫情传播的口号，如今越来越多的美国消费者正在转向网约送货购买食物和家用产品。President Donald Trump and senior administration officials have begun to give optimistic assessments of America’s war against the coronavirus pandemic, as light at the end of the tunnel becomes a Trump team mantra. 特朗普总统及内阁高官已开始对美国抗击冠状病毒疫情做出乐观评估，“曙光就在前面”已成为特朗普团队的口头禅。好的，我们今天学习的词是 mantra, mantra, mantra.

title: ameliorate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ameliorate. Ameliorate is spelled A-M-E-L-I-O-R-A-T-E, ameliorate.Ameliorate 的意思是改良，改善。The State Department issued a statement to welcome the formation of a new Iraqi Government that is capable of confronting the COVID-19 pandemic, ameliorating the country’s current economic distress, and bringing arms under state control. 美国国务院发表声明，欢迎伊拉克组建一个有能力应对新冠病毒大流行、缓解国家目前的经济困境以及将军火控制在国家手里的新政府。In his recent Wall Street Journal op-ed, Henry Kissinger calls for programs to ameliorate chaos, suggesting the big government bailouts and government interventionism we witnessed in response to the Great Recession. 亨利·基辛格最近在《华尔街日报》发表的专栏中呼吁采取平息混乱的措施， 建议进行当年为应对大萧条而采取的大规模政府救助和政府干预。好的，我们今天学习的词是 ameliorate, ameliorate, ameliorate.

title: adhere
article: 今天我们要学的词是 adhere. Adhere is spelled A-D-H-E-R-E, adhere.Adhere 的原意是附着，adhere to somthing是指坚持，忠实于某件事。As Americans celebrate Passover and Easter while the nation deals with COVID-19, the White House Coronavirus Task Force urged religious communities to adhere to social distancing measures. 美国人庆祝逾越节和复活节之际正值美国在设法控制病毒传播，白宫冠状病毒特别工作组敦促宗教团体遵照执行保持社交距离的措施。American businesses and individuals do their best to adhere to “social distancing”, but it is inevitable that the public and employees will still come into close contact with one another. 美国的公司企业和个人尽力保持社交距离”，但公众和员工仍不可避免会有密切接触。好的，我们今天学习的词是 adhere, adhere, adhere.

title: hackathon
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hackathon. Hackathon is spelled H-A-C-K-A-T-H-O-N, hackathon.Hackathon 指的是一种短期的、夜以继日的程式设计竞赛，通常围绕一定的主题。Tech entrepreneurs in Estonia hosted a global hackathon last week in a movement that has attracted more than 100,000 developers from 40 countries, creating platforms to improve life and work from home. 爱沙尼亚的科技创业者们上周举办了一次全球范围的程式设计马拉松，吸引了来自40个国家的10万多名软件开发人员，来创建改善生活和居家工作的平台。The Virginia Department of Transportation invites developers, planners, futurists and data enthusiasts to its Smarter-Roads Hackathon, aimed at soliciting concepts and solutions to help address Virginia’s greatest transportation needs. 弗吉尼亚州交通运输部邀请软件开发人员、规划师、未来主义者和热衷数据的爱好者们参加其主办的“智能道路程式设计马拉松”，目的是征集帮助解决该州重大交通问题的概念和解决方案。好的，我们今天学习的词是 hackathon, hackathon, hackathon.

title: caseload
article: 今天我们要学的词是 caseload. Caseload is spelled C-A-S-E-L-O-A-D, caseload.Caseload 的意思是案件，案例。Despite a growing coronavirus caseload, Indonesia has avoided locking down population centers in favor of softer control measures to sustain an economy already stressed by poverty. 尽管印度尼西亚的冠状病毒感染病例不断增加，该国没有封锁人口密集的中心地区而选择采取软性控制措施来维持其已经陷入贫穷的经济。Covid-19 cases in Africa only accounted for 0.7% of the global infections as of April 12, 2020, which prompted researchers to look into demographics, age dynamics, climate and other factors, that could be keeping the caseload low in Africa. 非洲的新冠病例截至2020年4月12日为止仅占全球感染病例的0.7%，这促使研究人员从人口统计、年龄分布、气候和其他方面探讨导致非洲病例数量较低的因素。好的，我们今天学习的词是 caseload, caseload, caseload.

title: surrogate
article: 今天我们要学的词是 surrogate. Surrogate is spelled S-U-R-R-O-G-A-T-E, surrogate.Surrogate 的意思是替代。Former US President Barack Obama endorses Joe Biden for president, giving the former vice president a powerful surrogate and fundraiser as he heads into the general election against President Trump. 美国前总统奥巴马宣布支持前副总统拜登竞选总统，成为在拜登进入与特朗普总统进行对决的大选之际强有力的代理和筹款人。Those who blame Russia’s influence in American politics believe that there was a hack of the Democratic National Committee server that was carried out by a Russian surrogate or directly by Moscow’s military intelligence arm. 那些指责俄罗斯对美国政治发挥影响力的人认为，民主党全国委员会的服务器曾遭到的黑客入侵是由俄罗斯代理人或莫斯科的军事情报部门直接造成的。好的，我们今天学习的词是 surrogate, surrogate, surrogate.

title: pitchin
article: 今天我们要学的词是 pitch in. Pitch in is spelled P-I-T-C-H, pitch, and in, I-N, pitch in.pitch in 的意思是努力投入、参与。 As parents feel the stress of juggling working from home and home schooling their children during the COVID-19 pandemic, grandparents are pitching in to help. 家长们在新冠病毒大流行期间感受到在家里一边上班，一边辅导孩子学习的压力，祖父母们正积极提供帮助。Employees of Major League Baseball teams, including players, executives and stadium workers, are pitching in for a 10,000-person coronavirus study designed to map the spread of the virus in cities across America. 美国职业棒球大联盟球队的员工，包括球员、高管和体育馆工作人员，都在积极参与一项针对一万人进行的旨在了解冠状病毒在美国各城市传播情况的研究。好的，我们今天学习的词是 pitch in, pitch in, pitch in …

title: spectator
article: 今天我们要学的词是 spectator. Spectator is spelled S-P-E-C-T-A-T-O-R, spectator.spectator 的意思是旁观者，观众。 Several California colleges are moving ahead with e-game competitions, normally held as spectator events, with players facing off remotely from their homes. 加利福尼亚州的几所大学正在推进通过网络进行的游戏比赛，这些比赛通常有现场观众，现在则是参赛者在家里隔空对决。Capitol Hill’s famous cherry blossoms have lured spectators out of their self-isolation to enjoy the blooms, in spite of warnings from officials to practice social distancing due to the coronavirus outbreak. 国会山著名的樱花吸引了赏樱者们走出自我隔离，享受樱花绽放，尽管有关官员警告说，在冠状病毒大爆发期间要保持社交距离。好的，我们今天学习的词是 spectator, spectator, spectator …

title: eviction
article: 今天我们要学的词是 eviction. Eviction is spelled E-V-I-C-T-I-O-N, eviction.eviction 的意思是驱逐。 Evictions are officially on hold in Massachusetts after Governor Charlie Baker signed a bill blocking all evictions and foreclosure proceedings in the state for the duration of the coronavirus crisis. 马萨诸塞州正式暂停驱逐房客，之前该州州长查理·贝克签署法案，停止在冠状病毒流行期间的所有驱逐和止赎程序。好的，我们今天学习的词是 eviction, eviction, eviction …

title: presumptive
article: 今天我们要学的词是 presumptive. Presumptive is spelled P-R-E-S-U-M-P-T-I-V-E, presumptive.presumptive 的意思是假定的、推定的。 For Joe Biden, the 77-year-old presumptive Democratic Party nominee for president, selecting a running mate during the coronavirus pandemic has taken on even greater importance. 现年77岁的拜登成为假定的民主党总统候选人，对他而言，在冠状病毒大流行期间选择竞选伙伴具有更重要的意义。The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced recently that it would begin including “probable” cases of the coronavirus in its count of cases in the U.S. Its current count includes confirmed and presumptive positive cases. 美国疾病控制与预防中心最近宣布，将开始把“可能”的冠状病毒感染病例也算在美国的病例数中。目前的病例数包括确诊和推定为阳性的病例。好的，我们今天学习的词是 presumptive, presumptive, presumptive …

title: methodical
article: 今天我们要学的词是 methodical. Methodical is spelled M-E-T-H-O-D-I-C-A-L, methodical.methodical 的意思是有条理的，系统性的。 North Korean leader Kim Jong Un did not make his regular appearance in state media coverage of the country’s most important political holiday, a highly unusual absence in the country’s methodical reporting of official events. 朝鲜领导人金正恩没有按惯例出现在官方媒体对该国最重要的政治性节日的报道中，这在朝鲜按部就班地报道官方活动的情况下极为罕见。Many political observers agree that there has been a methodical leftward move of the Democrat Party, yet it’s not fast enough to suit Bernie Sanders’s supporters who complained that there was no left-wing party in the United States. 许多政治观察人士认为，民主党一直系统性地向左倾，但对伯尼·桑德斯的支持者们来说还不够快，他们抱怨美国没有左翼政党。好的，我们今天学习的词是 methodical, methodical, methodical …

title: grapple
article: 今天我们要学的词是 grapple. Grapple is spelled G-R-A-P-P-L-E, grapple.grapple 作为动词，意思是扭打、奋战。 Communities in the United States and around the world are talking about when and how to ease lockdown measures as they grapple with the COVID-19 pandemic. 美国和世界各地的社区在与新冠疫情奋战之际，也在讨论什么时候，以及如何放松全面隔离措施。Hospitals across the state of Wisconsin have been cutting workers and implementing other measures to mitigate the economic damage of COVID-19, as many health systems around the country grapple with similar challenges. 威斯康星州各地的医院一直在裁员并采取其他措施来减少新冠疫情带来的经济损失，与此同时全美各地的许多医疗系统都在应对类似的挑战。好的，我们今天学习的词是 grapple, grapple, grapple …

title: castout
article: 今天我们要学的词是 cast out. Cast out is spelled c-a-s-t cast and out o-u-t out, cast out.cast out 的意思是赶走，赶出。 A Detroit Democratic lawmaker was cast out by her party colleagues after she credited President Trump who voiced support for the medicine, she says, saved her life after she contracted COVID-19. 底特律的一名民主党议员受到党内同僚们的排斥，之前她表示在感染新冠病毒之后，特朗普总统提到的药物挽救了她的生命。Users who share information that is considered “harmful”, or opinions that are not favored by social media giants such as Facebook, Google and YouTube, are finding themselves cast out from those digital platforms more often nowadays. 一些用户在社交媒体上分享被脸书、谷歌和YouTube等社交媒体巨头归为“有害”的信息，或者不受欢迎的观点，他们如今正越来越频繁地被这些数字平台排斥在外。好的，我们今天学习的词是 cast out, cast out, cast out …

title: afloat
article: 今天我们要学的词是 afloat. Afloat is spelled A-F-L-O-A-T, afloat.afloat 的原意是浮在水面，漂浮，引申出来是指经济上能够周转，维持经营。 California’s economy has largely been kept afloat by Silicon Valley and industries built around it. Outside of these bubbles, the state has the highest poverty rate and the largest homeless population in America. 加利福尼亚州的经济在很大程度上是靠硅谷及其周边产业维持。而在这些泡沫之外，该州是美国贫困率最高、无家可归人口最多的地区。Tens of millions of Americans have lost their jobs while thousands of small businesses are trying to stay afloat due to the shutdown imposed by state governments to combat the spread of the coronavirus. 由于美国各州政府为制止冠状病毒的传播而下令企业关门，数千万美国人失去了工作，成千上万的小企业只能勉强维持经营。好的，我们今天学习的词是 afloat, afloat, afloat …

title: susceptible
article: 今天我们要学的词是 susceptible. Susceptible is spelled S-U-S-C-E-P-T-I-B-L-E, susceptible.susceptible 的意思是容易受影响、受伤害的。 Elderly persons are especially susceptible to the coronavirus. As a result, many senior living facilities have not allowed visitors. 老年人尤其容易感染冠状病毒。因此，许多养老设施一直不允许访客进入。The conservatives in the United States are voicing concerns that, in order to steal elections, the political left is leveraging the current pandemic to promote mail-in voting, which they say is particularly susceptible to fraud. 美国的保守派人士担忧，政治左派们会为了窃取选举而利用目前的疫情大流行来推动邮寄投票，他们认为这极易导致选票欺诈。好的，我们今天学习的词是 susceptible, susceptible, susceptible …

title: stigma
article: 今天我们要学的词是 stigma. Stigma is spelled S-T-I-G-M-A, stigma.stigma 的意思是让人羞耻的事，坏名声。 WHO Director-General Tedros Ghebreyesus opposed President Trump’s late-January travel ban that reduced arrivals from China by over 90 percent, saying “such restrictions can have the effect of increasing fear and stigma, with little public health benefit.” 世卫组织总干事谭德塞反对特朗普总统在一月下旬实施的旅行禁令，那一禁令将来自中国的入境人数减少了90％以上，但他称“此类限制会加深恐惧和污名化，对公众健康 没有好处。”The perception of playing video games used to be negative as the gamers were considered loners who are consumed by their games. However, this social stigma appears to be changing as gaming becomes more mainstream. 电子游戏以前给人带来负面印象，因为玩家们被认为沉迷在游戏中，与世隔绝。 但是，随着电子游戏变得越来越普遍，它在社会上的坏名声似乎正在改变。好的，我们今天学习的词是 stigma, stigma, stigma …

title: makeshift
article: 今天我们要学的词是 makeshift. Makeshift is spelled M-A-K-E-S-H-I-F-T, makeshift.makeshift 的意思是临时的，代用的。 A world famous chef has turned giant stadiums into makeshift kitchens to help those in need during the coronavirus pandemic by cooking and giving away free food. 在新冠疫情大流行期间，一位世界级的名厨把巨型体育场变成了临时厨房，以厨艺和赠餐来帮助有需要的人。South African engineers and doctors are designing makeshift, inexpensive devices to address a major challenge posed by the coronavirus crisis – the lack of ventilators for patients. 南非的工程师和医生们正在设计廉价的呼吸机代用设备，以解决新冠病毒危机带来的一个主要挑战，就是缺乏救治患者的呼吸机。好的，我们今天学习的词是 makeshift, makeshift, makeshift …

title: hobble
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hobble. Hobble is spelled H-O-B-B-L-E, hobble.hobble 的意思是步履蹒跚的、陷入困境的。 The COVID-19 pandemic has hobbled meat processing due to plant shutdowns, prompting President Donald Trump to order federal intervention in the industry. 新冠疫情大流行导致工厂关闭后，肉类食品加工不足，促使特朗普总统下令联邦政府进行干预。New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy is optimistic about reopening the state’s economy but cautioned the state is not ready to end its stay-at-home order or quit the weeklong social distancing guidelines that have hobbled the economy. 新泽西州州长菲尔·墨菲对重新开放本州经济活动感到乐观，但他也警告说，新泽西还没有准备好停止居家隔离政策，或撤销长达数周的保持社交距离的规定，这些规定令经济陷入困境。好的，我们今天学习的词是 hobble, hobble, hobble …

title: calamity
article: 今天我们要学的词是 calamity. Calamity is spelled C-A-L-A-M-I-T-Y, calamity.calamity 的意思是灾难，危难。 Almost all American presidents have faced a crisis while in office, whether it’s a political scandal, natural disaster, economic calamity or terrorism. But not all have the misfortune of having to deal with epidemics and pandemics. 几乎所有美国总统都曾经在任内经历危机，无论是政治丑闻、自然灾害、经济灾难还是恐怖主义。但并非所有人不得不应对区域和全球疾病大流行的不幸遭遇。New Yorkers are fighting the coronavirus in any way they can and trying to stay strong in the face of calamity as they did in the wake of the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks. 纽约人正竭尽全力与新冠病毒作斗争，并努力坚强面对这场灾难，就像2001年9月11日发生恐怖袭击之后一样。好的，我们今天学习的词是 calamity, calamity, calamity …

title: ricochet
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ricochet. Ricochet is spelled R-I-C-O-C-H-E-T, ricochet.ricochet 的意思是反弹，跳弹。The latest wave of coronavirus infections, mostly among migrant workers, highlights how Singapore ricocheted from a seeming success case to having the most infections in Southeast Asia. 新加坡最新一轮冠状病毒感染主要出现在外劳人员中，凸显出新加坡如何从一个东南亚看似成功的案例急转成为感染最严重的国家。Like a shot ricocheting at Heaven’s Door as Planet Lockdown is the new normal, Bob Dylan has released a stunning 17-minute masterpiece dissecting the November 22, 1963, assassination of John Kennedy. 在全球强制隔离成为新常态之际，如同一记敲打“天堂之门”的回声，鲍勃·迪伦推出了一首长达17分钟的惊人杰作，剖析了1963年11月22日约翰·肯尼迪遭暗杀的事件。好的，我们今天学习的词是 ricochet, ricochet, ricochet …

title: commencement
article: 今天我们要学的词是 commencement. Commencement is spelled C-O-M-M-E-N-C-E-M-E-N-T, commencementcommencement 的意思是开始，开端，不过常用的是指高中毕业和大学授予学位的仪式。 The class of 2020 will miss their commencement ceremonies due to many states’ bans onf all mass gatherings, prompting colleges and universities across the US to offer alternative solutions. 由于美国许多州禁止了所有聚众活动，2020年应届毕业生将无法举行毕业典礼，这促使美国各地的学校和大学提出替代解决办法。Past commencement speeches have racked up tens of millions of views on YouTube, and these digital events are a chance to bring a lot more eyes to the platforms now and in the future. 一些以往的毕业典礼演讲在YouTube上能吸引数千万的浏览次数，这些放到网上的活动是现在和将来能吸引更多人关注这些平台的机会。好的，我们今天学习的词是 commencement, commencement, commencement …

title: incendiary
article: 今天我们要学的词是 incendiary. Incendiary is spelled I-N-C-E-N-D-I-A-R-Y, incendiary.incendiary 的意思是纵火的、燃烧的。 According to conservative news outlets, Antifa protesters attacked the facility of a nonprofit organization during a May Day demonstration in Chicago, in which a child wasalmost seriously injured by an incendiary device. 据保守派新闻媒体报道，反法西斯抗议者们在芝加哥举行的一个五一节示威中袭击了一个非营利组织的设施，期间一名儿童险些被一个燃烧弹造成重伤。US Attorney General William Barr said that American leaders should be chosen “through the election process”, and “efforts to use the law enforcement process to change leaders or to disable administrations are incendiary in this country.” 美国司法部长威廉·巴尔说，美国的领导人应该“通过选举程序”选出，而“利用执法程序更换领导人或阻止政府行使职权的努力在美国是玩火行为”。好的，我们今天学习的词是 incendiary, incendiary, incendiary …

title: congregation
article: 今天我们要学的词是 congregation. Congregation is spelled C-O-N-G-R-E-G-A-T-I-O-N, congregation.congregation 是指教区里的信徒，会众。 As Kentucky prepares to lift shelter-in-place restrictions in the coming weeks, state officials urge faith leaders to communicate with their congregations about the safety of religious gatherings. 随着肯塔基州准备在未来几周内取消居家隔离的限制，州政府官员敦促宗教领袖们提请他们教区的会众注意教堂聚会时的安全。In support of local businesses, a congregation in Maine organized a “community-supported lobster” program that encourages parishioners to buy in bulk from lobstermen and provides volunteer -run delivery. 为了支持本地企业，缅因州一个教区的会众组织了一个“社区支持龙虾”项目，鼓励教区居民从捕捞者那里批量购买龙虾并提供志愿者负责的送货服务。好的，我们今天学习的词是 congregation, congregation, congregation …Looks good.

title: hierarchy
article: 今天我们要学的词是 hierarchy. Hierarchy is spelled H-I-E-R-A-R-C-H-Y, hierarchy.hierarchy 的意思是等级制，阶层。Millennials in Asia say they are benefitting from remote working by not only getting extra hours for more rest or pursuing hobbies, but also escaping from the constraints of traditional work culturehierarchy. 亚洲的千禧一代表示，他们享受到远程工作的好处，不仅有了更多时间用来休息或发展个人爱好，而且还摆脱了传统的等级制工作文化的束缚。The U.S. Constitution did not create a hierarchy of government in which the federal government is the highest, states second, and county and municipal governments are at the bottom, but instead set up a way in which the states could join together and provide for certain needs that individual states could not fulfill on their own. 美国宪法并没有建立联邦政府高高在上，各州其次，县市政府垫底的政府等级制度，而是建立了各州可以联合起来为无法满足某些需要的单个州提供帮助的方式。好的，我们今天学习的词是 hierarchy, hierarchy, hierarchy …

title: defiance
article: 今天我们要学的词是 defiance. Defiance is spelled D-E-F-I-A-N-C-E, defiance.defiance 的意思是违抗，蔑视。 Pennsylvania Democratic Governor Tom Wolf threatened to withhold federal stimulus money from counties that are planning on opening up without his approval and in defiance of his orders. 宾夕法尼亚州民主党州长汤姆·沃尔夫威胁说，他不会把联邦经济刺激计划的资金拨给那些未经他批准以及违抗他命令而计划开放的县。Tesla founder and CEO Elon Musk announced he was officially reopening his California electric car plant in defiance of local government lockdown orders amid the coronavirus pandemic. 特斯拉创始人兼首席执行官马斯克无视地方政府在新冠病毒大流行之际实施的封锁令，宣布将正式重新开放在加利福尼亚州的电动汽车制造厂。好的，我们今天学习的词是 defiance, defiance, defiance …

title: forbid
article: 今天我们要学的词是 forbid. Forbid is spelled F-O-R-B-I-D, forbid.forbid 的意思是禁止，阻止。 Italy plans to reopen bars and restaurants as the country’s new coronavirus cases have decreased. However, getting around the country remains difficult as social distancing guidelines forbid using mass transit. 随着意大利新冠病毒感染的新病例有所减少，意大利计划重新开放酒吧和餐馆。不过由于保持社交距离的规定禁止使用公共交通工具，在意大利各地旅行仍然很困难。Apple and Google have provided samples of what eventual coronavirus exposure apps might look like although they won’t be developing the apps themselves and forbid the use of GPS-enabled location services. 苹果和谷歌推出了检测新冠病毒暴露风险的应用程序样品，不过它们不会自行开发这些应用程序，并禁止使用启动全球定位系统的定位服务。好的，我们今天学习的词是 forbid, forbid, forbid …

title: gaslight
article: 今天我们要学的词是 gaslight. Gaslight is spelled G-A-S-L-I-G-H-T, gaslight.gaslight 是煤气灯。现在基本用来指以谎言进行心理操纵，出自美国1940年代一部同名电影。Since the new coronavirus took over our lives, mixed messages about the risks have left many people feeling confused and doubting their decisions like living in a gaslight culture, a term to describe psychological manipulation of people. 自从新冠病毒占据我们的生活以来，对于相关风险的杂乱信息让许多人感到困惑以及对自己的决定产生怀疑，就像生活在煤气灯文化之中——那是一个形容人们受到心理操纵的名词。Women who have accused Harvey Weinstein of sexual assault said the disgraced movie mogul is “trying to gaslight society”, after he said in an interview that his “pioneering” work on “movies directed by women and about women” was being forgotten. 指控哈维·韦恩斯坦性侵的多位女性说，这位身败名裂的电影大亨正“企图操纵社会（舆论）”，之前他接受采访时称他在“女性导演、女性故事”方面的“开拓性”工作被人遗忘。好的，我们今天学习的词是 gaslight, gaslight, gaslight …

title: draconian
article: 今天我们要学的词是 draconian. Draconian is spelled D-R-A-C-O-N-I-A-N, draconian.draconian 的意思是严厉的、严苛的，尤其指法律规定。As COVID-19 spreads around the globe, governments have responded by imposing draconian restrictions, mandating business closures and requiring people to remain at home. 随着新冠病毒在全球范围内传播，各国政府采取了严厉的限制措施，要求企业关门，民众呆在家里。Although many Americans have willingly complied with the stay-at-home rules as a necessary way of defeating the coronavirus, that cooperation will quickly disappear if they find that their leaders are abusing their political powers with foolish and even draconian demands. 尽管许多美国人愿意遵守在家隔离的规定，相信这是战胜冠状病毒的必要之举，但如果他们发现领导人滥用政治权力，提出愚蠢甚至严苛的要求，这种合作将很快消失。好的，我们今天学习的词是 draconian, draconian, draconian

title: meddle
article: 今天我们要学的词是 meddle. Meddle is spelled M-E-D-D-L-E, meddle.meddle 的意思是插手、干预。 In a BBC documentary to mark his 70th birthday, Prince Charles, who has often been criticized for his views on Classicism and his influence on the property sector, said he would stop ‘meddling’ in architectural issues when he becomes king. 查尔斯王子在英国广播公司为庆祝他70岁生日而推出的纪录片中表示，他成为国王后将不会再“干预”建筑设计问题。他因对古典主义的看法以及对房地产业的影响力而经常受到批评。好的，我们今天学习的词是 meddle, meddle, meddle …

title: wrought
article: 今天我们要学的词是 wrought. Wrought is spelled W-R-O-U-G-H-T, wrought.wrought 作为形容词是指锻造成型的。作为动词的意思是造成，造就。U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell and Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin painted a bleak picture of the economic devastation the coronavirus pandemic has wrought on the country. 美联储主席鲍威尔和财政部长努钦指出新型冠状病毒大流行对美国造成的经济破坏十分严重。This is what online comparison shopping hath wrought： Consumers have gained so much power that retailers are now staring back through the screen and are comparison shopping — us. 这就是网上比价购物所造成的：消费者们的力量已经如此之强大，以至于零售商们从屏幕的另一边进行比价购物，目标是我们。好的，我们今天学习的词是 wrought, wrought, wrought …

title: bumpercrop
article: 今天我们要学的词是 Bumper crop. Bumper crop is spelled B-U-M-P-E-R, bumper, and C-R-O-P, crop, Bumper crop.Bumper crop 的意思是大丰收。 Summer fruits and vegetables have ripened, a bumper crop of wheat is ready for harvest in India, but a severe labor shortages could leave millions of farmers with huge losses. 印度的夏季水果和蔬菜已经成熟，丰收的小麦有待收割，但是严重的劳动力短缺可能使数百万农民蒙受巨大损失。The coronavirus pandemic is creating a mountain of medical waste. Healthcare facilities, medical laboratories and biomedical research facilities are all going through a bumper crop of disposables. 新冠病毒大流行正带来大量医用垃圾。那些医护设施、医学实验室和生物医学研究单位都在大量使用一次性医疗用品。好的，我们今天学习的词是 Bumper crop, Bumper crop, Bumper crop …

title: propel
article: 今天我们要学的词是 propel. Propel is spelled P-R-O-P-E-L, propel.propel 的意思是推进，推动。 With the launch of two NASA astronauts into orbit, SpaceX aims to propel the U.S. into a historic new era of commercially-led space exploration. SpaceX公司将两名美国宇航员送入太空轨道，目的是推动美国进入商业化太空探索的历史性新时代。Double-digit revenue and profit growth propelled Progressive Corp. up this year’s Fortune 500 ladder, while the home and auto insurer kept its No. 1 ranking among Cleveland-area companies. 美国前进保险公司两位数的营业额和利润增长将其推进至《财富》杂志的美国500强企业之列，而这家家庭和汽车保险公司在克利夫兰地区的企业中继续排名第一。好的，我们今天学习的词是 propel, propel, propel …

title: rendezvous
article: 今天我们要学的词是 rendezvous. Rendezvous is spelled R-E-N-D-E-Z-V-O-U-S, rendezvous.rendezvous 的意思是会合，对接。 Iran and Venezuela hailed victorious ‘defiance’ over the US as Venezuela’s Ocean Patroller rendezvoused with an Iranian tanker on Saturday in international waters. 委内瑞拉的一艘巡洋舰星期六在国际水域与伊朗的一艘油轮对接，两国欢呼这是对美国进行的胜利的“反抗”。Astronauts will likely perform a demonstration of the Orion spacecraft’s deep space rendezvous capabilities in a high-altitude orbit around Earth on its first piloted test flight, now scheduled for 2023. 宇航员可能会在 “猎户座”飞船现定于2023年进行的首次试飞中，在围绕地球的高空轨道上对飞船的深空对接能力进行演示。好的，我们今天学习的词是 rendezvous, rendezvous, rendezvous …

title: assuage
article: 今天我们要学的词是 assuage. Assuage is spelled A-S-S-U-A-G-E, assuage.assuage 的意思是缓和，安抚。 Changes to the rules about outdoor gatherings to allow bigger groups could be announced this week in the UK, as ministers are keen to assuage public concerns about being unable to see friends and family. 英国本周可能会宣布改变有关户外聚会的规定，允许更多人参加集体聚会，英内阁大臣们迫切希望缓解民众由于无法见到朋友和家人而产生的忧虑。好的，我们今天学习的词是 assuage, assuage, assuage …

title: crosshair
article: 今天我们要学的词是 crosshair. Crosshair is spelled C-R-O-S-S-H-A-I-R, crosshair.crosshair 直译过来就是十字准线，引申的意思是准星、靶向。 The nursing home in Kirkland, Washington, was the epicenter of the COVID-19 outbreak when it first started in the U.S., before it turned its crosshairs onto the Northeast and Mid-Atlantic regions. 华盛顿州柯克兰的养老院是新冠病毒疫情最初在美国爆发的起源地，之后疫情中心转移到美国东北部和沿大西洋中部地区。The state of Washington temporarily halted all unemployment benefit payments to examine fraud protections after the U.S. Secret Service alerted the state that it was in the crosshairs of international thieves targeting unemployment funds. 华盛顿州暂时停止了所有失业救济金付款以审查防假冒 保护措施，之前美国特勤局发出警报说，进行失业救济金诈骗的国际窃贼们瞄准了该州。好的，我们今天学习的词是 crosshair, crosshair, crosshair …

title: albeit
article: 今天我们要学的词是 albeit. Albeit is spelled A-L-B-E-I-T, albeit.albeit 是一个副词，意思是尽管。 Some passenger airplanes are preparing to rev up their engines again as countries begin to relax their travel restrictions and prepare for summer vacationers – albeit in much lower numbers. 随着各国开始放宽旅行限制，一些民用班机正准备再度开动引擎，为夏季游客做准备，尽管游客数量会少得多。Restaurants and retail businesses in Florida have been reopened following guidelines from the state government. Governor Ron DeSantis also announced that hair and nail salons may reopen, albeit with certain restrictions. 佛罗里达州的餐馆和零售商已按照州政府的指导方针重新开放。州长罗恩·德桑蒂斯还宣布，美发店和美甲店也可以重新开放，尽管有一定的限制。好的，我们今天学习的词是 albeit, albeit, albeit …

title: knell
article: 今天我们要学的词是 knell. Knell is spelled K-N-E-L-L, knell.knell 的意思是丧钟。 The COVID-19 crisis could be the death knell for some polarizing office trends, such as the shared workspaces used by many technology startups to create a more casual and creative environment. 新冠病毒危机可能为一些两极分化的办公趋势敲响丧钟，例如许多科技初创公司为营造更加休闲和创意的环境而使用的共享工作区。好的，我们今天学习的词是 knell, knell, knell …

title: precarious
article: 今天我们要学的词是 precarious. Precarious is spelled P-R-E-C-A-R-I-O-U-S, precarious.precarious 的意思是岌岌可危的，不稳定的。While many are excited about the China-funded redevelopment of an iconic fishing community in Ghana, the demolition of over 300 temporary and permanent structures has also raised fears for already precarious livelihoods. 尽管加纳许多人对该国一个标志性的渔业社区得到中国的资助进行重建感到兴奋，但拆除当地300多个临时和永久性建筑物也让人们对已经难以为继的生活感到担忧。Despite Sudan’s precarious economic and political situation, hopes are growing that the country could soon be in a position to open its doors to outside investment. 尽管苏丹的经济和政治局势不稳定，但人们对苏丹能够很快向外界投资敞开大门的希望越来越大。好的，我们今天学习的词是 precarious, precarious, precarious …

title: deleterious
article: 今天我们要学的词是 deleterious. Deleterious is spelled D-E-L-E-T-E-R-I-O-U-S, deleterious.deleterious 的意思是有害的。 The economic impact of the novel coronavirus and trade tensions between economic powerhouses China and the United States have had deleterious effects on some Asian economies. 新型冠状病毒以及中美两个经济强国之间的贸易紧张关系对一些亚洲经济体产生了有害影响。The shutdown of the physical retail operation had a deleterious impact on retail sales which fell by almost 44% over the prior year, however those who put more effort behind e-commerce marketing fared much better. 实体零售店的关闭给零售业销售造成了不良影响，零售额比去年下降了近44％，但是那些加强电子商务营销努力的商家要好得多。好的，我们今天学习的词是 deleterious, deleterious, deleterious …

title: prerogative
article: 今天我们要学的词是 prerogative. Prerogative is spelled P-R-E-R-O-G-A-T-I-V-E, prerogative.prerogative 的意思是特权。 White House press secretary Kayleigh McEnany left open the possibility that President Trump might invoke the Insurrection Act, saying that it is the president’s prerogative whether he decides to pursue it. 白宫新闻秘书麦肯尼没有明确说明特朗普总统执行《叛乱法》的可能性，她表示是否决定启动该法是总统的特权。New York Governor Andrew Cuomo tried to distance himself from the decision to direct nursing homes to accept coronavirus patients, saying it was the nursing homes’ prerogative to turn away patients they couldn’t safely handle. 纽约州长库莫试图淡化有关指示该州养老院接受新冠病毒患者的决定，他说，养老院有权拒绝那些他们认为无法安全处理的患者。好的，我们今天学习的词是 prerogative, prerogative, prerogative …

title: staveoff
article: 今天我们要学的词是 stave off. Stave off is spelled S-T-A-V-E, stave, and O-F-F, off, stave off.stave off 的意思是避开，阻止。 Singaporeans got perms and car repairs Tuesday when the first phase of life after lockdown began, but that will not be enough economic activity to stave off what looks to be the worst recession in the state’s history. 新加坡星期二进入封锁隔离取消后的第一阶段，当地人得到了烫发和汽车维修等服务，但这些经济活动不足以让新加坡避开看来是其有史以来最严重的经济衰退。Millions of people with diabetes use insulin to keep their blood sugars within normal ranges and stave off complications that can include heart disease, blindness, kidney failure and amputations. 数以百万计的糖尿病患者依靠胰岛素将血糖保持在正常范围内，并避免包括心脏病、失明，肾衰竭和截肢在内的并发症。好的，我们今天学习的词是 stave off, stave off, stave off …

title: pent-up
article: 今天我们要学的词是 Pent-up. Pent-up is spelled P-E-N-T-hyphen-U-P, pent-up.pent-up 的意思是积压的，压抑的。 The CEO of Minneapolis-based Target, a retailer hit hard by angry protesters, said the death of George Floyd while detained by police officers unleashed the “pent-up pain of years.” 总部位于明尼阿波利斯市的塔吉特百货公司的零售店在愤怒的抗议中遭受沉重打击。该公司首席执行官说，乔治·弗洛伊德在被警察拘留时死亡使得“多年积压的痛苦”爆发出来。With shops, hairdressers and other places opening again across Europe, business owners are working overtime to ensure they will make up lost income after two months of closure; but few believe this spike in pent-up business signals a post-crisis boom. 随着欧洲各地商店、发廊和其他地方重新开放，业主们加班加点以弥补关闭两个月后损失的营业额。不过几乎没有人相信，被抑制的商业活动激增预示了危机后的繁荣。好的，我们今天学习的词是 pent-up, pent-up, pent-up …

title: annex
article: 今天我们要学的词是 annex. Annex is spelled A-N-N-E-X, annex.annex 作为动词的意思是合并，吞并。 The future of the Israeli-Palestinian peace process is in question as Israel prepares to annex parts of the West Bank in the coming weeks. 以色列准备在未来几周内将约旦河西岸部分地区并入以色列，这使得以巴和平进程的未来受到质疑。Voters will decide whether or not to annex the school district into the Ozarks Technical Community College, and in turn, get reduced tuition for classes at OTC, and a brand new campus at the Lake of the Ozarks. 选民们将投票决定是否将当地学区并入奧沙克技术社区学院，以得到该学院课程的优惠学费以及在奧沙克湖边的全新校舍。好的，我们今天学习的词是 annex, annex, annex …

title: lexicon
article: 今天我们要学的词是 lexicon. Lexicon is spelled L-E-X-I-C-O-N, lexicon.lexicon 的意思是词典，词汇库。 Universal’s Republic Records has decided to drop the use of the word “urban” from its lexicon in describing departments, employee titles, and genres as the music industry recalibrates itself in the George Floyd era. 随着音乐产业在乔治·弗洛伊德事件之际重新进行自我调整，环球集团旗下的联众唱片公司已决定在音乐部门的名称、职员头衔以及音乐流派中不再使用“都市”这个词。The COVID-19 pandemic has been a public health crisis of historic portions, with the phrase “frontline workers” becoming part of the daily lexicon. 新冠病毒大流行已成为历史性的公共卫生危机，“一线人员”这个词正变成日常用语的一部分。好的，我们今天学习的词是 lexicon, lexicon, lexicon …

title: ransack
article: 今天我们要学的词是 ransack. Ransack is spelled R-A-N-S-A-C-K, ransack.ransack 的意思是劫掠、洗劫一空。 As looters were ransacking businesses throughout the city of Chicago more than a week ago, aldermen pleaded with Mayor Lori Lightfoot to help them protect their communities. 一个多星期前，当哄抢之徒在芝加哥各地洗劫商店时，市议员们恳求市长莱特富特帮助他们保护他们的社区。President Trump demanded ‘law and order’ by urging Pennsylvania’s governor to call in the National Guard as looters and rioters ransacked stores and set fires across Philadelphia. 在哄抢者及暴徒们在费城各地洗劫商店、纵火焚烧之际，特朗普总统敦促宾夕法尼亚州州长召集国民警卫队以保障社会治安。好的，我们今天学习的词是 ransack, ransack, ransack …

title: dystopian
article: 今天我们要学的词是 dystopian. Dystopian is spelled D-Y-S-T-O-P-I-A-N, dystopian.dystopian 的意思是反乌托邦，一个不受欢迎甚至令人恐惧的社会形态。71 years ago, George Orwell published “1984”, a novel about a dystopian future where absolute conformity in action, word and thought including loyalty to Big Brother is demanded. 71年前，乔治·奥威尔出版了一部关于反乌托邦的小说《1984》，里面描绘了一个要求人们在行动、语言和思想上绝对一致，而且忠诚于“老大哥”的未来社会。Dystopian sci-fi has a long history of creating neat metaphors for social division by imagining worlds that physically segregate living space. 反乌托邦科幻小说历来通过描述生活空间遭到隔离的世界来隐喻社会的分裂。好的，我们今天学习的词是 dystopian, dystopian, dystopian …

title: asymptomatic
article: 今天我们要学的词是 asymptomatic. Asymptomatic is spelled A-S-Y-M-P-T-O-M-A-T-I-C, asymptomatic.asymptomatic 的意思是无症状的。 A new study found that 86% of coronavirus cases are asymptomatic. The carriers have no idea they are infected but can still spread it. 一项新的研究发现，86％的冠状病毒感染病例没有症状。病毒携带者在不知道自己被感染的情况下仍可以传播病毒。Sweden continues its strategy that involves voluntary social distancing measures and no lockdowns for combating the coronavirus, while several recent studies have affirmed that cases of “asymptomatic transmission” appear to be very rare. 瑞典继续实施其应对新冠病毒的战略，其中包括民众自愿进行社交隔离以及不采取封锁隔离措施。而最近的一些研究证实，“无症状传播”病例似乎非常少见。好的，我们今天学习的词是 asymptomatic, asymptomatic, asymptomatic …

title: defacto
article: 今天我们要学的词是 de facto. De facto is spelled D-E, de, and facto, F-A-C-T-O, facto, de facto.de facto 是一个拉丁语的法学词汇，意思是法律并未承认，但事实上存在的。 North Korea has followed through on its threat to demolish the de facto inter-Korean embassy just north of the border, Pyongyang’s latest move to ratchet up tensions with Seoul. 朝鲜威胁要拆除其境内的实际是南北之间的大使馆之后付诸行动，这是平壤加剧与首尔紧张关系的最新之举。好的，我们今天学习的词是 de facto, de facto, de facto …

title: chafe
article: 今天我们要学的词是 chafe. chafe is spelled C-H-A-F-E, chafe.chafe 的意思是摩擦。 Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte’s agreement to give a U.S. military pact its second chance despite distaste for Washington shows his relations with China are chafing after four years, analysts believe. 分析人士认为，尽管菲律宾总统杜特尔特对华盛顿不满，但他同意再次协商与美国的军事协议表明，他与中国的关系在四年后陷入困境。While the European aviation industry is celebrating the full reopening of regional travel business ahead of the summer travel season, airlines are chafing against Britain’s strict coronavirus safeguards that went into effect on June 8. 在欧洲航空业庆祝夏季旅游旺季开始之前当地旅游业全面开放的同时，航空公司也为英国于6月8日生效的严格的新冠疫情防范措施深感不满。好的，我们今天学习的词是 chafe, chafe, chafe …

title: provocative
article: 今天我们要学的词是 provocative. Provocative is spelled P-R-O-V-O-C-A-T-I-V-E, provocative.provocative 的意思是刺激的，挑衅性的。Although the inter-Korean liaison office building in Kaesong was not being used, destroying it was still the most provocative act by North Korea since it entered nuclear talks with the U.S. in 2018. 尽管设在开城的南北韩联络处办公楼没有被启用，但现在将它摧毁仍然是自2018年美朝核谈 以来朝鲜最具挑衅性的行为。好的，我们今天学习的词是 provocative, provocative, provocative …

title: preliminary
article: 今天我们要学的词是 preliminary. Preliminary is spelled P-R-E-L-I-M-I-N-A-R-Y, preliminary.preliminary 的意思是初步的，预备的。 Afghanistan’s warring sides have agreed to open a preliminary round of peace negotiations later this month for a sustainable cease-fire and political settlement to years of conflict in the country. 阿富汗交战各方已同意在本月晚些时候展开初步的和平谈判，讨论可持续停火协议以及阿富汗多年冲突的政治解决方案。The Israeli police have been carrying out a preliminary investigation to assess whether there may be evidence of fraudulent dealings of Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in a company controlled by his American cousin more than a decade ago. 以色列警方一直在进行初步调查，以评估是否能证明以色列总理内塔尼亚胡十多年前在他美国表亲控制的一家公司的交易中有欺诈行为。好的，我们今天学习的词是 preliminary, preliminary, preliminary …

title: burnish
article: 今天我们要学的词是 burnish. Burnish is spelled B-U-R-N-I-S-H, burnish.burnish 的意思是擦亮，增色。 Twitter has been important in burnishing the image of President Donald Trump, but the social media company has recently begun to flag Trump’s tweets when they are deemed misleading. 推特对于为特朗普总统的形象增色一直很重要，但是最近这家社交媒体公司在认为特朗普总统的推文具有误导性时，开始为他的推文加上警告标示。Some analysts suspect Kim Yo Jong, sister to North Korea’s leader, may now be raising tensions with South Korea in order to burnish her military credentials and alleviate concerns about her rise within the country’s leadership. 一些分析人士怀疑，朝鲜领导人金正恩的妹妹金与正现在可能正在加剧与韩国的紧张关系，以提高她在军事方面的资历并减少人们对她在朝鲜领导层中升迁的担忧。好的，我们今天学习的词是 burnish, burnish, burnish …

title: moniker
article: 今天我们要学的词是 moniker. Moniker is spelled M-O-N-I-K-E-R, moniker.moniker 的意思是绰号。 France has weathered multiple crises in recent years. While successive governments champion the country’s revolution-era moniker as the land of human rights, critics say they don’t always live by it. 法国近年来经历了多次危机。尽管历届政府都称赞大革命时期法国被誉为人权之地，但批评人士说，法国政府并非一直名至实归。The official name of the smallest U.S. state is Rhode Island and Providence Plantations, but some residents want to change the moniker saying it is offensive to African Americans. 美国最小的州的正式称号是罗得岛，但一些居民希望更改它的绰号普罗维登斯种植园，他们认为这冒犯了非洲裔美国人。好的，我们今天学习的词是 moniker, moniker, moniker …

title: spawn
article: 今天我们要学的词是 spawn. Spawn is spelled S-P -A-W-N, spawn.spawn 的原意是产卵。 A team at Tokyo University has successfully used stem cells to spawn some 1,700 rainbow trout from a single fish, a technique that could pave the way for preservation of endangered fish and enable their mass production. 东京大学的一个研究小组已经成功地利用干细胞从一条鱼诞生出约1,700条虹鳟鱼，这项技术可以为保护濒临灭绝的鱼类，并让其大量繁殖铺平道路。spawn引申出来有繁殖、催生的意思。The first effective treatment of HIV/AIDS started it US medical trial 25 years ago. It spawned a generationof drugs that saved countless lives and is still helping to prevent the spread of the virus today. 艾滋病毒的第一种有效疗法25年前在美国开始进行医学试验。它催生的一代治疗药物至今已挽救了无数生命，并仍在帮助预防这种病毒的传播。好的，我们今天学习的词是 spawn, spawn, spawn …

title: disengage
article: 今天我们要学的词是 disengage. Disengage is spelled D-I-S-E-N-G-A-G-E, disengage.disengage 的意思是脱离，解除。 After marathon talks, Indian and Chinese military officials agreed to disengage their forces in a disputed area where a bloody clash between their troops led to the death of 20 Indian soldiers. 在印度和中国军方官员进行了马拉松式的会谈后，双方同意解除其在有争议地区的武装对峙，那里的血腥冲突导致20名印度士兵丧生。A National Park Service spokesperson confirmed that pepper spray was used to disengage the protesters from the statue of Andrew Jackson in Lafayette Square as they tried to topple it. 美国国家公园管理局发言人证实，在抗议者们试图推翻拉斐特广场上安德鲁·杰克逊的雕像时使用了辣椒喷雾将抗议人群驱离。好的，我们今天学习的词是 disengage, disengage, disengage …

title: condone
article: 今天我们要学的词是 condone. Condone is spelled C-O-N-D-O-N-E, condone.condone 的意思是宽容，宽恕。 IBM is no longer offering general purpose facial recognition or analysis software. The company says it will not condone uses of any technology for “mass surveillance” or “racial profiling”. IBM不再提供用于面部识别或分析等一般用途的软件，并表示不会容忍将任何技术用于“大规模监控”或“种族定性”。French President Emmanual Macron said he would not condone racism but would also not condone the destruction or removal of any of France’s history, good and bad, including statues. 法国总统马克龙表示，他不会容忍种族主义，但也不会纵容对无论是好是坏的法国历史，包括雕像在内进行破坏或清除。好的，我们今天学习的词是 condone, condone, condone …

title: drubbing
article: 今天我们要学的词是 drubbing. Drubbing is spelled D-R-U-B-B-I-N-G, drubbing.drubbing 的意思是敲打，重创。 Frenchance President Emmanuel Macron’s centrist party received a drubbing Sunday in municipal elections, as the Greens celebrated victories in several big cities after a surge in support. 法国总统马克龙的中间党派在星期日举行的市政选举中遭受重创，而绿党则庆祝他们在几个大城市的支持率大增之后选举获胜。The U.S. hotel industry’s performance for the month of April showed that hoteliers, primarily those with high-end brands, took a drubbing as the pandemic nixed lucrative corporate business. 美国酒店业4月份的业绩显示，新冠病毒大流行切断了利润丰厚的公司业务，酒店业者们，主要是经营高端品牌酒店的公司受到重创。好的，我们今天学习的词是 drubbing, drubbing, drubbing …

title: emblem
article: 今天我们要学的词是 emblem. Emblem is spelled E-M-B-L-E-M, emblem.emblem 的意思是徽章、象征。Mississippi’s House and Senate took historic votes on Sunday to remove a Confederate battle emblem from their state flag, more than a century after the design was adopted in 1894. 密西西比州的众议院和参议院星期日进行了一次历史性表决，将美国内战时期邦联军队的战徽从州旗上删掉，这个1894年采用的设计距今已有一个多世纪。North Korea’s Supreme Commander flag and emblem — composed of a Marshal’s Star and a half-wreath — has been a key representative symbol of the country’s leader Kim Jong Un. 朝鲜最高指挥官的旗帜和由一个元帅星和半个花圈组成的徽记，一直是象征朝鲜领导人金正恩的主要标志。好的，我们今天学习的词是 emblem, emblem, emblem …

title: egregious
article: 今天我们要学的词是 egregious.
